Five types of antennal sensilla were identified, including sensilla rod-like, sensilla furcatea, sensilla chaetica, sensilla trichoid, sensilla squamiformia, and some cuticular pores. Sensilla furcatea represents a unique sensillum type in the antenna of Curculionidae, and named here after their furcate shape. The number of sensilla squamiformia and sensilla furcatea on male antennae was significantly more than that on female antennae. The antennal shape, distribution and number of these sensilla and their differences between sexes were deseribexi and compared.

ags:resource.dc:title: Detection and variation analysis of Potato virus Y tobacco isolates in Zhaotong, Yunnan Province from 2009 to 2011
马铃薯Y病毒云南昭通烟草分离物的检测及年度间差异比较

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lu Xun, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kunming (China), Institute of Biotechnology and Germplasm Resources
Ding Ming, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kunming (China), Institute of Biotechnology and Germplasm Resources
Fang Qi, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kunming (China), Institute of Biotechnology and Germplasm Resources

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用DASELISA检测试剂盒检测昭通烟草脉斑病样品，结果表明存在马铃薯Y病毒O株系和马铃薯Y病毒N株系两个不同株系病毒。利用Sprimer和M4引物扩增、克隆、测序，得到长度为1771bp目的片段，该片段包含病毒的外壳蛋白基因序列、3’UTR序列以及部分Nib基因序列；序列分析表明与湖南HN-2分离物（GenBank No. GQ200836）和美国NE-11分离物（GenBank No. DQl57180）核苷酸序列相似性均为98%，系统进化分析表明其具有较近的亲缘关系。

The samples with tobacco vein necrosis symptoms were isolated from Zhaotong, Yunnan Province from 2009 to 2011, and detected by DAS-ELISA. The results showed that the samples contained two strains of PVY, namely PVY and PVYN. The expected PCR fragments were obtained by PCR with Sprimer and M4 primers. The fragments were cloned and sequenced. The sequence analysis showed that the length of the nucleotide sequence of different isolates were 1 771 bp, which contained PVY cp gene sequence, 3’UTR sequence and part of Nib gene sequence. Phylogenetic analysis showed that PVY tobacco isolates from Zhaotong had close relationships with Hunan HN-2 isolates (GenBank No. GQ200836) and the United States NE-11 isolate (GenBank No. DQ157180). The homology of nucleotide sequences between them was above 98%.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the pathogenic crude toxin of the tobacco root rot extracted from Fusarium sp.
烟草镰刀菌根腐病病菌致病粗毒素的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Jie, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Qingdao (China), Research Institute of Tobacco
Wang Jing, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Qingdao (China), Research Institute of Tobacco
Li Naihui, Shandong Linyi Tobacco Company, Linyi (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本试验测定了经尖孢镰刀菌（Fusarium oxysporum）和茄病镰刀菌（F. solani）粗毒素浸泡后烟草幼苗抗病相关酶系的活性及细胞膜透性的变化，以研究毒素对烟草的致病作用。结果表明，引起烟草根腐病的尖孢镰刀菌和茄病镰刀茵的毒素属于非寄主专化性毒素（NHST）。烟草幼苗经毒素处理12～60h，其过氧化物酶（peroxidase，POD）和多酚氧化酶（polyphenol oxidase，PPO）的活性都迅速升高，随后下降，幼苗出现不同程度的萎蔫。50%的毒素液处理幼苗根部54h后，根部细胞膜的损伤率比对照均增加了80%，叶片的细胞膜损伤率比对照增加了90%。另外毒素处理能抑制烟草种子胚根的生长，使幼苗萎蔫，与病原菌直接接种表现相同，说明毒素是病原菌侵染烟草导致发病的一个重要因子。

This study was to investigate the pathogenicity of the toxins extracted from Fusariurn oxysporum and F. solani against tobacco through measuring the activity of resistant enzymes and the changes of cell membrane’s permeability by immersing the seedling tobacco in the toxins. The results showed that the crude toxins of F. oxysporum and F. solani causing root rot were both determined as the non-host-specific toxin (NHST). The activity of peroxidase and polyphenol oxidase from seedlings treated with toxins for 12 - 60 h increased rapidly, then declined, showing wilting symptom to different degrees. Compared to the control, the damage rate of root’s membrane increased by 80%, while that of leaf’s membrane increased by 90% after the seedling root exposed to toxins at 50% concentration for 54 h. Besides, toxins could restrain the growth of seeds’ radicle and cause seedling wilt, and the same was observed when the pathogen was directly inoculated, indicating that the toxin was an important factor influencing the infection of tobacco by the pathogen.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preliminary identification of the pathogen of potato scab in Gansu
甘肃马铃薯疮痂病病原初步鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Kang Rong, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Prataculture
Wang Shengrong, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Prataculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对甘肃不同地区马铃薯疮痂病病原进行了分离鉴定。采用盆栽方法进行致病性测定、形态特征、生理生化特性测定和16SrDNA序列分析。结果表明：共有6株菌能使马铃薯块茎出现疮痂症，分别为GP1、GP2、GH1、GH2、JB-1和JB-2。经鉴定菌株GP-1、JB-2的形态特征、生理生化特性及16SrDNA序列与Streptomyces scabies 87-22菌株均一致；GP-2、JD-1的16SrDNA序列与S. scabies菌株相似性为99%。菌株GH-2和GH-1与S. griseus的16SrDNA序列相似性分别为100%和99%，形态特征一致，但不能以棉籽糖和肌醇为单一碳源，暂定为S. grisem。

The pathogens of potato scab from different areas in Gansu Province were isolated and identified in this study. Six pathogenic strains (GP-1, GP-2, GH-1, GH-2, JB-1 and JB-2) were selected by the pot tests. The characteristics of the pathogens were analyzed based on morphological, physiological and biochemical features, and 16S rDNA sequence. The results showed that the strain GP- 1 and JB-2 belonged to S. scabies 87 - 22 (100%). The 16S rDNA sequences of the strains GP-2 and JB-1 are similar to that of S. scabies 87 - 22 (99%). The similarity between the 16S rDNA sequences of the strains GH-2 and GH-1 and S. griseus were 100% and 99%, respectively. They had the same biological characteristics as S. griseus but could not use raffinose and inosite.

ags:resource.dc:title: Control effect of different nematicides to the root-knot nematodes in greenhouse cucumber
不同土壤处理剂对设施蔬菜黄瓜根结线虫防治技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xi Xianmei, Inner Mongolia Academy of Agriculture and Husbandry, Hohhot (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Bai Quanjiang, Inner Mongolia Academy of Agriculture and Husbandry, Hohhot (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhang Qingping, Inner Mongolia Academy of Agriculture and Husbandry, Hohhot (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了筛选蔬菜根结线虫的防治技术，在赤峰市进行了7种不同土壤处理药剂对黄瓜根结线虫的防治效果田间试验，结果表明，应用7种不同土壤处理药荆进行土壤处理，揭膜放气5d后定植黄瓜，对黄瓜生长无不良影响，而且对根结线虫均有较好的抑制作用，其中98.1% 1，3-二氯丙烯-氯化苦复配胶囊16kg/667m2、95% 1，3-二氯丙烯液剂65kg/667m2及10%液体石灰氮65kg/667m2对黄瓜根结线虫的防治效果达90%左右，优于目前生产中常用药剂42%威百亩水剂6kg/667m2和10%噻唑磷颗粒剂2kg/667m2的防治效果，并且可以显著地提高黄瓜产量，适于在设施蔬菜生产上推广使用。

The field experiment was conducted to define the control effect of seven kinds of soil treatment agents on the root-knot nematode in greenhouse cucumber in Chifeng City. The results showed that soil treated by seven kinds of different soil treatment agents had no negative effect on the growth of cucumber plants, but had good inhibition against root-knot nematodes. Control effects of 98.1% 1,3-dichloropropene-chloropicrin mixture capsule with dose of 16 kg/667 m2, 1,3-dichloropropene LD with dose of 65 kg/667 m2 and 10% liquid calcium cyanamide with dose of 65 kg/667 m2 were about 90%. These treatments could increase the yield of cucumbers and had better control effect than that of the common chemicals, 42% metam-sodium AS 6 kg/667 m2 and 10% fosthiazate GR 2 kg/667 m2.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on control efficacies of flubendiamide on rice leaf-roller
氟虫双酰胺防治水稻稻纵卷叶螟研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tang Tao, Hunan Plant Protection Institute, Changsha (China)
Liu Ducai, Hunan Plant Protection Institute, Changsha (China)
Liu Xueyuan, Hunan Plant Protection Institute, Changsha (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2010和2012年，采用田间小区试验分别探索了氟虫双酰胺种子包衣处理、喷雾处理对水稻稻纵卷叶螟的实际防治效果。2010年试验结果表明，24%氟虫双酰胺水分散粒剂种子包衣处理对稻纵卷叶螟的控制作用较好，且持效期长。2012年试验结果表明，氟虫双酰胺不同剂型（20%悬浮剂、20%水分散粒剂）喷雾处理能有效防控该害虫危害，且持效性长达28d，药后7-28d卷叶防治效果分别为75.72%-97.21%、79.71%-97.43%；同时，该药剂对稻纵卷叶螟低龄及高龄幼虫的杀灭效果高，药后7-21d防治效果大于92%。

Field plot experiments were conducted to investigate control efficacies of flubendiamide with coating treatment of seed and spraying treatment on the rice leaf-roller, Cnaphalocrocis medinalis in 2010 and 2012, respectively. The results showed that high control efficacy against C. medinalis and excellent residual effect could be achieved with coating treatment of seed by 24% flubendiamide WG in 2010. C. medinalis was obviously controlled by 20% flubendiamide SC and 20% flubendiamide WG within 28 days after spraying treatment in 2012, and the control efficacies of leaf rolling were 75.72% - 97.21% and 79.71% - 97.43%, respectively, at 7 - 28 days after spraying treatment. Both young and old larvae of C. medinalis were effectively controlled by the above two formulations, and control efficacies were over 92% at 7 - 21 days after spraying treatment.

ags:resource.dc:title: Toxicity test of different pesticides and their mixed formulation against Aphis citricola
不同杀虫剂对苹果黄蚜的毒力及复配研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Qin, Shanxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Taiyuan (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Wang Zhen, Shanxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Taiyuan (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Feng Yuntao, Shanxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Taiyuan (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用浸虫法测定不同药剂对苹果黄蚜的毒力，并对不同药剂进行复配，测定复配药剂对苹果黄蚜的毒力和复配效果。结果表明：苹果黄蚜对啶虫脒最敏感，其次是吡虫啉、联苯菊酯、阿维菌素，对高效氯氰菊酯、氰戊菊酯敏感度较低，对马拉硫磷基本无敏感性。不同药剂复配以啶虫脒与阿维菌素配合效果最好，5种不同比例配合均表现为增效作用，其中啶虫脒与阿维菌素质量配比为2:1时增效作用最明显，其余依次为啶虫脒与阿维菌素（1:4）和（4:1）、啶虫脒与高效氯氰菊酯（1:4）、啶虫脒与氰戊菊酯（1:4）、啶虫脒与联苯菊酯（1:2），其共毒系数均高于400。田间试验同样表明：啶虫脒与阿维菌素（2:1）桶混处理效果明显好于单剂。

In order to select effective single and mixed pesticides for the control of Aphis citricola van der Goot, toxicity of acetamiprid, imidacloprid, beta-cypermethrin, bifenthrin, abamectin, fenvalerate, phoxim, malathi- on and their mixtures were tested by insect-soaking method. The results showed that A. citricola was sensitive to acetamiprid, followed by imidacloprid, bifenthrin and abamectin. The toxicity of malathion was the lowest. Among all formula, the synergistic effect of the mixture of acetamiprid and abamectin at the proportion of 2:1 was the best, the second was acetamiprid and beta-cypermethrin at the proportion of 1:4, followed by acetamiprid and abamectin at the proportion of 1:4 and 4:1, acetamiprid and fenvalerate at the proportion of 1:4, acetamiprid and bifenthrin at the proportion of 1:2. Field experiments also indicated that control efficiency of the mixture of acetamiprid and abamectin at the proportion of 2:1 on A. citricola was better than that of their each single.

ags:resource.dc:title: Residual toxicities of three insecticides applied by root-drenching and spraying to the western flower thrips
三种药剂喷雾和灌根施药方式强西花蓟马的残留毒力

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Fei, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Life Science
Wang Xiangjing, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Life Science
Wu Qingjun, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Vegetables and Flowers

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选取生产中常用的阿维菌素、噻虫嗪和螺虫乙酯，分别采用喷雾和灌根的方式施于甘蓝、甜椒和菜豆上，药后不同时间分别取3种作物上的老叶片及新生叶片，采用离心管法测定其对西花蓟马的残留毒力。结果表明，噻虫嗪灌根对西花蓟马的残留毒力最高，持效期长达一个月左右，可作为防治苗期西花蓟马的有效药剂和方法。

Three insecticides, abamectin, thiamethoxam and spirotetramat, which were commonly used in fields, were selected to compare their residual toxicities to the western flower thrips, Frankliniella occidentalis (Pergande) on potted cabbage, sweet pepper and kidney bean plants by root-drenching and spraying methods. The old and new leaves were cut from the above plants at different time and brought back to laboratory to test their residual activities by using centrifuge tube method. The results showed that thiamethoxam applied by root-drenching method demonstrated the highest residual activity and the activity lasted more than one month, which could be recommended to use in controlling the western flower thrips especially during the seedling stage.

ags:resource.dc:title: Identification of the pathogen of carnation rust and chemical screening
康乃馨锈病病原鉴定及药剂筛选

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Gang, College of Grassland Science of Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China)
Liang Qiaolan, College of Grassland Science of Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China)
Xu Bingliang, College of Grassland Science of Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过鉴定发现引起甘肃省康乃馨锈病的病原为石竹单胞柄锈菌（Uromyces dianthi Niessl.）；分别采用孢子萌发法和田间喷雾法、灌根法对防治康乃馨锈病的药剂进行了室内筛选和田间药效试验。结果表明，12.5%烯唑醇可湿性粉刺、25%嘧菌酯悬浮剂等7种药剂对康乃馨锈病夏孢子的萌发抑制率均超过50%；对筛选出的7种药剂进一步进行田间药效试验，发现采用喷雾法时12.5%烯唑醇可湿性粉剂、25%嘧菌酯悬浮剂和10%苯醚甲环唑水分散粒刺三种药剂的防效高于其他几种药剂，分别达70.2%、68.3%和65.0%，而灌根法对康乃馨锈病的防效并不理想，最高防效仅为8.1%。

The pathogen of carnation rust in Gansu Province was identified to be puccinia single cell (Uromyces dianthi Niessl.); Laboratory experiments and field tests were conducted to screen effective fungicides against carnation rust by spore germination, field spraying, and irrigation root methods. Laboratory experiments showed that 12.5% diniconazole WP, 25% azoxystrobin SC and other 5 kinds of fungicides could inhibit the urediospores germination by over 50%. Field tests indicated that control efficacy of 12.5% diniconazole WP, 25% azoxystrobin SC and 10% difenoconazole WG was higher than that of other fungicides by spraying method, with efficiency of 70.2%, 68.3% and 65.0%, respectively. However, control effect by irrigation root methods was poor, with a maximal efficiency of 8.1%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preliminary report of investigation on Arge huazhongia
华中黑头三节叶蜂调查研究初报

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Bumei, Lanzhou Agro-technical Research and Popularization Center, Lanzhou (China)
Zhang Wenli, Lanzhou Agro-technical Research and Popularization Center, Lanzhou (China)
Xu Qiong, Lanzhou Agro-technical Research and Popularization Center, Lanzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 华中黑头三节叶蜂（Arge huazhongia Wei）是发生在苦水玫瑰上的新害虫，在兰州市一年发生2代，主要以幼虫群集取食玫瑰叶片，雌成虫选择苦水玫瑰健壮的当年生新枝顶部产卵，老熟幼虫在玫瑰根际落叶及虫粪间结茧越冬，次年5月中下旬越冬态成虫羽化。植株受害率达81.4%，当年生新梢受害率30.6%。

Arge huazhongia is a new insect pest on the Kushui rose in Lanzhou, with two generations a year. The larvae gather and feed on the leaves of rose. Female adults lay eggs at the top of the young strong branches on the Kushui rose. The mature larvae cocoon and then overwinter in the rhizosphere of rose fallen leaves and frass, and emerge into adults in mid or late May next year. The damage rate of rose plants reaches 81.4%, and that of young sprouts reaches 30.6%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Morphological and molecular identification of the burrowing nematode Radopholus similis from Anthurium andraeanum
危害红掌的穿孔线虫形态和分子鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Yuerong, Hainan University, Haikou (China), College of Agronomy
Chen Changlong, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), Department of Plant Pathology
Yang Guangsui, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Danzhou (China), Tropical Crops Genetic Resources Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对一批引进后隔离培养中患病的红掌种苗，进行了根系线虫检测，通过病症分析、线虫形态测量、rDNA-ITS区序列分析等鉴定，结果表明：检测的线虫形态和香蕉穿孔线虫基本一致，rDNA-ITS区测序结果序列一致性为98%-100%。本报道再次证明香蕉穿孔线虫在红掌上的分布和危害，应该对种苗的跨区引进和种植过程进行严格的检疫。

Diagnosis of root parasitic nematodes was carried out on a group of imported and isolated growing Anthurium andraeanum seedlings with nematode-suspected disease symptoms by symptom diagnosis, morphological measure and rDNA-ITS sequence analysis. The isolated nematode was identified to be burrowing nematode Radopholus similis. The results revealed that the burrowing nematode could exist and damage on A. andraeanum. Take into account its wide host range and gigantic harmfulness, a strict inspection and quarantine should be applied in the importation and cultivation of A. andraeanum.

ags:resource.dc:title: Resistance of Potamogeton distinctus to the sulfonylurea herbicides in paddy field in Guizhou
稻田杂草眼子菜对磺酰脲类除草剂的抗性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ye Zhaochun, Guizhou Institute of Plant Protection, Guiyang (China)
Wang Nan, Guizhou Institute of Plant Protection, Guiyang (China)
Lu Deqing, Guizhou Institute of Plant Protection, Guiyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 磺酰脲类除草剂在世界各地受到广泛应用，但其作用位点单一，杂草对其易产生抗药性。在贵州，磺酰脲类除草剂苄嘧磺隆、吡嘧磺隆应用至少有20年以上历史，为明确贵州稻田杂草眼子菜对磺酰脲类除草剂苄嘧磺隆、吡嘧磺隆的抗药性，指导农户合理用药，课题组采集贵州不同地区稻田杂草眼子菜鳞茎，采用《农药室内生物测定试验准则》的方法进行测定。试验结果表明：苄嘧磺隆、吡嘧磺隆对贵州稻田杂草眼子菜的防效较好，其鲜重防效在81%以上；所采样田块中眼子菜对苄嘧磺隆的IR值在1.00-7.53之间，对吡嘧磺隆的IR值在1.00-10.67之间。表明贵州稻田杂草眼子菜对磺酰脲类除草剂抗性水平不高，但部分田块已开始出现抗药性生态型眼子菜，且眼子菜对苄嘧磺隆、吡嘧磺隆两种药剂间存在着交互抗药性。

Sulfonylurea herbicides with broad spectrum, good crop selectivity and low mammalian toxicity, have been widely used in the world. However, weeds are easily resistant to this kind of herbicides due to the singleness of action site. Bensulfuron methyl and pyrazosulfuron-ethyl have been applied to control Potamogeton distinctus, a malignant weed in paddy field in Guizhou, for at least 20 years. According to the methods from the book titled ‘Pestcide-Guideline For The Bioassay Test’, resistance of the two herbicides were determined with the bulbs of P. distinctus collected in different regions of Guizhou. The results showed that bensulfuron methyl and pyrazosulfuron-ethyl had good control effect on P. distinctus with the weight control efficiency of more than 81%. The IR value of bensulfuron methyl and pyrazosulfuron-ethyl ranged from 1.00 to 7.53 and from 1.00 to 10.67, respectively, indicating the resistant level of P. distinctus to the sulfonylurea herbicides was low in Guizhou. However, the resistant ecotypes of P. distinctus are gradually appearing in part of fields. Moreover, there were positively correlated cross-resistance between bensulfuron methyl and pyrazosulfuron-ethyl.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comparison of trapping efficacy of two kinds of sex pheromone lure of Athetis lepigone in field
二点委夜蛾两种新型性诱芯田随诱蛾性能比较

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Xia, Linfen City Plant Protection Station, Linfen (China)
Sheng Ru, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Zoology
Wang Zhenying, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 二点委夜蛾是玉米的新害虫，2011年在黄淮海夏玉米区暴发，已经成为该区夏玉米苗期的重要害虫。2012年在山西省洪洞县对二点委夜蛾A、B两种性诱芯的诱蛾性能进行了田间测试。结果表明，在6月21日至8月17日，B诱芯的平均诱蛾量是A诱芯的2.49倍，显著提高了诱蛾数量。B诱芯的单盆单日最大诱蛾量达到280头，而A诱芯最高仅为85头。两种诱芯的田间有效期均达58d，对二点委夜蛾的诱蛾量季节动态基本一致，且B诱芯的蛾量高峰较A诱芯早、峰值更明显。可见B诱芯的诱蛾性能比A诱芯具有明显优势，可应用于二点委夜蛾成虫的动态监测和诱杀防治中。

Athetis lepigone (M6schler) has become one of the most serious corn pests in summer corn seedling stage in North China. Trapping efficacy of two kinds of the sex pheromone lure was evaluated and compared in field in Linfen, Shanxi Province from June 21 to August 17 in 2012. The pheromone lures were from Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences. Two treatments and three replicates were designed. In each of 11 time groups, the mean number of A. lepigone moth captured at 3 water trays baited with the rubber lures A and B were 139.6 and 347.0, respectively, significantly different (P0.05). The maximum number of A. lepigone moth captured at one tray in one day baited with the rubber lures A and B were 85 and 280, respectively. Both the field longevities of the two lures were 58 days. Generally, the patterns of seasonal population dynamics related to the lures A and B were the same with the peak occurred in July 25 and 19, respectively. Obviously, lure B is of higher quality and could be recommended to apply in monitoring, luring and killing the pest.

ags:resource.dc:title: Investigation on mango thrips species and control effect of common pesticides against dominant species
芒果蓟马种类及常见药剂对优势种的田间防效

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xie Yonghui, Ministry of Education Key Laboratory of Agriculture Biodiversity and Pest Management, Kunming (China)
Li Chaoqin, Huaping Horticulture Station, Yunnan (China)
Li Zhengyue, Ministry of Education Key Laboratory of Agriculture Biodiversity and Pest Management, Kunming (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过对云南省华坪县芒果蓟马种类进行详细调查，结果发现：为害芒果的蓟马种类主要有12种，其中西花蓟马（Frankliniella occidentalis）是华坪县芒果园蓟马的绝对优势种。对常见芒果蓟马成虫种类编制了简明的检索表。通过5种常见药剂对优势种进行田间防效评价，结果表明，50%甲基嘧啶磷乳油的速效性和持效性最好。可用于西花蓟马的大面积防治。

The species of thrips collected on mangos in Huaping County, Yunnan Province, were surveyed in this study. The results showed there were 12 kinds of thrips on mangos and Frankliniella occidentalis was the most abundant species. A key to the common adult mango thrips was compiled. Field trials were conducted to test the control efficacy of common insecticides on F. occidentalis. The results indicated that 50% pirimiphos-methyl EC had rapid effects and long persistent period, which can be applied in large scale against F. occidentalis in the field.

ags:resource.dc:title: Investigation on rice virus diseases transmitted by rice plant hoppers in low and hot valley of Yunnan Province in winter and suggestion on virus diseases management
云南低热河谷地区冬季稻飞虱传播的水稻

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Rong, National Agro-Technical Extension and Service Centre, Beijing (China)
Lu Jianping, Yunnan Province Station of Plant Protection and Quarantine, Kunming (China)
Xiao Wenxiang, Baoshan Station of Plant Protection and Quarantine, Yunnan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 于2012年2月对云南低热河谷地区施甸县、元江县玉米、水稻、黑麦草和稻飞虱调查及样本检测，结果显示，白背飞虱携带南方水稻黑条矮缩病毒（SRBSDV），褐飞虱携带水稻齿叶矮缩病毒（RRSV），再生稻感染SRBSDV、水稻黑条矮缩病毒（RBSDV）和RRSV，水稻秧苗感染SRBSDV。玉米SRBSDV发病面积占种植面积的36.81%。云南低热河谷地区越冬稻飞虱是早春水稻、玉米病毒病传播的重要介体，再生稻、秧苗、玉米是病毒冬季存续循环的重要寄主和初始毒源。改秋冬种玉米为蔬菜，或推迟玉米播期，晚稻收割后及时翻耕，晚稻收割后至玉米播种期间有1个月以上的空田期，物理阻隔育秧或异地育秧，是切断病毒冬季循环的重要措施。

During February 2012, field investigation and sample collection of suspicious infected rice, maize and ryegrass as well as rice plant hoppers (BPH, WBPH, SBPH) were conducted in Shidian and Yuanjiang County, Yunnan where rice virus diseases including SRBSDV and RRSV have spread widely and caused heavy loss. Virus detection tests showed that some WBPHs were viruliferous with SRBSDV and some BPHs with RRSV, meanwhile some ratoon rice were infected with SRBSDV, RBSDV and RRSV respectively or simultaneously. Rice seedling was infected with SRBSDV. Autumn/winter-maize in Shidian County was infected severely with SRBSDV by 36.81% infected acreage of growing area. These results suggested that overwintering rice plant hoppers were major vector for virus diseases of early rice and maize in low and hot valley of Yunnan. Ratoon rice, dropping-grain rice, early rice seedling, and autumn/winter maize were major hosts of viruses during winter and etiology of virus diseases of early rice. The main measure on management of virus diseases in rice and maize in low and hot valley are to grow vegetables in place of maize in winter, or to postpone sowing date to keep field empty for at least one month between late rice harvest and winter maize sowing, and to cover rice seedling bed with insect net or non-woven fabric.

ags:resource.dc:title: Occurrence regularity of Apanteles cypris in different paddy fields
纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂在不同类型田的发生规律

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ma Heng, Institute of Entomology of Guizhou University, Guiyang (China)
Yang Hong, Institute of Entomology of Guizhou University, Guiyang (China)
Zhi Junrui, Institute of Entomology of Guizhou University, Guiyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为掌握纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂的发生特点，对纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂在单作稻田和水稻-玉米邻作类型田的发生规律进行了调查。结果显示：水稻-玉米模式中纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂的数量在玉米的扬花期明显高于单作稻田，最高值为单作稻田模式的3.36倍，但是田间纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂的寄生率并不高于单作稻田模式。在单作稻田未施药系统田，纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂的数量显著高于施药系统田；并且与稻纵卷叶螟幼虫的数量密切相关。不论在何种种植模式下，纵卷叶螟绒茧蜂的雌性比一直处于低水平，在单作稻田下，雌性比为0.2-0.3，在水稻-玉米邻作田，其雌性比为0.25左右。

Occurrence regularity of Apanteles cypris was surveyed in different paddy plant fields. The maximum number of A. cypris in the rice paddy neighboring to corn field was 3.36 times than that in the monocultural paddy field, and the peak was in corn’s flowering stage. The parasitism rate of A. cypris in the paddy filed neighboring to corn was not higher than that in monocultural paddy field. In the field of monocultural paddy field, the number of A. cypris in non-spraying paddy field was significantly higher than that in spraying pesticide paddy field, and it is relative to the number of the Cnaphalocrocis medinalis larva. The number of A. cypris and the larva of C. medinalis dropped rapidly after the pesticides were sprayed. The female sex ratio of A. cypris kept low in the two paddy habitat, the female sex ratio in monocultural paddy field was 0.20 to 0.30, about 0.25 in the paddy neigh- boring to corn field.

ags:resource.dc:title: The influences of varied temperature on the occurrence period of Holcocerus hippophaecolus adults
气温变化对沙棘木蠹蛾成虫发生期的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ge Xuezhen, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing (China), The Key Laboratory for Silviculture and Conservation of Ministry of Education
Yao Guolong, Pengyang Forestry Bureau of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, Pengyang (China)
Luo Youqing, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing (China), The Key Laboratory for Silviculture and Conservation of Ministry of Education

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 根据宁夏彭阳2006-2011年期间沙棘木蠹蛾成虫发生期资料和2005-2011年的气象资料，分析了彭阳县每年5-9月气温变化趋势和沙棘木蠹蛾成虫发生期年变化趋势，探讨了发生期与气温之间的相关性。结果表明：2005-2011年，彭阳县平均气温、平均最高气温均呈现下降趋势，气温倾向率分别达-0.89、-0.57℃/10年，而平均最低气温呈现略微上升的趋势，气温倾向率为0.18℃/10年，但总体来说，气温的变化呈现下降的趋势，但是下降趋势不显著。沙棘木蠹蛾成虫始见期和结束期均向后推迟，发生期总体呈现加长的变化趋势。相关性分析结果表明气温降低对沙棘木蠹蛾成虫始见期的影响较大，始见期随气温的降低而推迟，平均温度下降1℃则向后推迟约9d，而历期受气温降低的影响较小，其他时期基本不受气温降低的影响。研究结果为有效控制沙棘木蠹蛾危害提供了理论依据。

In Pengyang County of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, the change trend of the occurrence period of Holcocerus hippophaecolus adults from May to September were analyzed by comparing the historical outdoor observations from 2006 to 2011 and the historical climate data from 2005 to 2011. The correlation between temperature and adult occurrence period was then analyzed using linear tendency method. The results showed that both mean temperature and mean maximum temperature exhibited a decline trend, and the temperature tendency rates were -0.89℃/10 year and -0.57℃/10 year, respectively. The mean minimum temperature exhibited a slight escalation trend, and the temperature tendency rate was 0.18℃/10 year. In general, the temperature change exhibited a decline trend, but the decline trend was not significant. The initial occurrence and the terminal date of occurrence period of H. hippophaecolus adults were both postponed. The adult occurrence period generally tended to be longer. The results of correlation analysis showed that temperature declining had a great influence on the initial occurrence of H. hippophaecolus, and the initial occurrence tended to be delayed by the declining of temperature. It was delayed by 9 days on average with the decline of 1℃. However, temperature declining had little influence on the duration of adult occurrence period and had no influence on other periods. These data would provide a theoretical basis for practical control of the pest.

ags:resource.dc:title: Selection and inheritance of resistance to abamectin in Liriomyza sativae
美洲斑潜蝇对阿维菌素的抗性筛选和遗传方式

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wei Qingbo, Hainan University, Haikou (China)
Lei Zhongren, Chinese Academy of Agriculture Science, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Gao Yulin, Chinese Academy of Agriculture Science, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在室内对美洲斑潜蝇进行了阿维菌素的抗性筛选和抗性遗传方式分析。经过1年的筛选，抗性水平从起初的13.05倍提高到36.05倍，遗传分析结果表明，抗性基因位于常染色体上，抗性为不完全显性遗传，受多基因控制。

Selection and the inheritance of resistance to abamectin in Liriomyza sativae were studied in the labora tory. The results showed that the resistance level was increased from the initial 13.05-fold to 36.05-fold after one year’s selection. The resistance gene was located in the autosome and showed an incomplete dominant inheritance feature, and the resistance was controlled by multiple genes.

ags:resource.dc:title: Molecular detection and identification of Sweet potato curl leaf virus infecting sweet potato in Guangdong Province
侵染广东甘薯的甘薯曲叶病毒分子检测与鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tang Yafei, Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Guangzhou (China), Research Institute of Plant Protection
He Zifu, Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Guangzhou (China), Research Institute of Plant Protection
Han Lifang, Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Guangzhou (China), Research Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 甘薯曲叶病是广东甘薯的一种新病害，病株表现为叶片皱缩，向上卷曲，叶脉肿大等症状。PCR检测结果显示，所有病样中均存在菜豆金色花叶病毒属病毒。通过滚环扩增方法获得了3个病毒分离物的全基因组。扩增产物克隆及序列分析结果表明，这3个病毒分离物基因组均仅含有DNA-A，具有菜豆金色花叶病毒属单组分病毒基因组典型特征；其大小分别为2829nt（JX286653、JX286654）和2828nt（JX286655）。三者核苷酸序列同源率为96.0%～98.4%；与已报道的甘薯曲叶病毒19个分离物的同源率均大于89.0%。因此，引起广东甘薯曲叶病的病原被鉴定为甘薯曲叶病毒。本研究是首次在广东发现甘薯曲叶病毒。

The sweet potato leaf curl disease is a new disease in Guangdong. The symptoms of the diseased plants exhibited leaf shrinking, curling upwards and vein swelling. PCR detection indicated that the diseased plants were infected by a begomovirus. Using rolling circle amplification (RCA) method, the full-length DNA-A of three begomovirus isolates were amplified, cloned and sequenced. The results revealed that they only had DNA-A component, with typical characteristics of monopartite begomoviruses and 2 829 nucleotides (GenBank accession nos. JX286653 and JX286654) and 2 828 nucleotides (GenBank accession no. JX286655) in length, respectively. The nucleotide identities of these three DNA-A were 96.0% - 98.4% between each other and more than 89.0% with these of 19 isolates of Sweet potato curl virus previously reported. Thus, the virus infecting sweet potato in Guangdong was identified as Sweet potato curl virus. It was the first report that the Sweet potato curl leaf virus was distributed in Guangdong Province, China.

ags:resource.dc:title: Antibiosis of the ferment of the endophyte Brevibacillus brevis strain 011
内生短短芽胞杆菌011菌发酵滤液抑菌活性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Yuting, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), College of Food Science and Technology
Yi Youjin, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), College of Food Science and Technology
Xia Bo, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), College of Food Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为明确短短芽胞杆菌011菌株在植物病害生物防治中的应用潜力，采用平皿打孔法测定011菌发酵滤液抗菌谱及其活性稳定性；采用孢子萌发法测定011菌发酵滤液对番茄早疫病菌最低抑茵浓度MIC及EC50；并显微观察其对番茄早疫病菌茵丝及孢子抑制作用。结果表明：011菌发酵滤液对8种植物病原真菌均有抑制作用，其中对番茄早疫病茵抑制作用较强，抑菌带宽度为5.5mm；对番茄早疫病菌菌丝及孢子均有致畸作用；对番茄早疫病菌最低抑菌浓度MIC为30%，有效抑菌中浓度EC50为9.64%；其活性具有较好的热稳定性（100℃处理1h活性保持在95%），耐酸性及抗紫外线（pH2.0处理及紫外20w，30cm照射120min，活性保持不变）。

To investigate the utilization potential of the strain 011 of Brevibacillus brevis in biocontrol of plant diseases, antibiosis spectrum and stability of its ferment were evaluated by plate-perforation method. MIC and EC50 of the ferment against Alternaria solani were determined by spore germination assay, and its inhibitive effects on both hyphae and spores of A. solani were validated by microscopy. The results suggested that the ferment of the strain 011 had an inhibitive effect on 8 fungal plant pathogens, and the strongest inhibition was observed in A. solani, with a 5.5 mm width of inhibition band. Moreover, the ferment had a teratogenic effect on both hyphae and spores of A. solani; the MIC and EC50 were 30% and 9.64%, respectively; the ferment had considerable heat stability (with 95% bioactivity reserved after treatment at 100℃ for 1 h), acid tolerance and anti-UV property (bio activity was unaffected by pre-treatment at pH 2.0 or 20 W UV radiation from a distance of 30 cm for 120 min).

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation, screening and identification of antagonistic strains against apricot postharvest diseases
杏采后病害病原拮抗菌的分离筛选及鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zheng Qi, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Pratacultural Science
Xu Bingliang, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Pratacultural Science
Xue Yingyu, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Pratacultural Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 针对杏采后主要病害病原茵细交链孢（Alternaria tenuis Nees）和灰葡萄孢（Botrytis cinerea Pers．ex Fr．）进行拮抗茵的分离筛选及鉴定，分别采用组织分离法、表面分离法和土壤稀释分离法从杏果实、叶片及根围土壤中进行了分离并采用离体和活体筛选，对拮抗效果好的菌株JK-14和JK-11进行形态学、生理生化及分子生物学鉴定。共分离到14株对这两种病原茵都具有抑制效果的菌株，占分离总数的13.5%，离体筛选结果表明：JK-14和JK-11能明显抑制病原菌的茵丝生长，对细交链孢和灰葡萄孢的抑制效果R分别为0.74和0.68，0.74和0.73。活体筛选结果表明，JK-14和JK-11对杏采后黑斑病和灰霉病的防治效果显著，处理果实的发病率和病斑直径明显小于对照。经鉴定，JK-14和JK-11分属芽胞杆菌属（Bacillus）和类芽胞杆菌属（Paenibacillus）。

To isolate and screen the antagonistic strains inhibiting Alternaria tenuis Nees and Botrytis cinema Pers. ex Fr. causing apricots postharvest diseases, the plant tissue separation, fruit surface separation and soil dilution separation methods were used to isolate the strains from fruits, leaves and soil samples, respectively, and screened in vitro and in vivo. The morphology, physiology, biochemistry and molecular biology were employed to identify JK-14 and JK-11 with better antagonistic effects. There were 14 strains that had inhibition effects on the two pathogens, accounting for 13.5% of the total number of isolates. The antagonistic strains JK-14 and JK-11 could obviously inhibit the growth of pathogenic hyphae by in vitro screening, and the inhibitory effect Rs in A. tenuis and B. cinema were 0.74/0.68 and 0.74/0.73, respectively. The results of the in vivo screening indicated that the prevention effects on postharvest Alternaria rot and gray mold by JK-14 and JK-11 were remarkable, and the incidence and the disease spot diameter of the treatment fruits were significantly less than the control. JK-14 and JK-11 were identified as Bacillus and Paenibacillus.

ags:resource.dc:title: Screening of LED light source of the adapter solar trap lamp for trapping the citrus psyllid
适配太阳能诱虫器诱杀柑橘木虱LED光源的筛选

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lin Xiongjie, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Research Institute of Fruits
Fan Guocheng, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Research Institute of Fruits
Hu Hanqing, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Research Institute of Fruits

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 柑橘木虱（Diaphorina citri）是柑橘黄龙病的传播媒介。为达到治虫防病的目的，在室内利用昆虫行为反应器开展适配太阳能诱虫器的LED光源筛选，结果表明：柑橘木虱成虫对光照强度分别为1800lx和4310lx的蓝光和绿光（波长分别为460nm和531nm）在光照时长为17h时的趋光性最佳，相同波长条件下，其趋光性与光照强度和光照时长成正相关。该研究结果为进一步探索适宜田间柑橘木虱测报和高效诱杀的LED光源提供理论依据。

The citrus psyllid is the vector of Huanglongbing. In order to control citrus psyllid and prevent disease, screening of LED light source adapter solar trap lamp for citrus psyllid by using reaction vessel of insect behavior was carried out in the laboratory. The results showed that the phototaxis of 1 800 Ix and 4 310 Ix blue and green light sources (wavelength 460 nm and 531 nm) were best on the illumination duration of 17 h. It was also found that the phototaxis of citrus psyllid adults was positively correlated with light intensity and light duration under the same wavelength condition. It might provide an effective theoretical basis for the LED light source for forecasting and trapping citrus psyllid in the field in the future.

ags:resource.dc:title: Biological characteristics of the pathogen of the carnation rust
康乃馨锈病病原生物学特性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liang Qiaolan, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Grassland Science
Chen Gang, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Grassland Science
Xu Bingliang, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Grassland Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用孢子萌发法对引起甘肃省康乃馨锈病病原菌的生物学特性进行研究，结果表明：25-28。C、100％相对湿度、1％的葡萄糖液和无菌蒸馏水、黑暗、pH7等有利于康乃馨锈病病原菌夏孢子的萌发，夏孢子的致死温度为42℃（20min）或43℃（10min）；对冬孢子采用与夏孢子相同的研究方法，但均未见有萌发。

The pathogen biological characteristics of the carnation rust were studied using the spore germination method in Gansu Province. The results showed that 25 - 28℃, 100% relative humidity, 1% glucose solution and sterile distilled water, darkness and pH 7 were conducive to the germination of uredospores. The lethal temperature of the pathogen was 42℃ (20 min) or 43℃ (10 min). However, the germination of teliospores was not observed under the same conditions.

ags:resource.dc:title: Evaluation of ITS region for DNA barcoding of Verticillium spp.
ITS片段作为轮枝菌DNA条形码的评价研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Duan Weijun, Ningbo Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Ningbo (China)
Zhang Huili, Ningbo Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Ningbo (China)
Guo Lixin, Ningbo Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Ningbo (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以轮枝菌属中的重要植物病原性轮枝茵及其近似种共13种35个菌株为材料，探讨ITS片段作为轮枝菌DNA条形码的可行性。结果表明，ITS成功区分了研究涉及的10个种，其PCR扩增和测序成功率为97.1%，序列鉴定成功率为94.5%，但对个别亲缘关系较近种的物种鉴别能力较弱。

In this study, the ITS fragment was tested with 35 strains of 13 species of the Verticillium spp. to investigate its feasibility as a DNA barcode. The results revealed that ITS showed appropriate intra-and inter-specific variations, and could distinguish the investigated 10 species of the genus. It was easy for PCR amplification and sequencing. The correct identification rate is 94.5% for the sequences tested. However, the inter-specific differences of ITS in some closely-related isolates were more than the intra-specific differences.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preliminary research on the separation of an agro-antibiotic from the fermentation broth of the Streptomyces strain TJ430 by macroporous absorption resin D-101
采用大孔吸附树脂D-101初步分离提取TJ430菌株发酵液中的抗生素

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Yongchun, Ministry of Agriculture, Tianjin (China), Institute of Agro-environment Protection
Liu Hongmei, Ministry of Agriculture, Tianjin (China), Institute of Agro-environment Protection
Zhao Peng, Ministry of Agriculture, Tianjin (China), Institute of Agro-environment Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 借助生物活性测定法和高效液相色谱法对发酵液中农用抗生素进行追踪监测，探讨了大孔吸附树脂对菌株TJ430发酵液中农用抗生素的分离纯化条件。经过对比试验发现D-10I型大孔吸附树脂的吸附性能最好；最佳吸附时间为120min；70%丙酮水溶液的解吸附能力最佳；最佳解吸附pH为接近中性条件；最佳解吸附时间为120min。采用D-101型大孔吸附树脂对TJ430菌株发酵液中抗生素进行吸附，在中性条件下经70%丙酮水解吸附，使发酵液中抗生素得到了有效的分离纯化。

An agro-antibiotic extract was obtained by bioassay and HPLC. The dynamic adsorption performance of macroporous resin D-101 on the agro-antibiotic from the Streptomyces strain TJ430 fermentation broth was investigated. The influences of the adsorption and desorption time, value of pH, and concentration of acetone eluent on extraction were discussed. The results showed that D-101 resin had good adsorption ability for fermentation broth, and the optimum adsorption and desorption conditions were as follows: the adsorption and desorption time was 120 minutes, the desorption concentration of acetone was 70%, and the pH value of desorption was 6.0. The antibiotic was refined efficiently after adsorption and desorption procedure.

ags:resource.dc:title: A modified protocol for extraction of total RNA from small insects
一种改良的快速提取小型昆虫总RNA的方法

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Yang, Hunan Institute of Plant Protection, Changsha (China)
Zhu Chunhui, Hunan Institute of Plant Protection, Changsha (China)
Tan Xinqiu, Hunan Institute of Plant Protection, Changsha (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 硅粒吸附法是一种常用的植物总RNA提取方法，本文对其进行改良后应用于小型昆虫总RNA提取，同时与小型昆虫RNA提取常用的改进的一步法和Trizol法进行了比较。试验结果表明：改良的硅粒吸附法是一种经济高效的小型昆虫总RNA提取方法，RNA产率高，纯度佳。同时，整个试验操作步骤简单、省时（约1h），所用试剂普遍、廉价。

The silica method, a simple and efficient protocol, is broadly used in plant RNA extraction. In this study, the method was modified and used in small insects, such as Myzus persicae, Bemisia tabaci Q sibling species and Frankliniella occidentcdis. Meantime, we compared the RNA extraction efficiency of small insects with the modified silica protocol, the modified one-step procedure and Trizol method. The results showed that the highest quality and yields of RNA were obtained by modified silica RNA extraction protocol. This protocol has the advantages of time-saving, lower cost as well as easy-to-handle and can be used for RNA extraction of insects.

ags:resource.dc:title: Observation of antennal sensilla of Liriomyza huidobrensis with scanning electronic microscope
南美斑潜蝇触角感器的扫描电镜观察

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Jiao, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Ji Qingzhan, Beifang University of Nationalities, Yinchuan (China)
Zhang Kaowen, Beifang University of Nationalities, Yinchuan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用扫描电镜对南美斑潜蝇触角形态和感器进行了观察。结果表明，南美班潜蝇触角为具芒状，由柄节、梗节、鞭节三部分组成，鞭节上着生触角芒。触角感器有五种，分别为刺形感器、毛形感器、锥形感器、钟形感器和腔锥形感器，所有的触角感器都分布在鞭节上。雌雄成虫在触角形态、感器种类与分布上没有显著性差异。

The morphological characters of antenna and sensillum of the male and female of Liriomyza huidobrensis (Blanchard) were observed with a scanning electron microscope (SEM). The results showed that the aristate antenna consisted of the scape, pedicel and flagellum. There was an arista on the flagellum. Both female and male antennae of the species had the same 5 types of sensilla. They were identified as chaetic sensillum, trichoid sensillum, basiconic sensillum, campaniform sensillum and coeloconic sensillum. All of the sensilla were on the flagellum. No difference was found in the morphological characters of antennae and the type and distribution of the sensilla between the male and female adults.

ags:resource.dc:title: Inhibition of the extracts from Justicia procumbens against Colletotrichum gloeosporioides and its efficacy at the seedling stage
爵床提取物对辣椒炭疽病菌的抑颓作用及其苗期防效

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Mingcheng, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Li Baotong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Tang Limei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 爵床（Justicia procumbensL.）是一种传统的中药材。为探明爵床提取物对辣椒炭疽病菌的抑制作用，采用生长速率法和孢子萌发法分别测定了爵床提取物对辣椒炭疽病菌茵丝生长、孢子产生和孢子萌发的抑制作用，采用苗期盆栽试验观察爵床提取物对辣椒炭疽病的防治效果。结果表明，爵床甲醇提取物可抑制辣椒炭疽病菌菌丝生长、孢子产生和孢子萌发，其活性随着浓度的提高而增强，抑制中浓度分别为4.23、2.16和2.98mg/mL。通过对爵床提取物处理后病菌孢子萌发形态显微观察，发现病菌孢子芽管长度受到明显抑制甚至不能萌发。当提取物浓度为16mg/ml时对苗期辣椒炭疽病的防效达73.08%。

Justicia procumbens is a kind of traditional Chinese medicine. In order to ascertain the fungicidal activity of the extracts from J. procumbens, the inhibitory effects of the extracts from J. procumbens against mycelial growth, conidial production and conidial germination of Colletotrichum gloeosporioides were assayed by the methods of mycelial growth rate and conidial germination, and the efficacy of the extracts from J. procumbens was tested against C. gloeosporioides by pot culture experiments at pepper seedling stage. The results showed that methanol extracts from J. procumbens had inhibitory effects against mycelial growth, conidial production and conidial germination of C. gloeosporioides, and its values of effective concentration (EC50) were 4.23, 2.16 mg/mL and 2.98 mg/mL, respectively. The germ tube length of C. gloeosporioides conidia was obviously inhibited, and even conidia could not germinate by the observation of microscope after treated with the extracts. Its efficacy was 73.08% after sprayed against C. gloeosporioides at the concentration of 16 mg/mL at pepper seedling stage.

ags:resource.dc:title: Scale insects on rubber trees in Xishuangbanna
西双版纳地区寄生橡胶树的蚧虫种类

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Jinqiang, Yunnan Institute of Tropical Crops, Jinghong (China)
Xu Liyue, Yunnan Institute of Tropical Crops, Jinghong (China)
Li Guohua, Yunnan Institute of Tropical Crops, Jinghong (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过调查发现云南省西双版纳地区寄生橡胶树的蚧虫有5种，分属于3个科。其中蚧科2种，即橡胶盔蚧和橄榄黑盔蚧；粉蚧科1种，即大洋臀纹粉蚧；盾蚧科2种，即类巨腺白盾蚧和东方片圆蚧。描述了以上5种蚧虫为害橡胶树的基本情况及国内外对各蚧虫的防治概况，预测了未来可能严重为害橡胶树的蚧虫种类。

Five species of scale insects belonging to three families were investigated on rubber trees in Xishuangbanna, Yunnan Province. Two of the species were from Coccidae, namely Parasaissetia nigra and Saissetia oleae, one from Pseudococcidae, namely Planococcus minor, and two from Diaspididae, namely Pseudaulacaspis ab brideliae and Aonidiella orientalis. The current states of scale insect damage to rubber trees were described and the control measures for them at home and abroad were summarized. Species that possibly cause serious damage to rubber trees in the future were forecasted.

ags:resource.dc:title: The characteristics of spatial and temporal occurrence of grubs at Suzhou, Anhui Province
安徽宿州地区蛴螬时空发生特点

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yan Qian, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection
Hong Nannan, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection
Zhao Zhonghua, The National Agro-Tech Extension and Service Center, Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了解安徽宿州地区农田蛴螬群落的时空发生特点，于2011年8月和10月，以及2012年3月，调查了种植在砂土、砂壤土和黏土3种不同土壤类型上的农田蛴螬群落。结果表明，宿州地区蛴螬群落共有3科14种，优势种为暗黑齿爪鳃金龟（Holotrichia parallela Motschulsky）和小阔胫玛绒金龟[Maladera ovatula（Fairmaire）]。蛴螬发生量和种类结构在不同土质与时间下差异显著，其中砂壤土蛴螬数量与种类数均较高，8月为为害高峰期，虫量与种类数最多。研究结果可为安徽宿州地区蛴螬的科学防控提供依据。

In order to explore the characteristics of spatial and temporal occurrence of grubs in the farmland in sand soil, sandy loam and clay in Suzhou, Anhui Province, a field survey was conducted in August 2011, October 2011 and March 2012, respectively. The results showed that the grub community was composed of 14 species in 3 families, and the dominant species were Holotrichia parallela Motschulsky and Maladera ovatula (Fairmaire). The abundance and species richness of grubs showed significant differences among different soil types and periods, with sandy loam being of highest abundance and richness, and the peak occurrence in August. Our results play a potential role in the scientific prevention and control of grubs in Suzhou, Anhui.

ags:resource.dc:title: Seasonal population occurrence of Apolygus lucorum on grapes in Yantai, Shandong Province
烟台葡萄绿盲蝽的季节性发生规律

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Lili, Yantai Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Yantai (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Wang Hongtao, Yantai Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Yantai (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Wang Peng, Yantai Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Yantai (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 于2011-2012年系统研究了烟台地区绿盲蝽在葡萄上的越冬场所及其季节性发生规律。结果表明，绿盲蝽以卵越冬，越冬卵主要产在葡萄芽鳞内，极少量产于葡萄枯枝、落叶内；绿盲蝽一年发生5代，世代重叠严重，1、2代为主要危害代；越冬卵于4月下旬达孵化高峰，第2代绿盲蝽成虫于6月中下旬达到羽化高峰，并开始向外转移扩散；第3、4代危害较轻；第5代成虫于9月下旬开始陆续迁回葡萄上产卵越冬。

The overwintering sites and seasonal occurrence of Apolygus lucorum (Meyer-Diir) on grapes were in vestigated in Yantai during 2011 - 2012. The results showed that most eggs of A. lucorum overwintered in the bud scales of grape, and only a few laid in deadwood and fallen leaves. A. lucorum had five generations per year in Yantai, and the first two generations caused serious damage to grapes. The nymph-hatching dynamics of the first generation peaked in late April. The adults of the second generation largely emerged in mid-and late June, and then moved to other host plants outside vineyards. The third and fourth generations of A. lucorum caused limited damage to grapes. The adults of the fifth generation moved back to vineyards and laid eggs for overwintering in late September.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preference of Pseudasphondylia zanthoxyli to different wavelengths of yellow light and applications of sticky traps
花椒伪安瘿蚊对不同黄色的选择性和粘卡技术应用研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Yanli, Heze College, Heze (China), Department of Landscape Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究报道了6种不同波长的黄色粘卡对花椒伪安瘿蚊的诱捕能力及诱捕方法，并在花椒伪安瘿蚊种群动态监测方面与套笼法进行了比较。结果表明，波长为590.0nm的黄色粘卡诱杀效果最好；在诱捕数量上，以横置粘卡在0.5m高度捕获的花椒伪安瘿蚊最多；在成虫种群动态监测方面，粘卡技术比套笼方法更准确、灵敏和方便。

Experiments were conducted to determine the preference of Pseudasphondylia zanthoxyli to color, height and placing method in Zanthoxylum bungeanum fields. The number of P. zanthoxyli trapped by sticky traps with six different wavelengths of yellow light was compared, which showed that the P. zanthoxyli were trapped well by the yellow sticky traps with 590.0 nm wavelength. The highest number of P. zanthoxyli was found on lateral sticky traps at 0.5 m height from the tree base. The population dynamics of P. zanthoxyli monitored by sticky traps was also discussed. The results showed that the method of sticky traps could monitor the population dynamics of P. zanthoxyli more accurately, sensitively and conveniently than the method of covering bags.

ags:resource.dc:title: Fumigation effects of two fumigates on different development stages of the gypsy moth
2种不同熏蒸剂对舞毒蛾不匾虫态的杀灭效果

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Ruifeng, Tianjin Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Tianjin (China)
Cheng Yu, Tianjin Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Tianjin (China)
Yang Fei, Tianjin Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Tianjin (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为判断溴甲烷和硫酰氟对舞毒蛾不同虫态的杀灭效果，在25℃下，分别在经过气密性检测的熏蒸桶内投入16、20、24、32g/m3的溴甲烷和40、56、72、88g/m3的硫酰氟，熏蒸处理舞毒蛾卵、幼虫、蛹和成虫4.5h。结果表明，经过4.5h熏蒸，杀灭舞毒蛾卵、1龄幼虫、蛹和成虫的溴甲烷浓度分别为32、20、24和16g／m3，杀灭上述虫态硫酰氟浓度分别为88、56、72和40g/m3。本文结果表明，舞毒蛾卵为最耐受溴甲烷和硫酰氟熏蒸的虫态，在目前口岸实际熏蒸处理中应充分考虑熏蒸剂对舞毒蛾卵的杀灭效果。

In order to determine the fumigation effects of methyl bromide (MB) and sulfuryl fluoride (SF) on different development stages of the gypsy moth Lymantria dispar L., the killing effects were tested in the laboratory at 25℃ and 16, 20, 24 and 32 g/m3of MB, and 40, 56, 72 and 88 g/m3 of SF, respectively, for 4.5 h. The results showed that the adults, larvae, pupae and eggs could be completely killed after treated with 16, 20, 24 and 32 g/m3 of MB and 40, 56, 72 and 88 g/m3 of SF, respectively, at 25℃ for 4.5 h. These results showed that the egg was the most tolerant stage against MB and SF, which should be taken into consideration in port fumigation treatments.

ags:resource.dc:title: Control effects of 12 different kinds of pesticides against Grapholitha molesta and Pseudaulacaspis pentagona
十二种不同杀虫剂对梨小食心虫和桑白蚧的防治效果

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Xiaojun, Shandong lnstitute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)
Zhai Hao, Shandong lnstitute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)
Wang Tao, Shandong lnstitute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 试验比较了不同类型的12种杀虫剂对梨小食心虫为害桃梢的防效和对桑白蚧的兼治效果。结果表明：35%氯虫苯甲酰胺水分散粒剂8000倍液、10%啶虫脒微乳剂3000倍液、1%甲维盐水剂1500倍液、80%灭多威可溶粉剂1500倍液具有较好的防效。240g/L螺虫乙酯悬浮剂1000倍液防治桑白蚧效果较突出，其次为2.5g/L高效氯氟氰菊酯乳油2000倍液、2.5%联苯菊酯乳油1000倍液和40%毒死蜱乳油1500倍液。氯虫苯甲酰胺、啶虫脒、甲维盐虽对梨小食心虫防效较好，但本试验发现，可能会导致桑白蚧为害加重，是值得进一步研究和探讨的问题。

The control effects of 12 different types of pesticides against Grapholitha molesta and Pseudaulacaspis pentagona were compared. The results showed that 35% chlorantraniliprole WG (1:8 000), 10% acetamiprid ME (1:3 000), 1% emamectin benzoate AS (1:1 500), and 80% methomyl SP (1:1 500) had stable control effects. 240 g/L spirotetramat SC (1:1 000) had an excellent control effect against P. pentagona, followed by 2.5 g/L lambda-cyhalothrin EC (1:2 000), 2.5% bifenthrin EC (1:1 000), and 40% chlorpyrifos EC (1:1 500). This study indicated that chlorantraniliprole, acetamiprid and emamectin benzoate had better control effects against G. molesta, but might cause aggravated harms by P. pentagona, which still needs further study.

ags:resource.dc:title: The toxicity and control efficacy of 2% Wuyiencin AS against strawberry powdery mildew
2%武夷菌素水剂对草莓白粉病的毒力测定及田间防效

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Zhe, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Sun Lei, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Liu Yanyan, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 武夷菌素是一种农用抗生素类生物杀菌剂，温室及田间试验表明它对粮食、蔬菜、果树上的多种真菌病害有很好的防治效果，并且已经应用于农业生产中。为了考查其对草莓白粉病的防治效果，进行了室内孢子萌发抑制试验，结果表明武夷菌素能够抑制草莓白粉病菌孢子的萌发，其EC50为9.5506μg/mL。同时田间药效试验结果表明，2%武夷菌素水剂对草莓白粉病具有良好的防治效果，其300倍液防治草莓白粉病的效果和化学农药10%苯醚甲环唑水分散粒剂相当，武夷菌素200倍液的防效显著高于化学农药，同时对草莓自身的生长发育没有影响。试验表明武夷菌素对草莓白粉病有很好的防治作用，可为生产上防治草莓白粉病和科学用药提供依据。

Wuyiencin is an agricultural antibiotic biocide. Antimicrobial assays in greenhouses and fields indicated that Wuyiencin was effective to fungus diseases of crops, vegetables and fruit trees, and it has been successfully applied in agricultural production. In order to examine its effect against strawberry powdery mildew, the control effects of Wuyiencin to strawberry powdery mildew were studied through laboratory tests and field trial tests. The indoor experiments showed that Wuyiencin had a strong inhibition against the spore germination of Sphaerotheca macularis, with an EC50 value of 9.550 6 μg/mL. The field trial tests showed that 2% Wuyiencin agent 300 times had an equal effect on strawberry powdery mildew as the chemical antiseptic 10% difenoconazole WG, while the Wuyiencin 200 times had an higher efficacy than the chemical antiseptic. At the same time, 2% Wuyiencin agent had no side-effects on strawberry growth and development at the tested dosage. The results showed that 2% Wuyiencin AS had an excellent control efficacy against strawberry powdery mildew, which could provide some basis for controlling strawberry powdery mildew and scientific application of fungicides in the field.

ags:resource.dc:title: A new insect pest, Celypha flavipalpana Herrich-Schaffer, infesting maize seedling stage, recorded from Fuxin in Liaoning Province
辽宁阜新地区发现玉米苗期新害虫-草小卷蛾

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xiaoqi, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Plant Protection
Wang Miao, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Plant Protection
Lv Chengjun, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文首次报道了发生于辽宁省阜新市彰武县部分地块玉米苗上的一种新害虫一草小卷蛾（Celypha flavipalpana Herrich-Schaffer），简要阐述了其形态特征、主要为害特点以及生活习性。为进一步研究其生物学特性及防治技术提供了重要基础。

This paper reported a new insect pest, Celypha flavipalpana Herrich-Schaffer, which infests maize at seedling stage. It is the first record of this species in Zhangwu County, Fuxin City, Liaoning Province. The morphology, major injury characteristics and habits of this insect were briefly described. It would provide an important basis for further study on the biological characteristics and control measures of the insect pest.

ags:resource.dc:title: Screening of adjuvants for entomopathogenic nematodes of Steinernema carpocapsae A11 strain in foliar application
昆虫病原线虫Steinernema carpocapsae A11品系叶面应用辅助剂的筛选

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jin Yongling, Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, Daqing (China)
Han Richou, Guangdong Entomological Institute, Guangzhou (China)
Cong Bin, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究了12种物质对昆虫病原线虫Steinernema carpocapsae A11品系的抗干燥保护作用。这些物质在试验浓度下对线虫和小菜蛾3龄幼虫的存活以及对线虫的侵染率都无显著影响。线虫加入抗干燥剂后经滤纸干燥法处理和叶面喷洒试验结果都表明，甘油和黄原胶的抗干燥保护作用最好。

Twelve chemicals were screened for the adhesive property and the anti-desiccation ability for Steinernema carpocapsae A11 strain. The tested chemicals showed neither adverse effects on the survival of S. carpocapsae A11 and the third-instar larvae of DBM, nor adverse effects on the infection rate of S. carpocapsae A11. Among all chemicals tested, glycerin and xanthan are promising as anti-desiccants for field application, when tested in growth cabinet and sprayed on cabbage leaf.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of 3 kinds of acaricides on activity of the extracellular protease and chitinase produced by Acremonium hansfordii
3种杀螨剂对顶孢霉菌株胞外蛋白酶和几丁质酶活性的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Jing, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Prataculture
Yang Lilong, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Prataculture
Chen E, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Prataculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究了螺螨酯、噻嗪酮和吡螨胺在不同浓度下处理对顶孢霉胞外蛋白酶和几丁质酶活力的影响。结果表明，螺螨酯各浓度处理对顶孢霉胞外蛋白酶和几丁质酶活性均无影响，噻嗪酮高浓度处理顶孢霉在培养的前4d对胞外蛋白酶活性有轻微的抑制作用，随培养时间延长，抑制作用不明显；而低浓度处理下，即在1.25mg/L浓度下培养7d，其酶活力是第1天的3.97倍，对顶孢霉胞外蛋白酶活性有刺激作用。吡螨胺对顶孢霉胞外蛋白酶和几丁质酶活性有抑制，且随浓度增高和培养时间延长抑制作用越明显。

Influence of 3 kinds of acaricides, spirodiclofen, buprofezin and tebufenpyrad with different concentrations on the activity of the extracellular protease and chitinase produced by Acremonium hansfordii was investigated in this study. The results showed that spirodiclofen had no influence on the activity of protease and chitinase. Buprofezin at high concentration slightly inhibited the protease activity during the first four days after treatment, while it had no obvious inhibition with the time prolonged. Buprofezin at low concentration of 1.25 mg/L could obviously increase the protease activity, and the enzyme activity at the 7th day was 3.97 times as high as that at the 1st day. Tebufenpyrad could inhibit the activity of protease and chitinase, the higher concentration or the longer time, the more obvious inhibition.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of bacterial shot-hole stress on proteins and amino acids contents in leaves of plum trees
细菌性穿孔病危害对李树叶片蛋白质和氨基酸含量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Deyi, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Yao Jin’ai, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Huang Peng, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为判定细菌性穿孔病危害对李树叶片蛋白质和氨基酸含量变化的影响，以3个品种李树的病、健叶为试验材料，利用凯氏定氮仪及全自动氨基酸分析仪检测其蛋白质和氨基酸含量。结果显示，3个品种李树叶片受细菌性穿孔病危害后，蛋白质和氨基酸含量均出现了不同程度的下降，降幅与李树品种有关；细菌性穿孔病危害对李树不同病情等级叶片的蛋白质含量产生了极显著影响，各等级叶片的蛋白质含量出现变化，有升有降，但最终还是不能抵抗病害的胁迫，4级叶片的含量最低且显著区别于其他各级叶片；细菌性穿孔病危害对李树叶片的氨基酸种类无影响，均有必需氨基酸9种和非必需氨基酸8种，但绝大多数种类氨基酸含量通常随叶片病情等级的提高而呈现不同幅度的下降，只有极少数种类出现小幅度的提升，两者紧密关联。研究可为从生理生化角度探讨李细菌性穿孔病的致病机理提供基础数据。

To explore how leaves of plum trees are damaged by bacterial shot-hole stress, we collected the ailing and healthy leaves of three varieties of plum trees and investigated the contents of amino acids and proteins in these leaves by using Kjeldahl apparatus and automatic amino acid analyzer. The results showed that after infection of the bacterial shot-hole pathogen, the contents of amino acids and proteins in these leaves decreased in different degrees and these variations were associated with plum tree varieties. Protein contents of injure leaves with different disease levels showed great difference. All these leaves could not resist bacterial shot-hole stress, and protein contents in the leaves with the 4th disease grade was lowest than those in leaves with other disease grades. The kinds of amino acids in leaves of plum tree were not affected by bacterial shot-hole stress. There were 9 essential amino acids (EAAs) and 8 non-essential amino acids (NEAAs) in all tested leaves, but the contents of the majority of amino acids decreased at different extent with the increase of the disease grades, only the content of few kinds of amino acids increased slightly. This research provides basic data for further research on pathogenic mechanism of the bacterial shot-hole pathogen from the perspective of physiology and biochemistry.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of temperature and initial population density on the infection of Meloidogyne enterolobii on tomato plants
温度和初始种群密度对象耳豆根结线虫侵染番茄的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Juanhua, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), Lab of Plant Nematode
Zhuo Kan, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), Lab of Plant Nematode
Lin Borong, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), Lab of Plant Nematode

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过室内接种方法，研究了不同温度和接种密度对象耳豆根结线虫侵染番茄能力的影响。研究结果表明，28～30℃是象耳豆根结线虫侵染番茄的最适温度。随着温度的下降，其侵染能力明显降低。当象耳豆根结线虫2龄幼虫接种密度大于10条/100cm3土壤时，番茄的生长会受到显著的抑制，随着线虫接种密度的增加，根结指数显著增加、线虫对番茄的危害也逐渐加重。研究结果将为广东省蔬菜产区制定象耳豆根结线虫防治指标提供理论依据。

Effects of temperature and initial population density of Meloidogyne enterolobii on the infection on tomato were assessed using bioassay method in the greenhouse. The infection ability of M. enterolobii was best at 28 - 30℃. And as the temperature dropped, the infection ability decreased obviously. When the initial inoculation density of M. enterolobii reached 10 second-stage juveniles (J2) in 100 cm3 soil, the growth of tomato plants was affected significantly. With increasing the initial inoculation density of J2, the gall index increased obviously and the nematodes caused more and more harm to tomato plants. These results may provide the theoretic foundation for the control index of M. enterolobii in Vegetable producing areas of Guangdong Province.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of Odontothrips loti damage on MDA content and defensive enzyme activity in alfalfa plants
牛角花齿蓟马为害对紫花苜蓿MDA含量及防御酶活性的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Kou Jiangtao, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Grassland Science
Shi Shangli, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Grassland Science
Hu Guixin, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Grassland Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了明确紫花苜蓿对牛角花齿蓟马为害的抗性机理，测定了不同牛角花齿蓟马虫口密度下抗、感蓟马苜蓿无性系R-1、I-1的丙二醛（MDA）含量及防御性酶POD、PPO和PAL活性的变化。结果表明：受牛角花齿蓟马为害后，R-1、I-1无性系的MDA含量均上升，为害第5天时，MDA含量的增加量均与虫口密度呈显著的正相关，且I-1无性系MDA含量的增加量显著高于R-1无性系。R-1无性系的POD、PPO和PAL活性在低虫口密度（1、3头/枝条）下均呈上升趋势，在高虫口密度（5、7头/枝条）下均呈先上升后下降的趋势；I-1无性系的POD和PPO活性均呈先上升后下降的趋势，低虫口密度下PAL活性在为害后期上升，高虫口密度下PAL活性先上升后下降。说明POD、PPO和PAL活性的升高可能是紫花苜蓿对牛角花齿蓟马诱导抗性的一种表现，但R-1无性系对牛角花齿蓟马的抗性高于I-1无性系，在牛角花齿蓟马为害后期其体内POD、PPO和PAL活性仍处于较高水平，所以I-1无性系膜脂过氧化程度也较R-1无性系高，表现为感蓟马。

MDA content and defensive enzymes (POD, PPO, PAL) activity of resistant and susceptible alfalfa clones R-1 and I-1 growing under different thrips densities were tested to explore resistance mechanism of alfalfa plants to thrips damage. The results indicated that MDA contents for both the 2 clones increased. Significantly positive correlation was found between MDA increment and thrips density on the 5th day of damage. MDA increment in I-1 was significantly higher than that of R-1. For R-1 clone, POD, PPO and PAL activity increased under low thrips densities (1, 3 per branch), while under high densities (5, 7 per branch), they increased firstly and then decreased; POD and PPO activity for I-1 increased firstly and then decreased, while for PAL activity, it presented an increased tendency at the late stage of damage under low thrips densities, and under high densities they increased firstly and then decreased, indicating that the increase in activities for POD, PPO and PAL might be a kind of induced resistance of alfalfa to thrips damage. The activities of the 3 enzymes in R-1 were higher than those in I-1, and similarly, I-1 was with more lipid peroxidation and shown as thrips susceptible.

ags:resource.dc:title: Predatory capacity of Chrysopapallens (Rambur) to three species of aphids
大草蛉对3种蚜虫的捕食能力研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sun Lijuan, Qingdao Agriculture University, Qingdao (China), Key Laboratory for Integrated Management of Plant Disease ＆ Insect Pest in Shandong Province
Yi Weixian, Huangdao Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Qingdao (China)
Zhao Chuande, Qingdao Agriculture University, Qingdao (China), Key Laboratory for Integrated Management of Plant Disease ＆ Insect Pest in Shandong Province

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了明确大草蛉[Chrysopa pallens（Rambur）]对田间3种常见蚜虫，桃粉大尾蚜[Hyalopterus amygdali（Blanchard）]、绣线菊蚜（Aphis citricola van der Goot）和牛蒡长管蚜[Uroleucon gobonis（Matsumura）]的捕食能力，在室内研究了大草蛉各龄幼虫、成虫对3种蚜虫的捕食量及大草蛉3龄幼虫对3种蚜虫的捕食功能反应。结果表明，大草蛉3龄幼虫对3种蚜虫的日均捕食量最高，单头大草蛉日均捕食牛蒡长管蚜、桃粉大尾蚜和绣线菊蚜的数量分别为24.9、37.3和103.1头；大草蛉成虫期对3种蚜虫的捕食总量显著高于整个幼虫阶段，在成虫期内，单头大草蛉对牛蒡长管蚜、桃粉大尾蚜和绣线菊蚜的平均捕食量分别为208.5、632.3和766.0头；大草蛉3龄幼虫对牛蒡长管蚜、桃粉大尾蚜和绣线菊蚜的捕食功能反应均符合HollingⅡ模型。

In order to clarify the predatory capacity of Chrysopa pallens (Rambur) to three species of aphids, Hyalopterus amygdali Blanchard, Aphis citricola van der Goot and Uroleucon gobonis (Matsumura), the predatory amount of each instar of C. pallens larva and adult, and the predatory functional response of the 3rd instar larva to three species of aphids were investigated in laboratory. The result showed that the daily average predatory amount of the 3rd instar larva to three species of aphid was the highest, and the daily average predatory amount of each larva to H. amygdali, A. citricola and U. gobonis was 24.9, 37.3 and 103.1, respectively. The total predatory amount of an adult to three species of aphid were all higher than that of a larva, and the total predatory amount of each adult to H. amygdali, A. citricola and U. amygdali were 208.5, 632.3 and 766.0, respectively. The predatory functional responses of the 3rd instar larva to the three species of aphids were all belong to Holling Ⅱ Model.

ags:resource.dc:title: Control effects of Encarsia formosa populations reared on different hosts to Trialeurodes vaporariorum and Bemisia tabaci
不同寄主扩繁的丽蚜小蜂对粉虱的控效差异及评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Juan, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), Department of Entomology
Chen Hongyin, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhang Lisheng, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 日光温室条件下，分别以温室粉虱和烟粉虱作为扩繁寄主，建立起稳定的2种丽蚜小蜂种群（分别以E1和E2表示）。对这2种不同寄主来源的丽蚜小蜂在番茄、黄瓜、菜豆、茄子上烟粉虱和温室粉虱的寄生率进行了研究与比较。结果表明，E1和E2对4种寄主植物上温室粉虱的控制作用均显著大于对烟粉虱的控制作用；E1对茄子和黄瓜上的粉虱类害虫的控制作用较好，E2对4种植物间粉虱类害虫的控制作用无显著差异。2种小蜂在4种植物上烟粉虱的寄生率，除番茄上E1（27.84%）低于E2（42.22%），差异显著，其余3种植物上，均是E1高于E2，差异显著；2种小蜂在4种植物上对温室粉虱的寄生率，均是E1高于E2，差异显著，即对于4种植物上的粉虱类害虫的控害效果E1要相对优于E2。

Parasitism of two Encarsia formosa Gahan populations reared on Trialeurodes vaporariorum (Westwood) and Bemisia tabaci (Gennadius) separately for several generations (represented as population E1 and E2, respectively) to B. tabaci and T. vaporariorum on tomato, cucumber, kidney bean and eggplant, was investigated in the greenhouse. The parasitism rates of E1 and E2 on T. vaporariorum were significantly higher than those on B. tabaci from all of the four plants. The parasitism rates of E1 to whiteflies on cucumber and eggplant were much higher than those on the other two plants. However, there was no obvious difference in the parasitism rates of E2 to whiteflies among four plants. The parasitism rates of E1 to B. tabaci on all of the plants were significantly higher than those of E2 except for tomato. Similarly, the parasitism rates of E1 to T. vaporariorum were significantly higher from the four plants than those of E2.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of diapause duration on the growth and development of post-diapause pupae in the beet webworm Loxostege sticticalis
滞育持续期对草地螟滞育解除后蛹生长发育的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lu Xiaofei, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Jiang Xingfu, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Luo Lizhi, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了研究滞育持续期对草地螟（Loxostege sticticalis L.）滞育解除后蛹生长发育的影响，本试验以非滞育幼虫发育而来的蛹作对照，观察了从5种滞育持续期（2、4、6、8、10个月）条件下发育而来的蛹生长发育和存活情况。结果表明：不同处理间草地螟蛹重、化蛹前期、蛹期和蛹的存活率均差异显著。其中，非滞育幼虫发育而来的蛹最重，显著高于其他滞育持续期的，但不同滞育持续期的幼虫发育而来的蛹重差异不显著；所有经过滞育的化蛹前期均显著延长，其中以滞育2个月幼虫解除后的最长（14.78d），其余处理随滞育持续期的延长，化蛹前期显著延长；所有经过滞育的幼虫滞育后蛹期均显著延长，其中以滞育2个月和6个月幼虫发育来的蛹期最长，滞育4、8、10个月幼虫发育而来的蛹期差异不显著；随着滞育时间的延长，蛹的存活率显著降低。

To determine effects of diapause duration on the growth and development of post-diapause pupae of Loxostege sticticalis, pupal weight, post-diapause developmental time of pre-pupae and pupae and pupal survival rate were investigated originating from different diapause periods of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 months and non-diapause larvae under the controlled laboratory conditions. The results showed that the weight of pupae originated from non-diapause larvae was the highest and significantly higher than that from diapause larvae, while weight of pupae originated from different diapause duration of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 months larvae showed no significant difference. The developmental time of pre-pupae and pupae of post-diapause development was significantly longer than that of non-diapause individuals. Pre-pupal period of post-diapause individuals with a short diapause of 2 moths was the longest. The pupal period of post-diapause individuals with diapause duration of 2 and 6 months was significantly longer than that with diapause duration of 4, 8 and 10 months. The survival rate of post-diapause pupae was significantly lower than that of non-diapause individuals, indicating that longer diapause duration has negative effect on pupal survival.

ags:resource.dc:title: A data processing and analysis system for millimetric scanning entomological radar
毫米波扫描昆虫雷达数据处理分析系统

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Hu Xiaowen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Chen Lin, Ningxia Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Yinchuan (China)
Zhang Yunhui, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用C#和MySQL自行研发了毫米波扫描昆虫雷达数据处理分析系统，设计了较为通用的雷达数据库，实现了雷达数据的统一管理、转换、查询、统计与分析，为昆虫迁飞的总体空间研究提供了平台。使用该系统可计算得到一系列昆虫迁飞参数，如昆虫数量、空中密度、飞行速度及定向等，为毫米波昆虫雷达提供了通用的数据分析功能，对提高其数据管理与分析效率具有重要的推动作用。这为昆虫雷达监测网的建立奠定了基础，将为迁飞性害虫的监测预警与有效治理提供重要的技术支撑。

A data processing and analysis system used for millimetric scanning entomological radar, and a universal radar database were developed with C# and MySQL, which achieved the unified management, transformation, query and statistical analysis of radar data, and also provided a platform to approach into overall space of migration. Using this system, a series of parameters exhibited by the over flying insect population, such as quantity, density, speed and collective orientation of the insects, were estimated. This system facilitated data management and analysis for millimetric scanning entomological radar by providing generalized data analysis function. Development of this system laid the foundation for establishment of entomological radar monitoring network, and would provide important technical support for launching real-time forecasting, early warning and effective management for migrant insects.

ags:resource.dc:title: Verticillium dahliae labeled with green fluorescent protein gene
绿色荧光蛋白基因标记棉花黄萎病菌

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Ming, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Agro-Products Processing Science and Technology
Gui Yuejing, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Agro-Products Processing Science and Technology
Qi Weiyan, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Agro-Products Processing Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以携带有潮霉素抗性筛选标记的pCTHyg载体为骨架，构建了含有增强型绿色荧光蛋白基因sGFP的载体pCH-sGFP，并通过农杆菌介导的遗传转化法导入引起棉花黄萎病的高致病力大丽轮枝菌Vd991，获得了sGFP整合到大丽轮枝菌基因组的转化株。通过转化子荧光信号、生长表型和致病力筛选鉴定，获得了1株与Vd991生长和致病力无显著差异且荧光信号强烈的转化株Vd-gfp77。侵染棉花根部试验表明，Vd-gfp77侵染棉花后快速扩展繁殖，子代仍然能发出强烈的荧光信号。本试验绿色荧光蛋白标记大丽轮枝菌的成功构建，为后续大丽轮枝菌侵染棉花过程的组织学和致病机理研究提供了良好的研究材料。

The expression vector of pCH-Sgfp was constructed by integration of the enhanced green fluorescent protein gene (sGFP) into the pCTHyg vector with hygromycin-resisitant gene, and transformed into Verticillium dahliae strain Vd991 highly virulent to cotton by Agrobacterium tumefaciens-mediated transformation. A transformant with strong fluorescence intensity, namely strain Vd-gfp77, was obtained, which had the same growth phenotype and virulence with the wild type. Infection experiment of Vd-gfp77 to cotton demonstrated that the strain Vd-gfp77 can excite fluorescence after invading and spreading in cotton tissue. The successful construction of GFP-tagged isolate of V. dahliae is beneficial to the further research on pathogen infection process to cotton and its pathogenesis.

ags:resource.dc:title: Sequence analysis of mtDNA COI gene of 7 geographical populations of Oedaleus asiaticus in Beijing and surrounding regions
北京及周边地区7个地理种群的亚洲小车蝗mtDNA COI基因序列分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Yunlong, Beijing Plant Protection Station, Beijing (China)
Li Xia, Center of Agricultural Technique Extension of Anda City, Anda (China)
Liang Tieshuang, Beijing Plant Protection Station, Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以线粒体DNA COI基因中一段645bp的特异片段作为目的片段，对来自内蒙古自治区的锡林郭勒盟、赤峰市、乌兰察布市，河北省的张家口市、承德市和北京的密云县在内共7个地理种群的139个亚洲小车蝗样本进行了DNA序列分析。结果表明：在目的片段序列中共检测到12个多态性位点，占碱基总数的1.86%。7个种群中内蒙古赤峰广兴源种群的遗传变异程度相对较高，其核苷酸多样性值为0.000 84，河北张家口种群、河北承德种群和北京密云种群均未发生遗传变异。在139条序列中共鉴定出13种单倍型，各单倍型之间未形成与其地理种群空间位置相对应的聚类单元，并且在单倍型网络进化图中也未发现各单倍型之间存在明显的进化关系。

The 645 bp fragment of mtDNA COI gene from 139 individuals of 7 geographical populations in Miyun County, Beijing and surrounding regions (including Xilingol League, Chifeng and Wulanchabu of Inner Mongolia, Zhangjiakou and Chengde of Heibei Province) were sequenced and analyzed. The results indicated that 12 genetic polymorphisms were found in the target fragments, about 1.86% of sequenced nucleotide. Variation degree of guangxingyuan population in Chifeng, Inner Mongolia was the highest among all the 7 populations. Genetic variation was not found in the populations from Zhangjiakou, Chengde and Miyun. Cluster units corresponding to geographic location were not found among 13 haplotypes identified in 139 sequences, and there was no obvious evolutionary relationship among these haplotypes in the haplotype networks.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning and expression of heat shock protein 90 gene in relation to heat stress in the leafminer, Liriomyza trifolii
三叶斑潜蝇热激蛋白Hsp90基因的克隆及其在高温胁迫下的表达分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ji Qingzhan, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Wang Haihong, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Lei Zhongren, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用RT-PCR及RACE技术克隆了三叶斑潜蝇Hsp90基因全长cDNA序列，并用实时定量RT-PCR的方法检测其在不同发育阶段受到高温胁迫后的表达水平。该基因的cDNA序列全长2 408bp，开放阅读框为2 145bp，编码714个氨基酸；5’非编码区为151bp，3’非编码区为112bp。该基因推导的氨基酸序列与其他昆虫同源序列比较有很高的相似性（80%～99%）。聚类分析结果显示三叶斑潜蝇与美洲斑潜蝇和南美斑潜蝇的亲缘关系最近。实时荧光定量PCR检测结果表明三叶斑潜蝇Hsp90基因的表达受到热胁迫的诱导，诱导3龄幼虫最大表达量的温度比诱导其他发育阶段的温度低，在43℃时预蛹和蛹的表达量在整个生命周期中最高，在检测的高温胁迫条件下，雄虫比雌虫的表达量更高。该结果为阐明三叶斑潜蝇胁迫耐受能力及其对其他潜蝇种群的取代机制奠定了分子基础。

A full-length cDNA encoding heat shock protein 90 (Hsp90) was cloned from Liriomyza trifolii using RT-PCR and RACE methods, and the expression levels of this gene in relation to high temperature stress during different developmental stages were investigated using real-time quantitative PCR (qRT-PCR). The cDNA is 2 408 bp in length, containing an open reading frame (ORF) of 2 145 bp, encoding 714 amino acid residues, with a 5 runtranslated region (UTR) of 151 bp and a 3 UTR of 112 bp. Cluster analysis confirmed that the deduced amino acid sequence shared high identity with the reported homologous sequences from other insects (80% - 99%). Evolution results showed the genetic relation of L. trifolii was more close to that of L. salivae and L. huidobrensis, qRT-PCR analysis showed that expression of Hsp90 gene could be induced by heat stress. The maximum of inductive temperature of the third instar larvae was lower than that of other developmental stages. Gene expression attained the maximum at the stage of prepupa and pupa at 43℃. Higher expression level was observed in male than in female when exposure to heat stress tested. Our research provided a way forward for further research on stress tolerance of L. trifolii and the displacement mechanism of this insect to other leafminer populations.

ags:resource.dc:title: Introduction to the database of invasive alien species in China
中国外来入侵物种数据库简介

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xian Xiaoqing, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Chen Hong, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhao Jian, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 中国外来入侵物种数据库系统是我国进行生物入侵交流的权威网络信息平台。该系统由中国外来入侵物种数据库系统、中国外来入侵物种地理分布信息系统、外来入侵物种野外数据采集系统、外来入侵物种安全性评价系统、中国主要外来入侵昆虫DNA条形码识别系统和中国重大外来入侵昆虫远程监控系统等6个子系统组成。该系统旨在为从事外来入侵物种研究、检测监测工作的科研机构和职能部门提供科研成果交流、检测监测信息发布、外来入侵物种数据查询和科普教育的综合信息服务平台。

The database of invasive alien species in China is an important network platform for the information exchange of biological invasions in China. The system is composed of the basic information system of invasive alien species (IAS) in China, geographic distribution system of IAS in China, field data collection system of IAS in China, bio-safety evaluation system of IAS in agriculture and forestry ecosystem, DNA barcoding system of major invasive alien insects in China and remote monitoring system of the important invasive alien insects in China. The system is intended to provide an integrated information service platform for research institutions, administrative departments and individual enthusiasts to exchange scientific research, publish detection and monitoring information, query IAS elementary knowledge, and popularize biological invasion knowledge.

ags:resource.dc:title: Herbicide-resistant weeds and their management
抗药性杂草与治理

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Chaoxian, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Huang Hongjuan, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Cui Hailan, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 抗药性杂草对农田杂草治理和农业生产构成严重威胁，成为备受全球关注的严重问题。随着长期、大量使用相对有限的化学除草剂，全球抗药性杂草发展迅猛，目前已有217种杂草对化学除草剂产生了抗药性，我国抗药性杂草发展也十分迅猛。本文在介绍杂草抗药性基本概念、抗药性杂草发展过程、抗药性杂草现状的基础上，重点描述了抗药性杂草治理策略，以期为我国抗药性杂草研究和治理提供参考。

Herbicide-resistant weeds are major constraints in weed management and threaten agricultural systems, and make it a great concern of the world. With the repeated and intensive use of herbicides, 217 weed species have developed resistance to herbicides worldwide. Herbicide-resistant weeds in China are also fast developing as in other countries. This paper described definitions relevant to herbicide-resistant weeds, development of herbicide-resistant weeds, and current status of herbicide-resistant weeds in the world, with emphasis on strategies for managing herbicide-resistant weeds, in order to provide useful reference for studies and management of herbicide resistance.

ags:resource.dc:title: Development and prospects of the research on pesticide residues
农药残留研究进展与展望

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zheng Yongquan, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 农药残留是农药应用后的必然现象。农药残留引起的安全问题已经引起全社会的高度关注。本文从农药残留分析方法、农药环境行为、加工农产品中农药残留变化、我国农药残留标准制定等四个方面简要综述近年来农药残留研究的基本状况及发展趋势，以期为农药残留的深入研究提供参考和借鉴。

Pesticide residues are inevitable after application, and safety problems caused by pesticide residues are serious concerns for the whole society. The article reviews the current development and future prospects of the research on pesticide residues in four aspects, including analytical method, environmental fate, processing factor and standard establishment, in order to provide some references for the further study of pesticide residues in the future.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research progress and prospect of bio-pesticides
生物农药研究进展与未来展望

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Qiu Dewen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 生物农药的研究与利用在农业病虫害防控体系中占有重要地位，进入21世纪后，更备受世界各国关注。随着绿色植保战略的推进与实施，生物农药研发成为我国生物产业、农业科研与应用的热点，被列为国家中长期科技发展规划的重大研究领域与方向。本文介绍了国内外生物农药产业的发展现状与未来趋势，分析了我国生物农药的发展瓶颈，提出了促进发展的可行对策。

The bio-pesticide research and utilization play an important role in IPM. Many countries have paid more and more attention to the bio-pesticides in the twenty-first century.
