This paper introduced the research progress and prospect of the bio-pesticide industry, analyzed the bottleneck problems in developing bio-pesticide industry in China, and put forward some strategic measures and suggestions for stimulating the development of biopesticide industry.

ags:resource.dc:title: Insecticide resistance in and chemical control of the cotton aphid, Aphis gossypii (Glover)
棉蚜抗药性及其化学防治

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liang Yan, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), Department of Entomology
Zhang Shuai, National Agro-Tech Extension and Service Center, Beijing (China)
Shao Zhenrun, National Agro-Tech Extension and Service Center, Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 棉蚜[Aphis gossypii（Glover）]属半翅目蚜科，是一种世界性的害虫，主要通过取食植物汁液和传播病毒给农业生产造成严重损失。长期以来，棉蚜的防治一直以化学防治为主，棉蚜对有机氯、有机磷、氨基甲酸酯、拟除虫菊酯、新烟碱类等多种杀虫药剂已经产生了抗性。本文主要从棉蚜抗药性发展历史、抗药性机制以及棉蚜的化学防治等方面进行论述，期望能为农业生产上延缓棉蚜抗药性产生、有效治理棉蚜提供指导。

Aphis gossypii (Glover) (Hemiptera: Aphididae), the cotton aphid, is one of the most important agricultural pests, causing damage by feeding and virus transmission. The control of the cotton aphid is primarily dependent on the application of insecticides, often with multiple applications for each growing season in China. However, with heavy application of insecticides such as organophosphate, pyrethroid, carbamate and neonicotinoid insecticides, the cotton aphid has developed strong resistance to these insecticides. In this paper, the history of insecticide resistance and resistance mechanisms and perspective of chemical control of the cotton aphid are reviewed.

ags:resource.dc:title: Rodent damages and the management of agricultural rodent pests in China
我国农业鼠害发生状况及防控技术进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Yongwang, National Agro-Tech Extension and Service Center, Beijing (China)
Wang Deng, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), College of Agronomy and Biotechnology
Shi Dazhao, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), College of Agronomy and Biotechnology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 我国的农业鼠害发生十分严重，全国31个省（市、自治区）农区均有发生。每年农田鼠害发生面积2 000～4 000万hm2，造成的粮食损失可占总产量的5%～10%。草原鼠害发生也遍及青海等13个草原大省（自治区），每年草原受灾面积达2 500～4 300万hm2左右，严重危害面积1 500～2 300万hm2。近年，我国农业鼠害防治工作取得了长足进步，成绩斐然。农田鼠害的防治可占到发生面积的50%～80%，农户鼠害的防治数占到发生总数的80%以上。草原鼠害防治面积占严重危害面积的1/3。鼠害监测预警体系的软硬件建设被不断推进。毒饵站技术，抗药性监测等技术措施被用来优化传统化学灭杀法，以减少其环境副作用。不育控制，TBS技术和生态管理等新型可持续鼠害管理技术的研究和试验推广也取得了丰硕成果。指导相关鼠害防治方法实践的国家标准、行业标准及优化策略等陆续推出。综合运用各种技术和方法来控制鼠害的能力得到了很大加强。

Rodent pests occurred very seriously in agricultural landscapes and villages in China. They happened in almost 31 provinces (municipalities or autonomous regions). Rodents occupy 20 - 40 million hm2 farmlands annually, typically causing annual losses of 5% - 10% harvest. In grasslands, episodic outbreaks of rodents occupy 25 to 43 million hectares annually, but heavier losses were caused to 15 to 23 million hectares annually. In recent years, management of rodent pests has made great progress in China, and obtained remarkable achievements. Rodent control activities implemented in farmlands account for 50% - 80% of total acreage; as for peasant households, it accounts for more than 80% of the total. The control areas in grasslands cover about a third of the seriously damaged lands. Software and hardware for rodent pest monitoring and early-warning were constructed. Some techniques, such as poison bait station, rodenticide resistance monitoring, were used to optimize the traditional chemical method, and minimize the environmental effects of rodenticides. Some new sustainable pest management techniques such as sterile control, TBS technology and ecologically-based rodent management were experimented, and made rapid progress. National standards, industry standards, and optimized management strategies for rodent pest control were promulgated. Integrating different suitable techniques and methods to control rodents has been developed, and obtained good achievements.

ags:resource.dc:title: Progress in monitoring and forecasting of insect pests in China
突发性暴发性害虫监测预警研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Yunhui, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), lnstitute of Plant Protection
Cheng Dengfa, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), lnstitute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 近年来，草地螟、黏虫和稻飞虱等害虫，在我国表现出突发性和暴发性，给农业生产带来了严重威胁。利用遥感、地理信息系统和全球定位技术等“3S”技术开展农作物病虫害的实时监测和早期预警，对于该类害虫的有效防控，确保我国粮食安全具有举足轻重的作用。本文综述了我国病虫害监测预警研究方法、取得的进展和现代信息技术在监测预警中的应用；分析了本学科的研究现状和存在的问题并提出了建议；探讨了我国病虫害监测预警学科的发展方向。

The sudden outbreak of the meadow moth, armyworm, and plant hopper has become a serious threat to the agricultural production of China in recent years. Developing a real-time monitoring and early-warning system based on the ‘3S’ technologies, including Remote Sensing (RS), Geographic Information Systems (GIS), and Global Positioning System (GPS), is very important for China’s grain security. This paper summarized the methodology of and progress in the monitoring and forecasting techniques for insect pests and plant diseases, and focused on the application of modern information technology. Additionally, the current state and existing problems for monitoring and forecasting of insect pests and plant diseases were analyzed and the strategy for future research was discussed.

ags:resource.dc:title: Current status and prospects of the important insect pests on the vegetable crops in China
我国蔬菜重要害虫研究现状与展望

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Youjun, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Vegetables and Flowers
Wu Qingjun, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Vegetables and Flowers
Wang Shaoli, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Vegetables and Flowers

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 蔬菜是我国重要的经济作物,蔬菜害虫给我国蔬菜生产造成了重大损失。本文以小菜蛾、甜菜夜蛾、斜纹夜蛾、粉虱、蓟马、斑潜蝇、叶螨、蚜虫、黄曲条跳甲和韭菜迟眼蕈蚊等重大害虫为对象，概述了我国蔬菜害虫的发生危害特点和近年来科研项目资助情况，对我国重要害虫的生物学与生态学、种类鉴定、入侵和传毒、抗药性及其机制、基因组学、防治技术基础研究及应用等方面的主要进展进行综述，展望了未来蔬菜害虫的研究方向。

Vegetables are important economic crops in China and the important insect pests caused great losses in vegetable production. In the present review, the important insect pests, including Plutella xylostella, Spodoptera exigua, S. litura, whiteflies, thrips, Liriomyza, spider mites, aphids, Phyllotreta striolata, and Bradysia odoriphaga, on the vegetables were targeted for a brief introduction to the occurrence, damage and the national research funding on the vegetable insects in China in recent years. The main progresses in the biology and ecology, species identification, invasion and virus transmission, insecticide resistance and mechanisms, genomics and control were summarized. The research directions on vegetable insects in the future were proposed in the end.

ags:resource.dc:title: The toxicity and field efficacy of 5 insecticides to Agriphila aeneociliella
5种杀虫剂对白眉野草螟的毒力测定和田间防效

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Peng He, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhang Yunhui, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Li Xiangrui, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 白眉野草螟（Agriph ila aeneociliella）是近年来在山东莱州等地小麦上新发现的一种害虫，由于对其生物学习性和防控技术缺少了解，致使当地小麦生产损失严重，对小麦主产区粮食安全生产构成潜在威胁。本试验通过室内毒力测定和田间药效试验，测定了当前5种常用杀虫剂对其幼虫的防治效果。室内毒力测定结果表明：毒死蜱、氯虫苯甲酰胺和辛硫磷的杀虫活性较高，LC50分别为0.39、1.75和10.75mg/L；田间药效试验结果表明：480g/L毒死蜱乳油和40%辛硫磷乳油在施药7d后的防效均在90%以上，分别为91%和90%，显著高于另外3种药剂，可作为防治白眉野草螟的首选药剂，施药方法建议在小麦返青前期灌根或播种前撒施毒土。

Agriphila aeneociliella has become a new pest occurring in wheat in Laizhou City of Shandong Province in recent years. Since there are no effective control methods available and lack of knowledge about its biological habits, serious wheat yield loss has been caused, which threatens the production safety of wheat. The toxicities of 5 common insecticides against A. aeneociliella were tested in the laboratory and field. The results of laboratory tests showed that chlorpyrifos, chlorantraniliprole and phoxim had strong activity against A. aeneociliella, and their LC50 values were 0.39 mg/L, 1.75 mg/L and 10.75 mg/L, respectively. The results of field efficacy showed that the control effects of chlorpyrifos 480 g/L EC and phoxim 40% EC were both over 90% 7 days after treatment, and their control effects values were 91% and 90%, respectively, significantly higher than those of the other three insecticides. Therefore, they could be the first choices in chemical control of A. aeneociliella. Root irrigation before wheat turning-green stage or spreading pesticide-clay mixtures before sowing were recommended.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of northern corn leaf blight epidemic in 2012 and control countermeasures
2012年玉米大斑病重发原因和控制对策

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Jie, National Agro-Technical Extension and Service Centre, Beijing (China)
Jiang Yuying, National Agro-Technical Extension and Service Centre, Beijing (China)
Zeng Juan, National Agro-Technical Extension and Service Centre, Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 玉米大斑病是由真菌引起的世界性玉米病害，常给生产造成严重损失。2012年玉米大斑病在东北、华北地区大流行，本文归纳了玉米大斑病全国发生概况、区域分布和各地病情。总结了2012年玉米大斑病发病时间早，流行速度快，品种间和地区间发病程度差异大等发生特点，分析了适宜天气条件、主栽品种不抗病、栽培管理措施不合理是导致大斑病重发的主要原因。并针对性地提出了重视玉米病害的预测预报、推荐种植抗病品种、加强病害综合防治的对策建议，旨在对今后进一步做好玉米大斑病测报工作，指导玉米病害防治、有效控制其危害、保障玉米生产有所裨益。

Northern corn leaf blight (NCLB) caused by fungi is a worldwide serious disease on corn, which can cause heavy losses to corn production. The NCLB was epidemic in the Northeast of China and North China in 2012. This paper summarized the nationwide general situation, distribution and local progress of NCLB. The disease prevalence is characterized by early and quick spread, and significant variation among different cultivars and regions. The serious occurrence of NCLB is mainly caused by suitable weather conditions, susceptible major corn cultivars and unreasonable cultivation measures. To control the NCLB and guarantee corn production safety, several countermeasures are recommended, such as attaching importance to the disease forecast, recommending resistant cultivars, and reinforcing integrated pest management.

ags:resource.dc:title: Co-toxicity and effect of mixtures of difenoconazole and pyraclostrobin against Colletotrichum gloeosporioides on yam
苯醚甲环唑和吡唑醚菌酯混合物对炭疽病菌的联合毒力及药效

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Shuai, Agriculture University of Hebei, Baoding (China), College of Plant Protection
Li Shixiong, Agriculture University of Hebei, Baoding (China), College of Plant Protection
Yang Taixin, Agriculture University of Hebei, Baoding (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了明确苯醚甲环唑与吡唑醚菌酯混合物对胶孢炭疽菌（Colletotrichum gloeosporioides）的毒力增效作用，本文采用菌丝生长速率法测定了苯醚甲环唑、吡唑醚菌酯及其不同比例混合物对炭疽病菌的毒力，并通过田间试验评价了其对炭疽病的防治效果和产量的影响。结果表明：苯醚甲环唑与吡唑醚菌酯质量比为2:1的混合物对抑制菌丝生长增效最为明显，增效系数为2.41。在田间药效试验中，2种药剂2:1混用对祁山药炭疽病的防效明显，增产率为45.02%。

To clarify the synergistic effect of difenoconazole and pyraclostrobin against Colletotrichum gloeosporioides, toxicity of difenoconazole, pyraclostrobin and their mixtures at different ratios against C. gloeosporioides was determined by mycelial growth rate test, and effect of the mixtures on C. gloeosporioides and yam yield was assessed through the field trials. The results showed that the synergistic effect of the mixture with the mass ratio of 2:1 was the most obvious with the synergistic coefficient of 2.41. Field trials demonstrated that the mixture with the mass ratio of 2:1 had higher control efficacy on yam anthracnose and could increase the yam yield by 45.02%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preliminary study on control efficacy of Beauveria brongniartii (Sacc.) Petch against white grubs in sugarcane fields
布氏白僵菌防治蔗田蛴螬的初步研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yin Jiong, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kaiyuan (China), Sugarcane Research Institute
Luo Zhiming, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kaiyuan (China), Sugarcane Research Institute
Huang Yingkun, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kaiyuan (China), Sugarcane Research Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用甘蔗蛴螬残留虫口数和蔗根受害率的相对防效为指标，从蛴螬和甘蔗两个角度评价布氏白僵菌[Beau veria brongniartii （Sacc.） Petch]对甘蔗蛴螬的防治效果。结果表明，5月底6月初结合甘蔗大培土，布氏白僵菌粉剂单一施用及其与3.6%杀虫双颗粒剂混合施用，均可不同程度降低蔗田蛴螬虫量和蔗根受害率。布氏白僵菌粉剂单一施用时，以30.00kg/hm2制剂用量的防效为最高，蔗田蛴螬残留虫口数和蔗根受害率的相对防效分别为67.27%和74.56%。两剂混合施用相对防效分别为74.55%～85.45%和78.18%～85.94%，其中以剂量为（22.50＋45.00）kg/hm2的布氏白僵菌粉剂＋3.6%杀虫双颗粒剂混合施用较为理想。

Control efficacy of Beauveria brongniartii (Sacc.) Petch against white grubs was evaluated by measuring the relative control effects on residual number of white grubs and infested root rate in sugarcane fields. The results showed that residual number of white grubs and infested root rate could be reduced at different levels by B. brongniartii DP and the mixtures of B. brongniartii DP and 3.6% bisultap GR in sugarcane fields. When B. brongniartii DP was used alone, the highest control efficacy was achieved in 30.00 kg/hm2 treatment, with the relative control effects to residual number of white grubs and infested root rate of 67.27% and 74.56%, respectively. When the mixtures of B. brongniartii DP and 3.6% bisultap GR were applied in sugarcane fields, the relative control effects on residual number of white grubs and infested root rate were 74.55% - 85.45% and 78.18% - 85.94%, respectively. The mixture of B. brongniartii DP and 3.6% bisultap GR at the dose of 22.50 and 45.00 kg/hm2 was suggested to be the ideal insecticide against white grub in late May and early June.

ags:resource.dc:title: Control effects of fly nets to the pests of vegetables in greenhouses
防虫网对设施蔬菜害虫控害作用研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Baohong, Anhui University of Science and Technology, Fengyang (China)
Lin Guikun, Xiamen Yinziao Environmental Development Co., Ltd., Xiamen (China)
Wang Xuehui, Anhui University of Science and Technology, Fengyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 防虫网覆网栽培对减少设施蔬菜害虫为害，降低农药用量以及提高蔬菜品级和产量具有重要意义。本文研究了不同网目和颜色的防虫网覆网栽培的控害作用及其对蔬菜病毒病发生、蔬菜产量和品级的影响，并分析了防虫网覆网的经济、生态和社会等三大效益。结果表明，以50目银灰色防虫网覆网栽培，可100%阻隔杜绝菜粉蝶、小菜蛾等鳞翅目害虫和有效控制温室白粉虱、萝卜蚜等微小害虫为害，其平均控害作用为85.7%，控害作用强弱依次为化防＞防虫网覆网防治＞生防≥黄板诱杀＞农业防治＞对照；并且也可有效地抑制蔬菜病毒病发生，提高蔬菜产量和品级；其经济效益、生态效益和社会效益均十分显著。因此，防虫网覆网是一种保障设施蔬菜产业发展的重要“绿色防控”技术，具有良好的开发、应用和推广前景。

Fly nets had important significance in that they can obstruct pests effectively, reduce pesticide consumption and improve the quality and yield of vegetables in greenhouses. The control effects of different meshes and colors of fly nets to pests, and its influences on virus disease occurrence, and vegetable yield and quality were studied. Their benefits of economy, ecology and sociology were also analyzed. The results indicated that the large pests, such as Pieris rapae, Plutella xylostella, etc., were absolutely hindered, and the tiny pests, such as Trialeurodes vaporariorum, Lipaphis erysimi, etc., were effectively controlled with mesh 50 silver fly nets. The average control effect of fly nets to tiny pests was 85.7%, and the order of control effects of fly nets was as followed: chemical control, fly net control, bio-control, yellow trapping, and agricultural control. Moreover, the virus diseases could be inhibited effectively; vegetable quality and yield could be improved by fly nets. Their benefits of economy, ecology and sociology were very significant. Fly net was a kind of important and harmless preventive measure for industrial development of vegetables in greenhouses, and it had good prospects for further development and application.

ags:resource.dc:title: Risk assessment and adaptability of Impatiens necrotic spot virus in China
凤仙花坏死斑病毒在中国的适生性风险评估

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Ye, Yunnan Agricultural University, Kunming (China), College of Agronomy and Biotechnology
Wang Jinlong, Yunnan Agricultural University, Kunming (China), College of Agronomy and Biotechnology
Li Qiufang, Yunnan Agricultural University, Kunming (China), College of Agronomy and Biotechnology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 凤仙花坏死斑病毒（Impatiens necrotic spot virus, INSV）能够侵染多种花卉并破坏其观赏价值，目前在我国已有INSV的入侵报道。查询INSV和西花蓟马在世界范围内报道的地理信息，应用MaxEnt、ArcGIS软件，分别获得INSV和西花蓟马的适生性范围，结合INSV植物寄主在Lifemapper发布的分布数据，获得INSV中国境内风险发生区分布图。预测结果显示我国华东地区、中南地区、华北部分省份、西南部分省份及西北部分省份，都是潜在INSV高风险发生地区，包括了云南、贵州、广西、广东、福建、湖南、湖北、江西、浙江、台湾、上海、江苏、安徽、山东、陕西、山西、河南、河北、北京、天津、重庆、四川东部、甘肃部分地区、辽宁部分地区。INSV入侵中国的适生性分布评估将为INSV的检疫及防控提供参考。

Impatiens necrotic spot virus (INSV) can infect a lot of flower crops and destroy the ornamental value. The invasion of INSV has been reported in China in recent years. Based on the geographical information of INSV and Frankliniella occidentalis around the world, potential distribution of INSV and F. occidentalis were constructed by MaxEnt. Combined with the potential distribution of INSV and F. occidentalis and host’s information of INSV in Lifemapper database, INSV risk distribution map was constructed by ArcGIS software. From this map, it indicated that high risk would happen in the eastern China, southern and central China, some provinces in the southwestern and northwestern China, including Yunnan, Guizhou, Guangxi, Guangdong, Fujian, Hunan, Hubei, Jiangxi, Zhejiang, Taiwan, Shanghai, Jiangsu, Anhui, Shandong, Shaanxi, Shanxi, Henan, Hebei, Beijing, Tianjin, Chongqing, east of Sichuan, east of Gansu and south of Liaoning. It is a significant guidance for INSV quarantine and risk area assessment of INSV in China.

ags:resource.dc:title: Control effects of a dual sex pheromone cream on the oriental fruit moth and peach fruit moth in apple orchards
复合式膏体迷向剂对梨小、桃小食心虫的防控效果

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Xiaolong, Institute of Germplasm of Ningxia Academy of Agricultural and Forestry Sciences, Yinchuan (China)
Xia Guoning, The Garden Centre of East River in Ningxia , Yinchuan (China)
He Jianchuan, The Garden Centre of East River in Ningxia , Yinchuan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2012年在宁夏苹果园试验研究了复合式膏体迷向剂对梨小、桃小食心虫防控效果.试验设3个处理（涂抹高度2m与3.5m以及常规药剂防治），1次重复，通过监测全年诱蛾量、调查果实膨大期与成熟期蛀果率来分析防控效果。结果显示，复合式膏体迷向剂有效控制了梨小食心虫的危害，涂抹高度3.5m时，梨小食心虫诱蛾数下降94.8%，涂抹高度2m时，下降84.6%，两处理区成熟期蛀果率分别下降86.5%和63.9%。由于试验区桃小食心虫种群密度较小，本次试验尚无法确定该迷向剂对桃小食心虫的防治效果。

A dual sex pheromone cream against the oriental fruit moth (OFM) and peach fruit moth (PFM) in apple orchards was investigated in Ningxia. The tested area was divided into three parts. The dual sex pheromone cream was smeared on the tree trunk 3.5 m and 2 m above the ground in plots A and B, respectively, and no smear in plot C. Trap catches in the whole year and the damaged rates of fruits were investigated. The results showed that the pheromone cream reduced the damage of OFM effectively. The numbers of OFM captured were decreased by 94.8% and 85.6% in plots A and B, respectively, compared to that in plot C. The damaged fruit rates by OFM were reduced by 86.5% and 63.9% in plots A and B, respectively. However, we could not determine the effect of the cream on PFM due to low population density in the season.

ags:resource.dc:title: Sensitivity test and analysis of Acidovorax citrulli to copper sulfate
瓜类细菌性果斑病菌对硫酸铜的敏感性检测与分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Wenlong, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Yang Yuwen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Wang Tielin, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 果斑病菌两个亚群的143个菌株继代培养10代后，通过平板画线法对各菌株的硫酸铜敏感性检测结果表明：在硫酸铜浓度为300μg/mL（1.88mmol/L）时只有一株菌株表现敏感，在浓度达到750μg/mL（4.69mmol/L）时所有菌株均表现敏感；浓度为450～650μg/mL（2.81～4.06mmol/L）时分离自甜瓜的敏感菌株所占比率显著低于西瓜菌株；继代培养后所有菌株的硫酸铜敏感性没有改变，证实果斑病菌具有稳定的抗铜性。

The 143 strains of Acidovorax citrulli from two subgroups were cultivated for ten generations and tested for copper sulfate sensitivity using streak plate method. The results indicated that only one strain was sensitive to copper sulfate at the concentration of 300 μg/mL (1.88 mmol/L). All strains were sensitive at the concentration of 750 μg/mL (4.69 mmol/L). The number of watermelon sensitive strains was much more than that of the melon strains at the concentration between 450 and 650 μg/mL (2.81 - 4.06 mmol/L). The same sensitivity of subcultured strains and original strains indicated that A. citrulli has stable resistant ability to copper.

ags:resource.dc:title: Occurrence causes of and control techniques against Makou disease of Astragalus mongholicus
黄芪麻口病的成因及防治技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Xinrui, Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Lanzhou (China)
Li Jiping, Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Lanzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Li Jianjun, Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Lanzhou (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为明确黄芪麻口病的成因，在甘肃陇西县多年种植的黄芪田进行调查、采样和防治试验。通过对黄芪根腐病菌的分离鉴定及根结线虫的分离，明确了根腐病菌不是黄芪麻口病的致病菌，在供试的麻口病株上未分离到线虫。经过回接地下害虫试验，确认黄芪根瘤象（Sitona ophtalmicus Desbrochers）幼虫的取食为害，是造成黄芪麻口病发生的主要诱因，经中科院动物所专家鉴定该虫为中国新记录种。田间药剂防治试验结果显示，黄芪移栽前用5%丁硫克百威颗粒剂45kg/hm2土壤处理，用15%阿维•毒乳油30kg/hm2灌根，防治效果良好，一次灌根的防治效果达87.51%，挽回92.14%的产量损失。

The causes of Makou disease of Astragalus mongholicus were studied by means of field investigation, sampling and control tests in the continuous A. mongholicus fields in Longxi County. By isolation and identification of foot rot disease and separation of nematodes, it showed that the pathogen of the root rot disease did not cause Makou disease of A. mongholicus; nematodes were not isolated from the diseased plants. After inoculating underground pest, it was determined that feeding by the larvae of Sitona ophtalmicus Desbrochers was the fundamental cause for Makou disease of A. mongholicus, and the species was identified as a new record in China. Control efficacy tests in fields indicated that the control effect was 87.51% and 92.14% of the output could be redeemed by soil treatment with 5% carbosulfan GR (45 kg/hm2) before transplanting and by one-time irrigating of roots treated with 15% abamectin and chlorpyrifos EC (30 kg/hm2).

ags:resource.dc:title: Preliminary studies on the life regularities of alfalfa underground pests in Longdong Loess Plateau
陇东黄土高原苜蓿地下害虫发生规律初探

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Fosheng, Longdong University, Qingyang (China), Science and Technology of Agriculture and Forestry College

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2009年至2011年，在陇东黄土高原苜蓿田，分苜蓿返青期、第一茬苜蓿刈割后、第三茬苜蓿刈割后3个时期调查地下害虫的种类、数量及不同深度分布规律。结果表明，该区域苜蓿地下害虫主要有11种，平均密度为18.2头/m2，主要类群按其所占比例大小依次为金龟甲类、金针虫类、网目拟步甲、蝼蛄类和地老虎类，优势种类为黑绒鳃金龟和华北大黑鳃金龟。

From 2009 to 2011, the species, quantity and distribution regularities of underground pests in different soil depth were investigated at turning green stage, after the first and third mowing. The results showed that there were eleven main underground pests species, with the average density of 18.2 heads/m2. Chafers, Elateridae, Opatrum subaratum Faldermann, Gryllotalpidae and cutworm were the main groups according to proportions. Maladera orientalis Motschulsky and Holotrichia diomphalia Bates were dominant species.

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation and identification of main pathogenic nematodes on vegetables in Ningbo
宁波地区蔬菜主要病原线虫的分离和种类鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yao Hongyan, Ningbo Academy of Agricultural Science, Ningbo (China)
Gu Jianfeng, Ningbo Inspection and Quarantine Institute of Science and Technology, Ningbo (China)
Wang Jiangling, Ningbo Inspection and Quarantine Institute of Science and Technology, Ningbo (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对宁波14个主要蔬菜基地进行土壤和植株取样，通过形态学和分子生物学鉴定明确了宁波地区蔬菜主要病原线虫为南方根结线虫[Meloidogyne incognita （Kofoid ＆ White）]和咖啡短体线虫[Prat ylenchus cofeae（Zimmermann）]。南方根结线虫主要分布在江北费市、宁海冠庄、宁波梅墟和镇海九龙湖，咖啡短体线虫分布在江北费市。南方根结线虫的寄主为番茄、黄瓜、豇豆和白菜，咖啡短体线虫的寄主为萝卜和大豆。

Soil and plant samples were collected and inspected in 14 major vegetable bases in Ningbo. Based on morphological analysis and molecular biology identification, Meloidogyne incognita and Pratylenchus coffeae were identified to be the main pathogens. M. incognita distributes in Jiangbei Feishi, Ninghai Guanzhuang, Ningbo Meixu and Zhenhai Jiulonghu. P. coffeae distributes in Jiangbei Feishi. Tomato, cucumber, cowpea and cabbage are host plants of M. incognita. Radish and bean are host plants of P. coffeae.

ags:resource.dc:title: Review of genome database resources of oomycete
农作物病原卵菌基因组数据库资源概述

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Yamei, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), School of Life Sciences
Wang Xiangjing, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), School of Life Sciences
Xiang Wensheng, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), School of Life Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 卵菌包含许多严重危害农作物的病原菌，目前已经积累了一些重要病原卵菌的基因组数据，这些数据资源对于卵菌的功能基因组研究具有重要意义。本文对农作物病原卵菌基因组数据库资源及数据库检索方法做一概述，以期促进卵菌基因组数据资源的利用,加快其功能基因学研究。

Oomycete includes many destructive pathogens of plants. Several genome databases of important oomycete species had been constructed, which are significant for genomics research. In this paper, the current progresses of these resources were reviewed and the data mining methods were introduced, to facilitate the utility of oomycete genome data resources and accelerate the research of functional genomics.

ags:resource.dc:title: Occurrence of and progress in fruit tree diseases caused by Botryosphaeria spp.
葡萄座腔菌属（Botryosphaeria）引起的果树病害及研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Fan, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), Key Laboratory of Horticultural Plant Biology
Huang Junbin, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), Key Laboratory of Plant Pathology of Hubei Province
Li Guohuai, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), Key Laboratory of Horticultural Plant Biology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 葡萄座腔菌属（Botryosphaeria）真菌在国内外分布广泛，是许多果树常见的病原菌、内生菌和腐生菌，能引起果实腐烂、叶斑、坏死、溃疡和流胶等症状。本文概述了该属真菌引起的果树病害的发生、危害症状、主要病原菌种类、流行学和病害控制、栽培管理策略；展望今后的研究方向。

Species of Botryosphaeria are endophytes, saprophytes, and pathogens of various fruit trees in the world, causing symptoms of dieback, canker, gummosis, leaf spot, fruit rot. This review summarized the researches on Botryosphaeria on fruit trees by discussing the causal species, diseases and associated symptoms, epidemiology, and strategies of disease control and management. Meanwhile, the problems that need to be solved in the future were discussed.

ags:resource.dc:title: Screening of insecticides for controlling Thrips palmi in solar greenhouse
日光温室防治棕榈蓟马药剂筛选

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Ansheng, Shangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Jinan (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhuang Qianying, Shangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Jinan (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhou Xianhong, Shangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Jinan (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用浸叶法开展了7种杀虫剂对温室棕榈蓟马成虫的室内毒力测定，并对效果较好的2种药剂进行田间药效试验。室内生物测定结果表明，多杀菌素、甲氨基阿维菌素苯甲酸盐对棕榈蓟马成虫的LC50分别为0.079mg/L和0.443mg/L，而阿维菌素、灭多威、啶虫脒、高效氯氟氰菊酯LC50值为47.908～206.236mg/L。田间药效试验结果表明：2.5%多杀菌素悬浮剂和2.2%甲氨基阿维菌素苯甲酸盐微乳剂使用剂量以80～60g/667m2和30～20g/667m2防治效果较理想。

Indoor toxicity of seven kinds of insecticides against Thrips palmi adults collected from solar greenhouse were evaluated by leaf-dipping method and field trials were carried out with two effective insecticides. The results of bioassay showed that the LC50 of spinosad and emamectin-benzoate against T. palmi adults were 0.079 mg/L and 0.443 mg/L, respectively, while the LC50 of abamectin, methomyl, acetamiprid and lambda-cyhalothrin ranged from 47.908 mg/L to 206.236 mg/L. Field trials demonstrated that 2.5% spinosad SC and 2.2% emamectin-benzoate ME provided good control efficacy at the doses of 80-60 g/667 m2 and 30-20 g/667 m2, respectively.

ags:resource.dc:title: Symptoms and occurrence conditions of clover virus disease
三叶草病毒病症状类型及发病条件研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xiang Dong, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Pratacultural Science
Liang Qiaolan, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Pratacultural Science
Xu Bingliang, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou (China), College of Pratacultural Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2010-2012年对兰州市不同绿化带及试验种植区三叶草病毒病症状表现和发病情况进行了调查。田间调查表明，三叶草病毒病在调查区普遍发生，平均发病率为28.14%，病情指数为17.45，主要症状为黄斑花叶、斑驳花叶、花斑花叶、丛簇矮化、皱缩褪绿、环斑及环纹。白三叶草和红三叶草发病高峰期及表现症状明显不同，4月下旬到5月上旬白三叶草达到发病高峰，主要症状为黄斑花叶；6月红三叶草达到发病高峰，主要症状为花斑花叶、丛簇矮化。环境对三叶草病毒病发生有重要影响，当温度为25℃，相对湿度为45%时发病最重，病情指数分别为74.81、74.07。DAS-ELISA检测表明，田间三叶草病毒病主要病原为苜蓿花叶病毒（AMV）和白三叶草花叶病毒（WCMV），检出率分别为100%、83.3%，复合侵染率为83.3%。寄主范围测定表明AMV可侵染6科16种植物，WCMV可侵染豌豆、菜豆、昆诺藜等。

In 2010 to 2012, clover virus disease symptoms and morbidity were surveyed in different green belts and test-growing areas of Lanzhou City. A field survey showed that clover virus disease generally occurs, and the incidence rate and disease index were 28.14% and 17.45, respectively. The main symptoms were macular mosaic, mottle mosaic, variegation mosaic, rosette stunt, shrinkage chlorotic, ring plaque and ring stria. The peak incidence and performance symptoms of white clover were different from those of red clover. The main symptom of white clover was macular mosaic, and the peak incidence came in late April to early May; red clover reached peak incidence in June, and the main symptoms were striation mosaic and rosette stunt. Environment affected the occurrence of clover virus disease significantly. When temperature was 25℃ and relative humidity at 45％, the disease index reached 74.81 and 74.07, respectively. Two of the main viruses causing white clover and red clover virus disease were identified as Alfalfa mosaic virus (AMV) and White clover mosaic virus (WCMV) through the DAS-ELISA test, and detection rates were 100% and 83.3%, respectively, with a composite infection rate of 83.3%. The biological measurement results showed that the AMV could infect 6 families and 16 species, while WCMV could infect peas, beans, chenopodium quinoa and so on.

ags:resource.dc:title: Virulence and inhibition activity of three kinds of preservatives against the pathogen of the potato tuber dry rot
三种防腐剂对马铃薯薯块干腐病菌的毒及抑制作用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Mei, Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Lanzhou (China), Agricultural Product Storage and Processing Research Institute
Tian Shilong, Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Lanzhou (China), Agricultural Product Storage and Processing Research Institute
Cheng Jianxin, Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Lanzhou (China), Agricultural Product Storage and Processing Research Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 马铃薯干腐病是目前马铃薯贮藏期间发生较严重的一种病害，已成为影响马铃薯贮藏保鲜的瓶颈问题之一。为筛选出施用简便、安全高效且能取代液体类毒性强的防腐剂，试验对二氧化氯、仲丁胺和过氧乙酸三种熏蒸型防腐剂进行了室内毒力测定和抑制效果评价。结果表明：该三种防腐剂对马铃薯干腐病具有不同的抑制活性，其中仲丁胺对马铃薯干腐病的抑菌效果最佳，其毒力回归式为y=3.608 7＋7.500 8x，EC50为0.202 8μg/Ml。通过3种防腐剂的体内效果试验，结果表明：在低温条件下，3种防腐剂处理均不同程度地降低了马铃薯块茎的发病率，其中以仲丁胺控制效果最佳，95μg/kg浓度处理可明显降低接种马铃薯薯块的发病率和病斑扩展速度。因此可以推断仲丁胺是防治马铃薯干腐病的理想药剂之一。

Potato dry rot is currently a serious disease detrimental to potato quality in storage. It has become one of the major concerns to potato storage and preservation. To screen the safe and efficient preservative with simple application that can replace toxic liquid ones, the virulence and inhibition efficacy of chlorine dioxide, butylamine and peracetic acid against pathogen of the potato tuber dry rot were evaluated. Results showed that chlorine dioxide, butylamine and peracetic acid have different inhibitory activity, and the efficacy of butylamine is the best, with EC50 value of 0.2 μg/mL. In vivo tests demonstrated that the three preservatives could reduce the disease incidence to some extent, and butylamine at the concentration of 95 μg/kg could significantly reduce the incidence of potato tuber dry rot and lesion expansion rate. Thus, it is concluded that butylamine has the potential to be applied in potato dry rot control.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influences of future climate warming on overwintering boundary of the brown planthopper
未来气候变暖对褐飞虱越冬界限的影响分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Hu Chaoxing, Agricultural University of Hebei, Baoding (China), College of Plant Protection
Wei Guoshu, Agricultural University of Hebei, Baoding (China), College of Plant Protection
Hou Maolin, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 全球气候变暖将对农业病虫害的越冬界限产生影响，从而影响病虫害的发生动态。本文以GIS（地理信息系统）技术研究了未来高经济发展条件下能源种类平衡发展排放情景（A1B）下褐飞虱越冬界限及相应越冬区相对于baseline时段（1961-1990）的可能变化。结果表明：（1）越冬北界在2020s（2010-2039）北移约50km，安全越冬北界北移约110km；2050s（2040-2069）越冬北界北移约120km，安全越冬北界北移约250km。由于经纬度及海拔的影响，越冬界限北移存在一定区域差异。（2）越冬区明显扩大，相对于baseline时段，2020s褐飞虱间歇越冬区扩大约11.93万km2（约23.24%），安全越冬区增加约2.08万km2或0.66倍；2050s间歇越冬区扩大约25.99万km2（约50.63%），安全越冬区增加约18.82万km2或5.93倍。这些结果表明褐飞虱越冬界限对气候变暖响应明显，其中安全越冬北界较越冬北界北移幅度更大。气候变暖导致的安全越冬北界北移对未来褐飞虱的发生动态可能产生重要影响。

Global climate change, characterized by climate warming, can affect overwintering boundary of agricultural insect pests. Based on GIS technology, the influences of climate warming on the overwintering boundary of the brown planthopper (BPH), Nilaparvata lugens, was analyzed for 2020s (2010 – 2039) and 2050s (2040 – 2069). The climate change scenario used was A1B and the average overwintering boundary from 1961 to 1990 was used as the baseline. The results showed that, in 2020s, the northern boundary of intermittent overwintering region will move northward by about 50 km and of safe overwintering region, by around 110 km. In 2050s, the two boundaries will shift northward by about 120 km and 250 km, respectively. The results also revealed regional difference in the northward shift of overwintering boundaries due to latitude, longitude and altitude. With the northward shift of overwintering boundaries, area of overwintering region will increase. In 2020s, area of intermittent overwintering region will expand by about 0.1193 million km2 or 23.24%, and the area of safe overwintering region, by about 0.0208 million km2 or 0.66 fold, as compared with those of the baseline period. In 2050s, the area of the two overwintering regions will increase by 0.259 9 million km2 or 50.63% and 0.188 2 million km2 or 5.93 fold, respectively. The current results suggest that climate warming will enlarge the distribution of overwintering BPH, the northern boundary of safe overwintering region will shift northward more than that of intermittent overwintering region.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of the wheat principal pests’ occurrence traits in China in 2012 and forecasting suggestions
我国2012年小麦重大病虫害发生特点和预测预报建议

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zeng Juan, National Agro-Technical Extension and Service Centre, Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2012年我国小麦病虫害重发种类多、涉及区域广、危害程度重。本文全面总结了赤霉病、条锈病、白粉病、纹枯病、蚜虫、蜘蛛、吸浆虫等小麦7大病虫的发生面积、范围、分布区域、发展动态、危害程度等发生特点.分析近年来小麦重大病虫害发生特点变化趋势，主要表现为重发威胁长期存在、暴发规律更难掌握，小环境特异化导致分布差异大和人为防治因素显著影响发生程度等方面。提出应加深认识、提高警惕、加强监测，综合考虑小环境特异化因素和人为防治因素，以提高病虫害预测预报的指导性、精确度和准确性。

The wheat principal pests occurred in vast areas with several outbreak-types and caused serious damages in China in 2012. This paper presented a comprehensive conclusion about the occurrence traits of seven wheat principal pests, such as wheat scab, stripe rust, powdery mildew, sharp eyespot, aphids, mites and midges, by describing their occurrence area, range, distribution, development dynamics and hazard degrees. The variation trends of wheat pests’ occurrence traits in recent years have been characterized by long-standing grievous threat, elusive eruption regulation, multivariate distribution depending on micro-environmental differentiation, and notable influences by contrived prevention and cure. To improve the guidance effect, precision and accuracy of pest forecasting, we should always adopt an alert attitude, and take an integrative consideration with micro-environmental differentiation and contrived influences.

ags:resource.dc:title: Evaluation of the resistance of 46 rubber tree clones to Colletotrichum gloeosporioides
橡胶树重要品系对胶孢炭疽菌抗性评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cai Zhiying, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Haikou (China), Institute of Environmental and Plant Protection
Lin Chunhua, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Haikou (China), Institute of Environmental and Plant Protection
Zhai Ligang, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Plant Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 橡胶树抗性种质的鉴定与利用是控制橡胶树炭疽病的一项重要措施。采用室内离体橡胶叶接种法、田间种质圃人工接种和自然发病条件下定期田间病害调查方法，2011-2012年在海南省儋州开展46份重要橡胶树种质对胶孢炭疽菌病抗性鉴定和评价。把抗炭疽病程度划分为高度抗病（HR）、抗病（R）、中度感病（MS）、感病（S）和高度感病（HS）共5个级别，根据抗性评价结果分析得出：高度抗病（HR）类型的0份；抗病（R）类型8份，占17.39%；中度感病（MS）类型19份，占41.30%；感病（S）类型16份，占34.78%；高度感病（HS）类型3份，占6.52%。筛选出的抗病品种，是今后可利用的抗性种质资源。本研究结果为炭疽病抗性种质资源的利用、培育及病害管理提供参考数据。

Identification of resistant clones is a major strategy in the management of Colletotrichum leaf disease (CLD) of rubber. Three methods for identifying resistance/susceptibility to CLD of 46 rubber clones were examined in this study at Danzhou of Hainan province from 2011 to 2012. The resistance was divided into 5 grades: highly resistant (HR), resistant (R), moderately susceptible (MS), susceptible (S), and highly susceptible (HS). The results showed that among the 46 rubber clones, there were 0 highly resistant (HR), 8 resistant (R), 19 moderately susceptible (MS), 16 susceptible (S), and 3 highly susceptible (HS), accounting for 0%, 17.39%, 41.30%, 34.78% and 6.52%, respectively. Copper brown leaves were the most susceptible to the pathogen. Annual occurrence of disease could be divided into two periods: the frequent period and infrequently occurring period. Environmental factors against the rubber tree would aggravate the disease. The results of our research provided important information for disease-resistant breeding, clone utilization as well as the management of CLD.

ags:resource.dc:title: Optimized control techniques against insect pests in middle-season rice fields along the Huaihe River
沿淮中稻害虫优化防治技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Miao Yong, Anhui Agricultural University, Hefei (China), College of Plant Protection
Gao Xiwu, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), College of Agriculture and Biotechnology
Jiang Junqi, Anhui Agricultural University, Hefei (China), College of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在田间系统调查和试验的基础上，研究了安徽沿淮中稻主要害虫稻纵卷叶螟和稻飞虱的防治策略和优化防治措施。结果表明，采用在水稻大田生长前期（水稻移栽至7月上旬）不施药，保护和培育天敌对害虫的自然控制作用，在水稻大田生长中期（7月中旬至8月初）和后期（8月上旬及以后）抓关键期防治的策略，以及在水稻大田生长中期/后期使用氯虫苯甲酰胺＋噻嗪酮/氯虫苯甲酰胺＋噻嗪酮、氯虫苯甲酰胺＋噻嗪酮/丙溴磷＋吡蚜酮、丙溴磷＋吡蚜酮/氯虫苯甲酰胺＋噻嗪酮等药剂组合的防治措施，可以有效控制害虫为害、满足生产实际的需要。

Based on the field systematic investigation and experiments, the control strategy and optimized control techniques of the major insect pests, namely the rice leaffolder and the rice planthopper, in middle-season rice fields along the Huaihe River were studied. The results showed that spraying no insecticides in the early rice growth stage (from transplanting to early July), adopting control measures during critical periods in the mid-growth stage (mid-July to early August) and late rice growth stage (after early August), and treating the insecticide combinations of chlorantraniliprole ＋ buprofezin/chlorantraniliprole ＋ buprofezin, chlorantraniliprole ＋ buprofezin/profenofos ＋ pymetrozine and profenofos ＋ pymetrozine/chlorantraniliprole ＋ buprofezin in the middle/late rice growth stages were able to control rice insect pests effectively and meet the needs of rice production practice.

ags:resource.dc:title: Transcription of receptor type Ⅱ of interleukin 1 in endometrial decidua
白介素1受体ⅡmRNA在小鼠子宫蜕膜中的转录

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Yongsheng, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Gongzhuling (China), Branch of Animal Husbandry
Luo Xiaotong, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Gongzhuling (China), Branch of Animal Husbandry
Jin Haiguo, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Gongzhuling (China), Branch of Animal Husbandry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用实时定量PCR方法检测白介素1受体Ⅱ基因在小鼠子宫蜕膜组织或细胞中的转录。获取正常的小鼠子宫蜕膜组织和人工诱导蜕膜化组织，同时利用酶消化分离小鼠子宫内膜基质细胞，进行体外诱导蜕膜化，以未诱导的子宫内膜基质细胞为对照。结果表明：白介素1受体Ⅱ在正常子宫蜕膜组织、人工诱导蜕膜化组织、小鼠子宫内膜蜕膜化基质细胞中表达水平均显著高于对照，说明白介素1受体Ⅱ可能参与子宫内膜蜕膜化过程。

The aim of this study was to detect the transcription of receptor type Ⅱ (IL1R2) of interleukin 1 in endometrial decidua. Normal decidual tissue and artificial decidual tissue of mice were collected, and endometrial stromal cells (ESCs) of mice were obtained from endometrium by enzymatic dissociation, and were induced to decidualize in vitro. The transcription of IL1R2 in those tissues or cells were measured by Real time PCR. Compared to the control, the levels of IL1R2 increased significantly in normal decidual tissue, artificial decidual tissue, and endometrial decidual cellinduced in vitro, indicating that IL1R2 may be involved in endometrial decidualization. The study lays foundation for researches on decidualization mechanism.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on antimicrobial activity of Phellinus baumii fermentation product
鲍氏层孔菌发酵产物抑菌活性的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zou Li, Northeast Forestry University, Harbin (China), College of Forestry
Tan Yun, Northeast Forestry University, Harbin (China), College of Forestry
Zou Xiaoqiao, China Medical University, Shenyang (China), College of Nursing

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为研究鲍氏层孔菌发酵产物对植物病原菌的抑菌活性，采用菌丝生长速率法以鲍氏层孔菌发酵产物的不同溶剂萃取物为研究对象，测定其对7种植物病原菌的抑制作用。将鲍氏层孔菌的发酵产物进行不同的处理，分级纯化抑菌活性多糖,比较其抑菌活性。结果表明：鲍氏层孔菌发酵产物对7种病原菌均有抑制作用；鲍氏层孔菌发酵时间为20d时，发酵产物对杨树烂皮病菌的抑制率最高；鲍氏层孔菌发酵产物的主要抑菌活性物质存在于发酵上清液醇提物中；醇沉体积分数为50%醇提物中的多糖对病原菌的抑制率为供试醇沉级别中最高。鲍氏层孔菌含有抑制病原菌的有效成分，具有成为新型生物农药的潜力。

To study the bacteriostatic activity of the extracts from Phellinus baumii, using growth rate method, bacteriostatic action of Phellinus baumii to seven kinds of plant pathogen was measured with extracts under different fermentation time and solvents. Fermentation product was treated in different ways, polysaccharides from ethanol concentration were obtained, and bacteriostatic activity was compared. The results show that antibacterial substances from Phellinus baumii had inhibitory effects on seven pathogenic bacteria; fermentation time was 20 d, and the antibiotic compound had the highest inhibitory rate to Cytospora chrysosperma. The antibiotic compound from Phellinus baumii almost existed in supernatant of acoparia-alcohol extract; and 50% alcohol-precipitation concentration was the highest of all. Conclusion: Phellinus baumii contains bacteriostatic activity components and has the potential of becoming a new biological pesticide.

ags:resource.dc:title: Screening and mutagenesis of lactic acid bacteria producing nitrite reductase
产亚硝酸盐还原酶的乳酸菌的筛选及诱变

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yan Jinxing, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Xu Runbo, High School Attached to Jilin University, Changchun (China)
Chen Ping, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Food Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 从东北朝族咸菜中分离出41株降解亚硝酸盐的乳酸菌，经过复筛得到6株降解能力较强的菌株，确定编号A2、B1、B10、Cc2的菌株为植物乳杆菌，编号D3、D5的菌株为明珠片球菌。在37℃条件下经48h，B10菌株对亚硝酸盐降解率可达70.5%。为了提高B10菌株降解亚硝酸盐的能力，在菌液浓度最佳稀释度为10-4，紫外照射20s的条件下，得到降解率最佳的诱变菌株Bb10，使亚硝酸盐的降解率从70.5%提高到88%。通过对亚硝酸盐还原酶分离，得到含酶活为56.84U/mL的亚硝酸盐还原酶的酶液，较诱变前的酶活10.56U/mL相比，提高了5.33倍。

Nitrite content of food is one problem on food security, and it is always a hot issue to reduce nitrite levels in food. Forty-one strains of lactic acid bacteria were isolated from the northeast Korean-nationality pickled vegetables, and these bacteria can degrade nitrite. Then six strains which have better degradation ability were rescreened, and A2, B1, B10, Cc2 strains were determined to be Lactobacillus and No. D3, D5 strains to be Pediococcus Pearl. The nitrite degradation rate of B10 strain was 70.5% after 48 h at 37℃. In order to improve the nitrite degradation ability of B10 strain, 10-4 dilution of the bacterial concentration was selected after UV irradiation 20 s, then the mutagenic strain Bb10 which had best degradation ability was obtained, and the rate increased from 70.5% to 88%. Finally, nitrite reductase was separated from strain Bb10, and crude extract with 56.84 U/mL enzyme activity was obtained, 5.33 times higher than pre-mutagenic activity 10.56 U/mL.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on expression of MyoG mRNA and histological characteristics of goose muscle fiber
鹅肌纤维组织学特性及MyoG基因mRNA表达研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Song Jiawei, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Gao Guang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Wu Wei, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用组织学方法和光学显微镜数字成像方法，选取吉林白鹅和霍尔多巴吉鹅两品种鹅各90只，分别测定了7，28，56日龄鹅胸、腿肌肌纤维直径和密度；采用实时荧光定量PCR方法研究了MyoG基因mRNA在鹅肌肉不同生长发育时期的表达水平变化规律。结果表明：在不同日龄，相同品种胸、腿肌肌纤维直径和密度差异极显著（P0.01）；不同品种，同一日龄胸、腿肌肌纤维直径和密度差异不显著（P0.05）；MyoG基因mRNA表达量相同品种不同日龄胸、腿肌差异极显著（P0.01），不同品种腿肌28日龄差异不显著（P0.05），不同品种胸肌7日龄差异不显著（P0.05）。

In this study, histology and optical microscope digital image were used to observe the diameter and density of breast muscle and leg muscle for each 90 geese of Jilin goose and hortobagyi goose at 7, 28 and 56 days; real-Time Quantitative PCR was used to detect the expression of MyoG mRNA in different growing and developmental stages of goose muscle. The results showed that the fiber diameter and density of breast muscle and leg muscle were significantly different between different ages (P 0.01); the differences of fiber diameter and density of breast muscle and leg muscle between different breeds were not significant (P 0.05); the expression of MyoG mRNA of breast muscle and leg muscle was significantly different at different ages (P 0.01), but not significant at different breeds at 28 days in leg muscle and at 7 days in breast muscle (P 0.05).

ags:resource.dc:title: Fumigation activity and several enzymes activities of essential oil from Artemisia annua L. against Monolepta hieroglyphica (Motschulsky)
黄花蒿精油对双斑萤叶甲的熏蒸活性及体内几种酶活力的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yuan Haibin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Yang Jie, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Chen Xiang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 测定了黄花蒿精油对双斑萤叶甲的熏蒸活性及体内几种酶活力的影响。结果表明：双斑萤叶甲在熏蒸处理8h后，25.00μL/L处理组的校正死亡率达到83.33%，表现出明显的熏蒸作用。黄花蒿精油对双斑萤叶甲体内乙酰胆碱酯酶活力表现出明显的抑制作用，对谷胱甘肽-S-转移酶表现出明显的诱导作用，对酸性磷酸酯酶、碱性磷酸酯酶活力表现出一定的抑制作用，对过氧化物酶影响不明显。

We tested the fumigation activity and several enzymes activities of essential oil from Artemisia annua L. against Monolepta hieroglyphica (Motschulsky) adult in the body. The result showed that the oil had obvious fumigation activity against insects. At dosage of 25.00 μL/L, and 8 h fumigating period, the corrected mortality rate reached 83.33%. Essential oil of Artemisia annua L. significantly inhibited the AchE; The activity of GSTs was obviously induced; The activity of ACP and ALP were inhibited to some extent; The activity of POD was not obviously affected.

ags:resource.dc:title: New record species of Erysiphales in Jilin province
吉林省白粉菌新记录种

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jiang Wentao, Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Education for Edible and Medicinal Fungi, Changchun (China)
Liu Shuyan, Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Education for Edible and Medicinal Fungi, Changchun (China)
Wang Lilan, Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Education for Edible and Medicinal Fungi, Changchun (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对采集的白粉菌标本进行鉴定，确定了吉林省新记录种2个：刺槐白粉菌（Erysiphe robiniae）和图拉斯叉钩丝壳（Sawadaea tulasnei）。文中对其进行了详细的形态描述、显微照相及分析讨论。

Powdery mildew collections were observed, and two new records in Jilin province were identified, and they are Erysiphe robiniae and Sawadaea tulasnei. The morphological characteristics of the two species were described, illustrated and discussed in this paper.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of status quo and trend of rural consumption in Jilin province
吉林省农村居民消费现状分析与消费趋势预测

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Han Xinghuan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economy and Management
Wang Xia, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economy and Management

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 根据1992—2010年的吉林省农村居民消费统计数据，从消费水平、消费结构2个角度对吉林省农村居民的消费现状进行了分析，并以2001—2010年为预测的样本区间，利用灰色预测模型对吉林省2011—2020年的吉林省农村居民消费水平、消费结构进行了预测。结果显示：从总体上看，吉林省农村消费增长仍有较大空间，家庭经营消费、衣着消费、居住消费和医疗消费将出现大幅增长；从生活消费的结构比例看，农村居民的恩格尔系数和交通与通讯消费比例将进一步下降，而居住消费的比例则可能大幅上升。衣着消费和医疗消费的比例可能有小幅度增长，家用设备消费和娱乐、教育、旅游消费的比例将基本保持稳定。

With the data of rural consumption in Jilin province from 1992 to 2010, this paper analyzed the status quo of rural consumption from the perspectives of consumption level and structure, forecasted rural consumption level and structure from 2011 to 2020 with the sample data of rural consumption from 2001 to 2010 through gray prediction model. The results show that rural consumption in Jilin province has much greater potential to increase, especially household operational expenditure, clothes expenditure, housing consumption and medicare expenditure etc. in general; in terms of rural consumption structure, the proportion of food, travel and communication expenditure will decrease further while the proportion of housing consumption may increase sharply. The proportion of expenditure in clothes and medicare may fall down mildly, however, the expenditure in household equipment, entertainment, education and tour will keep stable.

ags:resource.dc:title: Application of partial least squares regression to analysis of factors influencing Jilin province economic growth
偏最小二乘回归在吉林省经济增长影响因素分析中的应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Bo, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information and Technology
Bai Jie, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), College of Humanities ＆ Sciences
Gao Laibin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 运用偏最小二乘法，利用吉林省1995—2010年15年间的数据，选取人口、物质资本、科学技术、政府财政支出、对外贸易、消费水平6个因素，对吉林省的经济增长影响因素进行了分析。结果表明：科学技术、政府财政支出、物质资本投入是影响吉林省经济增长最重要的因素，人口对经济增长的影响最小。

Using data from 1995 to 2010 of Jilin province, by applying partial least squares regression, the paper discusses the factors that have influenced economic growth of Jilin province, including population, physical capital, science and technology, government spending, foreign trade, and consumption level. The results show that during this period, physical capital, human capital and technological capital have become three major factors affecting economic growth in Jilin province. The influence of population has been minimal.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning of encoding squalene epoxidase gene and its expression in Panax ginseng root tissue
鲨烯环氧酶基因的克隆及其在人参根组织中的表达

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Ning, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science
Tian Yuhua, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science
Meng Xingyu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对人参根组织中的鲨烯环氧酶基因进行了克隆与序列分析，并利用相对荧光定量Real-time PCR法检测了鲨烯环氧酶基因不同年生人参根组织中的表达水平。结果表明：克隆人参根中鲨烯环氧酶基因全长编码区cDNA为1 611bp，编码537aa长的多肽，其核苷酸和氨基酸序列与GenBank中人参鲨烯环氧酶基因序列（登录号：AB122078.1）对比，同源性分别为99.75%和99.81%。相对荧光定量PCR差异分析发现鲨烯环氧酶基因在一年、三年、四年、五年生人参根组织中均有表达，其中在五年生人参根中表达水平最高。

Squalene epoxidase mRNA in Panax ginseng root tissue was cloned and its sequence analysis was conducted. Its expression level in ginseng root tissue of different years was detected with relative quantitative fluorescence Real-time PCR. The results showed that complete encoding sequence of SQE in ginseng root was 1 611 bp, which encoded 537 amino acid residues. Bioinformatic analysis of nucleotide and amino acid sequence based on SQE genes of squalene epoxidase on GenBank (No.: AB122078.1) showed that the homology was 99.75% and 99.81% respectively. Relative fluorescent quantitative PCR differential expression analysis showed that SQE gene had expression of varying intensities in root tissues of one-year, three-year, four-year and five-year ginseng. SQE genes manifested the highest expression level in root tissues of five-year ginseng.

ags:resource.dc:title: Report on selection and breeding of the new rice variety ＂Jinongda 45＂
水稻新品种“吉农大45号”选育报告

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ling Fenglou, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
He Xiaoliang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Deng Dianxin, Yushutai Agro-Tech Extension Station in Lishu County of Jilin Province, Lishu (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: “吉农大45号”水稻新品种是以“吉粳69号”为母本、“农大2284”为父本进行有性杂交后经系谱法选育而成。2年区域试验和1年生产试验平均产量分别为8 742.7kg/hm2和8 894.2kg/hm2，分别比对照品种“长白9号”增产6.1%和7.3%。该品种于2010年1月通过吉林省农作物品种审定委员会审定，其主要特点是高产、抗病，适宜吉林省中早熟稻作区域种植，特别适宜吉林、通化、松原、白城地区种植。

Jinongda 45, a new rice variety, was bred through crosses between jijing 69 (female) and nongda 2284 (male) using pedigree technique. The mean yield of jinongda 45 was 8 742.7 kg/hm2 in 2 years’ regional yield test. Its yield increased by 6.1% compared with the contrast variety. The mean yield of jinongda 45 was 8 894.2 kg/hm2 in 1 year’s productive trial. Its yield increased by 7.3% compared with the contrast variety. Jinongda 45 was proved and released to the farmers by Jilin Evaluation Committee of Crop Variety in January 2010. The main characteristics of this variety are high yield and resistance to disease. It can be planted in middle mature region and middle-early mature region of Jilin province, especially in Changchun, Jilin, Tonghua, Songyuan and Baicheng area.

ags:resource.dc:title: A breeding report of new silage maize variety “Jinongdaqingsi 1”
饲用玉米新品种“吉农大青饲1号”选育报告

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jia Enji, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
He Wen’an, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Dong Shilong, Zhongyu Agricultural Co. Ltd. of Jilin Province, Changchun (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 饲用玉米新品种“吉农大青饲1号”是吉林农业大学2006年以自选系L16为母本、自选系G599为父本杂交选育而成。2009—2010年参加内蒙古自治区饲用玉米区域试验，平均生物产量76 169.3kg/hm2，比对照“金山12号”增产5.4%；2010年参加内蒙古自治区饲用玉米生产试验，平均生物产量81 811.9kg/hm2，比对照“金山12号”增产6.9%。该品种于2011年3月通过内蒙古自治区品种审定委员会审定，其主要特点是生物产量高、抗病、抗倒伏，适宜在内蒙古自治区晚熟区推广种植。

A new silage maize jinongdaqingsi 1 was obtained by using L16 as female parent and G599 as male parent. Its average yield was 76 169.3 kg/hm2 in the 2-year regional test from 2009 to 2010, 5.4% higher than that of the control variety; Its average yield was 81 811.9 kg/hm2 in the production test in 2010, 6.9% higher than that of the control variety jinshan 12. Jinongdaqingsi 1 was examined and approved by Inner Mongolia Evaluation Committee of Crop Variety in March 2011. Jinongdaqingsi 1 is of high biological yield and great resistance to diseases and lodging. It can be planted in late region of Inner Mongolia.

ags:resource.dc:title: Culture and identification of testis Sertoli cells in calf in vitro
新生牛睾丸支持细胞的体外培养及鉴定分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Lei, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Zheng Peng, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Rong Enguang, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Animal Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探究支持细胞的体外培养特性，以新生牛睾丸组织为试验材料，利用组合酶消化法将其解离成单细胞悬液，并采用差速贴壁法纯化支持细胞后进行体外培养与鉴定。结果表明：支持细胞体外培养能够传至第20代，并且随着传代次数的增加，支持细胞的增殖速度越来越慢；添加2%血清浓度的DMEM/F-12的培养基即可用于支持细胞的体外培养；免疫组化染色显示，所培养的细胞内波形蛋白呈阳性；RT-PCR检测结果可见支持细胞标志基因SCF和GDNF的表达；第15代的支持细胞内含有正常的二倍体核型。

In order to explore the cultural characteristics of sertoli cells in vitro, calf testis were used in the present study. The method of collagenase and typin was sequentially performed to separate sertoli cells, and then the differential adhesion method was used to purify sertoli cells. The sertoli cells obtained were cultured in vitro and identified. The results showed that the sertoli cells could be passaged to the 20th generation, and with the increase of the number of passages, cell proliferation ratio was getting slower and slower; DMEM/F-12 medium containing 2% fetal bovine serum could be used to culture sertoli cells in vitro; Immunohistochemical staining result indicated that sertoli cells expressed vimentin. The marker gene SCF and GDNF could be detected by RT-PCR analysis in sertoli cells. The 15th generation of sertoli cells contained normal diploid karyotype. This study not only identified calf sertoli cells effectively, but also laid foundation for the probe into the physiological function of sertoli cells cultured in vitro.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research on the relationship between grain yield and maize head smut resistance
玉米对丝黑穗病的抗性及其与产量的关系

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Shao Bing, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Li Jizhu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Yi Hongkun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选用国内外对丝黑穗病抗性不同的15份自交系及其组配的56份杂交组合作为供试材料，进行了丝黑穗病的人工接种鉴定与配合力分析。结果表明：表现抗病的自交系材料有10份，占总鉴定自交系材料的66.6%，其中表现抗病的有F349和Mo17，表现中抗的有6WC、5918、J1782、4CV、丹8415、东D202、丹黄34、中106；杂交组合抗病类型有39份，占总杂交组合的69.64%。对其配合力进行分析，发现在有无接丝黑穗病菌条件下，组合6WC×东D202、6WC×丹8415小区产量较高，其亲本的一般配合力也较高，并且这些组合及其亲本的抗性均达到抗病或中抗水平，所以在抗玉米丝黑穗的育种中既要重视玉米抗病等级的鉴定，也要加强其配合力的分析和产量的测定。

Using different domestic and international maize head smut-resistant groups, including 15 inbred lines and 56 combinations, as test materials, artificial inoculation identification of head smut was performed and its combining ability was analyzed. The results show that there were 10 resistant inbred materials, accounting for 66.6% of the total number of materials. The high-resistant materials were F349 and Mo17; the medium-resistant materials were 6WC, 5918, J1782, 4CV, Dan 8415, Dong D202, Dan Huang 34 and Zhong 106, 8 materials in total. Disease-resistant combinations were 39, accounting for 69.64% of the total combinations. Through the combining ability analysis, the study reveals that the combinations of 6WC × Dong D202 and 6WC × Dan8415 were of high yield with or without vaccinated silk black spike. The parents’ combining ability was also high, and the resistance of the combinations and their parents reached the level of disease-resistance or medium-resistance. In conclusion, maize head smut-resistant breeding should not only focus on the resistance level of identification, but also on the analysis of combining ability and yield determination.

ags:resource.dc:title: Antioxidative effect of Lactobacillus plantarum K25 fermented milk on aged model mice
植物乳杆菌K25发酵乳对衰老模型小鼠的抗氧化作用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Ji, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Biological and Agricultural Engineering
Wang Ying, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Zhang Xue, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Changchun (China), Institute of Agro-Food Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用1株经体外筛选具有较强抗氧化活性的植物乳杆菌K25制备成植物乳杆菌K25发酵乳，灌胃经D-半乳糖所致衰老模型小鼠，研究该益生菌发酵乳在小鼠体内的抗氧化作用。结果表明：植物乳杆菌K25发酵乳能显著地提高衰老模型小鼠血清和肝组织中超氧化物歧化酶（SOD）活性、肝组织中谷胱甘肽过氧化物酶（GSH-Px）活性及总抗氧化能力（T-AOC），同时能降低小鼠血清和肝组织中丙二醛（MDA）含量。

The aim of the present study was to study the antioxidative effect of fermented milk containing Lactobacillus plantarum K25, a strain with high antioxidative activity in vitro, on the aged model mice induced by D-galactose. The results showed that L. plantarum K25 fermented milk could significantly enhance the aged mice serum and liver tissue SOD activity, liver tissue GSH-Px activity and liver tissue total antioxidant capacity (T-AOC), and lower the serum and liver tissue MDA content.

ags:resource.dc:title: A research review of RNA interference mechanisms and its applications in plants
RNAi机制及在植物中应用的研究概述

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cui Xiyan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences
Sun Xiaojie, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences
Liu Zhongye, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: RNA干扰即RNAi，通过外源或者是内源的dsRNA在细胞内诱导同源序列基因表达受到抑制的现象。自从RNAi现象在20世纪90年代中期被发现以来，很快就成为生物化学与分子生物学研究的焦点。文中简要介绍了RNAi在不同水平上的主要作用机制、特点和关键因子的结构与作用，以及在植物抗逆、功能基因、植物育种、植物抗病、植物营养、果实保鲜等方面的应用研究，以期为RNAi在植物中的深入研究提供参考。

RNA interference (RNAi) in cells is an inhibitive phenomenon which is induced by expression of homologous sequence gene through exogenous or endogenous dsNA. Since the discovery of RNAi phenomenon in the mid 1990s, it has become the focus of biochemistry and molecular biology. This article briefly introduces characteristics, key factors and main action mechanism of RNAi in different levels, and application researches on plant stress resistance, function gene, plant breeding, plant disease resistance, plant nutrition, fruit freshness preservation, and so on, which can provide reference for further researches on RNAi in plant.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of essential amino acids on Caenorhabditis elegans development
必需氨基酸对秀丽新杆线虫发育的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Xiaokun, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Sciences
Xing Shu, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Sciences
Fu Xueqi, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在秀丽新杆线虫培养的过程中去除其他营养来源，仅在培养基中加入线虫所需的10种必需氨基酸，进而考察该类氨基酸对线虫发育过程的影响。结果表明：未摄取任何营养物质的线虫始终处于滞育期，而摄入必需氨基酸的线虫体长明显长于维持在滞育期的对照组，其中色氨酸和组氨酸在该过程中发挥了关键性的作用。

All food resources were removed except 10 kinds of essential amino acids to explore the effects of these essential amino acids on Caenorhabditis elegans development. The results show that without any nutrient resources, C. elegans stayed in diapause and did not have a significant body length growth. However, C. elegans living with essential amino acids had significantly longer body length compared to diapause worms in control group. Our study demonstrates the effects of essential amino acids on C. elegans development have provided basis and proof for further functional and mechanism study on essential amino acids.

ags:resource.dc:title: Progress of researches on antibacterial functions and mechanisms of mammalian peptidoglycan recognition proteins
哺乳动物肽聚糖识别蛋白抗茵作用及其机制的研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Rui, Veterinary College of Yangzhou University, Yangzhou (China)
Wang Yin, Veterinary College of Yangzhou University, Yangzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 哺乳动物肽聚糖识别蛋白（PGRPs）是一类可识别肽聚糖的免疫激活分子，具有抗菌活性。它的抗菌机制与其他抗菌肽明显不同。最新研究发现，哺乳动物PGRPs通过与肽聚糖结合，激活在细菌中识别胞浆外错误折叠蛋白质分子的CssR-CssS或CpxA．CpxR双部件系统，最终导至细菌死亡。文中总结了肽聚糖识别蛋白的抗菌作用及其机制的相关研究进展。

Mammalian peptidoglycan recognition proteins (PGRPs) were a kind of innate immunity molecules, which could recognize peptidoglycan and had antibacterial activities. However, the antibacterial mechanism of PGRPs was different from most antibacterial peptides. The latest findings indicated that mammalian PGRPs could activate the CssR-CssS two-component system, which finally resulted in bacterial death. This review focused on the antibacterial activities and mechanisms of PGRP.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on interactive effects of fertilizer and density on yield and yield components of rice in cold area
氮肥与密度互作对寒地水稻产量及产量构成因素的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xiuzhi, Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, Daqing (China), Key Laboratory of Crop Cultivation in Cold Area of Heilongjiang Regular Institutions of Higher Learning
Liu Mujiang, Hegang Farm 290 of Heilongjiang Province, Hegang (China)
Lv Yandong, Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, Daqing (China), Key Laboratory of Crop Cultivation in Cold Area of Heilongjiang Regular Institutions of Higher Learning

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用多元二次旋转回归正交组合设计，研究了前期施氮量、穗肥用氮量、粒肥用氮量、调节肥施用时期及穴距5个因素对粳稻“垦鉴稻10号”产量及产量构成因素的影响。结果表明：在试验条件下，试验因素对产量既有单因子效应又存在互作效应；前期施氮量、穗肥用氮量和调节肥施用时期对产量作用显著，且前期施氮量和穗肥用氮量的互作对产量的作用仅次于前期施氮量对产量的单独作用；穴距对产量的作用不显著。适当增大前期施氮量可提高群体有效穗数，获得高产；也可以通过协调前、中期用氮量的关系对产量构成因素加以控制。

To investigate the effects of multiple factors on yield and yield components of rice, including nitrogen fertilizer dosage at different stages, application time of regulating fertilizer (RF) and hill spacing (HS), and field experiment with multiple factors quadratic rotational-regressive-orthogonal combination design was conducted in cold area of China. The conventional japonica rice variety “kengjiandao 10” was used. The results showed that the experimental factors had both single-factor effect and interaction effect on yield. N-fertilizer at earlier stage (ES), amount of N-fertilizer of panicle-fertilizer and application stage of regulating fertilizer (RF) had significant effects on yield and the effect of the interaction of the first two factors on yield was just next to ES; the effect of hill spacing (HS) on yield was not significant; proper increase of N-fertilizer at earlier stage (ES) could improve effective panicle then ensure high yield. Finally, we can control yield and yield components and obtain high yield by coordinating relation- ship of N-fertilizer at earlier stage (ES) and the amount of N-fertilizer of panicle-fertilizer.

ags:resource.dc:title: Observation on the fructification from plasmodium of Diderma effusum
垫形双皮菌原质团发育形成子实体的观察

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lv Dongxia, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Eduation for Edible and Medicinal Fungi
Qi Xiaoying, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Science and Technology, Jilin (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 经过基物培养获得垫形双皮菌[Diderma effusum（Schw．）Morgan]原质团，将原质团转移到琼脂培养基上进行继代培养，采用多因子试验筛选子实体形成的条件，观察子实体发育过程的形态变化。结果表明：垫形双皮菌子实体为垫状孢囊至联囊体。原质团扇面完整浓厚、饥饿、湿润、20～25℃是垫形双皮菌子实体发育形成所必需的，而黑暗与散射光交替更利于子实体的形成。

Plasmodium was obtained from moist chamber culture and transferred to agar culture for sub-culture. Multifactor analysis was used to screen the sporulation condition, and morphological changes of fructifications development were observed. The results showed that the fructification of D. effusum was sporangium to plasmodiocarp. The complete, thick fan-like plasmodium under hunger, wet, 20 - 25℃ condition was necessary for the development of fructification and dark and light scattering alternately was beneficial to forming the fructification of D. effusum.

ags:resource.dc:title: Empirical study on factors influencing farmers’ purchase of agricultural insurance in Jilin province
吉林省农户参加农业保险影响因素的实证分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Haipeng, Jilin Association for Science and Technology, Changchun (China)
Yang Zigang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economy and Management
Chen Xidong, Jilin Petroleum Group Overseas Industrial Co., Ltd., Songyuan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 自然灾害严重影响着农民的生产和生活，农业保险已经演变为一种增强农户抵御灾害能力的有效措施，并且成为增强一个国家农产品国际竞争力的重要手段。文中介绍了吉林省农业保险的现状；在实地调查的基础上，分析了影响农户参保意愿的主要因素；运用Logistics模型对调研所获得的数据进行定量分析，进一步分析了各因素对农户参保意愿的影响方向。结果表明：农户受教育年限、农业收入占总收入比重、政府补贴以及认知度对农户参保意愿有正向影响。文中最后提出了发展吉林省农业保险的一些政策建议。

Natural disasters seriously influenced human life and production. Agricultural insurance is not only an effective measure against natural disasters in various countries or governments, but also one of the important tools to enhance international competitiveness of agricultural products. The paper analyzes the state of agricultural insurance in Jilin province. Based on field investigation, the paper describes the factors that influence farmers’ willingness to buy insurance. Using Logistic model, the paper quantitatively analyzes how those factors influence farmers’ willingness. The results show that education degree, ratio of agricultural income, government subsidy and cognition degree have active effects on purchase will. At last, the author brings out some suggestions on how to develop agricultural insurance in Jilin province.

ags:resource.dc:title: Photochemical degradation of carbaryl in various solvents
甲萘威在液相中的光化学降解研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Ni, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection
Liu Xiaofeng, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection
Wang Minghua, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以高压汞灯为光源，研究了甲萘威在液相中的光化学降解及影响因素。结果表明：甲萘威在不同溶剂中的光解均符合一级动力学方程。甲萘威的光解速率随初始浓度的增加而减小。在不同有机溶剂中的光解速率大小依次为正己烷甲醇乙腈，在碱性溶液中比中性和酸性溶液中光解快。NO3-、NO2-和SDS对甲萘威光解有一定的抑制作用，而H2O2则对甲萘威在水中的光解起到促进作用。

The photochemical degradation of carbaryl in various solvents and the relevant effect factors were studied under the irradiation of high-pressure mercury lamp. The results showed that the photolysis rate of carbaryl could be characterized by first-order kinetics equation. The photolysis rate of carbaryl decreased with the increase of initial concentration. The photolytic rates of carbaryl in different organic solvents showed the following sequence: n-hexane methanol acetonitrile. The photolytie rate of carbaryl in alkaline buffer solution was much greater than in acid or in neutral buffer solution. The presence of NO3-, NO2- and SDS inhibited carbaryl photodegradation. The H2O2 could increase photolysis rate.

ags:resource.dc:title: Review on triterpenoid saponins and pharmacological activity of Platycodon grandiflorum
桔梗中三萜皂苷类成分及药理活性研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Qun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials
Li Wei, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials
Zheng Yinan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 根据桔梗皂苷的研究历史，综述了桔梗中三萜皂苷类的成分及其药理活性。研究表明：桔梗作为一种食药同源的植物，具有很好的开发前景，值得进一步研究。

The objective of this study is to summarize the studies on triterpenoid saponins of Platycodon grandiflorum and provide new reference for further research and exploitation. The structures of triterpenoid saponins and pharmacological activities of Platycodon grandiflorum were comprehensively reviewed according to phylogeny of Platycodon grandiflorum. The study shows that as an edible and medicinal herb, P. grandiflorum is of bright developing prospect and worthy of being further investigated.

ags:resource.dc:title: Primers design and PCR optimization for the amplification of elongation factor of Fuligo septica
煤绒菌延长因子的引物设计及PCR反应体系优化

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Shuyan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Education for Edible and Medicinal Fungi
Zhang Ao, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Education for Edible and Medicinal Fungi
Zhao Fengyun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Engineering Research Center of Chinese Ministry of Education for Edible and Medicinal Fungi

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 自主设计了煤绒菌（Fuligoseptica）延长因子序列扩增引物，成功地扩增出煤绒菌延长因子序列，其片段长约为800bp。同时对PCR反应体系进行了优化。在25μL的最优PCR反应体系中，引物量为2.0μL，TaqDNA聚合酶为0.2μL，退火温度为54℃。在此反应体系和退火温度条件下所得条带单一、清晰，可应用于煤绒菌相关的分子系统学研究。

Primers were designed to amplify elongation factor gene of F. septica, and were successfully tested by amplifying the target fragment. The length of PCR product was about 800 bp. PCR conditions were optimized to each primer 2.0 μL, Tax/polymerase 0.2μL, annealing temperature 54℃. The results could be helpful to molecular phylogenetic researches of F. septica.

ags:resource.dc:title: Optimized extraction technology of major components of Mitong capsule
秘通胶囊主要成分提取工艺优化

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Ying, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials
Xin Bo, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials
Liu Wencong, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对一种新型泻药方剂——秘通胶囊进行制备工艺优化的研究。采用正交设计试验法，通过观察乙醇体积分数、乙醇用量及提取时间对提取工艺的影响，以结合葸醌成分含量为指标优选方中君药酒大黄的乙醇提取工艺，并以油脂含量为指标优选臣药火麻仁和当归的乙醇提取工艺。结果表明：优选得到酒大黄最佳提取工艺为以5倍量体积分数为80%的乙醇回流提取3次（提取时间分别为2，1，1h），火麻仁和当归最佳提取工艺为4倍量体积分数为90%的乙醇回流提取3次（提取时间分别为3，2，1h）。秘通胶囊的主要成分——酒大黄、火麻仁和当归，其提取工艺合理、可行。

Preparation research on a new type of laxative prescription-Mitong capsule was conducted. The orthogonal design test was employed to optimize the extraction technology of Jiudahuang with the content of anthraquinones, Fructus Cannabis and Angelica with the content of fatty oil. The optimum extraction of Jiudabuang was 5 times the volume of 80% ethanol for 3 times (2, 1, 1 h), and the optimum extraction of Fructus Cannabis and Angelica was 4 times the volume of 90% ethanol for 3 times (3, 2, 1 h). The optimized extraction technology of Jiudabuang, Fructus Cannabis and Angelica was stable and efficient. It could be used for industrial production.

ags:resource.dc:title: Establishment of SRAP-PCR system and variety identification on V/t/s amurensis
山葡萄SRAP技术体系的建立及其在品种鉴定中的应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jin Bingkui, Agricultural College of Yanbian University, Yanji (China)
Zong Chengwen, Agricultural College of Yanbian University, Yanji (China)
Cao Hounan, Agricultural College of Yanbian University, Yanji (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以6个不同的山葡萄品种为材料，对山葡萄SRAP分子标记技术体系进行优化，探讨SRAP标记在山葡萄品种鉴定中的可行性。结果表明：SRAP扩增程序为94℃预变性5min；前5个循环，94℃变性45s，35℃退火45s，72℃延伸90s；后35个循环，94℃变性45s，50℃退火45s，72℃延伸90s；最后72℃延伸7min。反应体系：25止总反应体系中含模板DNA20ng，dNTP1.0μL，上下游引物各1皿，rTaq酶0.2μL，10倍Buffer1.0μL，其余用灭菌的ddH20补充。应用筛选出的16对引物对6个山葡萄品种进行扩增，共扩增出96条条带，其中多态性带占67.71%。每个品种都能找出其特有条带，最少用2对引物就可鉴别6个山葡萄品种。

With “zuoyouhong” and five different cultivars of grape as materials, the optimization of SRAP molecular marker system of Vitis amurensis was carried out, and the feasibility of SRAP marker in identifying grape cultivars was discussed. The main results are as follows: SRAP amplification program: 94℃ denaturation for 5 min; the first 5 cycles, 94℃ denaturation 45 s, 35℃ annealing 45 s, 72℃ extension 90 s; after 35 cycles, 94℃ denaturation 45 s, 50℃ annealing 45 s, 72℃ for 90 s; last 72℃ for 7 min. Reaction system: 25 μL total reaction system containing template DNA 20 ng, dNTPs 1.0 μL, upstream and downstream primers each 1 μL, Taq DNA polymerase 0.2 μL, 10 x Buffer 1.0 μL, the other with ddH20 added. Ninety-six bands were produced from six different cultivars of Vitis amurensis by 16 pairs of selected primers, and the percentage of polymorphie bands (PPB) was 67.71%. Each species has its unique band, at least with 2 pairs of primers Vitis amurensis cultivars can be identified.

ags:resource.dc:title: On selection and breeding of the new rice variety “Jinongda”
水稻新品种“吉农大603号＂选育报告

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ling Fenglou, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Liu Zhenku, Changchun Seed Administration Station, Changchun (China)
He Xiaoliang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: “吉农大603号”水稻新品种是以“吉农大19号”为基础材料，将其种子经卫星搭载60d后地面种植，后代经系谱法选育而成。2年区域试验和1年生产试验平均产量分别为8322.5kg／hm2和8648.6kg／hm2，分别比对照品种“吉玉粳”增产4.8%和5.9%。该品种于2011年1月通过吉林省农作物品种审定委员会审定，其主要特点是高产、抗病、优质，适宜吉林省中熟稻作区种植，特别适宜长春、自城、松原地区种植。

One hundred seeds of a rice variety, jinongda 19, were treated for 60 days through space fight. The treated seeds were planted. Jinongda 603, a new rice variety, was bred using pedigree technique from multi-generation of jinongda 19 planted. The mean yield of jinongda 603 was 8 322.5 kg/hm2 in 2 years’ regional yield test. Its yield increased by 4.8% compared with the contrast variety. The mean yield of jinongda 603 was 8 648.6 kg/hm2 in 1 year’s productive trial. Its yield increased by 5.9% compared with the contrast variety. Jinongda 603 was proved and released to the farmers by Jilin Evaluation Committee of Crop Variety in January 2011. The main characteristics of this variety are high yield and resistance to disease and good quality. It can be planted in middle mature region of Jilin province, especially in Changchun, Jilin, Baicheng and Songyuan areas.

ags:resource.dc:title: History and controlling strategy of locust plague in China
中国的蝗灾及防控对策

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ren Bingzhong, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences
Zhang Xue, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 回顾了我国蝗灾发生的历史，从中总结分析了蝗灾发生的原因及防治的对策。防治蝗灾的方法主要包括：生态防治、化学防治、生物防治、利用现代化技术进行防治，并且应始终坚持“改治并举”的方针政策，综合各种防治手段，与时俱进，以开创出一种有效、环保、低耗的治理体系为目标，结合传统与现代技术全方位地减轻乃至消灭蝗灾。

The history of locust plague in China was reviewed, and the causes and prevention of locust disaster were analyzed and summarized. The prevention methods included ecological control, chemical control, biological control and technical control. These methods should be utilized together, the policy of “changing and controlling simultaneously” should be consistently adhered to and pace should be kept with the times to combine traditional and modem technologies to reduce, even to eliminate locust plague and to create an effective, green and low-power system.

ags:resource.dc:title: Synthesis and identification of artificial antigen for heavy metal cadmium ions
重金属镉离子人工抗原的合成与鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Han Yingying, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Veterinary Medicine
Li Xiaobing, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Veterinary Medicine
Liu Guowen, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Veterinary Medicine

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选用螯合剂Isothiocyanobenzy-EDTA（1TCBE）络合重金属镉离子，再分别与载体蛋白BSA和KLH相连接，初步制备免疫抗原Cd.ITCBE-KLH和检测抗原Cd.ITCBE-BSA。通过BCA法测定完全抗原浓度，并利用SDS-PAGE电泳、紫外分光光度法及石墨炉原子吸收法对所合成抗原进行初步鉴定；BCA法测出Cd-1TCBE-BSA、Cd-ITCBE-KLH及ITCBE.BSA的实际蛋白浓度依次为1.426，1.504，0.890rag/mE。SDS-PAGE电泳和紫外分光光度法定性的说明抗原合成成功，石墨炉原子吸收法测得完全抗原中镉离子含量最高可达44.56ug/mL，其他无金属抗原、载体蛋白和Hepes中镉离子含量几乎为0，定量地说明了抗原合成成功。

Cadmium ions were coupled to Keyhole Limpet Hemocyanin (KLH) and Bovine Serum Albumin (BSA) via Isothiocyanobenzy-EDTA to gain complete antigen (Cd-ITCBE-KLH and Cd-ITCBE-BSA). The antigen concentration was measured by BCA method; ultraviolet scan of spectrophotometer and SDS-PAGE electmphoresis qualitative identification were done and the content of cadmium ions in antigen was determined by GFAAS method. The actual protein concentration of Cd-ITCBE-BSA, Cd-ITCBE-KLH and 1TCBE-BSA were in the sequence of 1.426, 1.504 and 0.890 mg/mL, ultraviolet scan and electmphoresis identification proved that the antigen synthesis was successful. Concentration of cadmium ion in complete antigen was measured as high as 44.56 μg/mL, and that of cadmium ion in ITCBE-BSA, BSA, KIM and Hepes were almost zero, which indicated the hapten was surely coupled into protein, and further testified the antigen synthesis was successful.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on technology of total saponins production from Polyporus fermentation by Panax pseudoginseng
猪苓菌发酵三七生产总皂苷的工艺研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Shu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Sciences
Fu Lili, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Sciences
Du Zhilin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为优化猪苓菌发酵三七的培养基和发酵条件，以提高总皂苷得率，试验以猪苓为发酵菌种、三七为发酵培养基中的添加物，以发酵液中总皂苷含量为指标，通过单因素和正交试验对培养基和发酵条件进行优化研究。结果表明：猪苓菌发酵生产三七总皂苷的最佳培养基配方为可溶性淀粉3g／100mL，蛋白胨0.2g/100mL，磷酸二氢钾0.3g/100mL，硫酸镁0.1g/100mL；最佳发酵条件为接种量10%，中药添加量5g/100mL，温度25℃，初始pH7，发酵8d。采用优化后工艺总皂苷得率为7.233%。
