To improve total saponin rate, using Polyporus as fermentation strains, Panax pseudoginseng as additives of fermentation medium and total saponin content in the fermentation as index, culture medium and conditions optimization of Polyporus fermentation of Panax pseudoginseng were studied with single factor and orthogonal tests. The best culture medium formula of total saponins production from Polyporus fermentation by Panax pseudoginseng is: soluble starch 3 g/100mL, peptone 0.2 g/100mL, potassium dihydrogen phosphate 0.3 g/100mL and magnesium sulfate 0.1 g/100mL; the best fermented conditions are: inoculums size 10%, traditional Chinese medicine 5 g/100mL, temperature 25℃, initial pH 7 and fermentation time 8 days. With the optimized fermentation process, the yield of total saponins was 7.233%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Population structure and point pattern of Acer truncatum Bunge in Xiaolongmen reserve, Beijing
北京小龙门地区元宝枫的种群结构及点格局分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Linghui, Beijing Normal University, Beijing (China), College of Life Sciences
Mao Yihuan, Beijing Normal University, Beijing (China), College of Life Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 植物群落的分布格局与空间尺度有着密切关系。在传统取样方法下，只能研究一种尺度下的格局，与之相比点格局分析法是以种群个体空间分布的坐标点图为基础，通过单一的分布情况分析各种尺度下的格局。该文通过点格局分析对北京小龙门地区元宝枫分布格局、各龄级的分布格局以及其与其他乔木的相关关系进行了研究。结果表明：元宝枫在样地内呈明显的集群分布，各龄级密度差异显著。幼龄级在小尺度下集群分布，大尺度下随机分布；随着龄级的增长，种群显著地趋于随机分布。核桃楸是该群落的优势种，且元宝枫和核桃楸、大叶白蜡、小叶椴之间在不同尺度下相关关系不同。

The distribution pattern of plant populations is closely related to spatial scale. By traditional sampling method, only one-scale point pattern can be studied. By comparison, point pattern analysis method is based on spatial mapped points of individual distribution and can analyze patterns under all scales along a gradient. The results are more consistent to the reality, especially for population structure. By using point pattern analysis method, the distribution pattern of all age-classes of Acer truncatum in Xiaolongmen Reserve, Beijing and its relationship with that of other arbors were studied. The results show that the distribution of Acer truncatum Bunge in the sampling area is centralization distribution, and it varies from age class to age class. Other arbors have obvious (positive or negative) effects on the distribution of Acer truncatum. The relationship between Acer truncatum and Juglans mandshurica, Tilia cordata, Fraxinus americana L var juglandifolia Rehd is different.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on agricultural insurance demand willingness of different kinds of farmers
不同类型农户农业保险需求意愿影响因素分析——以吉林省为例

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xiufen, CAAS, Beijing (China), Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning
Li Maosong, CAAS, Beijing (China), Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning
Wang Chunyan, CAAS, Beijing (China), Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用吉林省农户的调查数据，在对农户以农业收入占总收入的比例为依据进行分类的基础上，建立Logistic模型分析影响不同类型农户农业保险需求意愿的因素及差异。研究结果表明：家庭纯收入水平在一定程度上影响纯农型农户对农业保险的需求意愿，而对于其他三类农户而言，收入水平不再是影响因素，他们更关注于对农业保险重要性的认识、农业保险的服务及其对农业生产的促进作用，而对于非农型农户而言，是否购买农业保险对这类农户来说已经并不重要。

Based on the household survey data in Jilin province, this paper classified farmers according to ratio of agricultural income to total income, then built the Logistic model to analyze the main influencing factors of different kinds of farmers’ demand willingness to agricultural insurance and the differences. The results showed that the household net income level affected pure agricultural farmers’ demand willingness for agricultural insurance to some extent. For the other three types of farmers, the income level was not a main influencing factor, they focused more on the understanding of the importance of agricultural insurance, satisfaction to agricultural insurance services and their role in promoting agricultural production. For non-agricultural farmers, no factors could affect their agricultural insurance demand willingness.

ags:resource.dc:title: Drought characteristics analyzing method based on palmer index in northeast semi-arid region
东北半干旱地区Palmer干旱指数特征分析方法

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Xiaohui, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Information and Electrical Engineering
Yang Yong, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Information and Electrical Engineering
Ren Chuanyou, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Palmer指标可以较准确地描述干旱的强度，但当各个月份或季节降雨量不均衡时，由于干旱指数综合了各个月份降水的盈余或短缺，使得其弱化了灾情，通过改进方法，引入了马利科夫判据与Palmer指数结合的方法分析干旱特征。分析利用东北半干旱地区辽宁省朝阳地区1952—2011年期间60年的日降水量、气温等气象数据，进行干旱特征分析，结果表明：引入马利科夫判据与Palmer指数结合的方法分析干旱特征方法正确、客观。该方法进一步对Palmer指数分析结果补充判断，有效辨别出60年的试验数据中1959，1960，1963，1993，1999年5个年份原始判定为正常旱情的年份，能够客观地反映实际旱情特征。

Palmer Index can more accurately describe the intensity of drought, but when each month or season rainfall is not balanced, the condition of disaster will be weakened because the index integrates the surplus or shortage of rainfall in each month. The improved method of combining Malikov criterion and the Palmer index to analyze the characteristics of drought is introduced. Sixty years’ meteorological data, including daily precipitation, temperature, etc., from 1952 to 2011, in northeast semi-arid region-Chaoyang of Liaoning province were used to analyze drought characteristics. The results show that the proposed analytic method is correct and objective. It complements the judgment of Palmer analysis by discriminating the drought characteristics of the 5 years including 1959, 1960, etc. among the 60 years’ experimental data from the normal years according to Palmer alone, and it can objectively reflect the actual drought features.

ags:resource.dc:title: Combined characteristics of phytoliths in Phragmites australis (Cav.) Trin. ex Steud. under the control of different moisture gradients in Northeast China
东北地区不同湿度梯度条件下芦苇植硅体形态组合特征

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jie Dongmei, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), College of Urban and Environmental Science
Wang Jiangyong, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), College of Urban and Environmental Science
Li Na, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), College of Urban and Environmental Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对东北3个地区5个地点不同生境的芦苇叶片中植硅体进行了分析，探讨了不同湿度梯度条件下芦苇植硅体的组合特征。共测芦苇植硅体4 372粒，5个地点芦苇样品中的植硅体类型相同，所鉴定出的植硅体类型共8种，不同生境下的芦苇植硅体的百分含量及形态大小明显不同。芦苇植硅体中的硅化气孔对极端环境的响应较为敏感，干旱环境中芦苇植硅体颗粒变大，硅化气孔的含量相应减少。较湿润的沙兰地区，植硅体的颗粒偏小，气孔的含量也较少；尖型的长度，对于湿度因子更为敏感，湿度不同的地区，尖型植硅体的长度发育不同；鞍型植硅体的形态组合在长春地区小湿度梯度的设置中，随着湿度的增大有增大的趋势，说明湿度的变化在一定程度上会影响芦苇植硅体形态大小，同时有利于芦苇植硅体的发育。

Leaves of Phragmites communis were collected from five sampling sites in three zones or areas in NE China, each zone representing a different habitat. A total of 4 372 phytoliths particles were counted from the leaves and classified into eight types. The main types from the five sampling sites are identical but the proportions and sizes of phytoliths in different habitats are different. Phytoliths are sensitive to environmental extremes, those from a saline-alkaline environment being much larger but correspondingly fewer; in relatively wet environments, phytoliths are smaller as well as fewer. The length of lanceolate phytoliths is more sensitive to humidity, and saddle-shaped phytoliths tend to increase along all the three dimensions with even a small increase in humidity. Higher humidity thus appears to favor the development of phytoliths in Phragmites communis.

ags:resource.dc:title: A breeding report on new soybean cultivar of Jinong 28 with high yield and high oil
高产高油大豆新品种“吉农28”选育报告

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Jun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Jiang Enjun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Wang Guanqiu, Agricultural Development Company of Jilin Oilfield Company, Songyuan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 大豆新品种“吉农28”是以“吉农9”为母本、外引系“ARIRA”为父本，经品种间有性杂交，按系谱法经多年系统选育而成。2009—2010年参加吉林省大豆品种区域试验，平均产量3 136.7kg/hm2，比对照“九农21”平均增产18.8%；2010年参加吉林省大豆品种生产试验，平均产量3 272.4kg/hm2，比对照“九农21”平均增产21.4%。粗蛋白含量37.80%，粗脂肪含量22.56%。该品种于2011年2月通过吉林省农作物品种审定委员会审定，其主要特点是高产、稳产、高油、抗逆、抗倒，适宜吉林省长春、吉林、通化等中熟区种植。

Jinong 28, a new soybean cultivar, was bred through sexual hybridization between species using the pedigree selection method with jinong 9 as female and ARIRA as male. Its average yield of regional test was 3 136.7 kg/hm2 in 2009 and 2010, which was 18.8% higher than the control. Its yield of production trial was 3 272.4 kg/hm2 on average in 2010, which was 21.4% higher than the control. Its crude protein content was 37.80% and crude fat content was 22.56%. Jinong 28 was proved and released to the farmers by Jilin Evaluation Committee of Crop Variety in February 2011. The main characteristics of this cultivar are high stable yield, high oil, anti-adversity and resistance to lodging. Jinong 28 could be cultivated in the medium maturing period areas such as Changchun, Jilin, Tonghua, etc..

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of different planting densities on grain-filling rates and yield of maize in semiarid area of Jilin province
吉林省半干旱区不同种植密度对玉米子粒灌浆速率和产量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yan Weiping, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Liu Yang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Chang Ying, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 试验对先玉335、郑单958、吉单198、农华101 4个玉米品种在不同种植密度下的子粒灌浆速率及产量进行对比分析。结果表明：不同玉米品种灌浆速率曲线不同，在9万株/hm2种植密度下“先玉335”子粒灌浆效率最高。在相同灌浆持续期内，9万株/hm2的种植密度下，“先玉335”群体子粒产量高于其他3个品种。相同种植密度与灌浆持续期下，灌浆速率的高低决定了子粒群体产量。试验中“先玉335”各项产量指标较优，利于提高半干旱地区玉米产量。

The comparative analysis of yield and grain-filling rates of maize varieties of xianyu 335, zhengdan 958, nonghua 101, jidan 198 under different planting densities was carried out. The results show that grain-filling rate curves of different maize varieties were different. Grain-filling efficiency of xianyu 335 at the planting density 90 000 plants per hectare was the highest. Within the same grain-filling duration, under the planting density of 90 000 plants per hectare, grain yield of xianyu 335 was higher than that of any other three varieties. Under different planting densities and grain-filling durations, filling rate level determined grain yield. Yield indicators of xianyu 335 were better in the tests, good for the increase of maize yield in the semiarid area.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on environmental impact assessment of land remediation planning in Jilin province
吉林省土地整治规划环境影响评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Wei, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Earth Sciences
Li Shujie, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Earth Sciences
Wang Ji, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Earth Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以ArcGIS为平台，基于《生态环境状况评价技术规范》（HJ/T 192-2006），构建土地整治规划环境影响评价体系，进行吉林省新一轮土地整治规划（2011—2015年）环境影响评价的定量研究。研究结果表明：2010年吉林省土地生态环境状况总体水平良好，生态系统较稳定；吉林省生态环境主要制约因子为水资源瓶颈与土壤侵蚀；土地整治规划方案实施后，吉林省土地生态环境状况指数（EI）由2010年的66.37增长至2015年的70.69，生态环境状况明显变好。各分指数计算结果表明：生物多样性更加丰富，植被覆盖度进一步增大，土壤侵蚀状况明显好转，土地适宜程度显著提高，水资源瓶颈因素有所缓解；“田、水、路、林、村”综合整治有利于当地生态系统稳定性提高。

Based on “Technical Criterion for Eco-environmental Status Evaluation” (HJ/T 192–2006) and ArcGIS platform, the land remediation planning environmental impact assessment Index system was established, and quantitative researches on the new round of land remediation planning (2011 — 2015) environmental impact were conducted. The results indicate that the overall land eco-environmental status was good in Jilin province in 2010. In addition, ecosystem was stable. The main constraint factors of eco-environment were soil erosion and bottleneck of water resources. After the implementation of land remediation planning, the eco-environmental status will obviously get better and the land eco-environmental status index (EI) will increase from 2010’s 66.37 to 2015’s 70.69 in Jilin province. Meanwhile, the calculated results of each sub-index show that biodiversity will be obviously richer, vegetation coverage will be further increased, soil erosion will be significantly improved, the land suitability will rise up obviously, and the water resource bottleneck factors will be visibly eased. Moreover, the comprehensive renovation of fields, water, road, forest and village will improve the stability of the local ecosystem.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research status and development trend of precision fertilization technology
精准施肥技术的研究现状与发展趋势

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Guifen, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information Technology
Ma Li, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information Technology
Chen Hang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 精准施肥是精准农业技术中的核心内容。精准施肥的实施可以节约肥料，均衡土壤养分，减少环境污染，增加粮食产量。文中从土壤肥力分析、施肥模型和施肥决策3个方面对精准施肥技术的研究现状进行了综述，总结了在精准施肥研究方面的经验与不足，指出了其未来发展趋势，为今后的精准施肥研究和应用提供参考。

Precision fertilization is the central part of precision agricultural technology. Precision fertilization implementation can save fertilizer, balance soil nutrients, reduce environmental pollution and increase grain yield. Three aspects of precision fertilizer, including soil fertility analysis, fertilization model and fertilization decision making, are reviewed in this paper. Precision fertilization research experiences and shortcomings are summarized. Development trend is also predicted, with the purpose of providing reference for precision fertilization research and applications.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research on changes of chemical constituents in panax ginseng bi-directional solid fermentation process
人参双向固体发酵过程中化学成分的变化

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Hongfeng, Changchun University of Chinese Medicine, Changchun (China), Graduate College
Zhu Kai, Changchun University of Chinese Medicine, Changchun (China), College of Pharmacy
Tian Jian, Changchun University of Chinese Medicine, Changchun (China), College of Pharmacy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用紫外分光光度法测定人参双向发酵过程中总皂苷和总多糖含量；采用高效液相色谱法测定人参双向发酵过程中代表性单体化合物Rg1、Re、Rb1含量；通过薄层色谱法鉴定、高效液相色谱法测定人参稀有皂苷Rg3、Rh1、Rh2、人参皂苷CK含量，研究了人参双向固体发酵过程中化学成分的变化规律。在发酵30d后，人参药材经过生物转化以后总多糖含量增加26.86%，总皂苷含量减少7.70%，人参皂苷Rg1、Re、Rb1含量分别减少52.76%、10.86%、9.82%，Rg3、Rh1含量明显增多，分别达到0.90mg/g和0.09mg/g。人参在发酵过程中不仅利用了人参中的多糖，而且还生成了其他种类的多糖；人参皂苷发生了部分的转化，人参皂苷Rg1、Re、Rb1在发酵过程中被转化成了稀有人参皂苷Rg3、Rh1。

The content of total saponin and total polysaccharide was determined by ultraviolet spectrophotometry, and the content of representative monomer compound Rg1, Re, Rb1 was determined by high performance liquid chromatography during the process of ginseng fermentation. Through thin layer chromatography and high performance liquid chromatography, the content of rare saponin Rg3, Rh1, Rh2 was determined in ginseng, and saponin CK to study the ginseng chemical composition change rule in the process of bi-directional solid fermentation. Thirty days after the fermentation, the total polysaccharide content of ginseng medicinal materials increased by 26.86%, the total saponin content decreased by 7.70%, the content of saponin Rg1, Re, Rb1 respectively decreased by 52.76%, 10.86% and 9.82%, and the content of Rg3, Rh1 increased obviously, respectively to 0.90 mg/g and 0.09 mg/g. In the process of solid fermentation, ginseng not only employed ginseng polysaccharides, but also produced other kinds of polysaccharides; Ginseng saponin implemented partial transformation because Rg1, Re and Rb1 were transformed into rare ginsenosides Rg3 and Rh1 in fermentation process.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research and application of constructed wetland in rural domestic sewage treatment
人工湿地在农村生活污水处理中的研究与应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sun Hongjie, Dalian Nationalities University, Dalian (China), Department of Environmental Science ＆ Engineering
Yang Shaohua, China Northeast Municipal Engineering Design and Research Institute, Changchun (China)
Cui Yubo, Dalian Nationalities University, Dalian (China), Department of Environmental Science ＆ Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 随着社会主义新农村建设步伐的推进，农村环境治理工作正在稳步展开，而农村生活污水处理是其中的重要组成部分。受经济条件等因素的限制，节能型的人工湿地无疑成为农村污水处理技术的主要选择。通过对国内利用人工湿地技术处理农村生活污水的研究和实践进行总结，归纳出常用的湿地填料和湿地植物，对人工湿地组合工艺、多级人工湿地工艺和单级人工湿地工艺的运行效果进行了总结和分析。文中还针对实际工程，分析比较了人工湿地组合工艺的投资和运行费用并对该技术下一步需关注的重点进行了展望。

With the development of new socialist countryside construction in China, rural environmental management work is steadily unfolding. As an important part of environmental management, rural wastewater treatment is affected by economic conditions and other factors. Energy saving constructed wetland becomes a main choice of rural wastewater treatment technology. The paper reviewed the current researches and projects of constructed wetland for rural wastewater treatment, presented common fillers and plants used in constructed wetland, and summarized and analyzed the operation effect of combined constructed wetland process, muti-stage constructed wetland process and single stage constructed wetland process for rural wastewater treatment. At the same time, the paper analyzed and compared the investment and operating costs of combined constructed wetland process based on the actual wastewater treatment engineering and prospected the focus of attention about this technology in future.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of nerve growth factor (NGF) on pig cumulus cell expansion and oocyte in vitro maturation
神经生长因子对猪卵丘细胞扩散及卵母细胞体外成熟的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lu Chen, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science
Li Wanhong, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science
Chen Shuxiong, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用光学显微镜观察及地衣红染色方法，探究猪卵母细胞体外成熟过程中添加神经生长因子（NGF）对猪卵丘细胞扩散和卵母细胞成熟的影响。结果表明：在猪卵母细胞体外成熟过程中添加NGF对猪卵丘细胞扩散无明显影响；单纯添加NGF并不能显著改变第二次减数分裂中期（MⅡ期）卵母细胞的比率，但却可以显著提高生发泡期（GV期）卵母细胞比率。当NGF与促性腺激素（eCG和hCG）联合作用时，MⅡ期卵母细胞比率相对于单纯地促性腺激素作用有显著提高。

The aim of this work is to assess the effect of nerve growth factor on pig cumulus expansion and in vitro maturation (IVM) of pig oocytes. The degree of cumulus expansion was assessed directly under light microscope while nuclear maturation was assessed in terms of orcein staining. The results showed that NGF could not stimulate expansion of cumulus cells. Compared with oocytes in control group, oocytes stimulated with NGF alone were more likely to stay at GV phase, although the percentage of oocytes that had reached metaphase Ⅱ phase was not significantly different. Nevertheless, oocytes stimulated with NGF combined with gonadotrophins (equine chorionic gonadotropin and human chorionic gonadotropin) were more likely to reach metaphase Ⅱ phase compared with those stimulated with gonadotrophins alone.

ags:resource.dc:title: Empirical analysis of consumers’ willingness on purchasing quality rice - a case study of consumption of urban residents in Jilin province
消费者选购质量安全稻米意愿的实证分析——以吉林省城镇居民消费为例

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Ying, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economy and Management
Zhang Yuejie, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economy and Management

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用对吉林省省内各大超市、居民小区以及部分省外稻米消费较多地区368位稻米消费者的调查数，采用二元Logistic模型从实证的角度考察了现阶段吉林省稻米消费者质量安全稻米消费意愿。结果表明：性别、稻米购买场所、稻米购买时关注点、市场忧患度、质量安全稻米提价接受幅度、质量安全稻米了解程度对消费者购买质量安全稻米意愿有显著的影响。

The consumption willingness of Jilin rice consumers on purchasing quality rice was investigated. Two Logistic models were used to analyze data taken from the research on 368 consumers around major supermarkets, residential quarters in Jilin province and some rice consumption areas in other provinces. The results show that gender, rice purchase places, rice purchase concerns, market hardship degrees, reception for raising price of quality rice and level of understanding quality rice are all significant factors that influence consumers’ consumption willingness on purchasing quality rice.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of ricin aerosol exposure on immunoberrier in mice
蓖麻毒素气源性中毒对小鼠免疫屏障的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Meng, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Wang Quankai, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Qian Jun, AMMS, Changchun (China), Institute of Military Veterinary

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 蓖麻毒素来源广、毒性强、性质稳定，可通过注射、口服、气溶胶等多种方式中毒。为进一步优化蓖麻毒素气溶胶中毒模型，探讨蓖麻毒素气溶胶粒子对气—血屏障、血—胸屏障等免疫屏障的损伤过程，以及实质性免疫器官的病理改变，利用军事医学科学院军事兽医研究所五室已经建立的气溶胶暴露系统，对小鼠进行蓖麻毒素气溶胶的暴露，并于气溶胶暴露后12，30，48h采集小鼠气管、肺脏、胸腺、脾脏制作病理切片，观察病理变化。结果表明：蓖麻毒素气溶胶粒子能够引起间质性肺炎、脾脏及胸腺细胞变性坏死，从而验证吸入蓖麻毒素气溶胶粒子对免疫屏障的强烈损伤。

Ricin is of wide source, strong toxicity and stable nature, and can be exposed to various ways like injection, oral taking and aerosol. In order to further optimize the model of ricin aerosol exposure, explore the injury process of ricin aerosol exposure aerosol-blood barrier, blood-thymus barriers and other immune barriers, and observe pathological changes in the immune organs, 20 mice were exposed in the ricin aerosol exposure system established in our lab previously; the mice were divided into 2 groups, control group and ricin aerosol exposure group. 12 h, 30 h and 48 h after exposure, mice were sacrificed, and then, trachea, lungs, thymus, spleen were collected. After they were sliced, the pathological changes were observed. The results showed that ricin aerosol would induce a series of pathological reactions in trachea, interstitial pneumonia, meanwhile, degeneration and necrosis of the thymocyte and splenocytes. Those results indicated that ricin aerosol can induce injury in immune barriers and provide some basic evidence for understanding pathological mechanism of injury caused by ricin aerosol poisoning.

ags:resource.dc:title: Change rule of functional components content in dandelion of different picking periods
不同采收期蒲公英中功效成分的含量变化

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Shiyu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Shen Minghao, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Food Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以长白山野生蒲公英为原料，对不同采摘时期的蒲公英根部及全草中的功效成分变化规律进行了研究。采用乙醇浸提法提取蒲公英中的黄酮、皂苷及总胆碱，并用紫外分光光度法测定其含量。结果表明：8月中旬采摘的蒲公英全草中黄酮含量最高，达12.78mg/g；8月中旬采摘的蒲公英根中皂苷含量最高，达0.78mg/g；7月末采摘的蒲公英根中胆碱含量最高，达5.06mg/g。

Wild dandelion in Changbai mountain was selected as raw materials to study the change of ingredients in dandelion roots and whole plant in different picking periods. Flavonoids, saponins and total choline in dandelion were extracted with ethanol and their content was determined by UV spectrophotometry. The results showed that the content of flavonoid in the whole plant picked in mid-August was 12.78 mg/g, which was higher than that in the other picking periods. The dandelion roots picked in mid-August contained the highest content of saponins, which was 0.78 mg/g. The content of choline was the highest in the dandelion roots picked at the end of July, which was 5.06 mg/g.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of short-term drought and rewatering on quality of Scutellaria baicalensis Georgi under different water controls
短期干旱复水对不同施水黄芩药材质量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Yonggang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials
Zhao Shengnan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Materials
Li Yaqin, Changchun Medical College, Changchun (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 试验研究了不同施水处理条件下，短期干旱复水对黄芩药材中黄酮类药效成分积累的影响。对池栽黄芩进行3种不同施水处理2个月，干旱处理7 d后复水。高效液相色谱法分别测定干旱前1d、干旱1，3，5，7d及复水2d的黄芩根中黄芩苷、汉黄芩苷、黄芩素及汉黄芩素含量。结果表明：处理组Ⅰ和处理组Ⅱ的黄芩分别在干旱1-3d、干旱3-5d时呈现出干旱胁迫状态，并分别在干旱处理3d、5d时具有显著高于其他处理组的黄芩苷和总黄酮含量；处理组Ⅲ在干旱1-3d时有利于黄酮类物质积累。处理组Ⅱ旱后恢复能力强。3组不同施水处理的黄芩对干旱胁迫响应不同。

The effects of short-term drought and rewatering on flavonoids active ingredient accumulation of Scutellaria baicalensis Georgi under different water control were investigated. The contents of baicalin, baicalein, wogonoside and wogonin in S. baicalensis roots collected one day before drought stress, on the 1st day, 3rd day, 5th day and 7th day of drought stress, and the 2nd day of rewatering were determined by HPLC. Drought stress state of treatmentsⅠand Ⅱappeared respectively during the 1st - 3rd day and 3rd - 5th days of drought. And the contents of baicalin and total flavonoids of them were significantly higher than those of the other treatments on the 3rd day and 5th day of drought stress. The flavonoids accumulation was conduced in treatment Ⅲ on 1st - 3rd days of drought stress. The recovery capability of treatment Ⅱ was higher than that of the other two after drought. The responses of S. baicalensis under the three water treatments to short-term drought and rewatering were different. Theoretical basis was provided in this research to promote the quality of S. baicalensis and guide the cultivation of S. baicalensis.

ags:resource.dc:title: Change regularity of polyphenol content in blackberry fruit during growth and development
黑莓果实发育过程中多酚类物质的变化规律

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Huifang, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Nanjing (China), Jiangsu Institute of Botany
Wu Wenlong, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Nanjing (China), Jiangsu Institute of Botany
Lv Lianfei, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Nanjing (China), Jiangsu Institute of Botany

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选用黑莓Boysen和Kiowa品种研究了黑莓果实发育过程中多酚类物质的变化规律。结果显示：黑莓果实总多酚和鞣花酸含量在果实发育初期含量最高，发育过程中的前6天急剧下降，然后缓慢下降，但累计量逐渐上升，累积速率在果实发育的前期和后期较快，发育中期增长缓慢；总花色苷在果实成熟后期才开始形成，含量和累积量增长迅速，直至果实成熟时达到最大值。

The research on the change regularity of polyphenol content in blackberry fruit during growth period was carried out, and blackberry cultivars Boysen and Kiowa were selected as experimental materials. The results showed that the total polyphenol and ellagic acid content was the highest at fruit-setting and then decreased quickly during the initial six days, as their cumulants gradually increased. The accumulation rate of polyphenol and ellagic acid increased quickly in the early and late development stages, but slowly in the midterm development period. The formation of anthocyanins was in the late development stage, whose content and cumulants increased quickly and attained the maximum until fruit maturity.

ags:resource.dc:title: Purification and characterization of trypsin inhibitor from the seeds of red flesh jackfruit in Hainan
红肉菠萝蜜种子胰蛋白酶抑制剂的分离纯化及其特性

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wei Shuangshuang, Agricultural College of Hainan University, Haikou (China), Hainan Provincial Key Laboratory for Sustainable Utilization of Tropical Bioresources
Zhang Yingxia, Hainan University, Haikou (China), College of Marine Science
Jia Wanxian, Agricultural College of Hainan University, Haikou (China), Hainan Provincial Key Laboratory for Sustainable Utilization of Tropical Bioresources

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用阴离子交换层析和凝胶过滤层析方法，从海南红肉菠萝蜜种子中分离纯化得到胰蛋白酶抑制剂，命名为AHTI。结果表明：该蛋白有抑制胰蛋白酶水解小肽底物的活性作用，由相对分子质量分别约为28.8kD和16.4kD的亚基组成的多聚体。AHTI具有稳定的胰蛋白酶抑制活性，对胰蛋白酶的抑制活性与其浓度成正比，AHTI对温度、pH的耐受性较强，2种因素对其胰蛋白酶抑制活性影响较小。

On the basis of anion exchange chromatography and gel filtration chromatography, trypsin inhibitor was obtained from the seeds of red flesh jackfruit, which was named as AHTI. AHTI inhibited trypsin, which is made of multi subunits with the molecular weight of 28.8 kD and 16.4 kD. Its activity increased with the increase of its concentration. AHTI exhibited the trypsin inhibitory stability against temperature and pH. AHTI maybe played an important role in defending predators.

ags:resource.dc:title: Image segmentation method for corn diseases based on improved genetic pulse coupled neural network
基于改进遗传脉冲耦合神经网络的玉米病害图像分割方法

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Yajing, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information and Technology
Wen Changji, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information and Technology
Wang Zenghui, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 作物病害图像分割是利用数字图像处理技术进行病害识别的关键性技术环节之一，现有病害分割方法存在病害区域外部形态特征细节保留程度差和颜色纹理信息丢失等问题。针对上述问题，提出一种基于改进遗传算法的脉冲耦合神经网络分割方法。首先改进遗传算法，以信息熵的加权线性组合作为优化适应度函数用以在每次迭代过程中评价脉冲耦合神经网络对于病害区域的分割效果，通过计算种群适应度方差和适应度均值自适应调整遗传算法的交叉概率和变异概率；然后将改进遗传算法与脉冲耦合神经网络相结合，实现网络连接系数、衰减系数和幅值系数的自动优化调节；最后利用改进遗传脉冲耦合神经网络分割算法，在RGB子空间分别对病害图像进行病害区域分割，将分割结果利用RGB颜色空间子图合并策略实施合并，从而得到最终的图像分割结果。将此算法、最小交叉熵阈值化算法和GA-PCNN算法用于玉米黑瘤粉病彩色图像病害区域分割。结果表明：从主观视觉评测角度，此算法分割效果较好，能够较为细致的呈现病害区域的外部形态特征和较为完好的保留病害区域的颜色纹理特征；从客观量化评测角度，此分割算法在目标区域分割匹配率、错分率和正确率上明显优于最小交叉熵阈值化算法和GA-PCNN算法。

The image segmentation of crop diseases is one of the critical technical aspects of digital image processing technology for disease recognition. This paper presents a pulse coupled neural network model based on improved genetic algorithm. Through weighted linear combination of maximum Shannon entropy and minimum cross-entropy optimization, a fitness function was constructed. Meanwhile, an adaptive genetic algorithm was used to adjust the crossover and mutation probability. Improved genetic algorithm was used to optimize the pulse coupled neural network parameters. Combined with the RGB space subgraph merger strategy, the model has been used to the target for image segmentation of corn melanoma powdery mildew. The experimental results show that the method could better segment the disease regions and set low complexity parameters.

ags:resource.dc:title: Distribution and inhibitory activity on pancreatic lipase of hyperin in acanthopanax senticosus
金丝桃苷在刺五加各部位中的分布及其对胰脂肪酶活性的抑制作用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Fangfang, Changchun University of Science and Technology, Changchun (China)
Zhang Jing, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Material
Zhang Chuanqi, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Chinese Medicinal Material

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用高效液相色谱法测定了刺五加根、茎干、新枝、茎皮、茎韧皮部、叶、花蕾、果中金丝桃苷的含量，并研究了金丝桃苷体外抑制胰脂肪酶的活性。结果表明：刺五加花蕾中金丝桃苷含量最高，达2.4%，金丝桃苷对胰脂肪酶活性有一定的抑制作用，质量浓度为1mg/mL时抑制率为24.852%。

The content of hyperin in root, shoot, new branch, skin of shoot, phloem of shoot, leaf, flower and fruit was determined with HPLC and the activity of pancreatic lipase on hyperin was studied. The results showed that the content of hyperin was the highest in flower, 2.4%. At the concentration of 1 mg/mL, hyperin inhibited the activity of pancreatic lipase by 24.852%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning and bioinformatics analysis of emg1 gene of Auricularia auricular-judae
木耳emg1基因克隆与生物信息学分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Fang Ming, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Horticulture
Yao Fangjie, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Horticulture
Wang Xiao’e, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Horticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以毛木耳和皱木耳的cDNA序列为模板设计简并引物并进行扩增，获得1条长度为1 075bp的序列Aa-2；与JGI数据库中皱木耳基因组Blastn比对E值为0；与编码emg1的氨基酸序列Blastx同源性比对的E值高达1.82e-112。与木耳全基因组序列中注释为emg1的核酸序列有775bp的序列完全一致。经GenBank数据库Blastn同源比对，与玉米丝黑穗菌emg1蛋白cDNA的部分序列相似性达91%。经GenBank中Conserved domains搜索，Aa-2序列与emg1蛋白超家族序列同源比对的E值达2.66e-43，初步判定Aa-2的部分序列为emg1蛋白的编码序列。

PCR products Aa-2 were amplified with degenerate primers designed according to the cDNA sequences of Auricularia nigricans and Auricularia delicata with the length of 1 075 bp. The E value of Aa-2 is 0 by blastn with A. delicata genome sequence of JGI databank and 1.82e-112 by blastx with Auricularia delicata emg1 gene of JGI databank. 775 bp are identical between the Aa-2 sequence and the Auricularia auricularia-judae emg1 gene, among which the genome was sequenced by our lab. The homology of part Aa-2 fragments to emg1 cDNA fragments of Sporisorium reilianum is 91% by blastn. The E value of Aa-2 fragments is 2.66e-43 compared with the emg1 superfamily protein sequence. The Aa-2 fragment was preliminarily identified as emg1 CDS.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on doubling efficiency of maize haploids bud soaked by herbicide and colchicine
秋水仙素和除草剂浸芽加倍玉米单倍体效率的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang He, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Li Jizhu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Zhang Jiwei, High School attached to Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以Mo17×PHB1M诱导的单倍体子粒为试验材料，利用戊炔草胺、甲基胺草磷和秋水仙素为加倍药剂，浸芽处理单倍体种子。结果表明：戊炔草胺质量浓度为4-16 mg/L时的加倍率为5%-16%；甲基胺草磷质量浓度为8-32mg/L时的加倍率为8%-16%；秋水仙素质量浓度为0.4-1.0mg/L时的加倍率为5.5%-16.5%，3种药剂对玉米单倍体加倍均有效果。其中8mg/L的戊炔草胺、21mg/L的甲基胺草磷、0.7mg/L的秋水仙素浸芽8h的玉米单倍体加倍率均为各组最高。戊炔草胺和甲基胺草磷可以替代秋水仙素加倍玉米单倍体。

Maize haploids used in this research were induced from Mo17 × PHB1M. Haploids by bud soaking. The results showed all three medicaments had effects on doubling haploids. The doubling rates of haploids treated with propyzamide of 4 - 16 mg/L were 5% - 16%. The doubling rates of haploids treated with AMP of 8 - 32 mg/L were 8% - 16%. The doubling rates of haploids treated with AMP of 0.4 - 1.0 mg/L were 5.5% - 16.5%. The optimum combination was treated for 8 h with 8 mg/L propyzamide, 21 mg/L APM and 0.7 mg/L colchicines in three trials, respectively. The pronamide and AMP can replace colchicine in maize haploid doubling.

ags:resource.dc:title: Infection and colonization of Chaetomium globosum ND35 in cucumber and its effect on growth and yield of cucumber
球毛壳菌在黄瓜上的侵染定殖及其对黄瓜生长和产量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xin Yafen, Shanghai Vocational and Technical College of Agriculture and Forestry, Shanghai (China), Department of Gardening and Horticulture
Mi Shiwei, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Plant Protection
Zhang Shuling, Shanghai Vocational and Technical College of Agriculture and Forestry, Shanghai (China), Department of Gardening and Horticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用光学显微镜、扫描电镜和透射电镜观察了植物内生真菌球毛壳ND35菌株在黄瓜品种“津研4号”根部的侵染定殖情况。菌丝主要从表皮细胞之间的缝隙侵入，在表皮细胞和外皮层细胞中定殖，可与植物建立共生关系。通过施用不同含量的球毛壳ND35菌肥，研究其对不同黄瓜品种生长和产量的影响。结果表明：0.2g/株毛壳生物菌肥处理在显著增加黄瓜品种“津研4号”和“申绿06号”株高和叶面积的同时，提高了黄瓜产量，黄瓜单株产量分别比对照增加了43.2%和67.2%。

Infection and colonization of endophytic fungus Chaetomium globosum ND35 on the root of “Jinyan No.4” cucumber were observed by light microscopy, scanning electron microscopy and transmission electron microscopy. Hyphae mainly infected root from gaps between epidermal cells and colonized in epidermal cells and outer cortical cells. It was capable of establishing symbiosis with plant. The effect of Chaetomium globosum ND35 on growth and yield of 4 cucumber varieties was investigated by applying different content of fungal biofertilizer. The result indicated that applying fungal biofertilizer at 0.2 g per plant was able to promote and increase significantly height growth and leaf area of “Jinyan No.4” and “Shenlv No. 06” cucumber, and enhance their yield. Compared with the control plant, yield per plant cucumber increased by 43.2% and 67.2%, respectively.

ags:resource.dc:title: Extraction technology of hawthorn flavonoids fermented by edible fungi
食用真菌发酵山楂黄酮的提取工艺

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Fu Lili, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science
Chen Shu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science
Wang Xin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用食用真菌发酵山楂，确定山楂黄酮提取的最佳工艺。采用5种食用真菌茯苓、灵芝、黑木耳、冬虫夏草、香菇与山楂共发酵，测定发酵液中黄酮含量的变化。食用真菌发酵山楂的最佳工艺条件为温度25℃、转速125 r/min、接种量3mL、山楂质量3 g。结果表明：相对于传统加工方法，食用菌发酵作为一种中药的炮制方法能显著提高中药有效成分的提取率。

To determine the best extraction technology of hawthorn flavonoids with edible fungus fermentation, hawthorn was fermented with five edible fungi, Wolfiporia cocos, Ganoderma lucidum, agaric, cordyceps and mushroom to assay the content of flavonoid in fermented liquid. The best technology is: temperature 25℃, rotation speed 125 r/min, inoculums size 3 mL, amount of hawthorn 3 g. Edible fugus fermentation as a Chinese medicine processing method can obviously improve ingredients extraction efficiency of traditional Chinese medicine, and it is of greater significance compared to traditional processing method.

ags:resource.dc:title: Review on cultivation physiology of blueberry in China
我国越橘栽培生理研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Lin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Horticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 综述了我国在越橘光合作用、水分胁迫、土壤pH、土壤改良、矿质营养等栽培生理方面的研究成果，提出了越橘产业发展的建议。

Photosynthesis, water stress, soil pH, soil adjustment and mineral nutrition of blueberry cultivation were reviewed, and the development routine of blueberry industry was also suggested in this paper.

ags:resource.dc:title: Studies on the toxicity of blueberry leaf spot
越橘叶斑病的药剂筛选

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yang Lina, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Ma Qianli, Helong Housing and Urban-Rural Construction Bureau of Jilin Province, Helong (China)
Zhang Bo, Helong Coal Enterprise Management Bureau of Jilin Province, Helong (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用生长速率法和抑菌圈法对越橘叶斑病（Cylindrocladiumsp.）进行了室内药剂筛选，确定金万霉灵对越橘叶斑病抑制效果最好，经过田间药剂筛选确定甲基托布津对越橘叶斑病防治效果最好，金万霉灵的防效次于甲基托布津。

Fungicides were screened for the disease with methods of inhibition zone and mycelium growth rate indoor. The results showed that the inhibition rate of Gold wanmeiling were best to Cylindrocladium sp.. The field experiment showed that the effect of thiophanate methyl was best to Cylindrocladium sp.. The results showed that the control effect of Gold wanmeiling was lower than thiophanate methyl.

ags:resource.dc:title: Initial quantitative studies on spores germination and appressorium formation of alternaria brassicae
芸薹链格孢菌孢子萌发及附着胞形成的初步定量研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ma Haixia, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Haikou (China), Institute of Tropical Bioscience and Biotechnology
Liu Ying, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Qu Zhi, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Haikou (China), Institute of Tropical Bioscience and Biotechnology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用常规流行学方法研究了芸薹链格孢菌的孢子萌发及附着胞形成。结果表明：一般浸入水中2h后就有少量孢子萌发，10h孢子萌发率可达90%以上；孢子萌发时各个细胞均可萌发形成芽管，向不同方向伸长，形成附着胞，20h附着胞形成率可达50%以上；花粉和叶面物质对孢子萌发有促进作用；孢子抗干燥能力较弱，萌发孢子只须经4h干燥即可完全丧失存活能力；芸薹链格孢菌孢子萌发及附着胞形成的温度范围均为10-25℃，15℃为孢子萌发及附着孢形成的最适温度，温度达40℃后孢子不再萌发。

The study adopted a conventional epidemic experiment on spores germination and appressorium formation. The results showed that spores of Alternaria brassicae can germinate easily in pure water, a few spores can germinate after 2 hours of immersion, and the spores of Alternaria brassicae can germinate over 90% after 10 hours. Each cell may germinate and form the tube, and elongate to different directions. The rate of appressorium can be over 50% after 20 hours. Substance in the leaf surface and pollen can accelerate the germination of spores. The spores don’t have strong ability to resist drying condition, the germinated spores completely died after 4 hours in drying condition. The temperature of the sporulation and appressorium formation were both about 10 - 25℃. It was at 15℃ that the ratio of spores germination and the rate of appressorium formation were the highest. The spores cannot sporulate over 40℃.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on toxicity of natural leukotoxin of pathogenic Fusobacterium necrophorum
致病性坏死梭杆菌天然白细胞毒素毒性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Feng Erkai, Institute of Special Animal and Plant Science, Changchun (China)
Chen Lizhi, Institute of Special Animal and Plant Science, Changchun (China)
Liu Xiaoying, Institute of Special Animal and Plant Science, Changchun (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 作物病害图像分割是利用数字图像处理技术进行病害识别的关键性技术环节之一，现有病害分割方法存在病害区域外部形态特征细节保留程度差和颜色纹理信息丢失等问题。针对上述问题，提出一种基于改进遗传算法的脉冲耦合神经网络分割方法。首先改进遗传算法，以信息熵的加权线性组合作为优化适应度函数用以在每次迭代过程中评价脉冲耦合神经网络对于病害区域的分割效果，通过计算种群适应度方差和适应度均值自适应调整遗传算法的交叉概率和变异概率；然后将改进遗传算法与脉冲耦合神经网络相结合，实现网络连接系数、衰减系数和幅值系数的自动优化调节；最后利用改进遗传脉冲耦合神经网络分割算法，在RGB子空间分别对病害图像进行病害区域分割，将分割结果利用RGB颜色空间子图合并策略实施合并，从而得到最终的图像分割结果。将此算法、最小交叉熵阈值化算法和GA-PCNN算法用于玉米黑瘤粉病彩色图像病害区域分割。结果表明：从主观视觉评测角度，此算法分割效果较好，能够较为细致的呈现病害区域的外部形态特征和较为完好的保留病害区域的颜色纹理特征；从客观量化评测角度，此分割算法在目标区域分割匹配率、错分率和正确率上明显优于最小交叉熵阈值化算法和GA-PCNN算法。

The image segmentation of crop diseases is one of the critical technical aspects of digital image processing technology for disease recognition. This paper presents a pulse coupled neural network model based on improved genetic algorithm. Through weighted linear combination of maximum Shannon entropy and minimum cross-entropy optimization, a fitness function was constructed. Meanwhile, an adaptive genetic algorithm was used to adjust the crossover and mutation probability. Improved genetic algorithm was used to optimize the pulse coupled neural network parameters. Combined with the RGB space subgraph merger strategy, the model has been used to the target for image segmentation of corn melanoma powdery mildew. The experimental results show that the method could better segment the disease regions and set low complexity parameters.

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation and culture of stromal cells and gland epithelial cells of endometrium in pig
猪子宫内膜基质细胞和腺上皮细胞的分离培养

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Chengyue, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Ma Hong, Heilongjiang Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Harbin (China)
Guo Zhenhua, Heilongjiang Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Harbin (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了获得高纯度的猪子宫内膜基质细胞和腺上皮细胞，对猪子宫内膜进行胶原酶消化，分离基质细胞和腺上皮细胞进行体外培养，研究其生长特性。结果表明：猪子宫内膜组织在37℃、通过1g/L胶原酶Ⅰ消化90min可以获得游离的腺体，对腺体进行培养时上皮细胞比例可达70%以上。培养过程中采用差速消化和差速贴壁可以成功分离腺上皮细胞和基质细胞。基质细胞最适贴壁时间为25min，腺上皮为3h。纯化的基质细胞生长迅速，可传5代以上，上皮细胞生长缓慢，并且成片脱落。

In order to obtain high-purity endometrium stroma cells and gland epithelial cells of pig, we cultured the glands from the endometrium by collagenase digestion. The results showed that under 37℃, through 1 g/L collagenaseⅠ digestion for 90 min, pig endometrial tissue could get free glands, and when glands were cultured, epithelial cells ratio reached 70%. The process of cultivation using differential velocity adherents could successfully separate gland epithelial and stromal cells. The adherent for stromal cells was about 25 minutes, and for epithelial cells about 3 hours. Purified stromal cells grew fast, and could pass to more than five generations. Epithelial cells grew slowly, and shed off into pieces.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of 9 different density-tolerant maize inbred lines by SSR markers
9个不同耐密性自交系的SSR标记分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tian Xiaoyan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Center of Biotechnology
Liu Qiang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Center of Biotechnology
Qu Jing, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Center of Biotechnology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用30对SSR引物对存在耐密性差异的9个玉米自交系进行SSR标记分析。结果表明：15对SSR引物在9个自交系间检测到54个等位基因变异，平均每对引物检测到3.6个等位基因变异，多态信息量（PIc）平均为0.56。多态性高的引物有umcl590，phi96100，phi053，phi006，umel705，phil23，phi328175，phill6，umel741，推断在染色体位点1.06，2.00，3.05，5.03，6.07，7.04，7.06，8.03附近可能存在与耐密相关的基因，在7.04附近几率最高。

In this study, 30 pairs of SSR primers were used in 9 maize inbred lines with density-tolerant property difference. The results showed that 54 alleles of the 9 maize inbred lines were detected by using the SSR primers. The mean value of gene alleles per locus is 3.6 and the average PIC is 0.56. SSR primers umc1590, phi96100, phi053, phi006, umcl705, phil23, phi328175, phill6 and umc1741 have high polymorphism, inferring that there may be high density-tolerant genes near chromosome locis of 1.06, 2.00, 3.05, 5.03, 6.07, 7.04, 7.06, 8.03, and the chances of near 7.04 is the highest.

ags:resource.dc:title: Genetic analysis of seed coat color of B. rapa L. ssp. pekinensis and B. rapa L. ssp. dichotoma
白菜和白菜型油菜种皮颜色遗传分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Yugang, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), Department of Horticulture
Lu Xixi, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), Department of Horticulture
Liu Yating, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), Department of Horticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 试验以种皮颜色为褐色的白菜自交系（P1）和种皮颜色为黄色的欧洲白菜型油莱自交系（P2）杂交及获得的6个基本世代（P1、P2、F1、B1、B2、F2）为材料，采用人为目测分级法和色差计法测定种皮颜色，并应用主基因＋多基因混合模型对其进行了遗传分析。结果表明：种皮颜色主要受2对加性-显性-上位性主基因控制（E或E-1），二对主基因间加性效应、显性效应差别较大且存在明显的交互作用。各分离世代的多基因遗传率均较低（0～3.36%），除B1世代外（40.63%～55.09%），各分离世代均表现较高的主基因遗传率（95.86%-97.87%），对种皮颜色性状的改良应以主基因为主，适于早期选择。

The mixed major-gene plus polygene inheritance model was used to analyze the inheritance of seed coat color in B. rapa L. ssp. pekinensis and B. rapa L. ssp. dichotoma with six generations of PI (brown) and Pz (yellow) and their F1, BI, B2 and F2. The phenotypic score was measured by visual observation and portable colormeter CR-400. The results show that the seed coat color traits were controlled mainly by two major genes with additive-dominance-epistatic effects (E or E-1 model). Significant difference existed between additive and dominance effects of the two major genes, and significant interaction inside the two major genes was also detected. The polygene heritability is lower (0 - 3.36%), and the heritability of the two major genes is greater in all segregating populations (95.86% - 97.87%) except in B1 generation (40.63% - 55.09%). This implies that in the genetic improvement of seed coat color, major gene is a main factor. It is fit for early selection.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of duration of greenhouse soil on growth and development of tomato
不同连作年限的设施土壤对番茄生长发育的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Qiuyue, Mianyang Normal University, Mianyang (China)
Zhang Guangchen, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Horticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探讨不同连作年限的设施土壤对作物的影响，以长春、白城两地不同种植年限的设施土壤为试验对象，运用盆栽试验方法，研究并分析了不同连作年限的设施土壤对番茄叶片相对电导率、丙地醛（MDA）、过氧化物酶（POD）、超氧化物歧化酶（SOD）等生理指标影响的规律。结果表明：随着连作年限的增加，供试番茄植株体内相对电导率、MDA、POD、SOD含量呈增加的趋势，产量和品质下降，并且两地区的设施土壤比较，白城地区的设施土壤对番茄植株的伤害比长春地区的设施土壤严重。

To explore the effects of greenhouse soil with different continuous cropping years on crops, having greenhouse soil with different planting years in Changchun and Baicheng as objects, we studied the effects of greenhouse soil of different continuous cropping years on relative conductivity, malonaldehyde, peroxidase and superoxide dismutase (SOD) by pot experiment method. The results show that relative conductivity, malonaldehyde, peroxidase and SOD in tested tomato have an increasing trend while yield and quality have a decreasing trend with the increase of continuous cropping years. In addition, the damage from greenhouse soil to tomato in Baicheng is more serious than that in Changchun.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comprehensive evaluation of soil heavy metal pollution in mine based on the analysis of three-dimensional distribution characteristics
基于三维空间分布特征分析的矿区土壤重金属污染的综合评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Xin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Information and Technology
Zhu Yongjuan, Changchun Municipal Environmental Monitioring Center, Changchun (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在单一污染源的矿区，以土壤中4种重金属的含量为评价对象，选用Maflab为制图工具，分别绘制出4种元素含量的三维图像。在进行土壤重金属污染的综合评价时，为减少主观赋权而引起的偏差，采用熵权系数法，即利用信息论中熵的理论来进行权重的设定，得到各个测试点的综合评价指标，并将这些评价指标值与各等级的评价值进行比较和分析，绘制出三维空间分布图像，以全面反映污染情况，有针对性地采取措施综合治理。

In recent years, ecologial and environmental problems are increasingly drawing people’s arrention, and soil heavy metal pollution is one of them. In this study, we consider mapping out the three-dimensional images of four elements respectively in mine of single source of pollution by using the content of 4 heavy metals in soil as evaluation object and matlab as charting tool. In comprehensively evaluating soil heavy metal pollution, to reduce subjective weighting deviation, we selected entropy weight coefficient method for evaluation, that is, used the theory of entropy in information theory for the setting of weights, and got comprehensive evaluation indices of each test site. By comparing and analyzing the evaluation index value and the evaluation value of each grade, we drafted a three-dimensional distribution image, which reflected the pollution more comprehensively and facilitated the formulation of comprehensive control measures.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the SWOT analysis of green agricultural products and marketing countermeasures in Jilin province
吉林省绿色农产品营销SWOT分析与对策

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Yanming, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economics and Management
Zhang Yuejie, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Economics and Management

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 吉林省是我国重要的绿色农产品产地，绿色农产品产业发展到了一定的规模。为了进一步提高绿色农产品产业的竞争能力，吉林省应建立以维护品牌公信力为持续发展核心绿色的农产品营销战略体系。为此，应建立由绿色农产品质量标准体系、质量认证体系、质量监管体系等组成的绿色农产品营销战略组织体系；完善绿色农产品市场体系和生产体系；采取优品优质的产品策略，采用“地理标识＋产品标识”相结合的品牌策略和差异化定价策略，构建多渠道并进的网络化渠道，利用传统和现代媒介并进的广告宣传策略，将吉林省绿色农产品推向全国高端市场和国际市场。

Jilin province is China’s leading producer of green agricultural products. Its green agricultural product industry has been developed to a certain scale. To improve competing capability, it is necessary for Jilin province to set up marketing strategies of green agricultural products. Thus, Jilin province should build specification system, quality certification system, quality supervision and management system. In addition, it’s better for Jilin province to adopt superior quality production strategy, geographical indication strategy and differential pricing strategy, and to construct multi-channel network channels, and make use of the advertising strategy through traditional and modern media.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on extrusion conditions of Flammufina velutipes by twin screw extruder
金针菇渣粉双螺杆挤压膨化工艺

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Shuyan, Changchun University, Changchun (China), Key Laboratory of Agricultural Products Processing
Zhang Lihong, Changchun University, Changchun (China), Key Laboratory of Agricultural Products Processing
Wu Qiong, Changchun University, Changchun (China), Key Laboratory of Agricultural Products Processing

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以金针菇渣粉和玉米糁为原料，采用双螺杆挤压膨化工艺，通过单因素试验和正交试验，研究了螺杆转速、挤压膨化温度、物料含水量、金针菇渣粉添加量对产品膨化度的影响，得出金针菇渣粉最佳挤压膨化工艺为螺杆转速170r／min、挤压膨化温度160℃、物料含水量13%、金针菇渣粉添加量15%。在此工艺条件下，产品的膨化率为10.4%。

The mixture of corn grits and Flammufina velutipes residue screw extrusion technique. Single factor test and orthogonal experiment powder design was extruded with twin methods were applied to analyze the effects of screw speed, extrusion temperature, moisture content, addition of Flammufina re-residue powder on product expansion ratio. The optimal conditions are as follows: screw speed 170 r/min, extrusion temperature 160℃, moisture content 13%, addition of Flammufina velutipes residue powder 15%. Under these conditions, the product of the expansion rate was 10.4%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Quantitative inversion of salinity based on Hyper-spectral data in Songliao plain
利用HJ1A—HSI数据定量反演松辽平原土壤含盐量

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lu Chun, Liaoning Provincial College of Communications, Shenyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以HSI高光谱影像作为数据源，使用FLAASH大气校正模型对HSI影像进行大气校正，获得地表反射率图像。将反射率图像进行多种数学变换后，采用地理信息系统的分析方法，与土壤含盐量的实测值进行偏最小二乘回归分析，定量反演松辽平原土壤盐碱含量。结果表明：HSI高光谱影像的反射率经过倒数（1／R）、一阶微分（R’）变换后，能够显著提高与盐碱土含盐量的相关系数尺2，且相关系数分别达到0.818和0.851，均方根误差分别为0.770和0.694。该文在土壤含盐量的定量反演方面，探索使用了HSI影像作为新的数据源，并为松辽平原土壤盐分含量的精确、定量、快速获取及盐碱化防治等方面提供重要参考。

HSI sensor of HJ1A is the first hyper-spectral image in China. It has high time resolution (96 hours) and fine spectrum (5 nm), which will be widely used in resources, environment, disaster monitoring, etc. However, as a new sensor, application of HSI data is still in the exploratory stage in China. To get surface reflectance of HSI images, atmospheric correction model of FLAASH was used to correct the HSI images. The reflectance after a variety of mathematical transformation was carried on partial least squares regression analysis with the measured values of soil salinity to retrieve the salinity in Songliao plain using the analysis method of GIS. The results show that, reflectance of HSI hyper-spectral images after the countdown and the first-order differential transform can significantly improve the correlation coefficient with salinity of saline-alkali soil. The correlation coefficient was 0.818 and 0.851. The Root-Mean-Square Error was 0.770 and 0.694. HSI images were used as new data source in quantitative inversion of soil salinity, which has provided significant reference for getting salinity precisely, quantitatively, quickly and salinization control in Songliao plain.

ags:resource.dc:title: Selection report of the new rice variety, Jilong 868
水稻新品种“吉隆868”选育报告

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ma Lingxiao, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Li Yanzhi, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Lei Chuang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 水稻新品种“吉隆868”是以“吉农大3号”为母本、“五龙93—8”为父本，经人工有性杂交，采用系谱法选育而成。预备试验全省5个试验点，平均产量8722.3 kg/hm2，比对照“通35”增产6.1%。2年区域试验平均产量8800.4kg/hm2，比对照“通35”增产5.4%。1年生产试验平均产量9335.1kg/hm2，比对照“通35”增产6.0%。该品种于2012年通过吉林省农作物品种审定委员会审定，适宜吉林省长春、吉林、松原、四平、通化、延边、辽源等中晚熟稻区种植。

After years of selection, a rice variety, jilong 868, has been obtained from the artifical sexual crossing between jinongda 3 (female) and wulong 93-8 (male) using pedigree technique. There are 5 preliminary experimental sites in Jilin province and its average yield is 8 722.3 kg/hm2, 6.1% higher than the control variety (tong 35). In 2-year regional trials, its yield was 8 800.4 kg/hm2, 5.4% higher than the control variety (tong 35). In 1-year productive trials, its yield was 9 335.1 kg/hm2, 6.0% higher than the control variety (tong 35). Jilong 868 was examined and approved by Jilin Evaluation Committee of Crop Variety in 2012. It suits to be planted in the middle-late maturing regions of Changchun, Jilin, Songyuan, Siping, Tonghua, Yanbian, Liaoyuan, etc..

ags:resource.dc:title: Immunolocalization of AQP5 in mice marrow-derived mesenchymal stem cells
水通道蛋白AQP5在小鼠骨髓间充质干细胞中的免疫定位

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Mingtang, Changchun University of Science and Technology, Changchun (China), School of Life Science and Technology
Wang Oingshuang, Changchun University of Science and Technology, Changchun (China), School of Life Science and Technology
Ji Wei, Changchun University of Science and Technology, Changchun (China), School of Life Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 水通道蛋白家族是由能够转运水和小的溶质分子透过细胞膜的膜蛋白分子构成。AQP5属于水选择性通道，其在机体组织内的表达非常广泛。间充质干细胞主要来源于骨髓和脂肪组织，能够诱导分化成间充质组织中的各类细胞。采用PCR、免疫印迹和免疫荧光技术分析了水通道蛋白AQP5在小鼠骨髓间充质干细胞中的表达情况。结果表明：AQP5在RNA和蛋白质水平上都有表达，并且与CD90，CD44在小鼠骨髓间充质干细胞膜上共表达。

The aquaporin (AQP) family consists of a number of small integral membrane proteins that transport water and small solutes across the membrane. Recent reports demonstrated that AQP5 is expressed in various cells. However, its expression in mesenchymal stem cells have not been investigated. Therefore, we examined whether AQP5 could express in mice marrow-derived mesenchymal stem cells by immunofluorescence and immunoblotting analyses. The result show that AQP5 expresses in the membrane of marrow-derived mesenchymal stem cells. Accordingly, AQP5 may play an important role in the differentiation of marrow-derived mesenchymal stem cells.

ags:resource.dc:title: Apoptosis mechanism of SMMC-7721 cells induced by polysaccharides from the liquid submerged fermentation of Hericium caput-medusae
小刺猴头液体深层发酵浸膏多糖诱导SMMC-7721细胞凋亡的机制

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Ziyue, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences
Liu Xiaola, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences
Li Mu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), School of Life Sciences

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 用荧光染色观察小刺猴头菌液体深层发酵浸膏多糖（HFP）对SMMC-7721细胞核形变化的影响；用流式细胞仪研究HFP对SMMC-7721细胞的诱导凋亡作用和细胞周期的影响，并通过JC-1荧光染色法观察线粒体膜电位变化和ELISA法检测Caspase-9和Caspase-3活性未探讨HFP诱导人肝癌细胞SMMC-7721凋亡作用的机制。结果表明：不同浓度的I-IFP作用24h后，SMMC-7721细胞呈现典型细胞凋亡特征，细胞周期阻滞于G2／M期，同时引起线粒体膜电位降低，而Caspase-9和Caspase-3活性增高。说明HFP具有明显的诱导SMMC-7721细胞凋亡作用，其机制与引起细胞周期阻滞有关，而且线粒体途径也是其诱导肿瘤细胞凋亡的机制之一。

To explore the apoptosis mechanism of SMMC-7721 cell induced by polysaccharides from the liquid submerged fermentation extract of Hericium caput-medusae, the fluorescent microscope was utilized to observe the morphological changes of apoptosis. The effects of induced apoptosis and cell cycle were studied with flow cytometry. The method of JC-1 fluorescent staining was utilized to observe the changes of mitochondrial membrane potential and the activity of Caspase-9 and Caspase-3 was determined by ELISA assay. The results showed that typical morphological changes of apoptosis in SMMC-7721 cancer cells treated with HFP after 24 h could be observed with the fluorescent microscope. By flow cytometry analysis, cells were blocked in G2/M phase and mitochondrial membrane potential was declined, but the activity of Caspase-9 and Caspase-3 increased. HFP could markedly induce apoptosis in SMMC-7721 hepatocellular cancer cells. The mechanism might be not only related to cell cycle arrest but also related to mitoc-hondrial pathway.

ags:resource.dc:title: Bacterial identification of Botrytis cinerea and Alternaria panax from a antagonized ginseng strain
一株拮抗人参灰霉病菌和黑斑病菌的细菌鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Pengxiang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science
Wang Xin, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Life Science
Liu Ruijun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), Department of Discipline Construction

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用梯度稀释法从人参种植地土壤中分离出1株对人参灰霉病和黑斑病病原菌均有良好抑制作用的菌株JL2011。该菌株在天然固体培养基中菌落呈浅黄色，隆起，黏稠状，表面湿润光滑。对该菌株进行16S序列测定。结果表明：16S扩增片段大小为1428bp；MEGA4.0软件对序列进行比较分析，鉴定出所分离菌株为多粘芽孢杆菌（Paenibacillus polymyxa），同源性达到99%。

Bacterial strain JL2011 was isolated from the soil of ginseng plantations with gradient dilution method, which can inhibit the growth of Botrytis cinerea and Alternaria panax from ginseng. Its colony was yellowish, bulged, ropinessed and its surface was wet and smooth on the natural solid medium. The length of 16S fragment was 1 428 bp. Based on the comparative analysis of sequences with software MEGA4.0, this strain was identified as Paenibacillus polymyxa, and the homology was up to 99%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Application of nest PCR - DGGE in analysis and diagnosis of pathogenic bacteria in cows with postpartum acute endometritis
应用套式PCR-DGGE分析诊断奶牛产后急性子宫内膜炎致病菌

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Lixiang, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Veterinary Medicine
Song Xiaojing, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Veterinary Medicine
Guo Mengyao, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Veterinary Medicine

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过对子宫内膜炎患牛子宫内致病菌进行分离鉴定，探讨奶牛急性子宫内膜炎的主要致病菌，建立一种快速诊断子宫内膜炎致病菌的方法，为临床治疗提供指导及依据。选用产后7～10d急性脓性子宫内膜炎患牛30头，通过套式PCR-DGGE分析细菌16SrDNA序列，检测子宫内致病菌感染情况，确定治病菌种类，并以传统的致病菌分离培养作为对照。结果表明：通过套式PCR-DGGE分析细菌16SrDNA序列，大肠杆菌感染率最高，其次是金黄色葡萄球菌、绿脓杆菌、粪肠球菌和肺炎克雷伯菌，此外还有停乳链球菌、无乳链球菌、多杀巴氏杆菌、蜡样芽孢杆菌。该病78%为混合感染，主要由大肠杆菌、金黄色葡萄球菌和绿脓杆菌组成。奶牛产后急性子宫内膜炎主要致病菌为大肠杆菌．混合感染占有较大比例。

This experiment was conducted to study the pathogenic bacteria in the uterus of cows which have endometritis. It was to establish a rapid method of detecting 16S rDNA by nest PCR-DGGE, suitable for further application in pathogenic diagnosis of endometritis. Thirty cows with endometritis were isolated, all of which were in postpartum 7 - 10 d. Pathogenic bacteria infected in uterus were detected and the type of bacteria were identified by nest PCR-DGGE with 16S rDNA. Isolation and culture of pathogenic bacteria were a control method. The analysis of 16S rDNA by nest PCR-DGGE showed that the infection rate of Escherichia Coli was the highest. The following was Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Enterococcus faecalis and Klebsiella pneumonia. In addition, the Streptococcus dysgalactiae, Streptococcus agalactiae, Pasteurella mtdtocida and Bacillus cereus were also found. The result showed that 78% of endometritis was mixed infection, mainly infected by Escherichia Coli, Staphylococcus aureus and Pseudomonas aeruginosa. These results indicated that the Escherichia Coli was the major pathogenic bacteria in cattle endometritis, and most of the infections were mixed infection. The nest PCR-DGGE was better than the method of isolation and culture in detecting the type of bacteria with 16S rDNA. This method was suitable for further application in the diagnosis.

ags:resource.dc:title: Resistance measurement and simulation analysis of circular arc sub-soiling shovel
圆弧形深松铲的阻力测试与仿真分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chu Lidong, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Engineering
Yuan Jun, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Engineering
Zheng Zhong, Jilin University, Changchun (China), College of Automotive Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 结合课题组设计的新型圆弧形深松铲，利用八角环传感器，对圆弧形深松铲与土壤作用力在水平和垂直方向的分力进行了测定；利用测试数据在ANSYS Workbench软件对弧形深松铲进行了建模与结构静力分析，得到在工作载荷下弧形深松铲的应力分布，其中最大应力主要集中在铲柄与机架连接处，以及铲刃上部，最大应力值为201.6MPa，最大位移位于铲尖部分，其值为1.3877mm。

Octagonal ring sensor was used to measure the component force of the circular arc sub-soiling shovel designed by the project group and soil force along horizontal direction and vertical direction; the measured data of the force were used to analyze the modeling and structure static force of the circular arc sub-soiling shovel with ANSYS Workbench software and the stress distribution of the circular arc sub-soiling shovel under working load was obtained. The results show that the maximum stress mainly focused on shovel shaft and frame joint and upper shovel edge, the value of which was 201.6 MPa. The maximum displacement was located on the tine point, the value of which was 1.387 7 mm. The simulation results provide foundation for further design of circular arc sub-soiling shovel.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comparative studies on evolved structure of Salix matsudana Koidz under two different ecological habitats
2种不同生境下旱柳结构的比较

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Zhanwu, Jilin Normal University, Siping (China), School of Life Science
Lu Jingmei, Northeast Normal University, Changchun (China), School of Life Science
Liu Qiang, Jilin Normal University, Siping (China), School of Life Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 应用石蜡切片和光学显微镜技术，对中生和盐生环境下生长的旱柳（Salix matsudana Koidz）演化结构进行了比较研究。结果发现：与中生环境相比，盐生环境下生长的旱柳，内部结构逐渐发生了改变。演化出大量的通气组织，角质层明显加厚，叶肉薄壁组织也出现了增厚现象，并且在旱柳的茎和叶肉中出现许多方晶和簇状晶体等，这些变化都是植物为了适应盐碱环境而发生的结构演化。

The evolved structure of Salix matsudana Koidz under different ecological habitats was studied using manual slicing and optical microscopy techniques. The results were as follows: compared with that of Salix matsudana Koidz under neutral habitat, the internal structure of Salix matsudana Koidz under salinity habitat was gradually changed. Many aerenchyma were formed, the stratum corueum and Mesophyll parenchyma became thicker, however, many cubic crystal and cluster crystal were found, the emergence of these changes was ascribed to the structural development of plant in order to adapt to the salinity habitat.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research on arthropod community of plantation canopy in Larix olgensis Henry
长白落叶松人工纯林冠层节肢动物群落研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Bai Zonglei, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Wang Zhiming, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Qiu Cheng, Forestry Bureau of Dunhua City, Dunhua (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了解长白山林区落叶松人工林节肢动物的发生规律，采用随机取样的方法，调查研究了吉林省敦化市落叶松人工林冠层的节肢动物。结果表明：落叶松人工林内落叶松球蚜和落叶松鞘蛾发生量较大；节肢动物发生量主要集中在6、7月份，8月份节肢动物群落数量和种类开始下降；面积大的林分内节肢动物群落相对较丰富，稳定性高；落叶松冠层下部节肢动物群落数量整体上高于中层和上层。

In order to find out the occurrence regularity of arthropods community on plantation of Larix olgensis Henry in Changbai mountain, we used a randomly sampling method to study the arthropods on the plantation canopy of Larix olgensis Henry in Duhua city, Jilin province. The results showed that the main species in the plots were Adelges laricis Vallot and Coleophora obducta (Meyrick); arthropod community mainly appeared in June and July, and it began to decline in August. Arthropod community of the plots of a larger area was richer and more stable than the smaller one. The number of arthropod on lower-level branch was greater than middle-level and upper-level branch.

ags:resource.dc:title: Temperature and humidity characteristics of Vaccinium Uliginosum community in Changbai mountain
长白山笃斯越桔群落越冬期温湿度特征研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Fengzhang, Dalian University, Dalian (China), Institute of Modem Agricultural Research
Wang Hexin, Dalian University, Dalian (China), Institute of Modem Agricultural Research
Chen Yingmin, Dalian University, Dalian (China), Institute of Modem Agricultural Research

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 于2011年10月至2012年4月对长白山2种落叶松林内笃斯越桔群落的大气温度、空气相对湿度和土壤温度进行了测定。结果表明：长白山笃斯越桔群落越冬期长达约7个月，最寒冷的1月份平均温度约为-30℃，极端低温达到-40℃以下；越冬期相对湿度较低、空气干燥，尤其是仲冬至早春季节湿度偏低；越冬期土壤上层温度较低且变幅较大，下层较高且变幅较小，20cm土层的极端低温约为-15℃。

In October of 2011 to April of 2012, air temperature, air relative humidity and soil temperature of Vaccinium uliginosum community were measured in two kinds of Larix olgensis forest of Changbai mountain. The results indicated that: The wintering time was about seven months long, the average temperature and extremely low temperature were about -30℃ and -40℃, respectively; the relative humidity was low, and air was dry in wintering period, especially lower in midwinter to early spring; the variety of soil temperature was lower, and amplitude was greater on upper layer, higher and less on lower layer, extremely low temperature was about-15℃ in 20 cm soil layer.

ags:resource.dc:title: A review of researches on healthy pig raising mode and facilities and equipment
健康养猪模式及设施设备研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yuan Yueming, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Engineering and Technology
Li Xiwu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Engineering and Technology
Chen Limei, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Engineering and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 越来越多的人开始关注养猪业的安全和可持续发展及畜牧业转型期如何养猪的问题，如何健康养猪，其生产模式及设施设备已成为研究的焦点。文中就健康养猪相关国内外文献进行了分析，着重阐述了当前国内外健康养猪模式、饲养工艺模式、环境控制技术、自动化饲喂系统、无害化消毒技术、猪舍设施开发、福利化设施技术等相关设施与设备的研究与应用进展情况。指出健康养猪是一个系统工程，是我国畜牧养殖产业实现现代化的必然趋势。

More and more people begin to pay attention to safety and sustainable development of pig industry and ways of pig raising in animal husbandry transition period, and focuses of the researches are raising, production mode and facilities and equipment of healthy pigs. Related literature both at home and abroad was analyzed. Researches and application progress of the current domestic and international healthy pig raising modes, raising process, environmental control technology, automatic feeding system, harmless disinfection technique, piggery facilities development, welfare facilities technology and other related facilities and equipment were emphatically elaborated, it was pointed out that healthy pig raising is a systems engineering and modernization of livestock breeding industry in China is a natural trend.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of continuous cropping stress on defense enzyme activity and MDA content of peanut leaves
连作胁迫对花生叶片防御酶活性及丙二醛含量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Yuqian, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Land and Environment
Han Xiaori, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Land and Environment
Yang Jinfeng, Shenyang Agricultural University, Shenyang (China), College of Land and Environment

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以花生品种“阜花12”为供试材料，选取正茬和连作3年2个处理，分析了花生在连作条件下防御酶系活性以及膜脂过氧化产物含量的变化规律。结果表明：花生连作后，叶片的SOD活性和MDA含量在整个生育期内均高于正茬；叶片的PPO和POD活性在整个生育期内总体上呈现升高趋势，但在苗期时连作3年的酶活性小于正茬的花生处理；叶片的CAT活性在整个生育期内总体上呈现下降趋势，仅在成熟期时连作3年的酶活性大于正茬；叶片的PAL活性在整个生育期内变化规律不一致，苗期和花针期时，连作3年的酶活性大于正茬，结英期和成熟期时，连作3年的酶活性小于正茬。连作改变了花生叶片防御酶活性和MDA含量。

Arachis hypogaea L. cv Fuhua 12 was used to investigate the dynamics of defense enzyme activity and membrane lipid peroxidation under different planting years through selecting the two treatments of 1 - year continuous cropping and 3 - year continuous cropping. The results showed that leaf SOD activity and MDA content of peanut under 3 - year continuous cropping were higher than under 1 - year continuous cropping in the whole growth period. Leaf PPO and POD activity generally increased in the whole growth period, but leaf activity under 3 - year continuous cropping was lower than under 1 - year continuous cropping in seedling stage. Leaf CAT activity generally decreased in the whole growth period, but leaf activity under 3 - year continuous cropping was higher than under 1 - year continuous cropping in maturing stage. Leaf PAL activity dynamics was not consistent, and activity under 3 - year continuous cropping was higher than under 1 - year continuous cropping in seedling and blossom stages and lower than the other in pot-setting and maturing stages. Continuous cropping changed the defense enzyme activity and MDA content peanut leaves.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on extraction process of free amino acids from Smilacina japonica
鹿药游离氨基酸提取工艺

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhu Yuting, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Resources and Environment
Liu Junbo, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Resources and Environment
Tang Shanshan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Resources and Environment

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以鹿药为试验材料，采用超声波辅助浸提法，通过单因素试验和正交试验，分别对料液比、提取时间、提取温度及超声功率等因素进行考察，优选鹿药游离氨基酸的最佳提取工艺条件。同时，利用氨基酸自动分析仪对鹿药游离氨基酸进行组分及含量测定分析。结果表明：料液比1:30、提取时间30min、提取温度40℃、超声功率80w，超声提取鹿药游离氨基酸的提取率最高。鹿药由16种不同氨基酸组成，其中必需氨基酸占总氨基酸含量的47.93%。料液比对游离氨基酸提取率影响较显著，且游离氨基酸含量随鹿药采收期的延长呈下降趋势。

To optimize the extraction technology for free amino acids in Smilacina japonica, taking Smilacina japonica as raw materials, the effects of material-liquid ratio, extraction time, extraction temperature and ultrasonic power on extraction rate of free amino acids from Smilacina japonica were studied by single factor experiment and orthogonal test. At the same time, composition and content of free amino acids in Smilacina japonica were determined and analyzed by automatic amino acid analyzer. The results showed that the optimum extraction conditions were as follows: material-liquid ratio 1:30, extraction time 30 rain, extraction temperature 40℃ and ultrasonic power 80 W, and the extraction ratio of free amino acids with ultrasonic extraction was the highest. Smilacina japonica is composed of 16 kinds of amino acids, among which the essential amino acids account for 47.93% of total amino acids. The results also indicated that material-liquid ratio had a significant effect on the extraction rate of free amino acids and the content of free amino acids decreased with the extension of harvesting time. These primary research results provide credible foundation for utilization of Smilacina japonica.

ags:resource.dc:title: Selection and breeding of the new rice variety, Jinongda 878
水稻新品种“吉农大878”选育与栽培技术

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wei Yifan, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Ma Jian, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Wang Yingpei, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 水稻新品种“吉农大878”是以“吉农大7号”为母本、“五优93—8”为父本，经人工有性杂交，采用系谱法选育而成。2年区域试验平均产量8745.4kg／hm2，比对照品种“秋光”增产4.6%，1年生产试验平均产量8760.0kg／hm2，比对照“秋光”增产6.0%。水稻新品种“吉农大878”具有优质、高产、抗逆性强、适应性广等优点，于2013年1月通过吉林省农作物品种审定委员会审定。该品种适于吉林省的四平、吉林、长春、松原等晚熟稻区种植。

After years of selection, a rice variety, jinongda 878, has been obtained from the artifical sexual crossing between jinongda 7 (female) and wuyou 93-8 (male) using pedigree technique. In 2 - year regional trials, its yield was 8 745.4 kg/hm2, 4.6% higher than the control variety (qiuguang). In 1 - year productive triaJs, its yield was 8 760.0 kg/hm2, 6.0% higher than the control variety (qiuguang). Jinongda 878 was examined and approved by Jilin Evaluation Committee of Crop Variety in January 2013. It suits to be planted in the late maturing regions of Siping, Jilin, Changchun, Songyuan, etc..

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on the rhythm of insect community in suction trapping
吸虫塔内昆虫群落日节律研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Qiang, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Gongzhuling (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Gao Yuebo, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Gongzhuling (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Zhang Wei, Jilin Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Gongzhuling (China), Institute of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用吸虫塔内昆虫分时段取样的方法，利用物种丰富度和物种数的时序动态变化研究了不同昆虫类群在吸虫塔内的活动节律。采集的昆虫分属7目31科，共47种。研究结果表明：各类昆虫具有明显的活动日节律，同时发现蚜虫类昆虫夜间上塔数量极少，因此提出吸虫塔科学运行时间段应为06:00～18:00，文中讨论了吸虫塔对小型昆虫的监测潜力，并对吸虫塔在害虫监测预警应用方面的前景进行了展望。

We used sub-time sampling method to investigate insect community, and sequential dynamics of species richness and insect number to study the rhythm of different insect groups in suction trapping. All captured insects belong to 47 species, 31 families of 7 orders. The results indicated that different insect groups showed obvious activity rhythm during the whole day and few aphids were captured by suction trapping at nighttime. We suggested that the scientific run time of suction trapping should be from 06:00 (dawn) to 18:00 (dusk). We discussed the monitoring potentiality of suction trapping on smaller flight insects and the application prospect of suction trapping in forecasting insect pests.

ags:resource.dc:title: Genetic analysis of ear traits of exotic and improved maize inbred lines
玉米外引自交系及改良系穗部性状的遗传分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Qi, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Li Jizhu, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy
Yang Weiguang, Jilin Agricultural University, Changchun (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以7个外引玉米自交系及改良系和6个国内骨干自交系按照NCⅡ设计组配42个杂交组合，对其8个主要穗部性状进行了遗传分析。结果表明：7923、6WC、J1782的一般配合力较高，是综合性状较好的自交系。配合力与产量相关分析结果表明：一般配合力比特殊配合力相关明显，在玉米育种实践中应重视对性状一般配合力的选择。特殊配合力和杂种优势分析结果表明：7923×8F349，7923×丹340等9个组合为高产杂交组合。遗传力分析结果表明：穗长、穗粗和穗行数的广义遗传力和狭义遗传力均较大，可早代选择；子粒长、秃尖长、出子率、百粒重的狭义遗传力相对较低，不应早代选择。

Seven exotic and improved maize inbred lines were crossed with six elite Chinese inbred lines and 42 combinations were produced according to NC II design. Eight main ear traits were genetically analyzed. The results showed that inbred lines 7923, 6WC and J1782 had high combining ability, which were good lines; combining ability and yield correlation analysis showed that in maize breeding, GCA was more important than SCA; we selected 7 high-yield combinations through heterosis analysis, like 7923 x 8-F349; broad heritability and narrow heritability of ear length, ear diameter and ear row number were high, so they could be selected in early generation; narrow heritability of kernel length, length of bare tip, seed ratio and hundred-grain weight was low, and they are easy to be impacted by environment, so they should not be selected in early generation.

ags:resource.dc:title: Primary study on optimal fertilizer effectiveness of algae paste anaerobic fermentation
藻浆厌氧发酵最佳肥效条件初步研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ye Changbing, Yuxi Normal University, Yuxi (China), College of Resources and Environment
Li Wenchao, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Nanjing (China), Nanjing Institute of Geography and Limnology
Zhao Ke, Harbin Institute of Technology, Harbin (China), College of Municipal and Environmental Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 设计了5个规模相同厌氧发酵小试试验装置，进行为期8个月的最佳肥效试验研究。动态对比试验研究结果表明，藻浆厌氧发酵作为有机肥肥效最佳运行条件包括藻浆上浮比为100%、发酵温度为24℃、pH为7.0-8.0等。接种厌氧发酵藻泥对藻浆厌氧发酵肥效无显著性影响，但可大大加快藻浆厌氧发酵的速率。接种厌氧发酵藻泥量与藻浆量比为1:10时，可将藻浆厌氧发酵时间缩短至7d。在上述试验条件下，经过7d的厌氧发酵，藻浆滤后液体中氨氮、有效磷质量浓度至少可达1028，186mg／L。

To investigate the operation parameters of algae paste anaerobic fermentation with optimal fertilizer effectiveness, five laboratory-scale reactors were designed to treat algae paste. The results of the 8 - month trial for optimal fertilizer effectiveness indicated that the optimal fertilizer effectiveness would be realized with the floating ratio of 100%, temperature of 24℃ and pH of 7.0 - 8.0. The inoculation fermentation algae sludge had significant effect on anaerobic fermentation speed, but not on fertilizer effectiveness. Under the condition that fermentation algae sludge was inoculated into reactor at inoculation fermentation algae sludge rate being 1:10, the anaerobic fermentation duration was shortened to 7 d. Under these conditions, the NH4-N and available phosphorus concentrations in algae liquid filtered from algae sludge were at least 1 028 mg/L and 186 mg/L when the anaerobic fermentation lasted 7 d.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research advances in microbial mechanism of antimony
微生物对锑的代谢机制研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Mingshun, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Life Science and Technology
Li Jie, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Life Science and Technology
Wang Gejiao, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Life Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 锑（Sb）是一种自然界普遍存在的剧毒重金属，随着工业生产的日趋发展，我国部分地区土壤、水体及农产品受到严重的锑污染。作为环境污染物，锑中毒会导致人类心肌衰竭，肝坏死等疾病。自然界中的某些生物，特别是微生物却可以在极高锑浓度下生长，甚至可以利用这种元素作为能源物质，因此，微生物在锑的地球物质循环中起着重要的作用。研究生物对锑的代谢机制，对于保护环境与人体健康具有重要的现实意义。本文对锑在环境中的分布、污染状况、微生物对锑的代谢以及生物修复等方面的研究现状进行了综述。同时建议今后应加强以下三方面的研究：（1）筛选更多抗锑微生物或氧化锑的微生物；（2）发掘更多锑抗性基因或氧化基因；（3）开发锑污染土壤及水体的微生物修复技术。

Antimony (Sb) is a highly toxic heavy metal which wide spreadly exists in nature. With the increasing development of industry, the soil, water and agricultural products are severely polluted by antimony in some regions of our country. As an environmental pollutant, antimony poisoning can lead to heart failure, human diseases such as liver necrosis. Some organisms in nature, especially the microorganisms can grow in the high concentration of antimony, and can even use the element as an energy material, so the microorganisms play an important role in the cycle of earth’s materials. Study on metabolic mechanism of antimony has important practical significance to protect environment and human health. This study reviewed the researches of Sb distribution in the environment, the pollution status, microbial metabolism of antimony and bioremediation. At the same time it suggests that future researches should strengthen the following three aspects: (1) isolating more antimony resistance or antimony oxidizing microorganisms; (2) identifying more antimony resistant or oxidizing genes; (3) exploring microbial techniques to remediate Sb contaminated soil and water.

ags:resource.dc:title: Impact of transgenic Bt gene rice to Chilo suppressalis(Walker) larvae and arthropod community under field conditions
转基因抗虫水稻对二化螟幼虫和田间节肢动物群落的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Xueliang, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Yao Yingjuan, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Institute of Plant Protection
Chen Dazhou, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Institute of Rice Research
