dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过室内和网室以及田间调查评价了转Bt基因水稻材料对二化螟幼虫的抗性，分析了转基因抗虫水稻对节肢动物群落结构和功能团优势度的影响。结果表明：转Bt基因水稻对二化螟幼虫致死率在90%以上，显著高于对照品种；转Bt基因水稻田间二化螟幼虫发生和危害情况均低于对照稻田，转Bt基因水稻田间节肢动物群落结构物种数、优势集中度、香农指数和均匀性指数与对照相比，均无显著差异；转Bt基因水稻田间节肢动物5类功能团的优势度与对照稻田均无显著差异。由此可见，转Bt基因水稻对其靶标害虫具有高抗作用，且对田间节肢动物群落结构和功能团的优势度均无明显不利影响。

The resistance to Chilo suppressalis (Walker) larvae and impact on arthropod community of a transgenic Bt gene rice was evaluated under both laboratory and field conditions. The results showed that the mortality of transgenic Bt gene rice against C. suppressalis larvae was more than 90% and significantly higher than the control rice. Both the occurrence and damage of C. suppressalis larvae in transgenic Bt gene rice plots were lower than those of the control rice plots. Compared with the control rice plots, there were no significant differences in community indices such as species richness, dominance index, Shannon-Wiener diversity index and evenness index in transgenic Bt gene rice plots. Moreover, there were no significant differences in the five guilds dominance in the transgenic Bt gene rice plots and the control rice plots. It was apparent that the transgenic Bt gene rice had high resistance to its target pests and no significant adverse impact on the arthropod community structure and guild dominance under the field conditions.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of three different crops treated with different fertilizers on soil enzyme activity and the residual Cd content in the Cd contaminated soil
不同肥料不同作物对Cd污染土壤中酶活性及Cd含量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Tao, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Resource and Environment
Cheng Hongyan, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Resource and Environment
Wang Xiaoju, Center for Environmental Science in Saitama, Saitama (Japan)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以玉米、蓖麻、向日葵为供试材料，采用盆栽试验探讨在1 mg/kg Cd胁迫下，不同施肥条件下3种作物对土壤4种酶活性及重金属Cd含量的影响。结果表明，3种作物中，玉米对Cd污染土壤修复效果最好。施用菌肥和腐植酸均可减少土壤中的Cd含量，和CK比较，Cd含量降低了1.16%～10.33%。施用肥料后，土壤中脲酶活性较CK土壤提高了8.042%～350.429%，蔗糖酶活性较CK土壤提高了7.998%～39.885%，碱性磷酸酶活性较CK土壤提高了2.809%～13.999%，过氧化氢酶活性较CK土壤提高了9.333%～35.163%。施用菌肥和腐植酸可显著提高土壤的酶活性。

Using the maize, castor, and sunflower as materials, the present pot experiments were conducted to study the influence of different plants applied with different fertilizers on the soil enzyme activity and residual Cd content in the soil pre-treated with Cd at 1 mg/kg. The results showed that the maize was the most effective plant to reduce the Cd contaminant in the soil among three different types of crops. Employing the humic acid and bacterial manure could decrease the content of Cd at the range of 1.16% to 10.33%, compared with the control treatment. Four different enzyme activities in fertilizer treated soil, including the urease activity, invertase acticity, alkaline phosphates activity, and catalase activity were increased from 8.042% to 350.429%, 7.998% to 39.885%, 2.809% to 13.999%, and 9.333% to 35.163%, respectively, compared with the control group.

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation and identification of Lactobacillus strains from Tibetan kefir
藏灵菇发酵乳中乳杆菌的分离与鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cheng Feier, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Zhang Miaoqing, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Yu Xiaomin, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Food Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 从藏灵菇发酵乳中分离益生乳杆菌，研究其生理生化特性，为功能性乳制品的开发提供优良菌种。先用乳酸菌分离培养基MRS从藏灵菇发酵牛乳中分离得到乳酸菌,再分离纯化出乳杆菌，并对分离的乳杆菌进行生理、生化鉴定，研究其生长特性。结果表明，用MRS培养基从藏灵菇发酵牛乳中共分离出乳杆菌菌株6株，通过生理生化试验确定这6抹分别为：2株发酵乳杆菌、2株嗜酸乳杆菌和2株短乳杆菌。将分离出的菌发酵鲜牛乳，在品尝过程中发现口感较酸，推断其有很强的产酸能力。

To provide excellent strains for the development of functional dairy milk products, probiotic I. actobacilli strains were isolated and identified from Tibetan kefir fermented milk, and the physiological and biochemical characteristics were studied. In this research, first step was to separate lactic acid bacteria from Tibetan Kefir fermented milk with MRS medium, then to purify Lactobacilli strains, and finally to identify their physiological and biochemical characteristics, as well as the growth characteristics of obtained strains. The results showed that six strains of lactobacillus were separated from Tibetan kefir fermented milk by MRS medium, which were determined by physiological and bio-chemical experiments as two lactobacillus brevi strains, two lactobacillus fermentum strains and two lactobacillus acidophilus strains. Those strains were used to ferment fresh milk, and high acid productive ability was observed.

ags:resource.dc:title: Determination of mineral elements in red jujube with laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy
基于激光诱导击穿光谱法测定红枣果实中的矿质元素含量

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Rui, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Arts and Sciences
Wang Xinyue, SIPO, Beijing (China), Examination Cooperation Center of the Patent Office

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了找到一种对农产品中矿质元素进行快速鉴定的物理方法，利用激光诱导击穿光谱分析法对产自山西省太谷县的3个品种红枣果实中的矿质元素Ca、Fe、Na含量进行了测定。结果表明，不同品种红枣果肉中的矿质元素含量之间差异不显著，但同一品种中Fe元素的含量要明显高于Ca和Na元素的含量。激光诱导击穿光谱技术作为一种快速的检测手段可以应用于农产品的矿质营养元素检测。

In order to find a rapid physical methods to identify the mineral elements in agricultural products, the mineral elements of Ca, Fe and Na contents were determined in three varieties of red jujube from Shanxi TaiGu by using laser-induced break-down spectroscopy analysis. The experimental data showed that the differences in mineral elements content between three varieties red jujube pulp were not significant, but the content of Fe was significantly higher than that of Ca and Na in same jujube. The present results indicated that the laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy technology can be applied to the rapid detection of mineral nutrient elements in agricultural products.

ags:resource.dc:title: Generation characteristics and the value of parameterization in architectural graph
建筑参数化图解的生成特点及价值研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Dongdong, Shanxi Agriculture Uninversity, Taigu (China), College of Forestry
Guo Jinping, Shanxi Agriculture Uninversity, Taigu (China), College of Forestry
Wu Xiaogang, Shanxi Agriculture Uninversity, Taigu (China), College of Forestry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 参数化图解不仅反映了建筑设计学科的演变历程，也反映了学科在传承方面所体现的跨学科融合特性。参数化图解在线性文件中体现设计规则，传达设计分类数据，创造出具有尺度和解释性的有效空间，是当代建筑设计方案形成的重要解释性手段。本文从建筑设计方法论的角度通过图解的产生、发展以及实践应用的系列过程，论证了参数化图解对本土建筑设计思维变革的推动作用。

The parameterized graph reflects the evolvement of architectural design, and presents a characteristic of inter-disciplinary integration in the science inheritance. The parameterized graph is an important explanatory method in the formation of contemporary architectural design, because to its diverse abilities to show design rules, provide categorical data, and create a dimensional and explicable space. In this paper, the role of parameterized graph in promoting the revolution of the local architectural design was demonstrated by analyzing the generation, development and practical application process of design methodology in architecture.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on characteristics of adult plant and fruit in Eclipta prostrata
鳢肠成株及结实等特性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Ru, Huai yin Agricultural Institute of Xuhuai Prefecture, Huai’an (China)
Luo Xiaojuan, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection
Dong Liyao, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 鳢肠平均株高64.89cm，分布范围18.40～103.58cm；平均鲜重44.3657g，分布范围14.8834～74.5400g；平均分枝8.94个，分布范围1.27～16.34个。由结实调查结果可知，鳢肠平均果盘数每株113个、种子粒数为每果盘89粒、种子千粒重为0.4697g，平均理论结实量为每株10 057粒。

The average height of Eclipta prostrata was 64.89 cm, ranged from 18.40 to 103.58 cm average fresh weight was 44.3657 g, ranged from 14.8834 to 74.5400 g average branch was 8.94, distributed from 1.27 to 16.34. The results showed that the average fruit number per Eclipta prostrata plant was 113, seed number was 89 per plant, seed weight was 0.4697 g, and the average theoretic fruit bearing amount was 10 057 per plant.

ags:resource.dc:title: Primary studies on the anti-depression function of Jasmine tea
茉莉花茶抗抑郁机理的初步研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Jun, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Horticulture
Yang Jiangfan, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Economics and Management

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过对小鼠体重、摄食量与糖水偏爱的检测，发现茉莉花茶有改善抑郁小鼠的一般状态的作用；在小鼠悬尾和强迫游泳的实验中，分别连续用茉莉花茶汤灌胃与茉莉花茶香气处理8d，能明显缩短小鼠的不动时间；分别检测小鼠大脑和血浆中的DA、5-HT、DOPA和5HIA，发现茉莉花茶具有一定的激活神经递质的作用。茉莉花茶在抗抑郁方面具有一定的效果。

The jasmine tea was determined to alleviate symptoms of depression in mice by testing the mice body weight, food intake and sucrose preference. The immobility time of the mice was significantly reduced when continously using intragastric administration with jasmine tea and fumigation treatment with jasmine volatile aroma for 8 days in the mice tail suspension test and forced swimming test. The detection of DA, 5-HT, DOPA and 5HIA of brain and plasma in mice found that the neurotransmitter was activated by the jasmine tea. The results indicated that jasmine tea has some effect on fighting against depression.

ags:resource.dc:title: Breeding ecological characteristics of three kinds of owls in Pangquangou national reserves
山西庞泉沟保护区三种猫头鹰的繁殖生态特性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Hao Yinghong, Pangquangou national reserve administration, Jiaocheng (China)
Qi Lei, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing (China), College of Nature Conservation

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过1991～1997年和2002～2004年两次在庞泉沟自然保护区选择林线河滩耕地居民区、阔叶林区、针阔混交林区、针叶林区和山地土壁石质悬崖峭壁5种类型栖息地，设置长400m，跨度100m的固定样线，调查红角猫头鹰、雕猫头鹰和纵纹腹小猫头鹰的迁徙特性、种群密度和繁殖特性，并采用剖捡标本和食丸的方法分析其食性，借以分析3种猫头鹰对5种类型生境的利用特性和繁殖期繁殖生态学特性。结果表明：红角猫头鹰迁徙的特点，北徒年均差异3～4d，南迁年均差异2～5d，居留期162～166d，间隔期199～203d，在本区的生态活动是相对稳定的。阔叶林生境是红角猫头鹰的主要栖息环境。山地土壁、石质悬崖峭壁区是雕猫头鹰的主要栖息环境。林线河滩耕地居民区是纵纹腹小猫头鹰的主要栖息环境。通过其繁殖特性的分析，表明3种猫头鹰在繁殖巢穴选取、产卵、孵卵和育雏等方面存在较大差异。3种繁殖猫头鹰的食性，以农田鼠类、昆虫和部分鸟类为食性，为森林益鸟，应该加以保护，但由于其生境利用较为特殊，种群数量偏低，其繁殖受到食物丰富度的影响。

The study investigated river band area, broad leaved forest area, needle and broadqeaved mixed forest area, needle-leaved forest area and cliff area in Pangquangou national reserves during the periods of 1991 - 1997and 2002 - 2004, set the investigation ways to survey the population density of three kinds of owls, and analyzed the diet property by the way of specimen and diet pill. Result showed: the immigration characteristics of Otus Scops remain stable. The main habitat of Otus Scops is broad-leaved forest area, the main habitat of Bubo bubo is cliff area, and the main habit of Athene notua plumipes is river band area. The breeding habits of three kinds of owls is different in nestle selection, oviposition, incubation and brooding. The main food of three kinds of owls includes mice, insects and some birds. They are beneficial to forest protection, and they should be protected by us. The production of three kinds of owls is limited by the population density, and habitate disappearance.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of plant growth regulators on the stoma of jujube (Zizyphus jujuba Mill.) fruits skin
生长调节剂对枣果实表面气孔的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Song Yuqin, Shanxi Agriculture University, Taigu (China), College of Hoticulture
Li Weiqiang, Shanxi Agriculture University, Taigu (China), College of Hoticulture
Li Liulin, Shanxi Agriculture University, Taigu (China), College of Hoticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了探讨植物生长调节剂对枣果实表面气孔形态和密度的影响，以大白铃和大瓜枣为试材，研究不同浓度的2，4-D（2，4-二氯苯氧乙酸）和TDZ（苯基噻二唑基脲）处理对枣果实表面的气孔密度、气孔畸变率、气孔开度和气孔保卫细胞长宽的影响。结果表明：1g/L的2，4-D处理可以显著降低大瓜枣果皮气孔密度，且果实生长发育良好，但对气孔开度无显著影响；0.1～0.2g/L的TDZ处理可以显著降低枣果皮气孔开度，但显著增加了气孔密度，并对果实伤害较大；2，4-D和TDZ处理随浓度增大，果皮畸形气孔比例显著增大。

The objective of this study was to elucidate the effects of plant growth regulators on the stoma of jujube (Zizyphus jujuba Mill.) fruits skin. The stomatal density, stomatal aberration rate, stomatal aperture and the length and width of stomatal guard cells in Dabailing and Dagua jujube exposed to different concentrations of 2,4-D (2,4-dichlorophenoxyacetic acid) and TDZ (Thidiazuron) were detected. The results were as follows: The stomatal density of Dagua jujube was significantly reduced and the fruits grew well when treated with 1 g/L of 2,4-D, with no obvious effect on the stomatal aperture. The stomatal aperture of jujube peel was reduced remarkably when treated with 0.1 - 0.2 g/L of TDZ, while the stomatal density was significantly increased and the fruit was damaged. With the increase in concentration of 2,4-D and TDZ, the stomatal aberration rate was increased significantly.

ags:resource.dc:title: Overview in bioinformatics database and the introduction of inquiry
生物信息学数据库及查询

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jia Dong, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Agriculture
Jia Xiaoyun, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Life Science
Ma Ruiyan, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Agriculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 随着生物分子数据的指数增长，生物信息学相关数据库也有了空前的发展。介绍了生物信息学数据库的最新研究进展，并分别对核酸和蛋白质序列数据库、生物大分子结构数据库及基因组数据库的主要站点资源进行了评价，以大的生物信息中心NCBI开发的Entrcz系统和EBI开发的SRS系统为例，介绍了数据库查询的基本方法。

With the exponential growth of biomolecular data, bioinformatics databases have increased rapidly. The present study introduced the latest developments of bioinformatics databases, meanwhile, main site resources of nucleic acid and protein sequence databases, biological macromolecular structure database, and genomic databases were evaluated independently. The major inquiry methods of databases were described using the Entrcz system developed by NCBI and SRS system developed by EBI as examples.

ags:resource.dc:title: Exploring study on autotetraploid germplasm innovation of Gossypium arboreum
亚洲棉同源四倍体种质创新初探

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yang Na, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Agriculture
Wu Yuxiang, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Agriculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用秋水仙碱琼脂糖凝胶涂抹法，处理亚洲棉（Gossy pium arboreum）幼苗茎尖生长点，研究亚洲棉同源四倍体种质创新的诱变浓度与诱变时间，得出最佳诱变参数：浓度0.1%，时间1d。与对照株相比，获得的诱变株矮壮，节间缩短；子叶变大、肥厚，且脱落时间延迟；真叶出现晚，叶裂数不一，叶形不对称，叶面凹凸不平，出现卷曲叶、勺状叶，铲形叶等变异；着生子叶的茎杆处和子叶柄处出现瘤状；叶色浓绿。实验还发现19:00～20:00在温室进行处理,有助于提高诱变率。

The seedling apical bud of Gossypium arboreum was treated with colchicine agarose gel method in the present research. The study focused on the suitable mutation concentration and the time of colchicine on autotetraploid germlasm innovation of Gossypium arboreum. The optimal mutagenic parameter was determined as 0.1% colchicine with 1 day treatment. Comparing with the control groups, the mutants in the treatment groups showed much shorter inter-nodes, more stocky plants, bigger and thicker cotyledons which stayed longer than that of the control group, delayed euphyllas, asymmetrical crimpled and darker green leaves, different leaf division, mutation of curled, spoon-like or spade-like leaves and nodules appeared in the cotyledon petiole or the junction of stems. Conducting the experiments in greenhouse at 19:00 - 20:00 pm contributed to increase the mutation rate.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of different organic materials and exogenous Cu on the growth and the content and distribution of Cu in brassica campestris L. ssp. Chinensis L.
有机物和外源铜对小白菜生长及铜含量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Cheng, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Resource and Environment Science
Bu Yushan, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Resource and Environment Science
Hao Jiali, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Resource and Environment Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过盆栽模拟试验研究了不同有机物料和外源铜浓度对小白菜（Brassica campestris L. ssp. Chinensis L.）生长和铜含量分布的影响。结果表明，随着外源铜浓度的升高，在不加有机物料时，小白菜株高、单株株鲜重和单株根鲜重均呈下降趋势；在施不同有机物料下，低浓度外源铜对小白菜生长表现出一定的促进作用，但高浓度下仍表现为抑制。不同有机物料均不同程度地促进了小白菜生长，且对地下部促进作用好于对地上部。不同有机物料处理下，小白菜地上部和地下部铜含量均随外源铜浓度升高而增加。除鸡粪、猪粪和泥炭外，施用其余供试有机物料均不同程度降低小白菜地上部和地下部铜含量，且以玉米秸降低幅度最大，其次为草坪草。小白菜地下部铜含量高于地上部，猪粪和风化煤增加了小白菜地上部与地下部铜含量的比值，其余供试有机物料降低了小白菜地上部与地下部铜含量的比值。

The pot experiments were conducted to study the effects of different organic materials and different concentrations of exogenous Cu on the plant growth and the content and distribution of Cu in pakchoi. The results showed that the plant height, shoot fresh weight, and root fresh weight of pakchoi were all decreased as exogenous Cu concentration increased in the treatment groups without organic additive. Lower exogenous Cu concentration showed the promoting effect on the growth of pakchoi on some extent, while higher exogenous Cu concentration showed a significant inhibiting activity on the growth of pakchoi in the treatment groups which were treated with different organic materials in the soil. The growth of pakchoi in all groups was improved and the promoting effect was better on the underground part than on the aboveground part of pakchoi. The Cu contents in the underground part and aboveground part of pakchoi were all increased as exogenous Cu concentration increased in different organic material treatments. The Cu contents in the underground part and aboveground part of pakchoi were decreased at different degrees by all organic materials used in the present study excepting the chicken manure, pig manure, and peat, and the maximum reduction was observed in the corn stalk, followed by turf grass. The Cu content in underground part was higher than that in aboveground part of pakchoi. The ratio of Cu contents in aboveground part to that in underground part of pakchoi was increased by weathered coal and pig manure, but decreased by the other organic materials.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the control technologies for 4 Kinds of natural pesticides against Panonychus citri (McGregor) in organic citrus orchard
4种天然源农药对有机橘园柑橘全爪螨的防治技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xiong Zhonghua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Xi Yunguan, Ministry of Environmental Protection, Nanjing (China), Nanjing Institute of Environmental Science
Chen Xiaojun, The First Middle School of Guixi City Jiangxi Province, Guixi (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为明确有机管理背景下印楝素、苦参碱、鱼藤酮和SK绿颖农用喷洒油4种经过有机论证的天然源药剂对柑橘全爪螨的防效，进行了4种供试药剂一次喷雾施药和二次喷雾施药两种处理防治柑橘全爪螨的田间试验。一次施药处理结果表明，0.6%苦参碱水剂2 000倍液的速效性最好，药后1d对柑橘全爪螨的防效为98.57%，显著高于其他药剂；4药剂中，仅0.5%印楝素乳油1 000倍液的防效在供试期间内呈现逐渐上升的趋势，其余3药剂在施药3d后的防效均逐步下降；药后21d印楝素的防效较其他药剂显著为高，达97.54%，其次为SK绿颖农用喷洒油，再次为苦参碱、鱼藤酮和对照药剂阿维菌素。二次施药处理试验结果显示，印楝素、苦参碱和SK绿颖农用喷洒油3药剂的防效均在96.69%以上，但2.5%鱼藤酮乳油800倍液的防效较低，在88.95%～92.17%；且印楝素、苦参碱及SK绿颖农用喷洒油对柑橘全爪螨的防效优于或相当于对照药剂阿维菌素。从以上结果可知，供试4种天然源药剂对有机柑橘园的害螨均具有良好的防效，且二次施药处理的效果更为理想。

In order to illustrate the control efficacy of azadirachtin, matrine, rotenone and SK EnSpray 99 against Panonychus cirri (McGregor) in the background of organic management, the field experiments were conducted by one and two field sprays. With one spray, 2 000 times solution of 0.6% matrine. AS got the quickest response with a control efficacy of 98.57% 1 d after the spray. Among the 4 pesticides tested, only azadirachtin had an increasing effect during the trial. Azadirachtin had better control effects than others with a control efficacy of 97.54% 21 d after the treatment, and SK EnSpray 99 was secondary whose control efficacy was higher than that of matrine, rotenone and abamectin (control pesticide). With two sprays, azadirachtin, matrine, and SK EnSpray 99 had control efficacy above 96.69%, while 800 times emulsion of 2.5% rotenone EC had lower control efficacy than others, its control efficacy was 88.95%-92.17%. Furthermore, the control efficacy of azadirachtin, matrine, and SK EnSpray 99 against Panonychus citri was better than or the same as that of abamectin. It could be concluded that 4 kinds of natural pesticides tested had excellent control effect on phytophagous mites in organic citrus orchards, and two sprays were better than one spray.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the outcrossing characteristics of 5 new cytoplasm male sterile lines of rice
5个水稻三系新不育系异交特性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Yunfeng, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)
Chen Xiaorong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)
Yu Qiuying, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对5个新育成的水稻不育系和金23A（CK）的开花习性、柱头外露率、柱头活力、田间异交结实率等异交特性进行了系统观察研究。结果表明：井冈5A异交性能总体最好，柱头外露率高，花时集中，开花率高，田间异交结实率高达48.1%；其次是井冈2A、井冈3A，开花率高，柱头活力强，田间异交结实率分别为38.5%、39.2%；井冈1A、井冈4A异交特性表现较一般。

Outcrossing characteristics of 5 cytoplasm male sterile (CMS) lines of rice Jinggang 1A, Jinggang 2A, Jinggang 3A, Jinggang 4A, Jinggang 5A and Jin23A (CK), such as flowering habits, stigma exsertion rate, stigma vitality and outcrossing fertility were observed. In Jinggang 5A, the ratio of stigma exsertion was the highest; all of the flowers opened in a short time; the ratio of opening flowers was the highest and the outcrossing fertility was the best, up to 48.1% in field. The outcrosing fertility of Jinggang 2A and 3A was up to 38.5% and 39.2%, respectively, the ratio of opening flowers’ was the highest, the ratio of stigma exsertion was the highest; the outcrossing characteristics of Jinggang 1A and Jinggang 4A were the average.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of elevated CO2 on the carbon balance of forest ecosystems and C-N coupling
CO2浓度升高对森林碳平衡及碳氮耦合的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jiang Jun, Fujian Normal University, Fuzhou (China), State Key Laboratory of Humid Subtropical Mountain Ecology
Xie Jinsheng, Fujian Normal University, Fuzhou (China), State Key Laboratory of Humid Subtropical Mountain Ecology
Yang Yanhua, Fujian Normal University, Fuzhou (China), State Key Laboratory of Humid Subtropical Mountain Ecology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 森林碳平衡及碳氮耦合对大气CO2浓度升高的响应存在着诸多不确定性，现有研究主要集中在温带地区，并体现在光合作用、生产力及分配、枯落物分解以及土壤碳库等各个方面，研究结果表明：CO2浓度升高（1）短期内增强了森林的光合能力，长期条件下由于氮供应与叶氮含量的下降，就会产生光合下调与适应现象；（2）提高了森林净初级生产力（NPP）并影响其在各组分之间的分配，但却没有促进土壤氮矿化作用，土壤氮有效性降低，限制了森林NPP的持续上升；（3）增加了森林枯落物的数量，刺激了微生物的氮吸收与同化以及植物对有效氮的利用，从而影响分解过程；（4）增强了森林土壤的碳汇功能，但同样会受到氮有效性的直接限制与支持氮固定的其它养分的间接限制。由于热带、亚热带地区的环境因素与温带地区存在较大差异，未来应加强这些区域的相关研究，进一步揭示森林生态系统对CO2浓度升高的响应机制。

There are many uncertainties in the effects of elevated atmospheric CO2 concentration on the carbon balance of forest ecosystems and the C-N coupling mechanisms. Recent researches were focused on photosynthesis, productivity, litter decomposition and soil carbon pool of forest ecosystems in the temperate regions. The study results showed that CO2-enrichment (1) increased the photosynthesis of forest plants in the short-term, but photosynthetic acclimation would be observed in the 10ng-term because of low supply of nitrogen and reductions in leaf nitrogen; (2) increased the net primary productivity (NPP) of forest ecosystems and influenced the allocation of NPP in all components, but the sustained growth of NPP was limited by constant soil nitrogen mineralization rate and decreasing soil nitrogen availability; (3) increased the biomass oflitter, stimulated microbial nitrogen absorption and assimilation, enhanced nitrogen use of plants, and thus influenced the process of litter decomposition; (4) increased soil carbon input and soil carbon sequestration but was restricted by low nitrogen availability and additional nutrients supporting nitrogen fixation. The environmental conditions of tropical and subtropical forests are very different from those of temperate forests, so in order to further investigate the effects of elevated CO2 on forest ecosystems, more attention should be paid to the studies in these regions.

ags:resource.dc:title: Agronomic performance of different japonica rice varieties in different eco-regions in Jiangxi province
不同粳稻品种在江西不同生态区的农学表现

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Shan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
He Hu, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Zhang Weixing, China National Rice Research Institute, Hangzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以2个杂交籼稻（II优838和天优华占）为对照，在江西3个生态区（新建、抚州和吉安）开展对比试验以明确不同类型粳稻品种在江西的生态适应性。结果表明，总体上，杂交粳稻比常规粳稻更具产量优势，晚粳比中粳表现更好。新建点两个播期（5月30日和6月19日，各点均为30d秧龄）均为杂交晚粳产量最高，常规中粳最低，特别是5月30日播期的杂交晚粳平均产量达到10.95t/hm2，显著高于对照籼稻。抚州点两个播期（5月30日和6月29日）均是对照籼稻产量最高，常规中粳最低，常规晚粳、杂交中粳和杂交晚粳之间无显著差异。吉安点5月30日和6月9日播期均是对照籼稻产量最高，杂交中粳最低；6月19日和6月29日播期分别是杂交晚粳和杂交中粳产量最高，但均与对照籼稻无显著差异。新建和抚州点均为5月30日播期产量最高，而吉安点6月9日播种最佳。新建点两个播期均是来自浙江的粳稻品种产量最高，但与来自湖北的品种和对照籼稻之间均无显著差异。抚州和吉安点不同来源地的粳稻品种产量随播期的不同表现不一。因此，江西发展粳稻生产的适宜地区应该主要集中在鄱阳湖平原及以北地区，品种应该以杂交晚粳为主，品种的引进以从纬度相近的浙江省为宜。

Compared with two indica hybrid rice varieties (Ⅱ-you 838 and Tianyouhuazhan), a three-site experiment (Xinjian, Fuzhou and Ji’an) was conducted to investigate the agronomic performance of different japonica rice varieties in Jiangxi Province. The results showed that, overall, the yield of hybrid japonica varieties was higher than that of conventional japonica varieties, and late japonica rice performed better than semilate japonica flee. At Xinjian site, the late hybrid japonica rice obtained the highest yield with the semilate conventional japonica rice the lowest, the sowing dates were 30 May and 19 June (30-day-old seedlings at all the sites). The yield of the late hybrid japonica rice averaged 10.95 t/hm2 whose sowing date was 30 May, significantly greater than that of the control indica hybrid rice. At Fuzhou site, the yield of the control indica hybrid rice was the highest with the semilate conventional japonica inbred rice. the lowest, whose sowing dates were both 30 May and 29 June, while there were no significant differences among the late conventional japonica rice, semilate hybrid japonica rice, and late hybrid japonica rice. At Ji’an site, the indica hybrid rice obtained the highest yield with the semilate hybrid japonica rice the lowest, the sowing dates were 30 May and 9 June. The late hybrid japonica rice and semilate hybrid japonica rice yielded the highest, the sowing dates were 19 June and 29 June, respectively, but did not significantly differ from the control hybrid indica rice. The optimum sowing date tbr high yield was 30 May at both Xinjian and Fuzhou, while that was 9 June at Ji’an. At Xinjian site, the yield of japonica rice varieties derived from Zhejiang Province was the highest with the both sowing dates, but did not significantly differ from those derived from Hubei Province and the control hybrid indica rice. At both Fuzhou and Ji’an sites, the yield of japonica rice varieties derived from different native areas did not show a consistent trend, depending largely on the sowing date. Therefore, it can be concluded that the suitable region for japonica rice planting in Jiangxi Province may be the Poyang Lake plain and the area north of it, and that the optimum variety type is the late hybrid japonica rice introduced from Zhejiang Province due to the similar latitude.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning and expression analysis of E3 ubiquitin ligase Nrdpl from grass carp ctenopharyngodon idella
草鱼E_3泛素连接酶Nrdp1基因cDNA克隆和表达分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wei Lili, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Yang Zhuqing, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Wang Zirui, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 神经调节素受体降解蛋白1（neuregulin receptor degradation protein-1，Nrdpl）是一种新的E3泛素连接酶，可调节细胞增殖和凋亡等。研究采用RACE方法从草鱼（Ctenopharyngodon idella）肝脏中克隆了Nrdpl的全长cDNA序列；采用半定量RT-PCR方法分析该基因在草鱼不同组织中表达情况。结果表明：该序列全长cDNA大小为1 865bp（GenBank登录号：JX864048），其中开放阅读框为954bp，编码318个氨基酸，预测分子量大小为36.09ku，pH为7.0时理论等电点为5.83；5’和3’非翻译区的长度分别为291bp和620bp，在3’非翻译区发现2个mRNA不稳定信号（ATTTA）和1个多聚腺苷酸加尾信号（ATTAAA）。该蛋白序列没有信号肽和跨膜结构，其二级结构主要以α-螺旋为主，不含β-折叠。氨基酸序列保守性分析表明，草鱼Nrdp1与斑马鱼、虹鳟及人的同源性分别为98%、94%和89%；该基因在心脏和脑中的表达量较多，在肌肉和血液中表达很少。

Nrdpl (neuregulin receptor degradation protein-1) is a newly defined E3 ubiquitin ligase and regulates the cell proliferation and apoptosis. In the present study, the cDNA sequence of grass carp Ctenopharyngodon idella Nrdpl (gcNrdpl) consists of 1865 bp with a 291 bp 5’ untranslated region (UTR) and a 620 bp 3’ UTR, with an open reading frame of 954 bp encoding the 318 amino acids which is predicted to have no signal peptide and transmembrane helices. The deduced amino acid sequence of gcNrdpl showed 98%, 94% and 89% of identity to zebra fish Danio rerio, rainbow trout Oncorhynchus mykiss and human Homo sapiens Nrdpl, respectively. The domain search revealed that gcNrdpl contains a RING domain (at amino acids 18 - 56) and Pfam domain (at amino acids 137 – 315). Phylogenetic analysis demonstrated that gcNrdpl is clustered in a same clade with zebra fish and rainbow trout Nrdpl. RT-PCR demonstrated that the mRNA is constitutively expressed in all the examined organs examined of healthy fish, with the higher level in heart and brain, and with the lower level in muscle and blood. Therefore, this study would be significant to the discussion on genetic structure and function of Nrdpl from the fish.

ags:resource.dc:title: Variation law of surface properties during the aging process of common decorative wood
常用装饰木材老化过程表面特性的变化规律

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Shunzhi, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Material Engineering
Lin Jinguo, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Material Engineering
Chen Jinming, Popularization Station of Forestry Science ＆Technology of Fujian Province, Fuzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 应用En927-6加速老化法，采用QUV/SPRAY加速老化试验箱对筒状非洲楝、水曲柳、古夷苏木和杉木4种常用装饰木材老化过程中材色和润湿性进行测定分析，结果表明：随着老化周期的增加，4种常用装饰木材表面明度增加，红绿轴色品指数降低，黄蓝轴色品指数增加，老化处理后木材表面的颜色向偏白、偏绿和偏黄的方向变化。加速老化过程中，4种装饰木材表面接触角减小，润湿性增加。

The color and wettability of 4 kinds of common decorative wood, namely, (Entandrophragma cylindricum, Guibourtia tessmannii, Fraxinus mandshurica and Cunninghamia lanceolata aging in QUV/SPRAY accelerated aging chamber were determined and analyzed according to En927-6. The results showed that: the surface color of these 4 kinds of common decorative wood, the lightness and yellow-bule chromatic creased while red-green axis decreased with the increase of the aging period. The contact angle index in of these 4 kinds of common decorative wood reduced while wettability increased during the accelerated aging process.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preliminary studies on histopathological changes and expression of NF-κB in liver of zebra fish exposed to urban sewage
城市生活污水对斑马鱼肝脏组织结构和NF-κB基因表达的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gan Haiyan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Yang Zhuqing, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Wang Zirui, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为评价生活污水的直接排放对水体中的鱼类的毒性效应，将斑马鱼暴露在25%、50%、100%浓度的污水中，在实验持续到第4天、7天和14天后分别采集各实验组和对照组鱼的肝脏，制作肝脏组织切片，观察肝组织结构的变化。结果发现：随着污水浓度的增大和时间的延长，肝细胞病变程度加深，肝窦隙扩张，细胞核肿大甚至裂解消失，胞质疏松，空泡明显增加。利用RT-PCR分析NF-κB基因表达变化发现斑马鱼经25%、50%、100%浓度生活污水处理不同时间后，表达水平均明显上调。研究表明生活污水的直接排放将对水体中的鱼类的肝脏产生毒性效应并可能出现NF-κB的激活，促进炎症反应的发生。

In order to test the potential toxic effect of urban to urban sewage at the concentrations of 25%, 50%, 100%, sewage, zebrafish (Danio rerio) were exposed respectively. On the 4th day, 7th day and 14th day, the livers were collected to observe histopathological changes. With the increasing concentration and time of exposure, impairments in liver of zebra were increased, liver sinusoid expanded, nucleus swelled and vanished, and some vacuoles appeared in cytoplasm. The gene expression of NF-κB was detected by RT-PCR. The results showed that the mRNA expression of NF-κB was up-regulated after exposure for 4, 7 and 14 days in different concentrations of urban sewage. It is thus indicated that urban sewage can damage the liver of fish and effectively induce the expression of NF-κB.

ags:resource.dc:title: Determination of aureomycin content in duck egg white with derivative synchronous fluorescence method
导数同步荧光法测定鸭蛋蛋清中金霉素残留含量

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yuan Haichao, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering
Zhao Jinhui, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering
Liu Muhua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为实现鸭蛋蛋清中金霉素残留含量的快速测定与检测模型精度的提高，应用导数同步荧光法结合支持向量回归（SVR）建立鸭蛋蛋清中的金霉素含量的预测模型。首先在280～400nm光谱范围内对三维同步荧光指纹图谱与三维同步荧光光谱进行分析，确定检测鸭蛋蛋清中的金霉素含量的最佳波长差△λ为70nm；然后对原始的同步荧光光谱进行一阶导数预处理，并用联合区间偏最小二乘法（siPLS）结合遗传算法（GA）优选出11个特征波长；最后应用支持向量回归（SVR）建立了鸭蛋蛋清中的金霉素含量的预测模型，其模型预测集的决定系数（R2）和预测均方根误差（RMSEP）分别为0.973mg/L和1.501 1mg/L。试验结果表明，本研究方法能够满足鸭蛋蛋清中金霉素残留含量快速测定要求。

To achieve the rapid prediction of aureomycin contents in duck egg white and improve the accuracy of prediction model, the prediction model of aureomycin content in duck egg white was developed with derivative synchronous fluorescence method and support vector regression (SVR). Firstly, three-dimensional synchronous fluorescence fingerprints and three-dimensional synchronous fluorescence spectroscopy within 280 - 400 nm were analysed, and 70 nm was selected as the optimum wavelength difference. Secondly, 11 characteristic wavelengths were selected combined with siPLS and GA. Lastly, 11 characteristic wavelengths were used to build prediction model applied by SVR. The determination coefficient (R2) and the root mean squared error of prediction (RMSEP) for prediction model were 0.973 and 1.501 1 mg/L, respectively. The experimental results showed that the research method in the paper could satisfy the request of determination of aureomycin content in duck egg white.

ags:resource.dc:title: Estimaton and dynamic change analysis of forest carbon storage in Fujian province
福建省森林碳储量估算与动态变化分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zheng Dexiang, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University Forestry Academy, Fuzhou (China), Forestry College
Liao Xiaoli, Minjiang College, Fuzhou (China)
Li Chengwei, Jian’ou Forestry Bureau, Nanping (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以福建省1998、2003、2008年连续3期森林资源固定样地清查统计数据为基础，结合不同森林类型生物量与蓄积量回归方程，对福建省森林植被的碳储量和碳密度进行估算，并进行期间的动态变化分析，其结果表明：随着福建省林业的发展，自1998年其森林碳储量有了明显的提高，人均碳密度由38.55t/hm2上升至65.65t/hm2，已超过全国41.1t/hm2的平均碳密度，但从其年龄结构上分析，近熟林以上的森林碳储量虽然有所增加，但其碳密度呈下降趋势，则表明近熟林以上森林质量有所下降，森林结构仍有待于进一步调整与改善。

Based on the forest inventory data from the fixed sample plots in Fujian Province in the years of 1998, 2003 and 2008, the carbon storage and density of forest vegetation were estimated and their dynamic changes during this period were analyzed with the method of regression equation between the stand biomass and volume in different forest types. The results showed the that forest carbon storage had increased obviously since 1998 with the forestry development in Fujian Province. The carbon density increased from 38.55 t/hm2 to 65. 65 t/hm2 per capita, more than the national average 41.1 t/hm2. However, the analysis of its age structure showed that the carbon storage of mature forest and over-mature forest increased while its carbon density decreased this result implied that the forest quality of mature forest and over-mature forest is going to decline, and further adjustment in forest structure is urgently needed.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on in vitro rapid propagation technology for crisp plum in Guizhou province
贵州酥李离体快繁技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Han Xiaoying, Guizhou Center for Fruit Engineering Technology, Guiyang (China)
Chen Hong, Guizhou Center for Fruit Engineering Technology, Guiyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以酥李带芽茎段为外植体进行组织培养，研究了植物生长调节剂组合对腋芽诱导、增殖及生根的影响，初步建立酥李离体快繁技术体系。结果表明，外植体消毒采用1g/LHgCl2浸泡8min的效果较好，适宜腋芽诱导培养基为WPM＋1.0mg/L 6-BA＋0.5mg/L KT＋0.1mg/L NAA，适宜芽增殖培养基为WPM＋1.0mg/LKT＋0.1mg/L IBA＋1.0mg/L GA3，适宜生根培养基为1/2MS＋0.4mg/L IBA＋15g/L蔗糖，其生根率达95%，移栽成活率在90%以上。

Using the axillary growth regulators on differentiation rapid propagation techniques were buds as explants for tissue culture, the proliferation and rooting of shoots in Crisp established. The results showed that the effects of combinations Plum were investigated of plant, and the optimal disinfection time of explants in 0.1% HgCl2 was 8 min. The optimal medium for initial culture was WPM＋1.0 mg/L 6-BA＋0.5 mg/LKT＋0.1 mg/L NAA. The optimal multiplication medium was WPM＋1.0 mg/LKT＋0.1mg/L IBA＋1.0 mg/L GA3. The optimal medium for rooting was 1/2 MS＋0.4 mg/L IBA＋15g/L sugar, and its rate for rooting reached 95% and rate of transplanting survival reached 90%.

ags:resource.dc:title: The assessment of rural residential suitability of Meiling town based on GIS
基于GIS的梅岭镇农村居民点用地适宜性评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Nie Xiaoqing, College of Land Resource and Environment of Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China);
Guo Xi, College of Land Resource and Environment of Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China);
Guo Daqian, Land Consolidation Center of Nanchang City, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 农村居民点用地的选择，在新农村建设、城乡统筹发展、优化区域土地利用结构与布局中是一个基础性的内容，而适宜性评价是农村居民点用地选择的基础，利用GIS的空间分析功能，构建梅岭镇农村居民点适宜性评价模型，在评价指标体系的构建中，选择影响湾里区梅岭镇农村居民点用地的地面坡度、高程等8个经济社会生态因子作为影响因素，并利用层次分析法得出各评价指标的影响权重，利用加权平均法，以10m×10m的栅格大小为评价单元，最终得出评价区域各栅格的综合分值，确定最佳选址区域。通过对评价结果分析，研究结果对优化梅岭镇农村居民点布局具有一定的参考价值。

New rural development planning in advance, is one of the important guiding ideology on the construction of new countryside in China, and the selection of rural residential sites is a basic work in the construction of the new countryside, the balance of urban and rural development and the optimization of regional land use structure and layout. And the suitability assessment is the foundation for the selection of rural residential land. Based on the spatial analysis function of GIS, this paper constructs the land suitability assessment model for MeiLing Town, and selects eight economic and social ecological factors as the influencing factors in Meiling town Wanli District, such as slope, elevation etc., and then by using AHP gets the weights of the various evaluations, the grid of 10 m × 10 m as the evaluation unit and using the weighted average method, evaluates the comprehensive regional scores of each grid area and determines the best location. The evaluation results are of a certain reference value for the optimization of Meiling Town’s layout.

ags:resource.dc:title: Advances in the research on parasitic weeds
寄生杂草研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sang Xiaoqing, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Subtropical Agro bioresources
Sun Yongyan, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Subtropical Agro bioresources
Yang Wenjie, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Subtropical Agro bioresources

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 寄生杂草种类繁多，分布广泛，靠吸取作物养分生活，致使作物正常生长受阻，给农业生产造成巨大危害，近年来寄生杂草的治理越来越受到人们的关注。对主要寄生杂草的种类分布及危害，生物学特性和治理方法进行综述，并对其发展趋势进行展望。重点论述寄生杂草的治理方法，包括检疫、物理防治、化学防治和生物防治，其中生物防治是该领域的研究热点，具有良好的应用前景。

Parasitic weeds are diverse and widely distributed. They obtain nutrients from crops to remain their life, thus blocking normal growth of crops and resulting in great harm to agricultural production, so control of parasitic weeds has recently attracted more and more attention. The distribution and hazards, biological characteristics and treatment methods of major parasitic weeds species are reviewed, and its development trend is prospected in this paper. The focus is on parasitic weed control methods, including chemical control and biological control. Biological control, the hot spot in this field quarantine, physical has a good prospect.

ags:resource.dc:title: Main planting patterns and their relevant cultivation practices for the double rice in Jiangxi province
江西双季稻主要种植方式及其配套栽培对策

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Pan Xiaohua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)
Li Muying, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)
Zeng Yongjun, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 就江西双季水稻的发展、种植方式的演变与现状，不同种植方式下的双季水稻产量与效益进行了分析。基于江西双季水稻种植方式多样化的现状，针对手插，抛秧，机插，免耕抛秧，直播和再生稻等不同种植方式，分别提出了适宜不同稻区的双季超级稻品种及高产对策。

This study reviewed the history, evolution, and present situation of planting patterns of the double rice in Jiangxi Province. In addition, the differences in the grain yield and profitability of the double rice under various planting patterns were investigated. Given the diversity of planting patterns of the double rice in Jiangxi Province, to gain a high yield under hand transplanting, throwing, mechanical transplanting, no-tillage throwing, direct seeding, and rationing-rice planting, the authors suggested the selection of super rice cuhivars and their relevant cultivation practices suitable for specific planting patterns in different double rice cropping regions of Jiangxi Province.

ags:resource.dc:title: Accuracy analysis of Kriging with local regression residuals on soil cation exchange capacity
局部回归残余克里格对土壤阳离子交换量空间预测的精度分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Ku, Minjiang University, Fuzhou (China), Department of Geographical Science
Jiang Zhenlan, Minjiang University, Fuzhou (China), Department of Geographical Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 高精度土壤理化属性的空间分布图件是环境保护、土壤管理及精准农业不可或缺的要件，土壤特性空间异质性的普遍存在是土壤理化特性精确预测的一大难题。以土壤阳离子交换量（CEC）为对象，通过比较不同的空间插值方法，来探讨土壤属性的高精度预测方法。通过采样实测表层土壤阳离子交换量，利用普通线性回归、地理权重回归及二者残余的克里格进行空间插值，来比较不同方法的插值精度和制图效果。结果表明，地理权重回归残余克里格法的精度最高，其预测值与实测值的回归决定系数达90%，普通线性回归的精度最低。在回归残余分析中，普通线性回归残余对CEC预测精度提高的幅度达34%，而地理权重回归残余对预测精度提高程度为9%，相对较小。说明地理权重回归及回归克里格法也是较好的空间预测方法。在制图效果上，2种残余法的预测图在空间上过渡自然，平缓，能较好地反映出CEC在空间上的变化细节，与实际情况吻合较好。对于那些环境影响因素明确，且与之存在线性相关的土壤属性，地理权重回归残余克里格法及回归克里格法可作为其高精度空间预测及制图的有效工具。

Soil property maps of high quality and accuracy are important for environmental protection, soil management and precision agriculture. It is challenging to predict soil chemical ＆ physical properties due to the spatial heterogeneity features of soil. Cation exchange capacity (CEC) as a target soil property was used in this study for acquiring its high accuracy spatial distribution map compared with various interpolating approaches. The predicting accuracy and mapping effects of soil CEC interpolated by differential approaches based on the observed CEC samples in surface soil were evaluated, these approaches were ordinary least squares (OLS), geographically weighted regression (GWR), RK (regression Kriging, that is OLS and its regression residuals with ordinary Kriging), and GK (GWR and its regression residuals with ordinary Kriging). There-suits showed that the prediction accuracy of GK ranksed the first place among the four used methods, and the coefficient of determination between its predicted and observed values reached to 90 percent. While the worstone in prediction accuracy was OLS. In the analysis of residuals, OLS residuals had 34% contribution to the improvement of CEC prediction accuracy, larger than 9% by GWR residuals. It was discovered that GWR and RK were both good methods in spatial prediction for soil properties. In the aspect of mapping effects, RK and GK could better reflect the marks of environmental factors on soil CEC, and maps were more continuous in transition and less affected by extreme sample values. The maps interpolated by GK and RK were more realistic and reflected the details of soil CEC patterns impacted by the environmental factors in nature. RK and GK are eligible tools for predicting and mapping soil properties with high accuracy combined with related environmental factors which have explicit linear relation with soil properties.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the combustibility of coarse woody debris in Xishan national forest Park of Kunming
昆明西山国家森林公园粗死木质残体的燃烧性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Qiuhua, Southwest Forestry University, Kunming (China), Faculty of Civil Engineering
Liu Wenguo, China Forest Exploration and Design Institute in Kunming, Kunming (China)
Li Shiyou, Southwest Forestry University, Kunming (China), Faculty of Civil Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过外业调查和实验室测定，利用载量和单位面积热量2个关键指标，研究了昆明西山国家森林公园的华山松、云南油杉、滇青冈、地盘松、麻栎和旱冬瓜6个主要林型粗死木质残体（CWD）的燃烧性。结果表明，粗死木质残体燃烧性最强的是地盘松，最弱的是云南油杉，华山松、滇青冈和麻栎的燃烧性很接近，旱冬瓜的燃烧性仅微大于云南油杉，因此，燃烧性从强到弱依次为地盘松、麻栎、滇青冈、华山松、旱冬瓜和云南油杉。

By plot surveying in Xishan National Forest Park of Kunming and lab experiments, using 2 key factors including fuel loading and heat value of unit area, the combustibility of Coarse woody debris of six main forest types consisting of Pinus armandii Franch, Keteleeria evelyniana Mast, Cyclobalanopsis glaucoides Schottky, Pinus yunnanensis var. pygmaea, Quercus acutissima Carr and Alnus nepalensis D. Don was studied. The results showed that the combustibility of CWD of Pinus yunnanensis var. pygmaea was the Strongest in the six forest types, while that of Keteleeria evelyniana Mast was the weakest. The combustibility of Pinus armandii Franch, Cyclobalanopsis glaucoides Schottky, and Quercus acutissima Carr was closely similar, and that of Alnus nepalensis D. Don was close to that of Keteleeria evelyniana Mast. The combustibility of these six CWD was in the order: Pinus yunnanensis var. pygmaea, Quercus acutissima Carr, Cyclobalanopsis glaucoides Schottky, Pinus armandii Franch, Alnus nepalensis D. Don and Keteleeria evelyniana Mast.

ags:resource.dc:title: Multiple statistics analysis of low light tolerance in pepper
辣椒耐弱光性的多元统计分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Fang Rong, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute
Zhou Kunhua, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute
Chen Xuejun, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用遮阳网模拟弱光条件，调查12份辣椒种质苗期株高、单位叶片株高、下胚轴长、叶长、叶宽、叶厚、茎粗、单株叶数、植株鲜质量、叶鲜质量、茎鲜质量和根鲜质量等形态性状，以耐弱光系数作为衡量耐弱光性的指标，应用因子分析、隶属函数和聚类分析，对辣椒耐弱光性进行综合评价。结果表明：12个形态性状的耐弱光系数在参试种质间差异较大，利用因子分析将其集约于5个主因子上，即株型因子、鲜质量因子、叶数因子、叶厚因子和下胚轴长因子，5个主因子累计贡献率达97.30%。根据综合评价值D，将12份供试种质分为4类，即耐弱光材料H101A、V06C0298、H107；较耐弱光材料V06C1825、H101、GX；弱光中度敏感材料SEC、H102、V06C1032、H108、H103以及弱光敏感材料H107B。本研究应用多元统计方法成功地对12份辣椒材料进行了耐弱光性鉴定，可为辣椒耐弱光性育种提供理论参考。

With block light net simulating the low light condition, twelve pepper accessions were used to evaluate their low light tolerance by means of factor analysis, subordinate function and cluster analysis based on the low light resistant index correlation matrix of 12 morphological characters at the seedling stage. The 12 traits included plant height, plant height per leaf, hypocotyl length, leaf length, leaf width, leaf thickness, stem diameter, leaf number per plant, fresh plant weight, fresh leaf weight, fresh stem weight and fresh root weight. The result indicated that the low light resistant index of the 12 morphological traits in different accessions showed great difference, and those indexes could be characterized into five main factors by factor analysis, namely plant type factor, fresh weight factor, leaf number factor, leaf thickness factor and hypocotyl length factor, and the accumulative contribution rate hit to 97.30%. Cluster analysis based on D value showed that the twelve accessions could be classified into four categories: the best low light tolerant accessions including H101A, V06C0298 and H107, and the stronger low light tolerant materials including V06C1825, H101 and GX, the moderately sensitive materials including SEC, H102, V06C1032, H108 and H103, whereas the low light sensitive materials was H107B. The study applied multiple statistics analysis to access the low light tolerance of the 12 pepper accessions successfully, and could offer theory reference for low light tolerance breeding in pepper.

ags:resource.dc:title: Rapid propagation of Fargesia fungosa by tissue culture
棉花竹试管快繁技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Song Liling, Zhejiang Agriculture and Forestry University, Lin’an (China), The Nurturing Station for the State Key Laboratory of Subtropical Silviculture
Li Ruijun, Forestry Bureau of Zhejiang, Lin’an (China)
Liu Qianqian, Zhejiang Agriculture and Forestry University, Lin’an (China), The Nurturing Station for the State

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以棉花竹（Fargesia fungosa）成熟种胚诱导出的芽作为材料，研究其快速繁殖技术。结果表明：棉花竹的最佳增殖培养基为MS（Murashige and Skoog）＋3mg/L BA（6-苄基腺嘌呤），增殖系数为3.77，芽丛生长旺盛；最佳生根培养基为1/2MS＋3mg/L IBA（吲哚丁酸），生根率达100%，根系较长且粗壮；试管苗移栽至泥炭、蛭石、珍珠岩配制比例为1:1:1的混合基质中，成活率高达98%。本研究结果为棉花竹的扩繁和产业化生产提供了技术支撑，对箭竹属其他竹种的组织培养具有重要的参考价值。

The buds induced from mature embryos were used as explants to study the rapid propagation technique for Fargesia fungosa. Murashige and Skoog’s (MS) medium supplemented with 3 mg/L BA was the optimal medium for bud multiplication. The highest proliferation coefficient was 3.77, and the cluster buds grown well. The suitable rooting medium was 1/2 MS supplemented with 3 mg/L IBA. The rooting rate was up to 100%, and the roots were long and thick. The survival rate of hardening plantlets was 98% after being transferred to a mixture of peat, vermiculite and perlite with a ratio at 1:1:1. The study provides technical support for the propagation and industrialization production of Fargesia fungosa, and also is of important reference value to the tissue culture of other species in the genus.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comparative analysis of proteomics in soybean cultivar seedlings with different salt resistance
耐盐性不同的大豆品种幼苗的蛋白质组学比较研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Xiaoyan, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), Soybean Research Institute
Tang Di, Jiangsu Polytechnic College of Agriculture and Forestry, Jurong (China), Basic Courses Department

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了探讨大豆品种耐盐性的抗性机理，应用蛋白质组学技术，对耐盐大豆品种Lee68和盐敏感大豆品种N2899萌发期幼苗的蛋白质组成进行比较分析。用三氯乙酸/丙酮法提取大豆幼苗的蛋白质，双向电泳技术分离，考马斯亮蓝染色，在pH4.0～7.0的2-DE胶上平均可检测到约650个的蛋白质点。比较Lee68和N2899幼苗的2-DE图谱，有52个差异表达蛋白点。选取6个蛋白质点，用MALDI-TOF-MS测定肽质量指纹图谱，搜索大豆UniGene库，成功鉴定出4个蛋白质，分别是GST9、GST10、种子成熟蛋白PM36和26ku未知蛋白；并对这些蛋白质在耐盐性不同品种中可能作用进行讨论。

To investigate the resistance mechanism of different soybean cultivars to salt tolerance the whole proteins of soybean seedlings from the salt-tolerant cultivar Lee 68 and salt-sensitive cultivar N 2899 were compared using proteomic analysis. Proteins were extracted using a trichloroacetic acid/acetone protocol, separated by two-dimensional electrophoresis and stained with coomassie brilliant blue. On the pH 4.0-7.0 2-DE gels there were about 650 protein spots, in which there were 52 differentially expressed spots in abundance between the 2-DE maps of the Lee 68 and N 2899 soybean seedlings. Then 6 proteins were identified by MALDI-TOF-MS. The peptide mass fingerprint was searched against the soybean UniGene database and 4 proteins were successfully identified. They were GST 10, GST 9, seed maturation protein PM 36 and hypothetical 26.0 ku protein. A possible role of these proteins was discussed between different salt-tolerant cuhivars.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analysis from on optimization of chlorella vulgaris culture with extracts from cow dung and its oil content
牛粪浸出液培养微藻系统优化及含油率分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ding Aijun, Nanjing University of Technology, Dafeng (China), Dafeng Institute of Marine Industry
Liang Ying, Nanjing University of Technology, Dafeng (China), Dafeng Institute of Marine Industry
Jia Mingliang, Nanjing University of Technology, Dafeng (China), Dafeng Institute of Marine Industry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 旨在研究利用牛粪浸出液对球藻生长及脂肪结累的影响。牛粪经处理，按浓度50g/L浸出培养液，设计6个试验组（体积比为1:9、2:8、4:6、6:4、8:2、9:1）及2个对照组对球藻进行培养，利用测定叶绿素总量计算其生长量，同时对藻种进行鉴定和脂肪含量测定。研究结果显示，通过18S rDNA分析本实验藻种属于普通小球藻；牛粪浸出液培养球藻适宜体积比为6:4，且含脂率达0.57，远远高于BG11。结果表明牛粪浸出液可用于球藻培养，且是提高球藻脂肪含量的另一种途径。

The study aims at the effects of the lipid extracts from cow dung on the growth and fat accumulation of Chlorella vulgaris. On the basis of concentration (50 g/L) of culturing liquid extracted from treated dung, 6 test groups were designed on the volume ratios of 1:9, 2:8, 4:6, 6:4, 8:2, 9:1 and 2 control groups culture Chlorella vulgaris. The tests included identification of species, determination of fat content and calculation of growth amount by total chlorophyll. In conclusion, Chlorella vulgaris sp. for tests belonged to Chlorella vulgaris according to 18S rDNA analysis. It was suitable for growth in the culturing liquid 6:4 (v/v), and the fat content was 0.57 in it obviously higher than that in BG11. The results show that liquid extracts from cow dung can be used for culture of Chlorella vulgaris, and increases the fat content in it.

ags:resource.dc:title: Establishmen and application of PCR method for detection of cattle Eperythrozoonosis
肉牛附红细胞体PCR检测方法的建立与初步应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Lanjiao, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology
Tao Qingsong, Yichun City Animal Husbandry Science Institute of Jiangxi Province, Yichun (China)
Huang Zhihai, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Animal Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为建立一个能快速准确的检测出肉牛附红细胞体的分子生物学诊断方法，及时监控好人畜共患病。试验根据Genbank中发表的肉牛附红细胞体16SrRNA序列设计一对特异性引物，通过PCR方法，对肉牛附红细胞体基因组DNA进行扩增。结果表明：扩增出了一段412bp的DNA片段，与Genbank中发表的肉牛附红细胞体序列同源性为98%。将建立的PCR方法对大肠杆菌、弓形体、胸膜肺炎放线杆菌的DNA进行检测为阴性，检测肉牛附红细胞体DNA的最低浓度为1.23ng/μL。该方法快速、准确、特异性好、灵敏度高，为肉牛附红细胞体病的临床诊断提供了新的方法。

In order to establish a diagnostic method of molecular biology that can rapidly and accurately detect cattle Eperythrozoon to survey and prevent and control zoonoses, a pair of specific primers were designed according to the published sequence data 16s ribosomal RNA gene of beef cattle Eperythrozoon from Genbank to amplify genomic DNA of cattle Eperythrozoon. The result showed that the targeted gene fragment was 412 bp in length and 98% identical to the published data. The genomic DNA of Escherichia coli, Toxo-plasm and Actinobacillus pleuropneumoniae ity of the assay was 1.23 ng/μL of DNA was amplified by the method, the result was negative. It suggested that the method is a rapid, accurate, specific and sensitive diagnostic method for cattle Eperythrozoon.

ags:resource.dc:title: An experimental study on the treatment of aquaculture wastewater on wetland
湿地处理水产养殖废水的实验研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Min, Nanchang Hangkong University, Nanchang (China), College of Environmental and Chemical Engineering
Liang Yue, Nanchang University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory of Poyang Lake Environment and Resource Utilization of Ministry of Education
Liu Xiaozhen, Nanchang Hangkong University, Nanchang (China), College of Environmental and Chemical Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 针对水产养殖废水污染负荷高，而其养殖行业的利润低的特点，提出氧化塘的处理工艺。以鹌鹑粪作为肥料，以水葫芦为主要的水生生物，研究氧化塘对水产养殖废水的处理效果，比较水生植物为水葫芦的氧化塘和自然湿地对水产养殖废水中各污染物指标的处理效果。实验结果表明，经过1周的时间，氧化塘对废水中的COD、TN、TP的平均去除率可达到61.35%、59.16%、64.94%，而自然湿地对废水中的COD、TN、TP的去除率为38.46%、62.43%、66.09%；2种处理结果相比，水生植物为水葫芦的氧化塘对COD的去除效果更好，对TN、TP的净化效果相近。

Aiming at the high pollution load of aquaculture wastewater and the low level of profits, oxidation pond treatment process was proposed. The fertilizer for the experiment was quail dung, and the aquatic creature was eichhornia crassipes. The objective was to study the effect of oxidation pond on aquaculture wastewater treatment and compare the effect on aquaculture wastewater treatment between oxidation pond and natural wetland. After treatment for one week, the results showed that the average removal rates of COD, TN and TP were 61.35%, 59.16% and 64.94% respectively by oxidation pond, but the removal rates of COD, TN and TP were 38.46%, 62.43% and 66.09% separately by natural wetland. From the comparison between the two treatment, oxidation pond had better removal rate of COD, but the two treatments had similar removal rates of TN and TN.

ags:resource.dc:title: Experiment on the efficacy of non-woven fabric bands with Beauveria bassiana against Hylobitelus xiaoi Zhang
无纺布白僵菌剂林间防治萧氏松茎象试验研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wen Xiaosui, Jiangxi Foresty Harmful Organism Control and Quarantine Bureau, Nanchang (China)
Liu Jisheng, Anfu Forest Pest and Disease Control Station, Anfu (China)
Shi Mingqing, Jiangxi Foresty Harmful Organism Control and Quarantine Bureau, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过林间试验，研究无纺布白僵菌剂对萧氏松茎象的防治效果。结果表明，2010年和2011年在无纺布白僵菌条防治试验样地，萧氏松茎象虫口密度分别下降47.5%和64.0%，而对照区的虫口密度分别上升7.02%和4.92%；防治效果分别为51.0%和65.7%。用诱捕器开展林间萧氏松茎象成虫数量及其白僵菌感染情况调查。结果表明，2010年和2011年在防治试验样地和对照样地诱捕到的成虫数量比分别为52.5%和49.1%；在防治试验样地诱集到的萧氏松茎象成虫白僵菌感染率分别达到74.6%和78.2%。因此认为，林间使用无纺布白僵菌条防治能够明显抑制萧氏松茎象种群的上升。

The non-woven fabric bands with Beauveria bassiana was applied to test the control effect on Hylobitelus xiaoi Zhang in the slash pine forest plots in 2010 and 2011. The test results indicated that the pine weevil populations decreased by 47.5% in 2010 and 64.0% in 2011 while the populations in the CK increased by 7.02% and 4.92%, and that the control effects were 51.0% and 65.7%, respectively. Pitfall traps were employed to monitoring the H. xiaoi adults in the field. The percent rates of weevils trapped in the plots to those in the CK were 52.5% in 2010 and 49.1% in 2011. And infection rates of the adults trapped in the 2 years were 74.6% and 78.2%, respectively. Therefore it is reasonable to conclude that using non-woven fabric bands with B. bassiana against H. xiaoi is considerably effective to reduce the weevil abundance.

ags:resource.dc:title: Optimization of extraction techniques for the essential oil in leaves in Cinnamomum camphora by response surface methodology
响应面法优化樟树叶精油水蒸汽蒸馏提取工艺

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Hu Wenjie, Nanjing Forestry University, Nanjing (China), College of Forest Resources and Environment
Gao Handong, Nanjing Forestry University, Nanjing (China), College of Forest Resources and Environment
Jiang Xiangmei, Jiangxi Forestry of Academy, Nanchang (China), Engineering Technology Research Center of Cinnamomum camphora of the State Forestry Administration

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用单因素试验方法、3因素3水平响应面分析方法，对影响水蒸汽蒸馏法提取樟树叶精油的提取时间、水料比、提取功率3个关键因素进行了优化试验。结果表明：优化提取条件为提取时间65min，水料比12.495:1，提取功率1 194W。在此条件下，2月份和5月份两次采集的叶样，其叶精油提取率分别为1.427%和2.139%。

With the single-factor test and then the three-factor and three-level response surface analysis (RSA), the extraction conditions for the leaf essential oil in Cinnamomum camphora by water vapor distillation were optimized. The result indicated that the optimization extraction conditions were as follows: the extraction time was 65 min, and the ratio of water to material was 12.495:1, and the extraction W. Then, the extraction rate of the essential oil in the leaves collected in February was 1.427%, in the leaves collected in May. power was 1 194 and was 2.139%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation and identification of a paclitaxel-producing endophyte from Taxus chinensis var. mairei
一株产紫杉醇的南方红豆杉内生菌的分离与鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Kuntai, Jiangxi Agriculture University, Nanchang (China), College of Biological Science and Engineering
Peng Weifu, Jiangxi Agriculture University, Nanchang (China), College of Biological Science and Engineering
Zhou Jia, Jiangxi Agriculture University, Nanchang (China), College of Biological Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以南方红豆杉植株为材料，采用组织块法从中开展内生菌的分离筛选，并借助薄层层析和高效液相色谱对内生菌的发酵产物进行分析，最终获得1株具有产紫杉醇能力的内生菌。根据菌株形态学观察以及18S rRNA序列分析，结果表明该菌株属于间座壳属（Diaporthe sp.），间座壳属内生菌产紫杉醇尚属首次报道。

The endophytic strains were isolated and screened from Taxus chinensis vat. mairei by the tissue separating method, as a result a paclitaxel-producing endophyte was obtained by thin-layer chromatog-raphy (TLC) and high performance liqiud chromatography (HPLC) analysis. Based on the morphological characteristics and 18S rRNA sequences analysis, this endophyte belonged to Diaporthe sp.. Worth notice, it is the first report that Diaporthe sp. can produce paclitaxel.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of loading density of bulk curing barn on aroma components of flue-cured lumbar and upper tobacco leaves
装烟密度对密集烘烤中上部烟叶香气质量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: He Fan, Henan Agricultural University, Zhengzhou (China), College of Tobacco Science
Wang Tao, Henan Agricultural University, Zhengzhou (China), College of Tobacco Science
Fan Junhui, Henan Agricultural University, Zhengzhou (China), College of Tobacco Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以烤烟品种云烟87中部叶和上部叶为试验材料，研究密集烤房3种装烟密度（42.09kg/m3、56.12kg/m3和70.15kg/m3）对烤后烟叶香气质量的影响。结果表明，密集烤房适当增加装烟密度能在一定程度上增加烤后烟叶类胡萝卜素降解产物、类西柏烷类、美拉德反应产物、新植二烯及其香气物质总量，但苯丙氨酸类有所减少；中部烟叶以装烟密度56.12kg/m3时烤后烟叶新植二烯和香气物质总量最高，其余香气物质含量略低于70.15kg/m3；上部烟叶随着装烟密度的增加，香气物质总量有升高的趋势，以装烟密度70.15kg/m3时香气质量改善效果最好。

Effects of three kinds of loading density (42.09 kg/m3, 56.12 kg/m3 and 70.15 kg/m3) on aroma components of flue-cured tobacco leaves were studied by using middle and upper leaves of tobacco cultivar Yunyan 87 in bulk curing barn. The results showed that, the products of degraded carotenoid, cembratriendiol and maillard reaction, neophytadiene and total content of aroma components could increase to some extent by increasing the loading density appropriately in bulk curing barn, but products of phenylalanine decreased. With the loading density of 56.12 kg/m3, the middle leaves had the highest the neophytadiene and total content of aroma components, and their content of other aroma components were lower than that of the leaves with the loading density of 70.15 kg/m3. With the increasing of loading of the upper leaves were on the rise. With the increase of loading density of the top leaves, the total content of aroma components 70.15 kg/m3, the aroma quality was the best.

ags:resource.dc:title: The status guo of the application of LED light source in seedling breeding and its prospects in the breeding of forestry seedlings
LED光源在种苗繁育中的应用现状及前景分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhou Jinye, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Landscape Architecture
Ding Guochang, Chinese Fir Engineering Research Center of Fujian, Fuzhou (China)
Wang Ting, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Forest

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 近些年，由于其具有体积小、耗能低、发热少、寿命长、波长稳定等特点，LED光源在植物人工光源领域的应用越来越广泛；通过分析LED光源在观赏植物、农作物、药用植物以及果树蔬菜繁育中的研究现状，从而对LED光源在林木种苗快繁的应用前景和发展方向进行展望。

Thanks to its small size, low power consumption, little heat, long life, and wavelength stabilization, LED light source is widely used in the field of plant artificial light source in recent years. Through analyzing the research status of LED light source in ornamental plants, crops research, medicinal plants, fruit trees and vegetables breeding, this paper looks ahead of the application prospects and the direction of development of LED light source in the breading of forest seedlings.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of different fertilizing methods on yield of Moso bamboo forest damaged by ice-snow disaster
不同施肥措施对江西毛竹冰雪灾后林分产量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Haixia, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)
Peng Jiusheng, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)
Yang Guangyao, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Jiangxi Provincial Key Laboratory for Bamboo Germplasm Resources and Utilization

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以2008年特大低温雨雪冰冻灾害后江西受灾毛竹林为研究对象，在江西3个毛竹集中分布区的毛竹主产县（区）设置试验和对照林分，研究竹腔施肥、竹蔸施肥及其组合对灾后毛竹林笋、材产量的影响。结果表明：各项施肥技术措施均能有效提高林分产量，而新竹竹腔施肥不仅能更好地提高竹林产量，较之其他施肥措施，施肥成本和施肥劳动强度都最低，特别适合在灾后林区大面积推广使用。

Taking the Moso bamboo after ice-snow disaster in 2008 in Jiangxi Province as the research object, experiment and contrast stands were set up in major bamboo regions in Jiangxi Province to study the effects of cavity-injecting fertilization, bamboo stump fertilizing and their combination on the yields of bamboo shoots and wood production after ice-snow disaster. The results showed, the production of bamboo could be effectively increased by fertilization after ice-snow disaster, the cavity-injecting fertilization to younger bamboo not only increased the production, but also lowered the cost and labour intesity compared with other fertilizing patterns, particularly suitable for popularization in bamboo stands after ice-snow disaster on a large scale.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of colibacillosis on intestine ultrastructure of rabbits under different treatment conditions
不同治疗条件下对仔兔大肠杆菌病肠道显微结构的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Lianlian, Shandong Institute of Commerce and Technology, Jinan (China)
Zhang Yinglong, Shandong Institute of Commerce and Technology, Jinan (China)
Yang Haiying, Shandong Institute of Commerce and Technology, Jinan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究不同治疗条件下，大肠杆菌对仔兔肠道显微结构的影响。将40只兔随机分为4组，实验兔经腹腔注射大肠杆菌，兔发病后观察临床症状、大体剖检变化、病理组织学变化以及超微结构的变化。结果显示：大肠杆菌感染组（G2）兔精神沉郁，出现腹泻症状，十二指肠有散在出血点，肠壁变薄。光镜下小肠绒毛脱落、断裂。扫描电镜下肠绒毛顶端脱落、微绒毛脱落、排列杂乱、上皮细胞脱落。庆大霉素治疗组（G3）和乳酸菌素治疗组（G4）绒毛、微绒毛和上皮细胞脱落现象减轻，2种药物对兔大肠杆菌均有有效的治疗作用，乳酸菌素治疗组（G4）肠道粘膜恢复时间比庆大霉素治疗组（G3）明显缩短。表明庆大霉素和乳酸菌素对大肠杆菌感染腹泻有显著的治疗作用，在疾病恢复期乳酸菌素的治疗效果好于庆大霉素。

In order to study the intestinal micro-structure in diarrhea rabbits after infection of E. coli under different treatment conditions, forty rabbits were randomly divided into four groups, intraperitoneal injection of E. coli was conducted to the test rabbits. The pathological microscopy (LM) and scanning electron microscopy (S group (G2) appeared depressed, and had diarrhea, there changes of intestinal mucosae were observed by light EM). The results showed that, the E. coli infection were sporadic bleeding points on duodenum, the intestinal wall became thinner. Through the LM, the intestine villi were broken. Under the SEM, intestinal villi, microvillus and the epithelial cells were cluttered. The gentamicin treatment group (G3) and the lactobacillus treatment group (G4) the shedding of villi, microvilli and epithelial ceils lessened. In the lactobacillus treatment group (G4) intestinal mucosae recovered much quicker than the gentamicin treatment group (G3). The results suggested that, lactolin and gentamicin could significantly control diarrhea of rabbits infected by E. coli, the effect of lactolin was better than that of gentamicin in the recovery period.

ags:resource.dc:title: The quantification of tea appearance quality using Hyper-spectral imaging
茶叶外形品质的高光谱图像量化分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Ruimei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering
Wu Yanhong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering
Ai Shirong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Software

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为弥补感官审评方法评定茶叶品质存在的不足，提出采用高光谱图像来量化分析茶叶的外形感官品质。以碧螺春名优绿茶为对象，采集其高光谱图像，利用主成分分析法从原始高光谱图像中优选出3个波长（768.74，827.54，886.83nm）下的特征图像。分别提取每个特征图像的颜色特征和纹理特征，3个特征图像共提取90个特征变量。利用BP神经网络方法建立特征变量与外形感官评分之间的相关模型，模型对预测集样本的相关系数为0.859，预测均方根误差为3.611。在预测集中，对模型的预测值与实际评分值进行t检验时，预测值与实际值无显著差异，说明所建模型是准确可靠的。

Hyper-spectral imaging technique was used for the quantitative evaluation of tea quality so as to make up the deficiency of sensory evaluation method for evaluating green tea quality. “Biluochun”, a famous green tea was used as the test object. Hyper-spectral image data of tea were obtained by using a hyper-spectral imaging system based on spectrometer. Three feature images at 768.74 nm, 827.54 nm and 886.83 nm were optimized by principal component analysis method from raw hyper-spectral images. Color feature and texture feature were extracted from each feature image, and 90 feature variables in all were obtained from the three feature images. The model between the feature variables and sensory scores of tea appearance was developed by BP-ANN method. The correlation coefficient (R) and root mean square error of prediction (RMSEP) of BP-ANN model were 0.859 and 3.611 in the prediction set, respectively. 25 samples in prediction set were used to do T-test, and the result indicated that there was on significant difference between the actual sensory scores and the prediction values of the model. The result showed that the developed model was accurate and reliable.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on effects of inoculating lac insects on photosynthetic characteristics of Pueraria wallichii during drought
干旱时期放养紫胶虫对马鹿花光合生理生态特征影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Xiaobo, Southwest Forestry University, Kunming (China), College of Environmental Science and Engineering
Li Fuqiang, Forestry Bureau of Nujiang Canton, Nujiang (China)
Yang Guicheng, Forestry Bureau of Nujiang Canton, Nujiang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用美国Li-COR公司生产的Li-6400便携式光合测定仪，选择旱季无云条件下，在试验地测定并比较放养紫胶虫的马鹿花和未放养紫胶虫的马鹿花的光合生理生态特征的日变化。结果表明：放养紫胶后马鹿花具有较低的净光合速率、蒸腾速率、气孔导度、气孔限制值、较低的水分利用效率和较高的胞间CO2浓度。相关性分析表明，影响马鹿花Pn下降的主要是非气孔因素，且同一环境因子对于放养紫胶虫和未放养紫胶虫马鹿花Pn的影响不同。

Under natural condition with inoculated lac insects and without, diurnal changes of photosynthetic characteristics of Pueraria wallichii inoculated lac insect were measured with the li-6400 portable photosynthesis system. The results showed that Pueraria wallichii with inoculated lac insects had smaller net photosynthetic rate (Pn), transpiration rate (Tr), stomatal conductance (Gs), value of stomatal limitaition (Ls), water use efficiency (WUE) and higher intercellular CO2 concentration (Ci). Correlation analysis showed that the cause of the depression of Pn of Pueraria wallichii was non-stomatal factors, and the same environmental factor had different impact on net photosynthetic rate of Pueraria wallichii with inoculated lac insects and without inoculated lac insects.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analyse on wood supply potential of mature and over-Mature forest resources in China
国内成过熟林资源短期内木材供给潜力分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Tonglin, Southwest Forestry University, Kunming (China), College of Computer and Information
Xu Weiheng, Southwest Forestry University, Kunming (China), College of Computer and Information
Su Zhifang, Kunming University, Kunming (China), Department of Mathematics

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 我国的木材需求日益增长，国内森林资源总量和质量不足，木材供给压力越来越大。第7次普查期间，国内采伐林木蓄积的综合利用率仅56%，超额采伐比例接近60%。而从成过熟林资源来看，近5年内每年可采伐蓄积约49 928.8万m3，87.7%集中在天然林，约3/4处于南部地区。如果保持原有的综合利用率，国内木材供给远远不能满足国内的木材需求。提高综合利用率，控制超额采伐，是缓解供需矛盾、保护国内森林资源亟需重视的问题。

China’s demand for timber keeps growing, but the quantity and quality of domestic forest resources are not satisfying, timber supply pressure also keeps increasing. In the seventh forest inventory period, the comprehensive utilization rate of forest reserves was only 56%, and the over-harvesting ratio reached nearly 60%. According to the mature and over-mature forest resources data, the reasonable annual harvesting in the coming five years is about 4 992.88 million m3, of which 87.7% is concentrated in the natural forest, and about 3/4 is located in the southern region. If the original comprehensive utilization is maintained, we are not able to meet the increasing demand for timber. So close attention should be paid to promoting the comprehensive utilization rate and controlling over-harvested phenomena.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analysis on the influencing factors in cation exchange capacity of yellow-cinnamon soil
黄褐土CEC影响因子分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cha Lisi, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), School of Land Science and Technology
Wu Kening, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), School of Land Science and Technology
Ju Bin, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), School of Land Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 运用多元回归分析方法，探讨黄褐土土壤阳离子交换量（CEC）与影响因子之间的关系。结果表明，土壤CEC与黏粒、pH之间存在正相关关系，而与砂粒、粉粒之间则存在显著的负相关。其中与黏粒的相关系数最大，pH次之。

The influencing factors in CEC of yellow-cinnamon soil were studied with multiple regression analysis pH, and was the methods. The results showed that CEC of the soil displayed significant positive correlations with clay, significant negative correlation with sand and silt. The correlation coefficient between CEC and clay biggest, followed by pH.

ags:resource.dc:title: Studies on fertilization effect and recommended amount for early rice based on “3414” field trials
基于“3414”试验的早稻施肥效应与推荐肥料研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ye Xiangsheng, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Resources and Environment
Wen Jianping, Agricultural Bureau of Ji’an City, Ji’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为水稻促进合理施肥、减少资源浪费和提高施肥效益，研究采用“3414”试验方案，连续3年在江西省吉安市13个县（市、区）开展早稻大田施肥试验，研究氮磷钾肥料施用效应，建立土壤氮、磷、钾养分分级指标和不同分级范围的推荐施肥量。结果表明：（1）试验区域有较高的土壤碱解氮（116～209mg/kg），但相对产量（60%～90%）较低，施用氮肥增产效果显著,推荐最佳施氮（N）量为120～240kg/hm2；（2）试验区域土壤速效钾含量在61～119 mg/kg，相对产量85%～95%，施用钾肥有较好的增产效果，推荐最佳施钾（K2O）量为50～120kg/hm2；（3）试验区域土壤有效磷含量分布在11～31mg/kg，相对产量在90%～100%，磷肥施用效果不明显，推荐最佳施磷（P2O5）量为0～70kg/hm2。因此，在当前水稻施肥实践中要进一步加强氮肥的合理施用及其高效施肥技术研究，同时注意增施钾肥，因土酌情施用磷肥。

In order to improve rational fertilization, reduce resource waste and enhance fertilizer recovery, the soil nutrient classification index for N, P, K, and the corresponding recommended fertilization amount were studied based on the early rice “3414” field trials conducted for three years in succesion in Ji’an, Jiangxi Province. The results showed that: (1) though the high soil alkali-N content ranged from 116 to 209 mg/kg in the trial spots, the relative yield was low (60% - 90%) and the effect of N fertilization on increasing grain yield was significant, and the optimal N fertilization – 120 - 240 kg/hm2 was recommended; (2) The soil available K content ranged from 61 to 119 mg/kg and the relative yield was 85% - 95%, showing evident effect of K fertilization and the optimal K fertilization -- 50 - 120 kg/hm2 was recommended; (3) The soil available P content was 11 - 31 mg/kg and the relative yield was 90% - 100%, this resulted in less effect of P fertilization on yield and the optimal P fertilization – 0 - 70 kg/hm2 was recommended. In a word, the study on N fertilization technology should be enhanced based on the current fertilization practices. In addition, K fertilization should be recommended in most fields, and P fertilization should be controlled according to soil available P.

ags:resource.dc:title: Yield estimation on Jiangxi early rice based on MODIS data
基于MODIS遥感资料的江西省双季早稻估产研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Xuehui, Nanchang Hangkong University, Nanchang (China)
Huang Shu'e, Institute of Meteorological Research Jiangxi Province, Nanchang (China)
Yan Liushui, Nanchang Hangkong University, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用MODIS植被指数产品,对江西省双季早稻总产进行的估算。以江西省行政区划为分区，2005—2009年江西省8个主要水稻种植区域为样本，对分区内早稻总产与分区内增强型植被指数值之和进行相关性分析，结果表明二者之间显著相关。通过建立一元线性回归与多元回归方程的方法构建了江西省早稻估产模型，利用2001—2004年及2010年的数据对模型进行验证与预测，综合均方根误差与相对误差选择出了最优模型。最优模型表明利用分蘖期与拔节期两个时期的增强型植被指数建立的模型最适宜江西省水稻总产的估算，利用该模型对江西省2010年省级早稻总产估算的结果与统计值的相对误差为0.8%，对江西省双季早稻的遥感估产工作具有一定的指导意义。

MODIS vegetation index products were used to estimates total yield production of early rice in Jiangxi Province. The study of rice yield estimation division was based on the administrative divisions of Jiangxi Province. Eight major rice-growing regions of Jiangxi Province were chosen as the samples, An analysis of the total production of early rice and the sum of the enhanced vegetation index value in the eight divisions during 2005 - 2009 was made. The correlation analysis results showed that they were significantly related. The yield estimation models were built through the establishment of linear regression and multiple regression equations. One optimal model was selected with an integrated consideration of their root mean square error and relative error with the data of 2001 to 2004. The optimal model established with the enhanced vegetation index during the tillering and jointing stages showed that the two periods were most appropriate for the estimation of the total rice production in Jiangxi Province. The relative error of the provincial production estimation result with the optical model is 0.8% which has certain significance for early rice yield estimation in Jiangxi Province.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on evaluation of general land use planning implementation based on the model of PSR-FUZZY
基于PSR-FUZZY模型的土地利用总体规划实施评价研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Qi, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), College of Land Science and Technology
Shi Xueyi, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), College of Land Science and Technology
Wang Ziling, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), College of Land Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 土地利用总体规划的实施评价既是规划实施管理的重要内容，又是新一轮规划修编的重要依据，因此探索有效可行的实施评价的方法对于完善土地利用总体规划的研究体系意义重大。在分析国内有关土地利用规划实施评价方法的基础上，将PSR框架模型与模糊综合评价法结合建立基于PSR-FUZZY模型的土地利用总体规划实施评价的方法，并应用于山西省侯马市。通过研究得出侯马市上一轮土地利用总体规划实施评价的结果为良，基本实现了规划的预期目标。PSR-FUZZY模型同时具备了层次系统系和模糊性，能够很好地应用于土地利用总体规划的实施评价，并且可以根据评价的结果分析原因，能够为新一轮规划的修编提供建议和依据。

General land use planning implementation is not only an important content of planning implementation administration, but also a basis for revision of the new round planning. So it is particularly important to explore effective and feasible methods for planning implementation evaluation in order to improve research system of general land use planning. In this paper, combined PSR framework model with fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method, the PSR-FUZZY model was established based on the analysis of the existing evaluation methods at home, and applied in Houma, Shanxi Province. The results indicated that the general land use planning in Houma was successfully implemented and achieved expected benefits at large extent by evaluation. It was concluded that the PSR-FUZZY model could meet the requirements of the systematic and fuzziness and can be well applied to evaluation of implementation of general land use planning, and the cause of this implemented result could be analyzed according to this evaluation and provide the reference for the perfection of comprehensive land use planning.

ags:resource.dc:title: Establishment of DNA fingerprinting and analysis of genetic relationship among main strawberry (Fragaria ananassa) cultivars in southern China
基于SSR和SCAR标记的草莓主栽品种指纹图谱构建及亲缘关系分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xin Ya, Hangzhou Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou (China)
Ruan Songlin, Hangzhou Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou (China)
Ma Huasheng, Hangzhou Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用RAPD、EST-SSR和SCAR标记对南方主栽的26个草莓品种进行指纹图谱及遗传多样性分析，结果表明：已公开的24对引物中有22对能扩增出产物，其中有18对扩增出多态性，占可用引物的81.8%。选用7对作为核心标记引物，构建出其中23个品种的特异指纹图谱，使它们相互区分。并根据扩增带型进行聚类分析，绘制成南方主栽草莓品种亲缘关系树状图，为目前已经趋于混乱的南方引进和主栽草莓品种的鉴定提供有效的技术支撑。

RAPD, EST-SSR and SCAR markers were used to establish DNA fingerprinting and to analyze the genetic diversity among 26 main strawberry cultivars in Southern China. 22 primer pairs showed amplification among 24 published primer pairs, of which 18 primer pairs. Which accounted for 81.8% showed polymorphism. 7 pairs of primers were selected as the core markers, and used to establish DNA fingerprinting among 23 strawberry cuhivars, which could distinguish them clearly. Moreover, the clustering analysis and the dendrogram of main strawberry cuhivars in southern China were investigated according to the amplification pattern. The resuits provide effective technology support for the identification of chaotic varieties of main strawberry cultivars in southern China.

ags:resource.dc:title: Selection and evaluation method for agriculture experiment field base on geostatistics
基于地统计学的农业田间试验地选择及评价方法

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Yiqiang, Henan Agricultural University, Zhengzhou (China), College of Tobacco Science
Liu Guoshun, Henan Agricultural University, Zhengzhou (China), College of Tobacco Science
