Xi Hong’ang, Tobacco Company of Nanyang City, Nanyang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 土壤差异是田间试验最主要的常见误差来源，选取土壤肥力均匀一致的试验地是保证农业田间试验成功、有效降低试验误差、提高试验精确度的关键。本研究以地统计学为研究工具，在试验地养分含量空间变异性研究和肥力均匀性评价的基础上进行多小区的正交回归试验，建立了基于地统计学的农业田间试验地选择的新方法。结果表明，试验地中碱解氮、速效钾、全氮、全磷、全钾含量和pH值的空间变异程度都小于20%，相对均匀面积比都为100%；速效磷和有机质的空间变异程度大于20%，但相对均匀面积比分别为91.34%和95.70%，都大于80%。试验地土壤养分的空间分布虽存在差异，但空间变异性不明显，属于肥力较为均匀的烟田。在此基础上进行氮、磷、钾肥的正交回归试验，试验结果较为理想，在一定程度上说明所建立的基于地统计学的肥力均匀的试验地的选择方法及其评价方法较为合理。

Experiment field is a basic condition for agriculture experiment, and the spatial heterogeneity of soil nutrient is the main factor causing experiment errors. So it is of great importance to select a field whose spatial distribution of soil nutrient is relatively uniform for reducing experiment errors and eventually ensuring the success of field experiment. In this study, the experiment field was selected by geostatistics method, an evaluation method of soil nutrient spatial variability was established to evaluate the spatial variability of soil nutrient, and a field experiment with the design of orthogonal regression was performed to test the selection method of agricultural experiment field and the evaluation method of soil spatial heterogeneity. The results showed that the rate of spatial variability of available N, available K, total N, total P, total K contents and pH value were all less than 20%, and their area rate of relative uniformity were 100%, which showed the spatial distribution of these soil nutrients were relatively uniform. The rate of spatial variability of available P and organic matter were all larger than 20%, but their/area rates of relative uniformity were all larger than 80% (91.34% and 95.70% respectively), which also showed that the spatial distribution of the two soil nutrients were relatively uniform. Though the spatial distribution of soil nutrient was not absolutely uniform, the spatial variability was not significant, and the fields’ fertility was relatively uniform. The experiment results of orthogonal regression design also indicated that the selecting way for experiment field and the evaluation method for soil nutrient spatial variability based on geostatistics are reasonable.

ags:resource.dc:title: Correlation of panicle with flag leaf related traits in Jiangxi late-season indica super rice
江西晚稻超级稻穗、叶性状特征及其相互关系

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Shi Huan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Yu Qiuying, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
He Haohua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以江西超级晚籼稻代表品种淦鑫688和五丰优T025为试材，汕优46为对照，分析主穗穗部和剑叶性状特征。结果表明，淦鑫688和五丰优T025一、二次枝梗数、每穗粒数和旗叶宽均显著或极显著地高于汕优46，而千粒质量、剑叶长和叶面积均极显著低于对照。说明超级稻淦鑫688和五丰优T025较对照有明显的主穗枝梗数优势，换言之，枝梗数和穗粒数的提高是两晚稻超级稻增产的主要途径。相关分析表明一次枝梗数与二次枝梗数呈显著正相关；枝梗数与剑叶长、剑叶面积负相关；剑叶宽与剑叶长、剑叶面积和有效穗数负相关，与枝梗数正相关。说明枝梗数与剑叶长、剑叶面积之间存在矛盾，而这种矛盾可以通过剑叶宽来改善。

Two Jiangxi typical indica super rice cuhivars Ganxin 688 and Wufengyou T025 were used as the experimental materials and Shanyou 46 as the control. The characteristics of the main panicle and flag leaf were measured in field trials. The results showed that the primary branch number, secondary branch number, grain number per ear and flag leaf width in Ganxin 688 and Wufengyou T025 were significantly higher than those of the control cuhivar, but Ganxin 688 and Wufengyou T025 showed lower 1,000 - grain weight, flag leaf length and area than the control, showing that Ganxin 688 and Wufengyou T025 had advantages in the branch number compared with Shanyou 46. In other words, the enhancement of branch number and grain number was the major means for yield increase for the two cultivars of late season indica super rice. Correlation analysis showed that, the primary branch number showed a positive correlation with the secondary branch number, the branch number showed a negative correlation with the flag leaf length and flag leaf area, the flag leaf width showed a negative correlation with the flag leaf length, flag leaf area and panicle number, but positive correlation with the branch number. This indicated that there was contradictory between the branch number and leaf length and leaf area, but the contradictory could be mitigated by the leaf width.

ags:resource.dc:title: The chiral selection of Quizalofop-p-ethyl enantiomers on toxicity daphnia magna
喹禾灵对映体对大型溞毒性的手性选择性

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Yangguang, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), College of Science
Zhang Jinling, China Agricultural University, Beijing (China), College of Science
Liu Liang, Institute for the Control of Agrochemicals of China, Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 喹禾灵含有R-对映体与S-对映体,其中只有R体有除草活性，S体是不具有除草活性。目前，喹禾灵都以R体的形式（精喹禾灵）生产并应用。为研究喹禾灵与精喹禾灵对水生生物的手性选择性毒性，对喹禾灵与精喹禾灵进行了大型溞急性和21d慢性毒性试验，慢性毒性试验观测了大型溞的存活率、生长速度、产卵量、产卵时间等生物学指标。研究发现，喹禾灵和精喹禾灵对大型溞48h EC50分别为8.44mg/L和6.08mg/L，为中毒；大型溞21d慢性毒性试验对照组未发现冬卵现象，但喹禾灵在高浓度0.50mg/L时出现的雄溞；母溞产第一胎后，在显微镜下观察幼溞，未发现异常；精喹禾灵和喹禾灵对大型溞的产卵时间、产卵数以及母蚤脱皮次数均有不同程度的影响，且二者在脱皮次数、产卵时间和产卵数等方面有显著差异，对于大型溞体长差异不大、不同浓度的处理组之间差异也不明显。试验结果表明喹禾灵与精喹禾灵对斑马鱼毒性有显著的手性选择性。

Quizalofop-p-ethyl includes R-enantiomer and S-enantiomer. R-enantiomer has herbicidal activity, but S-enantiomer is inactive. At present, quizalofop-p-ethyl is produced and applied in the form of R-enantiomer (that is quizalofop-P). To study the chiral selective toxicity of quizalofop-p-ethyl and quizalofop-P on the aquatic specials, Daphnia magna acute toxicity test and 21 d chronic toxicity test of quizalofop-p-ethyl and quizalofop-P were conducted. Through the chronic toxicity test, the biological indicators of survival rate, growth rate, fecundity and egg lying time were observed. The result showed that 48h-EC50 of quizalofop-p-ethyl and Quizalofop-P to Daphnia magna were 8.44 mg/L and 6.08 mg/L respectively, which indicated moderate toxicity. Winter egg phenomenon did not occure in 21d chronic toxicity test in the control group, but when it reached the high concentration of 0.50 mg/L of quizalofop-p-ethyl, male Daphnia magna occurred. The first zoea was normal under the microscope. The effects of Quizalofop-p-ethyl and Quizalofop-P on spawning time, number of eggs and numbers of molt were significantly different. The different effects on body length of Daphnia magna were noticeable. The differences in different concentrations of the treatment group were insignificant. As a result, it comes to a conclusion that quizalofop-p-ethyl and quizalofop-P show chiral selection to zebrafish.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research advances in genetic mapping and QTL in pepper
辣椒遗传图谱的构建与QTL定位研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zong Hongxia, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute
Zhou Kunhua, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute
Fang Rong, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对近十年来构建的辣椒遗传图谱和相关性状的QTL定位研究进展进行了总结分析，包括辣椒种内遗传图谱、种间遗传图谱和整合图谱的构建，以及抗病虫性状和细胞雄性不育恢复性等主要农艺性状的QTLs定位，并对相关研究中存在的问题进行了讨论，以期为辣椒分子标记辅助选择育种提供理论参考。

This paper summarizes the researches concerned with genetic mapping and QTLs analysis on related traits in pepper in the recent decade, including construction of intraspecific maps, interspecific maps, integrated maps, and the QTLs mapping of main agronomic traits such as disease and insect resistance traits, fertility restorer in pepper. The paper also discusses the problems about the related studies and the aim is to provide the theory reference for molecular marker-assisted selection of pepper.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the effect of ion-beam implanting on the families/clones of eucalyptus
离子注入对桉树不同家系单点生长的影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Guangyou, CAF, Guangzhou (China), Research Institute of Tropical Forestry
Xu Jianmin, CAF, Guangzhou (China), Research Institute of Tropical Forestry
Wu Shijun, CAF, Guangzhou (China), Research Institute of Tropical Forestry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对广东江门罗坑镇52个月生15个桉树家系/无性系的性状进行研究与综合排序，结果表明：15个家系/无性系的树高、胸径、单株材积、冠幅、枝下高、分枝和树皮率在家系/无性系间均存在着显著到极显著差异；共有4个家系平均单株蓄积超过对照无性系平均值0.084 35m3/株；以隶属函数法评定综合生长水平，排名前3的家系分别是206、213和188号，此3家系平均隶属函数值也超过2个对照无性系的平均值，生长最差的家系是182号。经离子注入与非注入家系隶属函数法评价后表明，综合生长排名前5家系均为离子注入家系，说明离子注入是一种具有广谱性促进生长的诱变育种方式。

The growth traits of 15 eucalyptus families/clones aged 52 months in middle Guangdong were analysed. The results showed that there were significant differences in growth traits among the different families/ clones. 4 families’ single volume (SV) was more than the CK clone’s average value 0.084 35 m3/S, and the 3 best families were No. 206, No. 213 and No. 188, the average subordinative function value of the 3 families was superior to that of the CK clone, the worst family was No. 182. The results of the analysis of average subordinative function values of the families showed that the best excellent 5 families in the 15 families/clones were those treated by ion implanting, and the ion-beam implanting could improve the growth level and is a broad-spectrum method in the mutation breeding of Eucalyptus families.

ags:resource.dc:title: The study of AI poison laxation with ten kinds of fungus in E. urophylla × E. grandis
内生真菌对缓解尾巨桉幼苗铝毒影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xie Anqiang, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Forest Ecology
Hong Wei, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Forest Ecology
Wu Chengzhen, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), Institute of Forest Ecology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过菌液浸泡的方法接种10株内生菌于尾巨桉幼苗，随之将幼苗进行铝胁迫试验，胁迫处理10d后，测量各项生理生化指标：过氧化物酶（SOD）、丙二醛含量（MDA）及游离脯氨酸（PRO）含量。处理D、A和E的过氧化物酶含量分别增加53.11%、38.80%和37.97%；处理A、D和E的丙二醛含量分别减少50.33%、48.33%和44.54%；处理D、A和E的游离脯氨酸含量分别增加50.84%、35.75%和32.96%。菌种A、D、E具有较强的提高植株铝胁迫抗性的能力，可以尝试进行推广试验。

Aluminum stress was conducted on the seedlings of E. urophylla × E. grandis by ten kinds of eucalypt endophytic fungus immersion. The measurements of SOD content, MDA content and PRO content after ten days, showed that compared with the control the contents of SOD increased by 53.11%, 38.80% and 37.97% in treatments D, A and E; and the contents of MDA decreased by 50.33%, 48.33% and 44.54% in treatments D, A and E; and the contents of PRO increased by 50.84%, 35.75% and 32.96% in treatments D, A and E After inoculated with No. A, No. D, and No. E fungus, the aluminum-resistant capability of eucalyptus improved: greatly. It is worth popularization.

ags:resource.dc:title: Preparation of nanometer propolis and its effect on decreasing lipoidemia and anti-oxidation in rats
纳米蜂胶的制备及其对大鼠降血脂和抗氧化功能影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yan Weiyu, JAU, Nanchang (China), Honey Bee Research Institute
Xie Guoxiu, Institute of Occupational Disease Prevention, Nanchang (China)
Ding Huangjie, JAU, Nanchang (China), Honey Bee Research Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以乙酸乙酯为油相，吐温-80和司盘-80为表面活性剂，制备纳米蜂胶水分散液。经测定，纳米蜂胶颗粒直径为270nm，浓度为9.56mg/mL。试验采用健康雄性SD大鼠，给予高脂颗粒饲料喂饲后第5天，大鼠眶静脉取血，测定血清总胆固醇（TC）、甘油三酯（TG）和高密度脂蛋白（HDL-C）值。高脂血症动物模型成功后，随机分为高剂量组（800mg/（kg.d）bw）、中剂量组（400mg/（kg.d）bw）、低剂量组（200mg/（kg.d）bw）和对照组。分组后连续灌胃纳米蜂胶45d，同时各组大鼠继续给予高脂颗粒饲料喂饲，之后各组大鼠取血测定TC、TG和HDL-C，并测定血液红细胞经H2O2诱导氧化后的溶血度。结果表明：纳米蜂胶高剂量组显著降低大鼠体质量，但对TC、TG和HDL-C值并无显著影响；纳米蜂胶试验组红细胞溶血度有降低趋势，但与对照组比较差异不显著。

Nanometer propolis was prepared with ethyl acetate as the oil phase, polysorbate-80 and Span-80 as the surfactant. The particle size of nanometer propolis was around 270nm, and its concentration was 9.56 mg/mL. Healthy male SD rats were fed with high-lipid pellet feed for 5 days, then blood from eyepit vein was collected to detect the levels of serum TC, TG and HDL-C. The rats were randomized into 4 groups. Different feeds for each group were arranged as follows: the control group (without propolis), the high dose group (800 mg/kg BW), the middle dose group (400 mg/kg BW) and the low dose group (200 mg/kg BW). Then they were fed with nanometer propolis and high-lipid pellet feed in the meantime for 45 d. The blood was collected on the 45th day, then the levels of serum TC, TG, HDL-C and red blood cell (RBC) hemolyses induced by H2O2 were detected. The result showed that the weight in the high dose group decreased significantly, but no difference was observed in TC, TG and HDL-C. The hemolysis of red blood ceils reduced in the experimental groups, but the difference was not significant compaced with that of the control.

ags:resource.dc:title: Determination of the contents of three flavonoids in leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. and their dynamic changes
山蜡梅叶中3种黄酮类成分含量动态变化研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Nie Wei, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)
Fang Hailing, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)
Huang Lili, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 建立同时测定山蜡梅叶芦丁、槲皮素、山奈酚含量的方法以及分析含量动态变化。采用HPLC法测定不同采收时间山蜡梅叶中芦丁、槲皮素、山奈酚的含量，建立的HPLC分析方法能使3种黄酮类成分均达到基线分离。随着植株生长，山蜡梅叶中黄酮类成分从5月份开始显著累积，并首先生成槲皮素和山奈酚黄酮苷元类成分，经由黄酮苷元继续合成黄酮苷芦丁。从7月份开始，黄酮苷元类成分开始逐渐下降，转化为黄酮苷类成分芦丁。从5月到10月，黄酮类总含量呈现逐步递增趋势。该含量测定方法能简便快速的测定山蜡梅叶中多个黄酮类成分的含量，可以较全面地反映山腊梅叶药材质量；且从含量动态分析结果可知，8至9月份采收山蜡梅叶药材，容易获得较大生物产量和质量。

To develop a method for determination of three flavonoids (rutin, quercetin and kaempferol) in leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. and to analyze their dynamic changes. HPLC was used in determination of rutin, quercetin and kaempferol in leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. havested at different times. Results Three flavonoids were separated perfectly. With the growth of plant, flavonoids in leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. began to accumulate from May, and to synthesize flavonoid aglycone, as quercetin and kaempferol, firstly. Then, flavonoid glycoside, rutin, was synthesized from flavonoid aglycone. From July, the content of flavonoid aglycone began to reduce gradually, and transformed to flavonoid glycoside, rutin. From May to October, the total of flavonoids showed a gradual increasing tendency. Conclusion: This analysis method could be used to defermine many flavonoids in leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. quickly, and could reflect the quality of leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. more comprehensively. From result of content dynamic analysis, the fit harvest time of leaves of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv. was from August to September, and could obtain higher yield and better quality.

ags:resource.dc:title: Construction and primary analysis of suppression subtractive hybridization library of Eriocheir sinensis by Aeromonas hydrophila
嗜水气单胞菌诱导中华绒螯蟹消减文库的构建及初步分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Daxian, Nanchang University, Nanchang (China), College of Life Sciences and Food Engineering
Chen Minwen, Nanchang University, Nanchang (China), College of Life Sciences and Food Engineering
Jiang Kun, Nanchang University, Nanchang (China), College of Life Sciences and Food Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用抑制消减杂交（SSH）技术分离嗜水气单胞菌（Aeromonas hydrophila）诱导中华绒螯蟹（Eriocheir sinen-sis）差异表达的基因，以血淋巴细胞为材料，提取感染前后总RNA，经mRNA分离、cDNA合成、酶切、加接头后分别以感染组为检测子（tester）、对照组为驱动子（driver）进行正向抑制性消减杂交，以对照组为检测子、感染组为驱动子进行反向消减杂交，成功获得了中华绒螯蟹正反双向差异消减cDNA文库；对构建的文库进行菌落PCR鉴定发现，克隆中插入的片段主要分布在100～1 000bp之间；随机选取54个阳性克隆测序，共获得37条有效表达序列标签（EST）序列，将测序结果提交到GenBank进行Blastn比对发现，6条与其他物种的免疫基因序列具有较高的同源性。上述结果表明，构建的文库质量较好，且差异表达的与抗病相关的基因得到了富集，为进一步开展中华绒螯蟹抗病重要功能基因的筛选、克隆和功能分析奠定了基础，为揭示中华绒螯蟹抗病的分子机理提供了理论依据。

Subtractive cDNA library of differentially expressed genes during the bacterial infection of Eriocheir sinensis was constructed by using suppression subtractive hybridization (SSH) technique. The RNA and mRNA from hemocytes of normal crab and bacterial-challenging crab were firstly isolated. After mRNA was reversely transcribed into double strand cDNA, the two kinds of ds cDNA were denominated with Driver cDNA (normal crab) and Tester cDNA (bacterial challenging crab) separately. The results of analysis of Rsa I digestion, ligation and subtraction efficiency showed that the library was established successfully. Further PCR screening showed that the size of the inserts was mainly between 100 to 1000 bp. 54 positive clones were picked up and sequenced randomly, and the obtained 37 expressed sequence tags (EST) were compared with the sequences in NCBI with Blastn algorithm, the results showed that 6 EST of them had homology with the immune-related genes of others species. Analysis of the libraries indicates that the constructed library performed with high quality, which can be used in further study on the immune mechanism in crab.

ags:resource.dc:title: A genetic diversity analysis of oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense) in Taohu lake using RAPD and SSR
洮湖日本沼虾遗传多样性的RAPD和SSR分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Minying, CAFS, Wuxi (China), Freshwater Fisheries Research Center
Xu Dongpo, CAFS, Wuxi (China), Freshwater Fisheries Research Center
Duan Jinrong, CAFS, Wuxi (China), Freshwater Fisheries Research Center

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用RAPD技术和微卫星（SSR）技术对洮湖日本沼虾群体的遗传多样性进行了分析。RAPD分析结果表明，每个随机引物扩增出3～8条带，片段大小在100～1 000 bp之间，17个引物共扩增出95条清晰条带；其中48条表现为多态，多态位点比例为16.67%～66.67%，群体遗传杂合度为0.196 0，Shannon多样性指数为0.257 6。微卫星分析结果表明，5个微卫星基因座共检测到50个等位基因，群体平均观测杂合度为0.742 5，平均期望杂合度为0.776 6，平均多态信息含量为0.574 0。2种研究结果表明，洮湖日本沼虾种质资源状况良好，遗传多样性较丰富。

Technologies of RAPD and SSR were applied to detecting the genetic diversity of oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense) in Taohu Lake. The result of RAPD showed that 95 distinct bands in range of 100 - 1 000 bp were totally obtained by 17 random primers, with 3 - 8 bands amplified by each primer. 48 bands were polymorphic and the percentages of polymorphic loci were from 16.67% to 66.67%. The genetic heterozygosity was 0.196 0 and the index of Shannon diversity was 0.257 6. The result of SSR showed that 50 alleles were totally found in five microsatellite loci. The values of average observed and expected heterozygosity were 0. 742 5 and 0.776 6 respectively, while the mean PIC was 0.574 0. Both RAPD and SSR results revealed rich genetic diversity and good situation of germplasm resource of oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense) in Taohu Lake.

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation, Identification of biocontrol bacterium and its antagonistic activity against Fusarium oxyspirum f. sp. niveum
西瓜枯萎病生防菌XG-1的筛选、鉴定及其抑菌作用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sun Zhengxiang, Yangtze University, Jingzhou (China), College of Agriculture
Wang Feng, Yangtze University, Jingzhou (China), College of Agriculture
Huang Lin, Yangtze University, Jingzhou (China), College of Agriculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 从湖北省荆州西瓜植株内分离出内生菌97株，通过平板对峙和抑菌圈法筛选出对西瓜枯萎病菌（Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. niveum）具有较强拮抗作用的菌株XG-1。该菌株对棉花枯萎病菌（Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. vasinfectum）、棉花黄萎病菌（Verticillium dahliae Kleb）、棉花立枯病菌（Rhizoctonia solani Kühn）等5种病原真菌均具有抑制作用。通过形态特征观察及16S rDNA序列分析将菌株XG-1鉴定为枯草芽孢杆菌（Bacillussubtilis）。菌株XG-1能使西瓜枯萎病菌菌丝产生明显的畸形，对其孢子的萌发具有较强的抑制作用。

97 bacterium strains were isolated from samples of watermelon from Jingzhou City, Hubei Province. Strain XG-1 with a relatively higher antagonistic activity against Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. niveum was obtained via being co-cultured on plate and the diameters of the bacteriostasis circles were measured. Strain XG-1 has strong inhibiting effect on Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. vasinfectum, Verticillium dahliac Kleb, Rhizoctonia solani Ktthn etc. Strain XG-1 was identified as Bacillus subtilis based on morphological features observation and 16S rDNA sequence analysis. Treated by strain XG-1, FON showed obvious mycelial deformation and its spore germination was strongly inhibited.

ags:resource.dc:title: The effects of increasing temperature to accelerate germination and supplementing lighting in the seedling period on germination and growth of tobacco seeds
增温催芽及苗期补光对烤烟种子萌发及生长的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xuedong, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), College of Agonomy
Zou Kai, Hunan Tobacco Company, Shaoyang (China)
Yang Hongqi, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), College of Agonomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为克服湖南烟稻轮作烟区冬春季育苗光照不足的障碍，利用育苗工厂闲置烤房进行增温催芽，并采用蓝光与红光1:1比例的LED灯对春季封盘后烟苗进行补光，以研究催芽及补光技术及其对烟草种子萌发和幼苗生长的影响。试验结果表明，烤房增温催芽能有效缩短烤烟种子萌发时间15d以上，并且能明显提高烤烟种子出芽速度和整齐度；烤房温度控制在25～30℃，种子5d左右萌发出苗较为适宜。悬挂1m的600W LED灯补光对烟苗生长有明显的促进作用；云烟87烤烟种子的催芽出苗速度和补光出叶速率均快于K326，说明不同烤烟品种对光温的敏感性存在差异；经补光处理的烟苗移栽后生长率、株高和茎围均大于对照。

In order to overcome the barrier of insufficient light in the nursery of tobacco in the tobacco-rice rotation areas in Hunan province in winter and spring, the influences of increasing temperature to accelerate germination in the barn and supplementary lighting with the combination of LEDs of blue and red light at a ratio of 1:1 on germination and seedling growth were studies. The results showed that: with barn germination, the seed germination time was shortened by at least 15 days, the germination speed and uniformity of tobacco seedlings were significantly improved, the suitable conditions were: the temperature between 25 - 30℃, the seed germination period 4 - 5 days. LEDs light of 600 W and 1 m of height significantly promoted seedling growth; the seed germination speed and seedling leafing rate of Yunyan 87 were higher than those of K326, showing the differences in light and temperature sensitivity among different flue-cured tobacco varieties; the seedling growth rate, the plant height and the stem girth of the seedlings treeted with supplementary light were greater than those of the control.

ags:resource.dc:title: Bioactivity of methanol extracts from Justicia procumbens L. of Chinese medicine against Ostrinia furnacalis Guenee
中药爵床甲醇提取物对亚洲玉米螟的生物活性

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Mingcheng, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Li Baotong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Tang Limei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为评价爵床（Justicia procumbens L.）甲醇提取物对亚洲玉米螟取食、存活、生长发育的影响和产卵忌避效果，采用室内生测法测定了爵床提取物对亚洲玉米螟的触杀、胃毒、拒食、生长发育抑制和产卵忌避作用。结果表明，爵床甲醇提取物对亚洲玉米螟具有一定的触杀活性和较强的胃毒、拒食、生长发育抑制及产卵忌避活性。在触杀试验中，药后24h和72h爵床甲醇提取物32mg/mL处理亚洲玉米螟3龄幼虫死亡率分别为28.33%和43.33%。在选择性拒食试验中，药后24h和48h提取物对3龄幼虫的AFC50分别为3.10mg/mL和3.90mg/mL；在非选择性拒食试验中，药后24h和48h提取物对3龄幼虫的AFC50分别为4.44mg/mL和5.77mg/mL。在胃毒试验中，药后6d和7d提取物对3龄幼虫的LC50分别为5.09mg/mL和2.73mg/mL。爵床提取物对亚洲玉米螟幼虫的生长发育有明显抑制作用，表现在体质量、体质量增加量和相对生长率均显著降低，药后24h和48h IC50分别为0.84 mg/mL和0.53mg/mL。爵床提取物对亚洲玉米螟成虫产卵具有较强的忌避作用，药后24，48，72h提取物对亚洲玉米螟成虫的AOC50分别为6.73，9.71，12.29mg/mL。

In order to ascertain the bioactivity of methanol extracts from Justicia procumbens, their effects on contacting toxicity, antifeeding, stomach poisoning, inhibition of growth and oviposition deterrence of Ostrinia furnacalis Guenee were bioassayed in the greenhouse. The results showed that the extracts from J. procumbens L. had the bioactivity of certain contacting toxicity, strong antifeeding, stomach poisoning, growth inhibition and oviposition-deterrent activities against O. furnacalis. The mortality of the extracts at the concentration of 32 mg/mL against 3rd instar larvae of O. furnacalis within 24 and 48 h after treatment reached 28.33% and 43.33%, respectively. The choice and non-choice AFC50 values within 24 and 48 h after treatment in the anti-feeding test were 3.10, 3.90 mg/mL and 4.44, 5.77 mg/mL, respectively. The LC50 values of extracts against 3rd instar larvae of O. furnacalis within 6 and 7 d after treatment in the stomach poisoning test were 5.09 and 2.73 mg/mL, respectively. The extracts from J. procumbens also imposed great influence on the growth of O. furnacalis Guenee larvae. The treated larvae showed big reduction in body weight, weight gain and relative growth rate compared with the control. The IC50 values within 24 and 48 h after treatment were 0.84 and 0.53 mg/mL, respectively. The extracts from J. procumbens had strong oviposition deterrence against O. furnacalis adult, the AOC50 values within 24, 48 and 72 h after treatment were 6.73, 9.71 and 12.29 mg/mL, respectively.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of foliage application of trace elements on chestnut yield
“燕山早丰”叶面喷施微量元素的产量效应

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Guanghui, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing (China), Key Laboratory for Silviculture and Conservation of MOD
Guo Sujuan, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing (China), Key Laboratory for Silviculture and Conservation of MOD
Zou Feng, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing (China), Key Laboratory for Silviculture and Conservation of MOD

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用二次通用旋转组合设计，研究迁西地区盛花期喷施微肥（Fe、B、Mn）对板栗产量的影响，建立了数学模型，探讨各因素对板栗产量的作用规律。结果表明：以板栗产量为目标函数、3种肥料的浓度为自变量，建立板栗产量与Fe、B、Mn肥浓度之间的三元二次回归模型：Y=61.743＋67.128X1＋122.057X2＋126.736X3-135.473X1. -159.346X2. -135.546X3. ，拟合性良好（P〈0.01）；回归模型中，各因子对板栗产量的提高有促进作用，影响顺序为锰肥〉硼肥〉铁肥；在95%置信区间内，采用频率分析法进行模拟寻优，预测板栗产量在每667 m. 115 kg以上，优化后叶面喷肥方案为：硫酸亚铁0.154%～0.262%、硼酸0.169%～0.262%、硫酸锰0.191%～0.277%。

Using quadratic general rotation design approach, the experiment was carried out to investigate the effects of foliage application of three trace elements (Fe, B, Mn) on chestnut yield in Qianxi area; and the mathematical model was established to discuss the effect of trace elements on chestnut yield. The results were as follows the ternary quadratic regression model was established using chestnut yield and three kinds of fertilizer concentration as objective function and independent variables, and the fitness of the model was excellent. In the mathematical model, each factor could promote the chestnut yield, and the order of each factor affecting the yield was Mn, B, Fe. In the 95% confidence interval, the method of frequency analysis was used to optimize the fertilization scheme for a prediction yield of chestnut more than 115 kg/667 m2, i. e. FeSO4 0.154% - 0.262%, H3BO3 0.169% - 0.262%, MnSO4 0.191% - 0.277%.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on annual growth dynamics of one-year-old seedlings of five species of beech family
5种壳斗科树种实生苗年生长规律研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yu Lin, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)
Ye Jinshan, Jiangxi Academy of Forestry, Nanchang (China)
Zhu Heng, Shangrao City Forestry Research Institute, Shangrao (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以甜槠（Castanopsis eyrei）、石栎（Lithocarpus glaber）、麻栎（Quercus acutissima）、青冈（Cyclobalanopsis glau-ca）和碟斗青冈（Cyclobalanopsis disciformis）1a生实生苗为材料，观测研究生长期内高生长动态，采用有序样本聚类法进行苗木生长时期的划分，并利用Logistic模型对各树种苗高年生长节律进行拟合。结果表明：甜槠、石栎、麻栎、青冈和碟斗青冈实生苗的苗高年生长量平均值分别为12.37、26.69、61.11、35.00和43.76cm。苗高年生长均表现出明显“慢—快—慢”的节律，且具有明显的阶段性。用有序样本聚类法可以将苗高生长过程分为生长初期、生长盛期和生长后期3个时期，生长盛期集中在6月至10月，生长盛期内苗高净生长量占总生长量的55.10%～68.25%。Logistic模型能够拟合苗高年生长过程，决定系数均在0.98以上，经检验均达到极显著水平。对Logistic曲线进行求导确定了各树种苗高日生长的速生点和生长拐点，速生点出现最早的甜槠（71d）与最晚的青冈（124d）相差53d。研究结果可以为甜槠、石栎、麻栎、青冈和碟斗青冈的苗木科学管理提供理论依据。

One-year seedlings of five species of beech family (Castanopsis eyrei, Lithocarpus glaber, Quercus acutissima, Cyclobalanopsis glauca and Cyclobalanopsis disciformis) were chosen in this study. Through regularly observation of annual growth rhythm of the one-year seedling, the growth periods of dynamics of the annual height growth of the seedlings were analyzed quantitatively by ordered sample cluster analysis, and the seedling height growth patterns were simulated with Logistic curve. The results indicated that the average seedling heights at the age of one year of Castanopsis eyrei, Lithocarpus glaber, Quercus acutissima, Cyclobalanopsis glauca and Cyclobalanopsis disciformis were 12.37 cm, 26.69 cm, 61.11 cm, 35.00 cm and 43.76 cm respectively. The annual growth rhythm of the seedling height was shaped of “S” curve, and obviously in phases. Based on the ordered sample cluster analysis, the annual growth of the seedlings height can be divided into three phases: pre-growth period, fast-growth period and post-growth period. The fast-growth period appeared between June and October, and the height growth net increment was between 55.10% and 68.25% of the total increment in this period. The growth patterns of 5 species were fitted well with the Logistic curve; the determination coefficients were greater than 0.98, with a very significant level (0.01). The fastest and inflection points of the seedling height growth were determined after derivation calculus to above Logistic curve. The fastest growing point of Castanopsis eyrei (71 d) was earlier than that of Cyclobalanopsis glauca (124 d). The study provides guidance for scientific and rational culturing of Castanopsis eyrei, Lithocarpus glaber, Quercus acutissima, Cyclobalanopsis glauca and Cyclobalanopsis disciformis seedlings.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the hypolipemic and nonenzymatic glycosylation activity in vitro of crude polysaccharide form nine plants
9种植物粗多糖体外降脂及抑制非酶糖基化活性的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Wenjun, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Lab for Natural Products and Functional Food of Jiangxi Province
Ouyang Kehui, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Lab for Natural Products and Functional Food of Jiangxi Province
Xu WenFeng, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Lab for Natural Products and Functional Food of Jiangxi Province

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对9种植物中的多糖进行提取，并对其体外降脂和抑制蛋白质非酶糖基化的作用进行了测定。分别将9种植物样品经粉碎、脱脂、脱色处理后，用超声辅助70%乙醇浸提得粗多糖。以葡萄糖为标准样品，用紫外分光光度法测其在510nm处吸光度值并绘制标准曲线，以同样的方法测定样品中多糖的含量。随后进行体外降脂实验，通过比较有无抑制剂（提取液）加入的情况下，脂肪酶的活性差异，所得各提取物的抑制率，比较降脂活性大小；再进行体外非酶糖基化实验，去1mL提取液（加氨基胍做阳性对照，加水做阴性对照）与1mL磷酸缓冲液混合，90℃水浴40min，然后与乙二醛和牛血清白蛋白混合，反应液于37℃孵育15d，用荧光法在发射波长440nm激发波长365nm处测定糖基化产物的自发荧光值，计算9种植物粗提多糖对体外非酶糖基化反应的抑制率。结果表明9种植物多糖粗提物对脂肪酶均有较强的抑制作用，以蛇接骨草的抑制活性最强。在体外非酶糖基化试验中，9种植物对非酶糖基化终产物的生成均有较强的抑制作用，以芦荟粗多糖非酶糖基化抑制活性最强。

In this study, the hypolipemic and nonenzymatic glycosylation activity in vitro of rough polysaccharide from nine different plants were studied. The plant samples were smashed, degreased, bleached, then the rough polysaccharide was extracted with 70% ethanol and supersonic. The hypolipemic effect of the polysaccharide from nine plants was detected in vitro by measuring the activity of pancreatic lipase. In the nonenzymatic glycosylation experiment, the polysaccharide solution (1 mL) was mixed separately with PBS (1 mL), and water heated at 90℃ for 40 min to remove ethanol. Then the samples mixed with the reactive solution containing glyoxal and bovine serum albumin were incubated at 37℃ for 15 d, added with the aminoguanidine as the positive control while pure water as the negative control. The AGEs contents were assayed by the specific fluorescence with emission at 440 nm upon excitation at 365 nm to calculate the inhibitory effects of the polysaccharide from 9 different plants on nonenzymatic glycosylation. The results showed that the hypolipemic activities of rough polysaccharide from different plants on the lipase were different, and the activity of the Gynura procumbens (Lour.) Merr. was the best; and the nonenzymatic glycosylation activities of the polysaccharide from different plants were also varied, of all the polysaccharides, the effect of the Aloe was the best.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study of the tolerability of Streptococcus faecalis for pH, gastric juice, intestinal juice and bile salt
pH、胃液、肠液、胆盐对强微乳酸粪肠球菌耐受性影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Bao Linbing, JXAU, Nanchang (China), The Key Laboratory of Animal Nutrition and Feed Science of Higher learning Institutions of Jiangxi Province
Wu Xiangdong, JXAU, Nanchang (China), The Key Laboratory of Animal Nutrition and Feed Science of Higher learning Institutions of Jiangxi Province
Qu Mingren, JXAU, Nanchang (China), The Key Laboratory of Animal Nutrition and Feed Science of Higher learning Institutions of Jiangxi Province

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探讨强微乳酸粪肠球菌对pH、胃液、肠液、胆盐耐受性，采用不同pH值、牛瘤胃液、人工胃液、人工肠液及胆盐处理，测定乳酸粪肠球菌不同时间的存活率。结果表明：（1）乳酸粪肠球菌对酸性受性更强，对碱性尤其是强碱（pH=10）时，耐受性较差。（2）0.2%～0.4%浓度的胆盐处理乳酸粪肠球菌，对其存活率影响不大，但高浓度（0.5%）胆盐处理后，对其存活率影响较大。处理时间越长，存活率下降明显。（3）乳酸粪肠球菌对天然牛瘤胃液耐受性比较强，处理3h，存活仍有95%以上。而对人工胃液的耐受性明显下降，经人工胃液处理3h后，存活率仅37.93%。（4）乳酸粪肠球菌对人工肠液的耐受性在2～4 h内比较强，存活率仍然达到72.64%。而在4h以上时，存活率就比较低。强微乳酸粪肠球菌能耐受较低的pH，对胃液、肠液、胆盐耐受性较高，故在胃肠道中较稳定。

To investigate the tolerability of Streptococcus faecalis for pH, gastric juice, intestinal juice and bile salt, the survival rate of Streptococcus faecalis was determined after treatment by different levels of pH, bovine tumors gastric juice, artificial gastric juice, artificial intestinal juice and bile salt at different time. The results showed that: (1) the acid tolerance of Streptococcus faecalis was relatively strong, but the tolerance was poor for base, especially strong base (pH = 10); (2) the survival rate of Streptococcus faecalis was not greatly affected by the 0.2% - 0.4% concentration of bile salt, but the survival rate was greatly influenced by high concentration (0.5%) bile salt; the survival rate decreased obviously with the treating time; (3) the tolerance of Streptococcus faecalis was quite strong in natural bovine tumors gastric juice, the survival rate was still more than 95% after being treated for 3 hours; but the tolerability was decreased by the artificial gastric juice, which was only 37.93% after being treated for 3 hours; (4) the tolerability of Streptococcus faecalis was strong within 2 - 4 hours in the artificial intestinal fluid, the survival rate was 72.64%; but the survival rate was relatively low over 4 hours. In conclusion: Streptococcus faecalis is tolerant to lower pH, gastric juice, intestinal juice, bile salt, so it is relatively stable in gastrointestinal tract.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of different fertilizer treatments on yield and quality of broccoli
不同肥料对青花菜产量及品质影响的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Jing, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Ding yue, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Ye Xianglin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以青花菜为试材，研究了25%海藻有机肥、40%海藻有机肥及三元复合肥作基肥对青花菜产量和品质的影响。结果表明：25%海藻有机肥和40%海藻有机肥的产量每667 m2分别为1 678.32kg、1 704.96kg，较三元复合肥增产了3.22%、1.61%，但3种肥料处理的差异均不显著；干物质含量、可溶性糖含量分别为14.45%、15.06%和13.59%、14.07%，与对照相比差异也均不显著；每100g青花菜中Vc含量分别达93.00mg、97.65mg，与对照相比差异均达极显著水平。综合分析，施用海藻有机肥能有效地提高青花菜产量，改善品质，并随海藻有机肥含量的增加，提高青花菜产量及改善品质的效果更佳。

The effect of 25% seaweed fertilizer, 40% seaweed fertilizer and three nutrient compound fertilizer as the base-fatty on the yield and quality of broccoli were studied. The results showed that the yields of 25% seaweed fertilizer and 40% seaweed fertilizer were 1 678.32, 1 704.96 kg per 667 m2 respectively and the increasing rate were 3.22%, 1.61%, more than the yield of adding three-nutrient compound fertilizer, but the three-nutrient compound fertilizer showed no significant difference (P0.05). The contents of dry matter and soluble sugar in the treatment of 25%, 40% seaweed fertilizer were 14.45%, 15.06% and 13.59%, 14.07% respectively and the three-nutrient compound fertilizer showed no significant difference either (P0.05). Vc contents treated by 25%, 40% seaweed fertilizer as the base-fatty were significantly higher than that of CK (P0.01). Application of seaweed fertilizer could increase the yield, improve the quality of broccoli and with the seaweed fertilizer contents enlarging, the effects on increasing the yield, improving the quality were better than the three-nutrient compound fertilizer.

ags:resource.dc:title: Application of SSR molecular marker to purity identification of new hybrid upland rice
SSR标记在杂交旱稻新组合纯度鉴定中的应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Lin, Science College of Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China)
Du Juan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Bioscience and Engineering
Qi Lixia, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Bioscience and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过筛选分布于水稻12条染色体上的600个SSR标记进行多态性分析。用吐温法快速提取DNA，利用RM3、RM304和RM475等标记鉴别参与研究的21个杂交旱稻新稻组合及其17个亲本，对杂交稻种子的纯度进行了鉴定；结果表明，新1A/旱恢3号和603A/旱恢25号这两个旱稻新组合的纯度是98.9%，纯度最好；11A/旱恢29号的纯度是87.5%，纯度最差；其它杂交旱稻新组合纯度多在95%左右。

600 SSR primers distributed in 12 rice chromosomes were used to analyse their complementary pattern in this study. The purity of hybrid rice seeds was identified through identifying twenty-one new combinations of hybrid upland rice and their seventeen parents and by using the Tween method to extract DNA and utilizing the molecular marks such as RM 3, RM 304 and RM 475. The results were as follows: the purity of new 1A/hanhui 3 and 603A/hanhui 25 was 98.9%, so their purity was the best; meanwhile the purity of 11A/hanhui 29 was 87.5%, its purity was the worst among all the combinations; and the purity of other combinations was about 95%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of genetic diversity in populations released for stock enhancement and population caught in natural water of bighead carp in the lower reaches of the Yangtze river using microsatellite markers
长江下游鳙放流群体和天然捕捞群体遗传多样性的微卫星分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Minying, Scientific Observing and Experimental Station of Fishery Resources and Environment in the Lower Reaches of the Changjiang River, Wuxi (China)
Liu Kai, Scientific Observing and Experimental Station of Fishery Resources and Environment in the Lower Reaches of the Changjiang River, Wuxi (China)
Xu Dongpo, Scientific Observing and Experimental Station of Fishery Resources and Environment in the Lower Reaches of the Changjiang River, Wuxi (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用18对微卫星分子标记对长江下游鳙3个放流群体和1个天然捕捞群体进行遗传多样性分析。在18个基因座中，共检测到109个等位基因，每个座位检测到的等位基因数为3～10个，18个基因座位都具有多态性，多态位点百分率为100%，鳙4个群体的平均等位基因数A为5.055～5.666，平均有效等位基因数Ne为3.482～3.948，观测杂合度Ho平均值为0.678～0.753，期望杂合度He平均值为0.672～0.721，多态信息含量平均值为0.604～0.633，4个群体的遗传多样性较丰富。4个群体间遗传相似系数为0.883～0.936，遗传距离为0.066～0.133，基因分化系数Fst为0.023～0.051，表明群体间的遗传分化程度较弱，人工放流群体的遗传多样性和长江常熟江段天然捕捞群体的遗传多样性没有显著差异，放流群体的种质资源状况良好。建议加强增殖放流苗种的种质资源控制。

Eighteen microsatellite markers were used to analyze the genetic diversity of bighead carp of four populations, including three released populations and one population caught in natural water in the lower reach of the Yangtze River. A total of 109 different alleles were found and the number of alleles in each locus ranged from 3 to 10.Eighteen loci (100%) were polymorphic. In the four populations, the values of average alleles and valid alleles were 5.055 - 5.666 and 3.482 - 3.948. The values of average observed and expected heterozygosity were 0.678 - 0.753 and 0.672 - 0.721 respectively, while the mean PIC was 0.604 - 0.633, which revealed rich genetic diversity in the four populations. The genetic similarity coefficient of the four populations was 0.883 to 0.936 and the genetic distance was 0.066 to 0.133, while Fst value ranged from 0.023 to 0.051, which indicated that the four populations were faintly differentiated and there was no significant difference in genetic diversity between the released populations and the natural population caught in Changshu section of the Yangtze River. Germplasm resource of released populations was in good situation. More attention must be paid to germplasm control of the released fry.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of colibacillosis on blood physiobiochemical indices and histological structure of parenchymal organs in rabbits
大肠杆菌对兔血液生理生化指标和实质器官组织结构的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ding Houkang, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Veterinary Medicine
Ma Weiming, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Veterinary Medicine
Liu Lianlian, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Veterinary Medicine

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探讨兔感染大肠杆菌病后血液生理生化指标的变化和内脏实质器官的病理损伤作用，研究将40只健康新西兰兔随机分为4组，第1组为正常对照组（G1），第2组为大肠杆菌感染组（G2），第3组为庆大霉素治疗组（G3），第4组为乳酸菌素治疗组（G4），分别于实验后第1、3、5天采集血样和实质器官组织，测定血液生理生化指标和实质器官病理组织学变化，结果显示大肠杆菌感染对心、肺、肝、肾、脾各实质器官均有病理损伤，对血液指标亦有很大影响。结果表明，大肠杆菌感染对机体的损伤不仅局限于肠道，还可造成全身性的病理损伤。

In order to study the effect of colibacillosis on the biochemical and physiological indices and the change in histological structure of parenchymal organs in rabbits, healthy young rabbits were infected with E. coli. Forty healthy rabbits were randomly divided into four groups, the first group was the control group (G1), the second group was E. coli infection group (G2), the third group was gentamicin treatment group (G3), the fourth group was lactobacillus treatment group (G4). The blood samples and tissues of parenchymal organs were collected and determined separately on 1st, 3rd and 5th day after artificial infection. The results showed that E. coli infection could damage parenchymal organs, such as heart, lung, liver, kidney and spleen, and that also influenced some biochemical and physiological indices in blood. The results showed that E. coli infection not only damaged the intestine, but also could cause systemic pathological damage.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on effects of factors on the growth of Phoebe bournei container seedling planting
多因子对楠木容器苗造林生长影响的分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jin Surong, CAF, Fenyi (China), Subtropical Forest Experiment Centre
Zhang Bangwen, Forest Inventory and Planning Institute of Jiangxi Province, Nanchang (China)
Ouyang Xunzhi, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 楠木（Phoebe bournei）是珍贵的阔叶树种，科学合理的培育楠木林资源，对珍贵用材资源的培育及森林可持续经营具有重要的现实意义。本研究采用裂区试验设计的方法，对吉安市楠木容器苗造林基地进行样地调查和资料收集，运用主成分分析和数量化理论模型Ⅰ方法，探讨不同楠木容器苗在不同施肥量、造林地类型及立地因子条件下造林的生长效应。结果表明：影响楠木造林当年生长的主要因子依次是容器苗类型、造林地类型、海拔、坡向及郁闭度，这些主要因子对楠木幼树生长的影响均达到极显著。

Phoebe bournei is a kind of precious broadleaved tree, cultivating Phoebe bournei forest resources scientifically and rationally has an important practical significance for cultivation and sustainable management of valuable timber resources. This study applied the split-plot experimental design method to survey and collect sample information on the forestation base of Phoebe bournei container seedling in Ji’an city. The growth effect of different kinds of Phoebe bournei container seedlings was analysed under the conditions of different fertilization amounts, site types and site factors by using principal component analysis and the quantitative theory Ⅰ model. The result showed that the dominant factors affecting the Phoebe bournei growth were container seedling type, site type, altitude, aspect and canopy density in planting in the first year. All the factors had significant growth effect on Phoebe bournei Sapling.

ags:resource.dc:title: Time lag characteristics of stem sap flow of main afforestation tree species during their growth season in Yuanmou dry-hot valley of southwest China
干热河谷主要造林树种生长季树干液流的时滞特征

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xiaofei, Chinese Academy of Forestry, Kunming (China), Research Institute of Insect Resources
Sun Yongyu, Chinese Academy of Forestry, Kunming (China), Research Institute of Insect Resources
Li Kun, Chinese Academy of Forestry, Kunming (China), Research Institute of Insect Resources

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 应用热扩散式探针法测定了元谋干热河谷生长季主要造林树种山合欢、印楝、大叶相思、新银合欢、赤桉、柠檬桉的树干液流，并将液流与太阳辐射和水汽压亏缺数据进行逐行错位分析，探讨树干液流与蒸腾驱动因子之间的时滞效应，结果表明：（1）树干液流速率与太阳辐射、水汽压亏缺存在明显的时滞，均呈现树干液流均滞后于太阳辐射，提前于水汽压亏缺；（2）所选干热河谷6个研究树种的种间时滞效应的差异较小，在日尺度上，树干液流很大程度都依赖于太阳辐射的变化；（3）干热河谷主要造林树种生长季树干液流与PAR和VPD之间的时滞长短与树木的地径、高度、冠幅、边材面积以及夜间水分补充量等的相关关系均不显著，可知树形因子和夜间水分补充量对该区所测树木树干液流与PAR和VPD之间时滞的影响较小甚至没有。

The method of thermal dissipation probes (TDP) was applied to measure the sap flow of the main afforestation tree species, such as Albizzia kalkora, Azadirachta indica, Acacia auriculaeformis, Leucaena leucocephala, Eucalyptus camaldulensis and Acacia confusa, during their growth season in Yunmou dry-hot valley. Meteorological factors such as photosynthetic active radiation (PAR), air temperature (T), relative humidity (RH), water vapor pressure deficit (VPD) and wind speed (WS) were measured at the same time. Cross-correlation analysis was used to estimate the time lag between the stem sap flow and the driving factors of canopy transpiration among the tree species. The results indicated: (1) The stem sap flow of the six tree species was significantly correlated with the radiation (PAR) and vapor pressure deficit (D), and the stem sap flow lagged behind PAR but ahead of D. (2) There was a small difference among the time lags of the six tree species. And the diurnal sap flow was more dependent on PAR than on D. (3) The time lag between the stem sap flow and PAR/D was not correlated with the tree features, such as DBH, tree heigh, canopy area, sapwood area and the nocturnal water recharge.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analysis of molecular evolution of nitrogen fixation genes
固氮基因的分子进化分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Qian, Minzu University of China, Beijing (China), College of Life and Environmental Science
Chen Haikui, Beifang University of Nationalities, Yinchuan (China), Biological Sciences and the Academy of Sciences
Wang Junli, Minzu University of China, Beijing (China), College of Life and Environmental Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 从GenBank数据库获取固氮微生物和固氮植物的固氮基因序列（固氮微生物包括AE006469等15条序列，固氮植物AF013594等22条序列），利用邻接法从同一固氮微生物的固氮基因、同种固氮基因在不同固氮微生物和不同固氮植物3个方面构建分子进化树，结果显示：Sinorhizobium meliloti 1021固氮基因进化树中，lpsL和exoA基因为一个分枝，nodD、nifH和fixA基因为一个分枝，由于缺乏数据其它固氮微生物的固氮基因进化是否有上述规律有待进一步的研究；固氮微生物固氮基因（nifH）进化树分为4枝，各种根瘤菌分为一枝，弗兰克氏菌分为一枝，肺炎克氏杆菌和满江红鱼腥藻独自为一枝；固氮植物固氮基因（enod40）进化树分为4个分枝，分别为豆科、茄科、禾本科和木麻黄科，与APGIII的分类基本吻合。研究从整体上了解了固氮基因在固氮微生物和固氮植物的进化历史，为以后固氮微生物和固氮植物的固氮基因的进一步研究提供理论依据，也便于固氮基因在农业等实际应用方面提供参考依据。

The nitrogen fixation gene sequences of nitrogen-fixing plants and microorganisms were obtained from the GenBank database to construct phylogenetic trees by neighbor joining method (microorganisms included 15 sequences, such as AE006469, and plants included 22 sequences, such as AF013594), which worked on the different nitrogen-fixing genes in the same nitrogen-fixing microorganism, the same kind of nitrogen fixation gene in many kinds of nitrogen-fixing microorganisms and plants. The results showed that: in the evolutionary tree of the nitrogen fixation genes of Sinorhizobium meliloti 1021, lpsL and exoA gene were clustered into a branch, nodD, nifH and fixA gene were clustered into a branch, whether the same law existed in other nitrogen-fixing organisms or not, it needs further study because of lack of data; the evolutionary tree of nifH genes of nitrogen-fixing microorganisms was divided into four branches, various rhizobia were clustered into a branch, Frankia strains were clustered into a branch, Klebsiella pneumoniae and Trichormus Azollae were clustered into one branch only; the phylogenetic tree of enod40 genes of nitrogen-fixing plants was divided into Fabaceae, Solanaceae, Poaceae, Casuarinaceae, which was basically consistent with the classification of APGIII. From the phylogenetic trees, as a whole, this study understands the nitrogen-fixing genes in the evolutionary history of the nitrogen-fixing genes in the nitrogen-fixing microorganisms and plants, which provides a theoretical evidence for the research on the nitrogen fixation genes of nitrogen-fixing plants and microorganisms and a reference for the application of the nitrogen fixation genes applying them in agriculture and other fields.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of silicon fertilizer application on plantation of phyllostachys violascens
硅肥对雷竹林生长影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Rong Jieqing, Zhejiang A＆F University, Lin’an (China), Nurturing Station of State Key Lab of Subtropical Silvicuhure
Pan Yue, Zhejiang A＆F University, Lin’an (China), Nurturing Station of State Key Lab of Subtropical Silvicuhure
Gui Renyi, Zhejiang A＆F University, Lin’an (China), Nurturing Station of State Key Lab of Subtropical Silvicuhure

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 针对覆盖雷竹林立地生产力衰退和土壤硅素供应不平衡的现象，分析施硅肥对雷竹生长及土壤供硅能力的影响，探讨雷竹林施硅肥的时间和施肥量。试验的硅肥施用量水平为：0、75、225和675kg/hm2，于2012年5月中旬以高效硅肥作基肥施入种植10年的雷竹林，测定施肥后每个月的土壤有效硅含量、pH值、叶片硅积累含量、硅积累速率及4个月时叶片光合参数。研究表明：在雷竹抽枝长叶前期，以675kg/hm2的硅肥施用量能有效地增加土壤有效硅含量、pH值、叶片硅含量及积累速率，促进光合速率。因此，在雷竹抽枝长叶前期，施675 kg/hm2的硅肥能促进雷竹的生长，提高土壤供硅能力。

Effects of silicon fertilizer on the growth of Lei bamboo and the ability of soil to supply available silicon were studied with plantation of Lei bamboo so as to find out the fertilizing amount and time. The test, in which that efficient silicon fertilizer as base fertilizer was applied to plantation of Lei bamboo, was proceeded in the middle of May 2012 at the application levels of 0 kg/hm2, 75 kg/hm2, 225 kg/hm2 and 675 kg/hm2. The measured details of the test were soil available silicon, soil pH, silicon accumulation of leaves, silicon accumulation rate of every month and photosynthetic parameter of the forth month. The results showed that silicon fertilizer at the level of 675 kg/hm2 in the early growth stage could effectively increase soil available silicon, soil pH, silicon accumulation of leaves and silicon accumulation rate of every month, and promote photosynthesis of Lei bamboo. Silicon fertilizer can promote growth of Lei bamboo and enhance ability of soil to supply available silicon.

ags:resource.dc:title: Isolation, identification and biological characterization of silicate bacteria
硅酸盐细菌的分离、鉴定及其生物学特性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Hu Zhou, National Engineering Center for Applied Technology of Agriculture Biodiversity, Kunming (China)
Wu Yixin, Yunnan Agricultural University, Kunming (China), Faculty of Agronomy and Biotechnology
Mao Zichao, Yunnan Agricultural University, Kunming (China), Faculty of Agronomy and Biotechnology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用硅酸盐细菌培养基分离法从全国采集的288份土样中分离出具有解钾能力的硅酸盐细菌8株，依据菌落形态、生理生化特性鉴定和16S rDNA全序列分析，它们被鉴定为胶质类芽孢杆菌（Paenibacillus mucilaginosus）。采用火焰亮度计测定其可溶性钾的含量，其中K1和K3菌株的解钾量分别比对照组高48.16%和56.57%，达到7.73μg/g和9.08μg/g。盆栽试验的结果表明，25d后K1提高玉米苗的根长、株高、叶宽和鲜质量分别达42.91%、18.88%、9.11%和116.73%，K3分别对应提高72.51%、22.81%、14.06%和198.51%。

Eight potassium-releasing strains were isolated from 288 soil samples collected from China by using the selective medium for silicate bacteria and identified into Bacillus mucilaginosus based on their morphological, physiological and biochemical properties and l6S rDNA sequences. Based on the analysis of soluble potassium by flame photometer among the 8 strains, the strains K1 and K3 could increase the potassium content in the liquid medium by 48.10% and 56.57% compared with control. In pot experiment, after 25 days K1 could increase the root length, plant height, leaf width and fresh weight of corn seedling by 42.91%, 18.88%, 9.11% and 116.73%, and K3 could increase the correspondents by 72.51%, 22.81%, 14.06% and 198.51% compared with the control.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of substrate formula and controlled release fertilizer application rate on the growth of Cyclobalanopsis oxyodon container seedling
基质配比和控释肥施用量对曼青冈容器苗生长的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Qiansheng, Shanghai Institute of Technology, Shanghai (China), School of Ecology
Deng Min, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai (China), Shanghai Chenshan Plant Science Research Center
Tan Haibo, Shanghai Institute of Technology, Shanghai (China), School of Ecology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 曼青冈（Cyclobalanopsis oxyodon）广布中国南部及东喜马拉雅，为中山常绿阔叶林重要组成，适应性较广。该树种用途广泛，但目前尚无人工繁育栽培的报道。为获得曼青冈容器育苗的合适基质配比和肥料用量，以泥炭、珍珠岩、蛭石为基质原料设置5种不同比例混合基质，研究基质配比对曼青冈盆栽苗生长的影响；同时还研究控释肥施用量对曼青冈容器苗生长和叶片养分含量的影响。结果表明：5种基质配比的基本理化性状均符合园艺基质总体要求，总孔隙度在83%～90%，通气孔隙度11%～21%，在肥水管理得当条件下，曼青冈容器苗在所有基质配比中均生长良好，高径比〈60，幼苗健壮。随着控释肥施用量增加，叶片氮磷钾含量逐渐增加，但从植株生长指标考察则以3g为佳，1g不足，而施肥量增加至5g和7g并没有显著增加容器苗生长。

Cyclobalanopsis oxyodon is widely distributed in southern China and east Himalaya. It is the dominant element in middle mountain evergreen forests, with extensively adaptability. It is a useful tree; however, there is no report on its seedling raising and cultivation. To obtain the suitable substrate formula and fertilizer application rate for container seedling production, 5 mixes composed of peat, perlite and vermiculite were compared for container seedling growth. Effects of the application rate of controlled release fertilizer on the growth and foliar NPK were also investigated. The results showed that all 5 mixes had the physical and chemical properties which met the general requirement of horticultural substrate; the total porosity was 83% - 90%, air porosity was 11% - 21%. With good irrigation and fertilization practice, Cyclobalanopsis oxyodon seedlings grew well in all mixes, with height-diameter ratio less than 60, seedlings appeared vigorous. The foliar NPK increased with the increase of fertilizer application rate, however, the plant growth indexes did not increased significantly when the fertilizer increase to 5 g and 7 g. Based on the plant growth, 3 gram of controlled release fertilizer was suitable, while 1 g was not sufficient.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the effects of cutting seasons on Cinnamomum camphora’s large scale field cutting seedings
季节对芳樟规模化大田扦插育苗的影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Zuyao, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art
Jiang Yang, Jiangxi Tianxiang Forestry Development Co. Ltd, Jinxi (China)
Wang Wen, Jiangxi Tianxiang Forestry Development Co. Ltd, Jinxi (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 规模化大田扦插育苗试验和SPSS分析表明：扦插季节对芳樟大田扦插的成活率及苗高、地径和侧根生长影响显著；成活率7、8月份最高,9月份最低；扦插苗当年长缓慢，但第二年显著加快；一年生苗木中，4、5月份扦插苗的地径、苗高和侧根生长显著高于6、7、8、9月份的扦插苗，扦插后加强肥水和田间管理，4、5月份扦插苗当年能够达到上山造林苗木标准；芳樟规模化大田扦插育苗以4、5和8月份为宜。

The analysis on large scale field cutting seedings and SPSS shows: seasons have significant effects on the survival rate, stem height, ground diameter and lateral root growth of Cinnamomum camphora’s field cutting seedings; the survival rates reach the highest level in July and August, and hit the lowest level in September; the cutting plants grow slowly in the current year, but their growth rate increases significantly in the next year; among annual plants, those cut in the cutting season in April and May have significant larger stem height and lateral root growth rate, and wider ground diameter than those cut in June, July, August and September; with proper fertilization and field management, plants cut in the cutting season in April and May can reach the criteria of afforestation in the current year. This study also finds that the best months for Cinnamomum camphora’s field cutting seedings are April, May and August.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comparative studies on the two methods for identification of Phytophthora capsici resistance
两种方法鉴定辣椒疫病抗性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ma Huigang, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Plant Protection Institute
He Liegan, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute
Chen Xuejun, Jiangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Vegetable and Flower Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用离体叶法和游动孢子灌根法对辣椒材料进行了疫病抗性鉴定，并对两种方法鉴定结果进行比较。结果表明，供试的材料中感病材料所占比例最大，其中V34-1、V7-3、B6等材料高度感病，而T3-1、富根、V48-2、T10-1等有极强的抗疫病能力，几乎达到免疫级别。研究发现，越感病的材料其发病速度越快。不同的菌株存在致病力分化，不同菌株的致病辣椒品种不同，同一个辣椒材料对不同的菌株表现不同的抗病性。也许某一致病率大的菌株对一辣椒材料不致病，而致病率小的菌株却对其表现为致病。对两种方法进行相关性分析，两者的相关性系数为0.597 6，相关性程度较为显著，18份材料中有14份表现一致，为77.78%，表明两种方法所得试验结果吻合程度高。

The resistance of pepper materials to Phytophthora capsici was identified by in vitro leaf and root-irrigating methods and the ideatification results assessed by the two methods were compared. The results showed that the susceptible materials accounted for the largest proportion of the tested materials, in which V34-1, V7-3, B6 etc. were susceptible seriously, while T3-1, Fugen, V48-2, T10-1 etc. had strong anti-Phytophthora capsici capacity that nearly reached the level of immunity. The more susceptible the materials were, the shorter time they were infected by Phytophthora capsici. There were differences in pathogenicity among different strains. Diffenrent strains were pathogenic to diffenrent pepper materials, and the same material showed diffenrent resistance to diffenrent strains. Maybe some strain with significant pathogenicity rate wasn’t pathogenic to a pepper material, but strains with paltry pathogenicity rate were pathogenic to the material. The correlations analysis of the two methods showed that the correlation coefficient was 0.597 6, which showed more significant correlations between them. The resistant performance of 14 varieties were unanimous in 18 tested ones, and the result by the in vitro leaf method had 77.78% similarity to that by the root-irrigating method.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on fruit storability of glossy mutant of “Newhall” navel orange
纽荷尔脐橙果皮光泽型突变体贮藏性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zeng Qiong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Agricultural college
Wu Qi, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Agricultural college
Wang Yuechen, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Agricultural college

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以纽荷尔脐橙果皮光泽型突变体（突变体）、普通纽荷尔脐橙（对照）及打蜡纽荷尔脐橙（打蜡）为试材，通过对它们贮藏期间的果实品质和生理指标变化趋势进行比较，探讨了突变体脐橙的贮藏特性。结果表明：在整个贮藏过程中，前期突变体脐橙腐烂率低于对照，比较耐贮藏，但后期腐烂较快，且果实失重率和MDA含量一直高于对照和打蜡脐橙，SOD和POD活性变化趋势基本一致，果实可溶性固形物、可滴定酸、可溶性总糖、Vc含量普遍高于对照和打蜡脐橙，说明突变体脐橙果实贮藏品质相对优于对照和打蜡脐橙。

In order to investigate the storage characteristics of the glossy mutant of “Newhall” navel orange, wild-type “Newhall” navel orange, its glossy mutant and waxed navel orange were used to compare the quality and physiological change of fruit during storage. The results showed that the rotting rate of the glossy mutant of “Newhall” was lower than that of wild-type “Newhall” and waxed navel orange at the former storage, but it rotted faster after 100 days’ storage. The weight loss rate, total soluble solids (TSS), titratable acidity (TA), total sugar, Vc and MDA contents of the glossy mutant of “Newhall” navel orange were higher than those of wild-type “Newhall” navel orange and the waxed navel orange during storage. It’s SOD and POD activities had the same trend, which suggested the storage quality of the mutant was better than that of the wild-type “Newhall” and waxed navel orange.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of high fructose syrup diet exposure on the activities of detoxifying enzymes in honey bees Apis mellifera ligustica
饲喂果葡糖浆对意大利蜜蜂解毒酶的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Meng Lifeng, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science, Beijing (China), Institute for the Apicuhural Research
Jin Sanxing, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science, Beijing (China), Institute for the Apicuhural Research
Diao Qingyun, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science, Beijing (China), Institute for the Apicuhural Research

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了探讨果葡糖浆饲喂蜜蜂的安全性，以意大利蜜蜂（Apis mellifera ligustica）为实验材料，蔗糖作为对照，饲喂果葡糖浆2个月后，检测意大利蜜蜂体内解毒酶的变化情况。结果表明：饲喂果葡糖浆后，意大利蜜蜂大幼虫体内细胞色素P450比活力、成年工蜂腹部谷胱甘肽-S-转移酶和羧酸酯酶比活力均与对照无显著差异。短期饲喂果葡糖浆对蜜蜂是安全的，长期影响还有待于继续研究。

The activities of Cytochrome-P450, glutathione S-transferase and carboxylesterase in the worker bees of Apis mellifera ligustica were investigated after the bees were fed orally with high fructose syrup in two consecutive months. The results showed that compared with sucrose diet, high fructose syrup diet did not significantly affect the activities of three detoxifying enzymes. Feeding with high fructose syrups is safe to Apis mellifera ligustica in short time and long-time effects need further research. The results can be used to assess the security of high fructose syrups used as bee feed.

ags:resource.dc:title: Construction of plant transformation vector of wheat starch branching enzyme SBE-Ⅱb and its expression identification
小麦淀粉分支酶基因SBE-Ⅱb植物表达载体的构建及表达鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Zibu, Key Laboratory of the development and utilization of biological resources of Guizhou Province, Guiyang (China)
Qi Juncang, Shihezi University, Shihezi (China), College of Agronomy
Li Weihua, Shihezi University, Shihezi (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 从花后15 d的小麦（Triticum aestivum L.）胚乳中提取RNA，根据GeneBank上已经公布的小麦淀粉分支酶基因（SBE-Ⅱb）序列（AY740401.1）设计引物，经RT-PCR扩增得到一条2 511 bp的条带，测序结果与公布的序列一致。将克隆得到的基因构建到了植物表达载体pPZP35S上，通过农杆菌叶盘转化法转化烟草叶片，经卡那霉素筛选、PCR扩增鉴定证明，SBE-Ⅱb基因已成功转入烟草细胞中，获得4个转基因株系。转基因烟草叶片与野生型比较，颜色变暗，植株较小。RT-PCR半定量和实时荧光定量RT-PCR分析表明，转基因烟草株系的叶片中有SBE-Ⅱb基因的表达，与对照植株相比，转SBE-Ⅱb基因的植株中的转录本达到了显著性的变化，但是其淀粉分支酶活性没有达到显著性变化。

The total RNA was isolated from wheat (Triticun aestivum L.) endosperm 15 days after pollination. One fragment of 2 511 bp of SBEⅡb gene was reversely transcribed and amplified from its mRNA using primer pairs designed according to the known SBEⅡb gene sequences (AY740401.1) in GeneBank, and the results of sequence analysis showed that the nucleotide sequence was the same with the known. The plant expression vector for pPZP35S was constructed. The plasmid was transformed into tobacco by leaf dish transformation, and four transgenic plants were obtained by kanamycin selecting and PCR analysis, and the results demonstrated that SBEⅡb gene was transformed into tobacco cells, successfully. The differences between the wild plants and the transformed plants were obvious in the original plant morphology, and the transformed plants leaves turned dark and the plants were smaller, and SqRT-PCR and qRT-PCR analysis results indicated that the SBEⅡb gene was expressed in the leaves of all the transformed plants. Compared with the check plants, the transcriptional level of the transformed plants changed significantly, however, the starch branching enzyme activity showed no difference between them.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on identification of wild Pholiota adipose strain JZB2126005 and its biological characteristics
野生黄伞JZB2116005菌株的鉴定及生物学特性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Shouxian, Beijing Sciences Academy of Agriculture and Forestry, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection and Environment Protection
Liu Yu, Beijing Sciences Academy of Agriculture and Forestry, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection and Environment Protection
Xu Feng, Beijing Sciences Academy of Agriculture and Forestry, Beijing (China), Institute of Plant Protection and Environment Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以采集于柳树上的JZB2116005野生菌株为研究对象，依据形态学和分子生物学特征鉴定为黄伞。对其进行组织分离并对菌丝生长特性进行研究，结果表明：黄伞菌丝生长的最适宜碳源为山梨醇，最适氮源为大豆蛋白胨，最适碳氮比为30∶1，最适生长因子为维生素B2，最适生长温度为28℃，最适pH值为5.0。

A wild mushroom gathered from willow trees was identified by morphological characteristics and molecular biological techniques as Pholiota adipose (Fr.) Quél.. The results of biological characteristic investigation showed that the optimal carbon source was sorbitol and the optimal nitrogen source was soybean peptone. The most suitable carbon nitrogen ratio was about 30:1 and the optimal growth factor was vitamin B2. The optimal temperature and pH were found to be 28℃ and 5.0, respectively.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on determination of neomycin residue in duck by fluorescence method
荧光法检测鸭肉中新霉素残留的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Jiang, College of Polytechnics Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Lab for Optics-Electrics Application of Biomaterials
Liu Muhua, College of Polytechnics Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Lab for Optics-Electrics Application of Biomaterials
Yuan Haichao, College of Polytechnics Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Lab for Optics-Electrics Application of Biomaterials

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 抗生素滥用所导致的健康问题已成为人们关注的焦点。为了快速检测抗生素残留，利用荧光法对鸭肉中新霉素的残留进行检测。在乳化剂OP-10的环境下，新霉素和邻苯二甲醛、巯基乙醇发生化学反应，经过激发光照射后可以产生强的荧光。以新霉素为研究对象，研究了其自身和反应物的荧光强度。研究结果表明：加入1.5mL邻苯二甲醛溶液，1mL乳化剂OP-10溶液，2.5mL巯基乙醇溶液，并且反应90min后测得的荧光强度为最佳；对浓度范围在1.00～8.00μg/mL的新霉素标准样品进行测定，得到的线性方程为，相关系数为0.984 9；对含不同浓度新霉素的鸭肉提取液进行测定，相关系数为0.999 8。结果表明，荧光法是一种方便、快速的新霉素残留分析方法。

Health problems caused by overuse of antibiotics have become the focus of attention. In order to detect antibiotic residues rapidly; fluorescence method was used to detect the neomycin residues in duck. A chemical reaction of neomycin with ortho-phthalaldehyde, mercaptoethanol was involved in the emulsifier OP-10 environment and strong fluorescence was produced after excitation light irradiation. With neomycin as the object of the study, fluorescence intensity of its own and the reactant was studied. The results indicated that the best fluorescence intensity was measured after 90 min by adding 1.5 mL o-phthalaldehyde solution, 1 mL emulsifier OP-10 solution, 2.5 mL mercapto ethanol solution; Neomycin standard samples of concentration range in 1.00 - 8.00 μg/mL were measured to obtain the linear equation F=45.3C＋9.7, thecorrelation coefficient was 0.984 9; duck extracted solution with different concentrations of neomycin was determined, the correlation coefficient was 0.9995. The results showed that the fluorescence method was a convenient and rapid analytical method for detection of neomycin residue.

ags:resource.dc:title: The response of Yunyan87 and K326 to drought stress
云烟87和K326对干旱胁迫的响应

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ding Xuedan, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Xiong Jiangbo, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Zhou Ziyan, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 干旱是抑制烟叶产量和品质的主要气象灾害之一。长时间干旱，植株生理改变，产量和品质下降，甚至死亡。2011—2012年以云烟87和K326为材料，采用盆栽栽培，在团棵期、旺长期、现蕾期设置干旱时间7，10，13，16d、长期干旱和CK（对照），研究了云烟87和K326对干旱的响应。结果表明：云烟87团棵期、旺长期、现蕾期干旱13d单株产量分别下降69.1%、69.8%和69.5%；而K326干旱10d单株产量就分别下降了70.2%、70.3%和68.7%；两个品种团棵期发生长期干旱，最终产量均为零，产量下降100%。在旺长期和现蕾期发生长期干旱，产量下降87%～90%。在三个生育期中，随着干旱时间增加，还原糖一直在下降，且云烟87还原糖含量受干旱影响小于K326，但差异不显著；现蕾期干旱16d云烟87和K326总氮含量分别升高了60.3%和91.6%，磷分别下降了34.9%和31.1%，钾含量分别下降55.9%和58.5%、烟碱含量分别升高42.9%和41.7%。云烟87比K326耐旱性强。

Drought is one of the main meteorological disasters which will restrain the output and quality of tobacco. The plant physiology of tobacco is changed, with the yield and quality being declined and even death by the long-term drought. Yuyan87 and K326 were studied from 2011 to 2012, which were grown in pots. The drought time was set to 7 d, 10 d, 13 d, 16 d and one group as the control in the resettling growth stage, the vigorously growing stage and the budding stage respectively to study the response of Yuyan87 and K326 to the drought stress. The result shows that: the amplitude reductions of single plant yield of Yunyan87 in the rosette stage, the vigorously growing stage and the budding period were 69.1%, 69.8% and 69.5% respectively, while those of K326 were 70.2%, 70.3% and 68.7% as the effect of 13 days’ drought. The two varieties would have no single plant production in the rosette stage as the effect of long-term drought and in the vigorously growing stage and the budding stage, the amplitude reduction of yield of which could be 87% to 90%. With the drought time increased, the content of reducing sugars of Yunyan87 and K326 in all the stages had been declining and the falling range of Yunyan87 was smaller than that of K326, but the difference was not significant. The content of total nitrogen of Yunyan87 and K326 increased by 60.3% and 91.6% while which of phosphorus decreased by 34.9% and 31.1% separately in the budding stage. The potassium content of Yunyan87 and K326 decreased by 55.9% and 58.5%, while the nicotine content increased by 42.9% and 41.7% respectively, the drought resistance of Yunyan 87 is better than that of K326.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of papermaking wastewater on protective enzymes and chlorophyll fluorescence of Phragmites communis Trim.
造纸废水对芦苇实生苗保护酶及叶绿素荧光的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sun Jingkuan, China University of Mining and Technology, Beijing (China), Institute of Restoration Ecology
Lu Zhaohua, China University of Mining and Technology, Beijing (China), Institute of Restoration Ecology
Li Tian, China University of Mining and Technology, Beijing (China), Institute of Restoration Ecology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以芦苇实生苗为材料，研究不同浓度造纸废水对芦苇保护酶活性和叶绿素荧光的影响。结果表明：超氧化物歧化酶（SOD）、过氧化物酶（POD）随着造纸废水浓度的增加先升高后下降，分别在化学需氧量（CODcr）为300mg/L、600mg/L达到最大值；过氧化氢酶（CAT）和丙二醛（MDA）随着造纸废水CODcr的增加持续增加，说明CAT活性抑制MDA的效果不显著。芦苇叶片最大荧光、光系统Ⅱ最大光化学效率随着造纸废水浓度的升高，呈现先升高后下降的趋势，在废水浓度为300mg/L时，二者最高，超过此废水浓度，芦苇叶片光系统Ⅱ反应中心受到一定程度的破坏。

Phragmites communis Trim. seedlings were used to study the response of protective enzymes and chlorophyll fluorescence to different concentrations of papermaking wastewater. The results showed that: with the concentrations of papermaking wastewater increasing, superoxide dismutase (SOD), peroxidase (POD) first decreased and then increased, the maximum value appeared at 300 mg/L, 600 mg/L. CAT and MDA increaseed continuously along with the increase of papermaking wastewater CODcr, and the inhibiting effect of CAT on MDA was not significant. Along with the increase of papermaking wastewater CODcr, the biggest fluorescence, PSⅡmaximum efficiency first decreased and then increased, and catalase (CAT), the content of malondialdehyde (MDA), initial fluorescence increased all the way, the maximum value appeared at 300 mg/L, the light systemⅡreactive centre of Phragmites communis Trim. was damaged when the wastewater concentration was over 300 mg/L.

ags:resource.dc:title: The effect of shading interference on photosynthate distribution of natural Leymus Chinensis ramet population
遮荫干扰对天然羊草分株种群光合产物及其分配的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Hongyi, Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, Daqing (China)
Wang Zhihui, Heilongjiang Bayi Agricultural University, Daqing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究4种遮荫强度0%（CK）、30%（S1）、50%（S2）、70%（S3）处理下天然羊草分株种群光合产物分配问题。结果表明：地上茎、叶鞘、叶片、根茎含糖量在不同处理间达到显著差异水平，其他器官糖含量变化也有不同的倾向性，说明遮荫能改变羊草各器官含糖量。另外，S1处理羊草的各器官总光合产物最高地上生物量也最大，S3处理羊草穗含糖量最高穗生物量也最大。各器官含糖量的变化，说明克隆植物在外界环境干扰下出现了明显的互惠共生和繁殖倾向性。

The effects of four shading treatments, namely, 0% (CK), 30% (S1), 50% (S2) and 70% (S3) on photosynthate distribution of natural Leymus Chinensis ramet population were studied. The results showed that shading influenced the content of sugar in the organs of Leymus Chinensis. There was significant difference in the content of sugar in the aboveground culms, sheath, leaf and rhizomes. The sugar contents in other organs also showed certain changing tendencies. In addition, experiments showed that the total content of photosynthate in the S1 was the highest. The content of sugar and biomss of spike in S3 were the highest. From the experiment results, there was a significant tendency of mutualism and reproduction in clonal plants under the interference of environment.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analysis of the achievements of research on bamboo in China
中国竹类研究成果分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Hong, SFA, Beijing (China), International Center for Bamboo and Rattan
Feng Yun, SFA, Beijing (China), International Center for Bamboo and Rattan
Ma Xuezhong, Forestry Bureau of Shangyou County, Shangyou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 系统搜集、整理了我国1949—2010年间鉴定的竹类研究成果1 000项。分析发现，竹类研究成果数量随年代稳步增长，20世纪80年代开始迅速增长；毛竹的成果数量最多，占总量33.8%；县市级科研单位、院校和省级以上科研院所系统成果数量分别占总量的30.8%、23.1%和21.1%，为产出竹类研究成果的中坚；福建、江西、浙江、湖南、四川、广东、安徽、广西等8省成果数量最多，占总量的71.6%；研究成果中，林业工程、森林培育学、经济林学和森林保护学4个二级学科占据总量的78%。

1000 achievements of research on bamboo in China from 1949 to 2010 were classified and organized. The characteristics of research achievements were analyzed. The results showed that the number of research achievements steadily increased yearly, and grew rapidly since 1980s; the achievements of research on Phyllostachys edulis were the most, accounted for 33.8% of the total; research institutions at county or city the levels of colleges, and research institutions over province level accounted for 30.8%, 23.1% and 21.1% of the total achievements, which were the strong force of bamboo research; the number of research achievements in Fujian, Jiangxi, Zhejiang, Hunan, Sichuan, Guangdong, Anhui and Guangxi were the most, accounted for 71.6% of the total; the research achievements in the subjects of forest engineering, silviculture, economic forests and forest protection accounted for 33.8% of the total.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of different branch angle on physiological characteristics and fruit quality of Hanfu apple
不同拉枝角度对寒富苹果树生理特性和果实品质的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Hongjian, Liaoning Fruit Research Institute, Xiongyue (China)
Wang Hong, Liaoning Fruit Research Institute, Xiongyue (China)
Liu Zhi, Liaoning Fruit Research Institute, Xiongyue (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探讨寒富苹果树主枝适宜的拉枝角度，以2年生自根砧寒富为试材，研究不同拉枝角度对树体生理特性和果实品质的影响。结果表明：寒富拉枝角度120°时果实单果质量和硬度最高，而拉枝角度110°时果实果型指数、着色指数、花青苷、可溶性固形物、总糖等果实品质高于其他处理，部分处理间差异极显著；拉枝角度110°时叶片净光合速率、单叶鲜质量、干质量、叶片厚度和叶绿素含量、枝条抽生中短枝和叶丛枝的数量高于其他处理，叶片中的氮素营养含量最低，磷素营养含量最高；叶片中的钾和枝条中的磷素营养含量随着拉枝角度的增大而升高，拉枝角度120°时最高。综合以上指标，认为寒富苹果自根砧树体主枝适宜拉枝角度为110°。

In order to investigate the proper angle of branch drawing of Hanfu apple tree, with 2 years old rootstocks Hanfu as the test material, the effect of different branch angles on physiological characteristics and fruit quality of Hanfu apple was studied. The results showed that: the fruit weight and the hardness were the best when the branch angle was 120°, and the fruit shape index, fruit coloring index, anthocyanin, total soluble solids, total sugar were better when the branch angle was 110° than those of other treatments, the difference among the treatments was significant; the leaf net photosynthetic rate, leaf fresh weight, dry weight, leaf thickness and chlorophyll content, the number of short branches and leafages were higher than those of other treatments, and the nitrogen content of leaves was the lowest, while the phosphorus content of leaves was the highest; the potassium content of leaves and phosphorus content of shoot increased with the branch angle, the phosphorus and potassium contents were the maximum when the branch angle was 120°. Based on the above indexes, 110° of the angle of the branches of Hanfu apple rootstocks tree is suitable.

ags:resource.dc:title: Antimicrobial activity of clove essential oils and eugenol against food-borne Bacteria
丁香精油及丁香酚对食品腐败菌的抑菌活性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zeng Rong, Foshan University, Foshan (China), College of Food and Horticultural Science
Chen Jinyin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of agronomy
Lin Lichao, Foshan University, Foshan (China), College of Food and Horticultural Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以丁香精油及丁香酚为研究对象，研究了其对食品中常见腐败菌及致病菌的抑制效果。结果表明。丁香精油及丁香酚具有广谱抗菌性。对供试的革兰氏阴性和阳性菌均表现出了较强的抑菌活性，其中对革兰氏阳性菌的抑制效果优于革兰氏阴性菌。通过测定两种物质对供试菌的MIC、MBC及毒力回归方程，结果显示丁香精油及丁香酚对金黄色葡萄球菌及蜡样芽胞杆菌的毒力最强，对绿脓假单胞菌的抑制活性最弱。

The antimicrobial characteristics of clove essential oils (CEO) and eugenol were studied in order to provide a basis for the development of natural and safer preservatives. The antimicrobial activities of the agents against 4 Gram-positive bacteria and 4 Gram-negative bacteria, such as MIC, MBC and regression equation, were observed. The CEO and eugenol showed effective antimicrobial activities and broad antimicrobial spectrum against all the tested bacteria species, in which Staphyloccocus aureus and Listeria monocytogenes were most sensitive and Pseudomonas aeruginosa showed higher resistant ability. In conclusion, the CEO and eugenol may be selected as natural preservatives and antibacterial agents.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning and prokaryotic expressing of coat protein gene in tomato black ring virus
番茄黑环病毒外壳蛋白基因的克隆与原核表达

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wei Xiaotang, Shandong Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Qingdao (China)
Li Weitao, Qingdao Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Qingdao (China)
Chen Hong, China Certification ＆ Inspection (Group) Co. , Ltd., Beijing (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用RT-PCR方法获得了番茄黑环病毒（TBRV）外壳蛋白（coat protein，CP）基因，将CP基因克隆到pMD19-T Simple载体，并进行测序，大小为1 399bp，与GenBank中已报道的TBRV的CP基因核苷酸相似度达99％以上。将TBRV CP基因定向插入双酶切的pET30a中，成功构建了原核表达载体pET30a-TBRVCP，转化大肠杆菌BL-21，表达重组蛋白。SDS-PAGE电泳分析发现，通过诱导条件的优化，重组蛋白在37℃，1.0mmol/L IPTG、4h条件下表达量最高。

The coat protein (CP) gene of tomato black ring virus (TBRV) was amplified by RT-PCR. The amplified fragment was cloned and confirmed by sequence analysis which consisted of 1 399 bp. TBRV CP gene was cloned into pMD19-T simple vector. Sequence analysis showed that the nucleotide was 99% aligned with TBRV CP gene in GenBank. TBRV CP gene was inserted into pET30a digested by Hind IU/BamH, the prokaryotic expression vector pET30a-TBRV CP was constructed, and transformed into E. coli BL-21. After induction by 1.0 mmol/L IPTG for 4 h in 37℃, the recombinant TBRV CP was successively expressed and the yields were the largest in SDS-PAGE analysis.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research and application of key technique for mechanized production of royal jelly (Ⅰ)—A design of bionic non-grafting larvae ovipositor
蜂王浆机械化生产关键技术研究与应用（Ⅰ）——仿生免移虫生产器设计

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zeng Zhijiang, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Honeybee Research Institute
Wu Xiaobo, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Honeybee Research Institute
Zhang Fei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Honeybee Research Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 蜂王浆是我国养蜂生产一种主要产品，也是养蜂者的主要经济来源之一。在我国劳动力成本上升和养蜂员队伍老龄化状态下，实现我国蜂王浆生产机械化，是解决蜂王浆生产瓶颈问题一条有效途径。研究利用仿生学原理，设计了一种仿生免移虫生产器，主要包括人工塑料空心巢础、托虫器、产浆条、空心巢础盖板等。仿生免移虫生产器的设计为实现我国蜂王浆生产机械化提供了技术支撑。

As a staple product of beekeeping industry in China, Royal jelly is the main source of income for beekeepers. With the rising of labor cost and the aging of beekeepers in the country, mechanized production has been an effective way to solve the bottleneck problem of royal jelly production. This study used the principle of bionics to design a kind of bionic non-grafting larvae ovipositor, plastic hollow comb foundation, the implement for larvae supporting, the cover plate of the hollow comb foundation, etc. The design of bionic non-technical support for mechanized production of Royal jelly in China. which mainly included the artificial bar for Royal jelly yielding and the grafting larvae ovipositor provided a technical support.

ags:resource.dc:title: Light transfer model and its application in microalgal culture in photobioreactor
光生物反应器中光传递模型在微藻培养中的应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Xiaofang, Jiangxi Normal University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory of Protection and Utilization of Subtropic Plant Resources of Jiangxi Province
Zhang Zhibin, Jiangxi Normal University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory of Protection and Utilization of Subtropic Plant Resources of Jiangxi Province
Yu Jiaqing, Jiangxi Normal University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory of Protection and Utilization of Subtropic Plant Resources of Jiangxi Province

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 微藻光自养生长的细胞密度很大程度上受到光生物反应器中光能传递效率的限制，研究光生物反应器中光能传递规律是提高微藻光能利用效率的基础。分别综述了微藻在光生物反应器中的光衰减和光强分布数学模型，这些模型不但能揭示微藻培养过程中光能的动态变化规律，也为开发高效的光生物反应器和优化培养工艺提供理论依据。

The cell densities of photoautotrophic microalgae were limited by the efficiency of light trans-mission in photobioreactors to a great extent. Therefore, the study on light transmission in photobioreactor was the theory foundation for improving the efficiency of light utilization. This work reviews the different mathematical models of light attenuation and distribution in microalgal culture in different, types of photobioreactors. These models can be applied to describe the changes of light intensities in different microalgal cultures, but also provide a theoretical support for efficient photobioreactor design and culture condition optimization.

ags:resource.dc:title: Clone and bioinformatics analysis of GAPDH from orchid (Cymbidium faberi)
蕙兰GAPDH基因的全长克隆及生物信息学分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tian Yunfang, Zhengzhou Normal University, Zhengzhou (China), Institute for Biological Studies
Jiang Suhua, Zhengzhou Normal University, Zhengzhou (China), Institute for Biological Studies
Yuan Xiuyun, Zhengzhou Normal University, Zhengzhou (China), Institute for Biological Studies
