dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 根据GenBank中已登陆的GAPDH基因的同源核苷酸保守序列，设计简并引物，采用RT-PCR的方法得到5个875bp的片段，分别命名为CfGAPDH1-CfGAPDH5，GenBank登录号分别为JN177722-JN177726。同时结合RACE方法得到蕙兰GAPDH基因cDNA全长，命名为CfGAPDH（JX560732），该序列cDNA全长为1 496bp，具有完整的开放阅读框（ORF，173-1 195bp），编码340个氨基酸，该基因编码的氨基酸序列与其他植物的GAPDH蛋白有较高的同源性（80%以上）。系统进化分析表明蕙兰CfGAPDH基因核苷酸序列与墨兰GAPDH1、GAPDH2和春兰GAPDH1的同源性最高（99%），所编码的氨基酸序列与墨兰GAPDH2的同源性达100%。生物信息学分析推测，该基因编码的蛋白残基主要有两个卷曲螺旋区域，分别位于25和250位点附近，属于不稳定蛋白，亲水性较强，初步推断CfGAPDH是一个胞质型GAPDH，二级结构中的β转角所占比例较高（41.2%），三级结构与春兰和小麦非常相似。

With primers designed based on the sequences of GAPDH genes from NCBI, the full-length cDNAs of GAPDH genes were cloned from Cymbidium faberi by RT-PCR combined with RACE. The newly cloned GAPDH gene was designated as CfGAPDH (JX560732). Sequence analysis shows that CfGAPDH is 1 496 bp in length, contains a single open reading frame from 173 bp to 1195 bp, encodes proteins with 340 amino acids. CfGAPDH and Cymbidium sinense GAPDH2 (JQ796075) are more similar having 100% identical amino acids. Bioinformaties analysis showed that the deduced protein is a putative unstable hydrophilie protein. The secondary structure of CfGAPDH consists mainly of loops (41.2%). The homology modeling of the GAPDH in Cymbidium faberi based on the 3D structure is similar to that of homologues in Cymbidium goeringii and Triticum aestivum, which firms that the polypeptides are highly conserved.

ags:resource.dc:title: Parameter optimization of LIBS in detecting chromium in smelter soil
激光诱导击穿光谱检测冶炼厂土壤中铬元素系统参数优化研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Wenbing, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Biology Key Laboratory of Photoelectric and Application
Yao Mingyin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Biology Key Laboratory of Photoelectric and Application
Zheng Jianhong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Biology Key Laboratory of Photoelectric and Application

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了探索激光诱导击穿光谱（laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy，LIBS）快速检测土壤中铬元素的可行性，采用1 064nm的Nd:YAG纳秒脉冲激光器作为激光光源，对冶炼厂土壤中的Cr元素进行了参数优化分析，通过获取的样品LIBS光谱得出Cr（Ⅰ）425.435nm为最佳分析谱线；通过信背比、强度与激光能量的关系曲线，得出最佳能量为140 nmJ；通过信背比、强度与延时时间的关系曲线，得出最佳延迟时间为1.4μs。结果表明，对LIBS参数优化可以提高其鉴别目标元素的能力，该参数优化方法也适用于检测土壤中其他重金属元素的研究。

In order to explore the feasibility of detecting chromium in soil rapidly by laser-induced break-down spectroscopy, this experiment used 1 064 nm Nd:YAG nanosecond laser as the laser light source, optimized the parameters for chrome in the smelters soil, chose Cr (I) 425.435 nm as the analytical spectral lines; then made the relation curve with signal-to -background ratio, strength and different laser energy, the result showed that the optimum energy was 140 nmJ; the relation curve with signal-to-background ratio, strength and different delay time, showed that the optimum delay time was 1.4 μs; All this show that: optimizing parameters for LIBS can improve its ability to identify the target element, and the research method in this paper is also suitable for detecting other heavy metal elements in soil.

ags:resource.dc:title: The resistance of different strains of rice blast (Magnaporthe oryzae) in Jiangxi province to Kasugamycin and Isoprothiolane
江西省稻瘟病菌对春雷霉素和稻瘟灵的抗药性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Jie, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Bioengineering
Huo Guanghua, Jiangxi Academy Of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Plant Protection Institute
Li Xiangmin, Jiangxi Academy Of Agricultural Sciences, Nanchang (China), Plant Protection Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 稻瘟病是水稻生产上潜在威胁最严重的病害，化学防治是目前防治稻瘟病的关键措施之一。采用生长速率法，分别测定2012年从江西省不同稻区分离的40个稻瘟病菌单孢菌株对春雷霉素与稻瘟灵的敏感性。试验结果表明春雷霉素对供试40个稻瘟病菌株的EC50值范围为6.28～333.01mg/L，其中，敏感菌株有29个，低抗水平菌株有10个，中抗水平菌株有1个；稻瘟灵的EC50值范围为5.63～28.96 mg/L，敏感菌株有38个，低抗水平菌株有2个，表明江西省稻瘟病菌株对春雷霉素与稻瘟灵的抗性均表现为较低水平。抗性菌株对春雷霉素与稻瘟灵的抗性分析表明江西省稻瘟病菌对春雷霉素与稻瘟灵未产生交互抗药性或多抗性。

Rice blast (Magnapothe grisea) is one of the single strains collected from different areas in Jiangxi Province important rice diseases. The resistance of forty to Kasugamycin and Isoprothiolane was determined by indoor mycelium growth test. The results indicated that there was great difference in the EC50 of Kasugamycin, the EC50 ranged from 6.28 mg/L to 333.01 mg/L, ten low-resistance strains and one middle-resistance strain were found. The EC50 of Isoprothiolane to blast ranged from 5.63 mg/L to 28.96 mg/L, two low-resistance strains were found. The result revealed that the resistance levels of blast to both Kasugamycin and Isoprothiolane were low. Cross-resistance or multi-resistance of the blast strains to Kasugamycin and Isoprothiolane was not found in the analysis of analyzing the resistance.

ags:resource.dc:title: Evaluation of forestry ecological security based on matter element analysis
江西省林业生态安全物元分析评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Pin, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Land Resources and Environment
Zhang Bangwen, Forest Inventory and Planning Institute of Jiangxi Province, Nanchang (China)
Cai Haisheng, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Land Resources and Environment

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 林业是生态安全建设的主体，是区域生态安全的重要保障。探讨了林业生态安全的内涵，构建了3个层次18个指标的林业生态安全评价指标体系。运用物元分析法对江西省2006年和2010年林业生态安全水平进行定量评价，以反映“十一五”期间江西省林业生态安全动态变化。结果表明：2006年和2010年江西省林业生态安全均处于较安全等级，且2010年比2006年较安全综合关联度略有下降，2008年雨雪冰冻灾害是导致这一结果的主要原因；病虫害发生率、树种结构、龄级结构以及年均森林消长比等指标是影响江西省“十一五”期间林业生态安全的主要因素。

Forestry is the principal part of ecosystem construction, and the important part of ecological security. In this study, based on the connotation of forest ecological security, the evaluation index system of forest ecological security was set up, including 18 indices of 3 levels. By using matter element analysis, forestry ecological security level of Jiangxi Province in 2006 and 2010 was evaluated. The results showed that, the rate of plant diseases and insect pests, tree species structure, age class structure, annual forest growth and decline were the main limiting factors.

ags:resource.dc:title: Identification of race and biovar of Ralstonia solanacearum from tobacco in Jiangxi province
江西省烟草青枯菌生理小种及生化型鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhou Zeke, JXAU, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Zhang Chaoqun, Jiangxi Tobacco Science Research Institute, Nanchang (China)
Jiang Junxi, JXAU, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为给江西烟草青枯病抗性品种的选育和利用提供理论依据，对江西主要烟区青枯病菌（Ralstonia solanacearum）的生理小种和生化型进行了鉴定。从石城、瑞金、会昌、信丰、广昌、峡江6个主要产烟县（市）采集青枯病感病烟株，通过平板稀释分离法从中分离获得24个具有致病性的烟草青枯病菌菌株。选取其中具有代表性的6个菌株，采用鉴别寄主接种、烟叶浸润反应和黑色素产生试验的方法，对其进行生理小种鉴定，结果6个菌株均属于生理小种1；测定菌株对三种双糖和三种己醇的利用能力以及对硝酸盐还原作用，结果发现6个菌株均属于生化型Ⅲ-1。

In order to provide theoretical basis for breeding and utilizing bacterial with-resistant tobacco varieties, race and biovar of Ralstonia solanacearum in tobacco in Jiangxi Province were identified. Diseased plant samples of tobacco bacterial wilt were collected from six counties of Shicheng, Ruijin, Huichang, Xinfeng, Guangchang and Xiajiang in Jiangxi Province, and 24 strains of the pathogen, Ralstonia solanacearum, were obtained from these samples by using the dilution plate isolation method. Six representative strains of them were chosen for race and biovar determination. The experimental results of differential host assay, infiltration reaction and melanin formation showed that all of the six strains belonged to race 1, and on the basis of their capacity in utilizing three disaccharides and three hexanol, as well as their reduction ability to KNO3, the six strains were also classified as bioval Ⅲ-1.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the neighborhood interrerence Index in Toona ciliates var. pubescens community
九连山自然保护区毛红椿天然林邻体干扰效应

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yang Qingpei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art
Fu Fanglin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art
Zhang Lu, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 邻体效应影响植物种群的更新，为探讨毛红椿天然更新困难的群落学机制，选取九连山国家级自然保护区毛红椿天然林为研究对象，采用干扰距离逐级扩大法，探讨了邻体对不同径级毛红椿基株干扰的有效距离、干扰来源和干扰强度。结果表明：（1）较小径级基株受邻体干扰的有效距离较宽（10m），较大径级相对较窄（6m）；（2）小径级毛红椿基株所受邻体干扰除来自种内干扰外，他种干扰也较大；（3）毛红椿基株径级与邻体干扰指数呈显著的负相关，随着基株个体的增大而干扰指数下降，推断较小植株受邻体干扰强度较大是毛红椿天然更新障碍的原因之一。

Neighborhood interference has strong effect on the regeneration of plant population. Based on the distance expanding method, the effective inference distance, interference intensity and sources to Toona ciliata var. pubescens objective trees with difference sizes of diameter at breast (DBH) were analyzed in Jiulianshan National Nature Reserve. The result showed that (1) the effective interference distance of large tree was wider than that of small one; (2) except for intraspecific interference, small objective tree suffered disturbance from other species; (3) the relationship between DBH of the objective tree and neighbor interference (NI) could be described as y=ae-bx. These findings indicated that intensive interference from neighbors would be one of the reasons for the failure of natural regeneration of T. ciliata var. pubescens.

ags:resource.dc:title: Formula of plant-ethanol-extract resisting Magnaporthe Oryzae and its activity in vivo and vitro
抗稻瘟病菌活性植物醇提物组方及其体内体外活性

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Fang, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering
Huo Guanghua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Engineering
Lan Bo, Institute of Plant Agricultural Science Academy, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 借鉴Wadley法评价植物源农药复配联合作用的思想，将参与组方的单剂引起25％抑制率的剂量定为中间水平，应用均匀设计安排试验来实现四种植物醇提物抗稻瘟病菌活性组方的配比优化。根据均匀设计的统计分析方法，应用DPS软件进行逐步回归，确定获得最高试验指标时各醇提物的配比（无患子:广玉兰:油茶:木荷=1:4.6:1:2.4）。对组方进行的盆栽试验结果表明组方对水稻稻瘟病既有预防作用又有治疗作用，质量浓度为20000mg/L的组方对水稻稻瘟病的预防作用的防效可达到93.2%，而治疗作用可达到91.2%，组方预防作用的EC50值为4 939mg/L，治疗作用的EC50值为5 944mg/L，预防作用明显优于治疗作用。

Using the thought of Wadley method evaluating plant-source pesticide’s joint action for reference, the dose of causing 25% inhibition rate of single agent in the formula was taken as the intermediate level, the proportion of the formula of four plant-ethanol-extracts with activity resisting Magnaporthe Oryzae by uniform design method was optimized. According to the statistical analysis of the uniform design, a stepwise regression analysis was conducted with DPS software, and the concentration ratios of each alcohol extract were defermined. The result verifying test showed that the best combination of the factors and the actual condition were mainly consistent, conforming to the requirements of the formula. The results were: the formula not only had preventing action, but also had curing action, when the concentration was 20 000 mg/L, the efficiency of prevention was 93.2%, the efficiency of cure was 91.2%, the EC50 of prevention was 4 939 mg/L, and the EC50 of cure was 5 944 mg/L, the preventing action was better than the cure action.

ags:resource.dc:title: Use of chilling injury subordinate function on evaluation of low temperature tolerance traits in hybrid rice
冷害隶属函数在水稻耐低温性状的评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Xiangrui, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Chen Xiaorong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Yang Jun, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以江西主栽杂交晚稻品种五丰优T025为试验材料，采用大田盆栽试验，人工控温在抽穗扬花期进行16℃和18℃处理强度，1～3d低温持续时间的胁迫，处理后立即移栽回大田，在抽穗扬花期测定倒2叶光合参数及SPAD值，成熟后调查产量性状的变化。结果表明：在16℃处理条件下，随时间的延长光合特性参数净光合速率（Pn）、气孔导度（C）及水分利用率（WUE）均降低，而18℃1～3d处理条件下WUE增加；SPAD值降低；在产量性状中，单株空秕粒数在抽穗扬花期对低温更敏感，16℃处理1，2，3d，单株空秕粒数分别增加40.96％、65.44％和155.15％；18℃处理1，2，3d，单株空秕粒数分别增加25.34％、40.77％和113.13％。产量相关性状与平均冷害隶属函数值相关分析表明，利用平均隶属函数值消除了与对照之间的差异，评价杂交晚稻冷害强度更为科学，可作为水稻新种质选择的依据。

Taking ‘WufengyouT025’ of hybrid rice at the heading stage as the test material this study investigated the photosynthetic parameter, SPAD value and the changes of the characters of yield under low temperature stress in pot experiment so as to discuss the injury mechanism of low temperature in the reproductive growth stages in 16℃/1 - 3 and 18℃/1 -3 d stress. The results showed that 16℃ low temperature resulted in the reduction of net photosynthesis (Pn), stomatal conductance (C), water use efficiency (WUE) and SPAD value, whereas the increase of WUE under 18℃ low temperature stress, unfulfilled grains per hill were more sensitive to low temperature at the heading stage among characters of yield, whose unfulfilled grains per hill increased by 40.96%, 65.44% and 155.15% under low temperature of 16%, and 25.34%, 40.77% and 113.13% under temperature of 18℃. Correlation analysis of yield component and average chilling injury subordinate function value, because it eliminated the difference between processing and the contrast, so it can be used to evaluate new rice germplasm resources.

ags:resource.dc:title: Genetic diversity analysis of recurrent selection of flue-cured tobacco populations by SSR marker
利用SSR标记分析烤烟轮回选择群体的遗传多样性

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jiao Fangchan, Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Agricultural Science, Yuxi (China)
Gao Yulong, Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Agricultural Science, Yuxi (China)
Tong Zhijun, Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Agricultural Science, Yuxi (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以烤烟轮回选择3个世代群体为材料，利用SSR标记技术分析不同世代材料的遗传多样性。利用16个原始材料从350对SSR引物中筛选出条带清晰、多态性稳定的27对引物并在C0、C1、C2 3个群体各选取46个单株进行分析。结果显示，改良群体比基础群体的多态性位点数和基因杂合度略低，但差异不明显；C1和C2群体的平均遗传距离与C0相比有所减小，但变化不明显，同时经过重组交换，也增加了部分个体间的异质性。整体上来看，轮回选择的改良群体与基础群体的遗传变异相似，通过两轮选择，改良群体能较好的保持原始群体的遗传多样性。

Using SSR makers, this study analyzed the genetic diversity of three populations from recurrent selection of flue-cured tobacco for material. 350 pairs of SSR primers were screened by 16 original lines, and 27 pairs of primers showed clear bands and stable polymorphism. PCR analyses were carried out among three populations of C0, C1, C2, 46 individuals from each population were selected for analysis. The results showed that the polymorphic loci and heterozygosity of the improved groups were slightly lower than those of the original group, but the difference was not significant. The average genetic distance in C1 and C2 groups was smaller than in C0 group, but it did not change significantly. The genetic distance of some individuals from the improved group was enlarged by recombination. The results indicated that the improved group by recurrent selection had similar genetic variation to the original group, and the improved group could maintain approximate genetic diversity of the original group.

ags:resource.dc:title: Dwarfing effect of two retardants on Phyllostachys nigra
两种植物生长延缓剂对紫竹的矮化效应

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Haiyan, Anhui Agricultural University, Hefei (China), College of Forestry and Landscape Architecture
Liu Guihua, Anhui Agricultural University, Hefei (China), College of Forestry and Landscape Architecture
Yue Xianghua, ICBR, Huangshan (China), Taiping Experimental Station

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以国际竹藤网络中心安徽太平试验中心种质资源保存库内紫竹为研究对象，采用喷施不同浓度的矮壮素（CCC）和多效唑（PP333）对其进行矮化。结果表明：两种植物生长延缓剂均能使紫竹的株高和枝下高矮化，其中矮壮素的矮化效果稍好于多效唑，但差别不大。药剂的矮化效果并非随浓度的增大而增强，其中矮壮素处理浓度为2 500mg/L对紫竹株高、枝下高的矮化效果最佳，与对照组相比，分别达到46.66％、34.19％，与浓度为3 000mg/L无显著差异；多效唑对紫竹株高、枝下高的影响均为800mg/L的矮化效果最佳，分别达到对照的43.44％、41.55％，超过800mg/L的二种浓度，效果与800mg/L的无显著差异。

Two retardants chloride (CCC) and paclobutrazol (PP333) were applied on Phyllostachys nigra by spraying to examing the dwarfing effects in genetic diversity bank of International Centre for Bamboo and Rattan, Huangshan, Anhui Province. The results showed that: the two retardants could decrease the bamboo height and the height under branch. The dwaring effect of CCC was a little better than that of PP333. The dwarfing effects of the two chemicals did not increase with the concentration. The optimal concentration was CCC 2 500 mg/L; with this concentration, indices of the bamboo height, height under branch were 46.66% and 34.19% of the control, respectively. No significant differences were found in the height under the concentration of 3 000 mg/L. The optimal concentration was PP333 2 500 mg/L, in which, the above mentioned two indices, were 43.44% and 41.55% of the control. The result had no significant differences if the concentration of PPP333 was higher than 800 mg/L of the two concentrations.

ags:resource.dc:title: Optimization of phosphorylation modification technology for ovotransferrin
卵转铁蛋白磷酸化修饰工艺条件优化

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Rong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory for Natural Product Utilization and Development of Jiangxi Provincial Higher Learning Institutions
Xu Mingsheng, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory for Natural Product Utilization and Development of Jiangxi Provincial Higher Learning Institutions
Wu Leiyan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory for Natural Product Utilization and Development of Jiangxi Provincial Higher Learning Institutions

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为提高卵转铁蛋白（OVT）的抑菌活性，采用三聚磷酸钠（STP）对卵转铁蛋白进行磷酸化修饰，以抑菌活性为评价指标，通过正交试验对修饰条件进行优化。试验结果表明，最佳修饰工艺条件为：pH值为9，OVT/STP为1g/10g，时间为1h，该条件下磷酸化的卵转铁蛋白（PP-OVT）抑菌活性得到了提高，其磷酸化程度为4.7%。

In order to improve the antibacterial activity of ovotransferrin (OVT), sodium tripolyphosphate (STP) was used to modify ovotransferrin. Orthogonal test was used to optimize the modification condition by evaluating the level of antibacterial activity. The results showed that the best conditions for the modification process were: pH was 9.0, OVT/STP was 1 g/10 g, reaction time was 1 h, antibacterial activity of ovotransferrin was improved after the optimized phosphorylation, and the phosphorus content of ovotransferrin was 4.7%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Studies on micro-climate in different habitats in southern ecotone of Mu Us sandy land
毛乌素沙地南缘生态过渡带不同生境小气候的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Lili, Ningxia University, Yinchuan (China), College of Agronomy
Yang Lihua, The Third Middle School of Wuzhong City, Wuzhong (China)
Xu Dongmei, Ningxia University, Ningxia (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用短期定位观测法对毛乌素沙地南缘生态过渡带流动半流动沙丘草地、固定半固定沙地草地、盐化丘间低地草和缓坡丘陵梁地草地4种不同生境的光照、空气温度、空气湿度、地表温度及地下5cm、10cm、15cm、20cm土壤温度等表征区域小气候特征的指标进行了观测并对其日变化进行了分析，以阐明小气候因子与生态环境变化的关系。结果表明：随着沙化程度的加重，从缓坡丘陵梁地草地，经盐化丘间低地草地、固定半固定沙地草地到流动半流动沙丘草地，光照强度增加了18.62％；空气湿度下降了24.62％；气温、地表温度变幅加大，分别由缓坡丘陵梁地草地的13℃、20.9℃增加至流动半流动沙丘草地的15.5℃、35.1℃。随着土层深度的增加，土壤温度变化幅度逐渐减小，5cm土层温度变化趋势接近地表，14：00达最高；其它土层温度17：00达最高，滞后于地表和5cm土层温度。自缓坡丘陵梁地草地至流动半流动沙丘草地，群落小气候向着更为干旱和不稳定的方向发展。

The micro-climates were determined under 4 different habitats in the ecotone in south edge of Mu Us sandy land by using short-term fixed sample observation. The illumination, air temperature, air humidity, soil surface temperature and soil temperature at 5 era, 10 cm, 15 cm and 20 cm depth were measured. The daily changing trends of the indexes were analyzed to clarify the relation between climate factors and ecological environments. The results showed that: the illumination intensity increased by 18.62%, while air humidity decreased by 24.62% from slope hilly ridge grassland, through to saline bottomland grassland, fixed and semi-fixed dune grassland and to shifting and semi-shifting dune grassland. The changing extents of air temperature and soil surface temperature increased from 13℃, 20.9℃ for gentle slope hilly ridge grassland to 15.5℃, 35.1℃ for shifting and semi-shifting dune grassland respectively. The changing extents of soil temperature decreased with the depth. The changing trend of soil temperature at 5 cm depth was similar to that of soil surface, were up to the highest at 14:00. The soil temperatures at other depths reached to the highest at 17:00, which lagged to the soil surface and 5 cm depth. The micro-climate developed to aridity and instability from gentle slope hilly ridge grassland to shifting and semi-shifting dune grassland.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on the changes of the physical properties of the compacted soil in coal base
煤炭基地村庄压实土壤物理性质变化研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Haiming, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), School of Land Science and Technology
Shi Xueyi, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), School of Land Science and Technology
Tian Yi, China University of Geosciences, Beijing (China), School of Land Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 土壤压实是影响土地复垦质量的主要障碍，导致了土壤理化性状的改变，难以满足作物生长的要求。合村庄土壤压实的产生机制，对土路、废弃院落土壤进行采样分析，另取耕作土壤作对比，选取容重、容积含水量、土壤孔隙度、土壤三相比4项指标反映压实土壤物理性质的变化。结果表明：压实导致土路表层容重高达1.75g/cm3，院落表层土壤容重接近1.60g/cm3，高于土壤耕作层容重1.40g/cm3；在土壤深度不超过70cm时，土壤容积含水量高低依次为耕地、土路、院落，土壤深度超过70cm时，无明显变化规律；对土路、院落土壤的压实导致土壤孔隙度由适宜作物生长的45％～50％减小为35％～45％；土路、废弃院落、耕作土壤三相比依次为6:3:1，6:2:2，5:3:2，压实导致土壤固相体积增大，大空隙减少、小空隙被水封闭、透气性减弱，土壤保水能力减弱。

Soil compaction is the main obstacle that affects the quality of the land reclamation, leading to changes of soil physical and chemical properties, so it is difficult to meet the requirements of crop growth. Combined with the generation mechanism of soil compaction, a sampling analysis of embankment and courtyard soils was carried out compared with cultivated land, the bulk density, bulk density water content, soil porosity and the rate of soil phases were selected as the four indexes which indicated the physical properties of compacted soil. The results showed that compaction caused the high bulk density of the surface of soil embankment, making 1.75 g/cm3, and that of the surface of soil courtyard close to 1.60 g/cm3, higher than that of cultivated layer 1.40 g/cm3; which was at the soil depth no more than 70 cm, the order of the soil bulk density water contents was cultivated land soil embankment courtyard, at the soil depth more than 70 cm, no definite trend was observed; compaction of soil embankment and courtyard reduced the soil porosity from 45% - 50%, which suits crop growth, to 35% - 45%; the rates of soil phases of soil embankment, courtyard and cultivated land were in the sequence of 6:3:1, 6:2:2, 5:3:2, compaction reduced big porosities, closed small porosities by water, decreased permeability hence the decrease of water retaining capacity of courtyard soil.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of gene expression profile in response to low temperature stress of pig
民猪低温胁迫的基因表达谱分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yang Yueying, Northeast Agricultural University, Harbin (China), College of Science
Liu Di, Heilongjiang Acamedy of Agricultural Sciences, Harbin (China)
Ding Changhong, Heilongjiang University of Chinese Medicine, Harbin (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 随着基因芯片在基因的发现与识别等研究方面的应用，高通量并行识别特征基因成为表达谱分析的重要工作之一。地方猪种民猪在抗寒性方面表现出较好的生物特征，提出的目标优化方法在识别民猪抗寒性状相关基因方面效果较好。通过制备常温状态和低温状态两类样本的基因芯片，获得了民猪低温胁迫的表达谱数据，通过目标优化算法多次迭代筛选得到的特征基因集合，对于不同的特征基因集合的分析，最终确定民猪抗寒性状相关基因，注释在生物学数据库中获得了相应的基因功能。目标优化算法泛化性能较好，能够同步进行特征基因的选择和样本分类两过程。

As the application of gene chip in gene discovery and recognition research, application of high-throughput identification of trait genes become one of the important work of gene expression analysis. Local pigs in cold resistance aspect showed good biological characteristics. The goal optimization is to identify the cold resistance traits related to gene effect in pig. Two kinds of gene chips of samples from normal temperature and low temperature, multiple iterations of optimization algorithm were used to identify the target gene sets. The cold related genes could be determined through analysis of gene characteristics. The optimization algorithm has good generalization performance, can synchronize the two processes of gene selection and sample classification.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analysis of the status of the development of the mechanization of rice production in the double cropping rice area in south China
我国南方双季稻区水稻生产机械化发展现状分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xiao Liping, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Department of Engineering
He Xiuwen, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Department of Engineering
Liu Muhua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Department of Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 从水稻耕整地机械、种植机械和收获机械等方面介绍了我国南方双季稻区水稻生产机械化发展现状；从地形条件、农机农艺结合状况、机械动力消耗和产品性能等方面分析了南方双季稻区水稻生产机械化的限制因素，指出了存在的问题，并提出了相关对策。

Combined with the features of southern double cropping rice area, the paper summarizes the current situation of the development of the mechanization of rice production in the double cropping rice area in South China from the aspects of tillage machinery, planting machinery and harvesting machinery. And at the same time the limiting factors in the development including the topographic condition, the imperfect combination of agricultural machinery and agronomic technology, the power consumption, and product performance, etc are analyzed. And some corresponding solution measures are put forward.

ags:resource.dc:title: Observation on the pollinated styles of Rhododendron siderophyllum by fluorescence microscopy and analysis of its self-compatibility
锈叶杜鹃授粉花柱的显微观察与自交亲和性分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xie Weijia, Flower Research Institute of Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kunming (China)
Bai Tian, College of Horticulture and Landscape of Yunnan Agricultural University, Kunming (China)
Li Shifeng, Flower Research Institute of Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kunming (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以锈叶杜鹃为研究对象，利用荧光显微镜观察其自交花粉的萌发、花粉管在花柱中的生长动态，并统计自花授粉后的坐果率。结果表明，锈叶杜鹃自花授粉后2h花粉开始萌发，授粉后8h后花粉管伸入花柱，授粉后48h花粉管进入子房，76h后花粉管进入胚珠。在锈叶杜鹃花粉管萌发和生长过程中，从柱头乳突细胞开始到花粉管、花柱通道细胞、子房引导组织、胚珠的胚囊等都伴随出现一系列的胼胝质反应等异常现象；而自花授粉的花朵坐果率仅为19.89％。结果表明：锈叶杜鹃自花亲和，但其自身存在抑制自交亲和的机制。

The self-compatibility of Rhododendron siderophyllum was studied by fluorescence microscope including the process of pollen sprouting and pollen tube growth after self-cross. The capsule setting of the self-cross was calculated. The results showed that the pollen of R. siderophyllum sprouted in 2 h after pollination, pollen tube entered the style in 8 h after the self-cross, and reached the ovary in 48 h after pollination and then got into the ovule in 76 h after the self-cross. The pollen tube growth was accompanied with a series of callose deposition responses, which happened in the stigma cell, pollen tube, canal cell, ovary and embryo sac in ovule. The capsule set was 19.89% in the self-cross. The results indicated that the self-cross of R. siderophyllum was compatible, however, the mechanism of restricting self-cross compatibility did exist in R. siderophyllum.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of genetic diversity in a Jian carp family and correlation of microsatellite markers and economic traits
一个建鲤家系的遗传多样性及微卫星标记与经济性状相关性分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Jianlin, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Wuxi (China), Freshwater Fisheries Research Center
Li Hongxia, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Wuxi (China), Freshwater Fisheries Research Center
Tang Yongkai, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Wuxi (China), Freshwater Fisheries Research Center

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选用16个微卫星标记对1个建鲤家系遗传多样性及这些位点与体质量、体型相关性进行分析。这16个微卫星位点在该建鲤群体中共检测出53个等位基因和58种基因型，平均等位基因3.3个，基因型3.6种；各位点平均观察杂合度（Ho）、期望杂合度（He）分别为0.829 1和0.648 5；所检测的多态信息含量（PIC）为0.292～0.703，平均为0.576 6；个体间的遗传距离为0.1057～0.5066，平均为0.403 9；平均固定系数（FIS）为-0.284，说明该建鲤群体存在杂合子过剩现象。实验结果表明，该建鲤群体多态信息含量丰富，遗传多样性水平较高，具有较大的选育潜力。最小二乘方差分析结果显示，位点CCA19中AA型个体，位点KOI55-56中BD、CD型个体和位点HLJ320中AB型个体有望作为以体质量为选育目标的辅助标记；位点KOI83-84中AC型、BC型个体有望作为以体型为选育目标的辅助标记。

In this study, 16 microsatellite loci were chosen and their polymorphisms and their association with body weight and body shape were studied in a Cyprinus carpio var. jian family. A total of 53 alleles and 58 genotypes were detected in the population by the 16 loci, with the average of 3.3 and 3.6 respectively. The average observed and expected heterozygosity were 0.829 1 and 0.648 5 respectively. The polymorphic information content (PIC) varied from 0.292 to 0.703, and the average was 0.577 6. The average fixation index (FIS) was -0.284, which indicated that heterozygote excess existed in the population. The results showed that with rich polymorphism information content and large genetic diversity, this the C. carpio var. jian family has a large selection potential. The least-square method was used to analysis the microsatellite markers associated with the traits of body weight and body shape. The results suggested that genotype AA of CCA19, genotype BD and CD of KOI55 - 56, genotype AB of HLJ320 might be regarded as the candidate-marker for body weight trait, genotype AC and BC of KOI83 - 84 might be regarded as the candidate-marker for body shape trait.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning and sequence analysis of full-length cDNA encoding beta-ketoacyl-ACP aynthase Ⅲ from Vernicia fordii
油桐β-酮脂酰-ACP合酶Ⅲ基因克隆及序列分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yan Fangfang, Central South University Of Forestory and Technology, Changsha (China)
Tan Xiaofeng, Central South University Of Forestory and Technology, Changsha (China)
Long Hongxu, Central South University Of Forestory and Technology, Changsha (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: β-酮脂酰-ACP合酶——KAS是脂肪酸合成中的一种缩合酶，主要是在缩合反应中起作用。研究以近成熟的油桐种子为材料，根据GenBank中蓖麻等已知的β-酮脂酰-ACP合酶基因KASⅢ的序列设计简并引物，利用PCR、RACE等技术克隆得到了油桐KASⅢ基因的全长cDNA序列。该基因序列全长1 901bp，开放阅读框为1 209bp，编码403个氨基酸，通过与其他物种的KASⅢ氨基酸序列比对，油桐KASⅢ基因与麻疯树的同源性最高，达90％。软件预测表明，KASⅢ蛋白等电点为5.78，存在跨膜结构域，整个蛋白质基本上是表现出亲水性的，将该基因命名为vf-kasⅢ。

Beta-ketoacyl-ACP synthase is a fatty acid synthesis under the condensation effect of enzyme, plays a role in the condensation reaction. The primer was designed according to the KAS Ⅲ sequences recorded in genbank. Full-Length cDNA of KAS Ⅲ was obtained by cloning it with PCR, RACE, etc. methods. It was 1 901 bp in length and contained a 1 209 bp ORF (open reading frame) encoding a peptide of 403 amino acids, amino acid sequence highest similarity (90%) to brane spanning domain was alignment with other species showed that the KAS Ill of Verniciafordii displayed the Jatropha curcas. The predicted isoelectric point of the KASm was 5.78. A mem-present in the gene. The protein shows hydrophilic basically.

ags:resource.dc:title: The pH distribution and its relationship to soil nutrient Zhanyi tobacco-growing areas in Yunnan province
云南沾益植烟土壤pH分布特征及其与土壤养分关系

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ouyang Lei, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), Tobacco Institute
Zhou Jiheng, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), Tobacco Institute
Duan Zhichao, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha (China), Tobacco Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为提高烤烟施肥的针对性，测试分析沾益烟区320个植烟土壤样本的pH和土壤养分状况。结果表明：沾益植烟土壤pH整体适宜，平均值为6.06；pH处于适宜烤烟生长的5.0～7.0的土壤样本占75.3％。不同土壤类型pH高低顺序表现为：新积土＞水稻土＞紫色土＞红壤。土壤pH与有机质、全氮、全钾、有效钙、有效镁、有效铁、有效锰以及水溶性氯离子含量的相关性系数达1％极显著水平。土壤pH分组后，土壤养分含量在组间存在极显著差异。沾益植烟土壤pH为5.5～6.5的土壤的有机质、碱解氮、速效钾、有效钙、有效镁、有效铜、有效锌、有效铁、有效锰、有效硫和水溶性氯离子的含量能够满足优质烤烟生长需要，全氮、全磷和速效磷含量能满足烤烟正常生长需求，全钾及有效硼含量偏低，但尚未引起烤烟缺素症状。

In order to improve the targeted fertilization for flue-cured tobacco, the pH distribution in Zhanyi tobacco planting area was analyzed from 320 soil samples. The results indicated that the pH of Zhanyi tobacco planting soil was generally suitable for tobacco cultivation with a mean of 6.06. The pH between 5.0 - 7.0 of the soil samples was about 75.3%, it was good for the growth of high-quality tobacco. The pH of different soil types was in the following order: new alluvial soil paddy soil purple soil red soil. The correlations between pH and nutrient contents, including organic matter, total N, total K, available Ca, available Mg, available Fe, available Mn and water soluble C1, were all significant at a 0.01 confidence level. Significant differences at the 0.01 confidence level existed among different pH groups for the soil nutrients. The contents of organic matter, available N, available K, available Ca, available Mg, available Cu, available Zn, available Fe, available Mn, available S and water-soluble C1 in the soil samples with pH 5.5 - 6.5 met the production requirement of high-quality tobacco. Total N, total P and available P all meet the requirement of good tobacco growth. However, the contents of total K and available B were relatively low, but no nutrient deficiency symptom was observed.

ags:resource.dc:title: In vitro culture and rapid propagation of crape myrtle (Lagerstroemia indica) Stem
紫薇离体茎段快速繁殖体系研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Duan Lijun, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Horticulture and Forestry Science
Li Guorui, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan (China), College of Horticulture and Forestry Science
Tong Jun, Wuhan Forestry and Fruits Research Institute, Wuhan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 试验以紫薇茎段为外植体，分别从消毒时间、取材季节、诱导、增殖和生根培养基配方等方面系统研究紫薇茎段快繁途径.实验结果表明：紫薇带芽茎段培养，以夏季效果最好；夏季剪取当年生枝条的带顶芽茎段和带腋芽茎段以0.1％的HgCl2分别消毒4min、6min为最佳；诱导和增殖最佳培养基为MS＋6-BA 1.0mg/L＋NAA 0.1mg/L，萌芽率高达97.6％，增殖效果好，经4次培养，萌生的平均不定芽数达61个。生根培养基宜选用1/2MS＋IBA 0.5mg/L。

This study used stem segments as explants, and investigated the factors that affected tissue culture and rapid propagation of crape myrtle, including disinfection time, explant harvesting time, and recipe for the primary, secondary and rooting medium. The results suggested that the stems with buds from summer branches were the best among those from spring-, summer-, and autumn-branches. The apical and axillary bud of the current-year summer branch performed well when disinfection in 0.1% HgCl2 for 4 and 6 min, respectively. The optimized induction and amplification medium for crape myrtle stem was MS ＋ 6-BA 1.0 mg/L ＋ NAA 0.1 mg/L, and the germination rate was 97.6%. After four rounds of culture, the number of adventive buds reached 61. The rooting medium of 1/2 MS ＋ IBA 0.5 mg/L was optimal for plantlet.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comparison of the foliage chlorine contents in 26 afforestation trees
26种绿化树种叶片氯含量的比较

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Jiayang, Xinxiang University, Xinxiang (China), School of Life Science and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 绿化树种是改善环境的载体，叶片是大气污染物的吸收器，于2011年选择新乡市26种绿化树种（不同的季节和功能区），对其叶片氯含量进行分析，结果表明，26种绿化树种叶片氯含量随春、夏、秋季节的变化呈现递增趋势，针对较清洁的校园而言，污染严重的工业区所有绿化树种叶片氯含量都较高。运用K-均值聚类法对城市绿化树种叶片氯含量进行分类，大叶黄杨、紫丁香、卫矛、杨树和大叶女贞叶片含氯量相对较高，归为第1类；臭椿、榆树、五角枫、榆叶梅、栾树、小叶黄杨、银杏和构树叶片氯含量居中，归为第2类；第3类包括连翘、毛泡桐、毛白杨、紫荆、国槐、椤木石楠、枇杷、白玉兰、红叶石楠、凤尾兰、垂柳、紫叶李和白蜡，叶片氯含量相对较低。

The afforest tree is an important supporter in environmental improvement and whose foliage is an absorber of atmospheric pollutants, 26 afforestation trees were chosen in different seasons and functional areas in the year of 2011 in Xinxiang, and the foliage chlorine contents of different trees was mensurated. The results indicated that the chlorine contents of the afforest trees’ leaves increased according to seasonal variation of spring, summer and autumn. In comparison with clean areas, the chlorine contents of all the trees were relatively high in severely polluted industial areas. The foliage chlorine contents of different afforestation trees could be classified by K-Means Cluster, Buxus megistophylla, Syringa oblate, Euonymus alatus, Populus canadensis, Ligustrun lucidum, were classified as the first category and their chlorine contents were relatively high. The second category included Ailanthus altissima, Ulmus pumila, Acer elegantulum Fanget, Amygdalus triloba, Koelreuteria paniculata, Buxus sinica, Ginkgo biloba and Papermulberry, their chlorine contents were in the medium. The third category included Forsythia suspense, Paulownia, Populus tomentosa, Cercis chinensis, Sophora japonica Linn, Photinia davidsoniae, Eriobotrya japonica, Magnolia denudate, Photinia serrulata, Yucca gloriosa, Salix babylonica, Prunus cerasifera and Fraxinus chinensis, their foliage chlorine contents were relatively low.

ags:resource.dc:title: Dynamic changes of endogenous hormones in Styrax tonkinensis seed during the treatment process
白花树种子处理过程中内源激素动态变化

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Jun, Zhejiang Forestry Academy, Hangzhou (China)
Li Yingang, Zhejiang Forestry Academy, Hangzhou (China)
Luo Xiubao, Forestry Technology Popularization Station of Suichang, Suichang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以江西吉水种源地的白花树种子为试材，研究了其在层积沙藏和低温干藏2种处理下，胚和胚乳内源激素动态变化。结果表明：2种处理的胚和胚乳IAA和ZR含量呈先升后降趋势，ABA和GA含量呈先降后升趋势，IAA/ABA、ZR/ABA分别与IAA、ZR的变化趋势一致。层积沙藏处理90d时胚和胚乳ABA含量分别比未处理时下降了14.50%、11.32%，GA含量则上升了12.64%和15.33%，且GA/ABA值总体上呈现上升的趋势。试验表明，高浓度ABA是导致种子休眠的主要原因，GA是种子萌发的主要促进物质。

The seed of Styrax tonkinensis from Jishui, JiangXi Province was used as the material, the dynamic changes of endogenous hormones in seed under the treatment of stratification and cold storage were studied. The results showed that: in the test, the contents of IAA and ZR increased first and then decreased. But the contents of ABA and GA decreased first and then increased. The changing trends of the IAA/ABA, ZR/ABA tended to be consistent with those of IAA, ZR separately. The the contents of ABA in the embryo and endosperm decreased by 14.50% and 11.32% separately under stratification for 90 d, but the contents of GA increased by 12.64% and 15.33%. The ratio of GA/ABA showed an ascending trend in general. The test proved that high-concentration ABA is the major cause of the seed dormancy, and GA is the main material to promote the seed germination.

ags:resource.dc:title: An analysis of phenotypic traits of native chestnut varieties
板栗农家品种资源坚果表型性状分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Guobin, Beijing Academy of Agriculture and Forestry Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Agricultural Integrated Development
Lan Yanping, Beijing Academy of Agriculture and Forestry Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Agricultural Integrated Development
Lan Weizong, Beijing Academy of Agriculture and Forestry Sciences, Beijing (China), Institute of Agricultural Integrated Development

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为揭示农家板栗品种间的表型变异，对搜集到的7个农家品种坚果的高度、宽度、厚度、单粒质量、体积等形态指标以及总糖、淀粉、蛋白质等营养成分进行统计分析，结果表明：坚果高、宽、厚三项指标变异程度较小，变异系数低于10%；坚果体积及单粒质量变异程度较大,变异系数在10%～20%；坚果中总糖、淀粉、粗纤维、蛋白质含量在7份种质间存在不同程度变异，变异系数9.01%～26.58%，其中以总糖含量的变异幅度和变异系数最大；不同种质间各性状差异显著程度不同，南庄4号与南庄5号，良乡1号、栗榛寨1号与北庄8号，燕红与慕田峪6号分别在形态上表现出较多的相似性；板栗坚果性状指标存在相关性，坚果宽、厚、体积、单粒质量之间存在显著的正相关。本研究为板栗品种选优、核心种质收集奠定了基础。

In order to reveal the phenotypic variation among native chestnut varieties, seven native varieties were collected and the statistical analysis of height, width, thickness, single nut weight, volume and content of the sugar, starch, protein, fiber, fat, water of nut was carried out. The result showed that, the degrees of variation in three traits, including height, width, thickness, were low, and the coefficient of variation (CV) was lower than 10%, while the CV of single nut weight and volume were within the scope of 10% ～ 20%, which showed larger variation; among the seven germplasms, the contents of sugar, starch, fiber, water and fat showed different variation degrees, the CV were 9.01% ～ 26.58%, and the variation range and CV of sugar were the largest; the significance of character difference among native varieties was different, but some characters among native varieties were similar, and similarity existed between Nanzhuang No.1 and Nanzhuang No.5, among Liangxiang No.1, Lizhenzhai No.1 and Beizhuang No.8, between Yanhong and Mutianyu No.6; correlation analysis showed that positive correlation existed among width, thickness, single nut weight and volume. The result of the study lays a foundation for variety selection and core collection of chestnut.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of Eucalyptus varieties on the fitness and growth of Leptocybe invasa fisher et La Salle
不同桉树品种（系）对桉树枝瘿姬小蜂的适合度及生长发育的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Huafeng, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Forestry
Xiao Hua, Disease and Pest Control and Quarantine Station of Xiamen, Xiamen (China)
Chen Shunli, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou (China), College of Forestry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在林间调查了桉树枝瘿姬小蜂对不同桉树品种（系）危害情况，以及不同桉树品种（系）对桉树枝瘿姬小蜂的适合度和生长发育、繁殖力影响.结果表明：（1）福建省桉树主栽品种（系）大部分都可遭受桉树枝瘿姬小蜂危害，并可在尾赤桉DH201-2、巨桉QG3、邓恩桉、尾叶桉U6、巨尾桉GL9、大叶桉和窿缘桉等7种桉树品种（系）上形成虫瘿，正常生长发育，并完成其生活史。（2）研究发现不同桉树品种（系）受害程度和对桉树枝瘿姬小蜂的适合程度是不同的。桉树枝瘿姬小蜂对不同桉树寄主的选择频次率、产卵量和幼虫数量均有差异。（3）以不同桉树品种（系）为食的桉树枝瘿姬小蜂，除雌性比差别不大外，其余如出蜂数、雌成虫体质量、怀卵量、寿命等生长发育和繁殖力指标都有极显著的差异。（4）对寄主进行适合度分析，并用聚类分析法将桉树枝瘿姬小蜂的寄主划分为适宜寄主、较适宜寄主、较不适宜寄主、不适宜寄主4类。在适宜寄主上寄生取食，每雌怀卵量都达70粒以上，存在种群暴发的生物学潜能。在生产上可使用寄主适合度指标做为抗虫品种（系）筛选的综合性评价指标。

The harm status and levels of damage to different varieties caused by L. invasa were surveyed in the field and the effects of Eucalyptus varieties on the fitness and growth of this pest were studied. The results showed that: (1) most of the infested Eucalypt varieties could be damaged by L. invasa in Fujian; when the larvae fed on E. urophylla × E. camaldulensis clone DH201-2, E. grandis clone QG3, E. dunnii, E. urophylla clone U6, E. grandis × E. urophylla clone GL9, E. robusta and E. exserta respectively, they could form galls, grew normally and completed their life cycle; (2) there were differences among varieties for the degree of damage and host fitness of L. invasa, which resulted in changes in frequency through selection, and the fecundity and number of larvae differed among different Eucalyptus varieties; (3) L. invasa larvae feeding different Eucalyptus varieties, except for the female ratio, differed significantly in other attributes including emergence rate, female weight, fecundity and longevity of female; (4) according to the fitness index (FI), the host plants of L. invasa were divided into 4 categories by cluster analysis: the most suitable, suitable, secondary and unsuitable; feeding on suitable host, its fecundity reached more than 70 eggs per female which is adequate to lead to potential population explosion of the pest. Host fitness index can be used as a comprehensive evaluation index for the screening of resistant clones in practice.

ags:resource.dc:title: The optimum condition for enzyme production in straw decomposition and strain identification
稻草秆腐解菌产酶条件优化及菌种鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wei Saijin, JAU, Nanchang (China)
Wang Shiqiang, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Bioengineering
Hu Dianming, JAU, Nanchang (China), College of Bioengineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以促进稻草秆腐熟速度为目的，分别研究了速效碳源、速效氮源和接种量对真菌F23、产纤维素酶和半纤维素酶能力的影响，并对该菌种进行鉴定。结果表明：蔗糖和尿素是真菌F23快速启动稻草秆降解的首选速效碳源和氮源。通过正交试验筛选适合F23产酶的最佳培养条件为1.5％蔗糖、1.5％尿素和7.5％接种量。根据该菌株的形态特征、培养特征的观察，ITS序列分析，鉴定菌株F23为黑曲霉。

Starting from promotion of the decomposition rate of straw stalks, the impacts of availabe carbon and avilable nitrogen sources and inoculum amount on cellulase and hemicellulase producing capacity of F23 were studied. The results showed that sucrose and carbamide were the preferred carbon and nitrogen sources for straw-degradation. The optimal culture conditions for enzyme production of the strain F23 were screened through the orthogonal test. The results illustrated that the optimum conditions for fermentation were 1.5% sucrose, 1.5% carbamide and 7.5% inoculum amount. The strain F23 was identified as Aspergillus niger according to its morphological, cultural characteristics and sequence analysis of the ITS region.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research and application of key technique for mechanized production of royal jelly (Ⅱ)—A bionic non-grafting larvae technique for royal jelly production
蜂王浆机械化生产关键技术研究与应用（Ⅱ）——仿生免移虫蜂王浆生产技术

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Fei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Honeybee Research Institute
Wu Xiaobo, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Honeybee Research Institute
Yan Weiyu, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Honeybee Research Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为验证江西农业大学密峰研究所设计的仿生免移虫蜂王浆产卵器的使用效果，以意大利蜜蜂为实验材料，系统研究了仿生免移虫产卵器的工蜂造巢脾效率、蜂王产卵效果、卵的孵化率和蜂王浆生产效果，同时比较了仿生免移虫蜂王浆生产技术与传统人工移虫生产蜂王浆的生产效率。结果表明：工蜂能在仿生免移虫产卵器进行造脾；蜂王在仿生免移虫产卵器巢脾上一天的平均产卵率超过88%；仿生免移虫产卵器巢脾中卵的孵化效率为90.32%～98.11%；仿生免移虫王台接受率为82.28%～92.86%，台浆量为0.47～0.64g；与传统人工移虫蜂王浆生产技术相比，仿生免移虫蜂王浆生产技术效率提高了38.9%～83.3%。

For the sake of validating the effect of the honeybee bionic non-grafting larvae royal jelly ovipositor which was designed by Jiangxi Agricultural University, the Apis mellifera ligustica was selected as the experimental material and several viral factors were tested and analyzed including the efficiency of comb building of workers, the effect of spawning rate of queen, the hatchability of spawn and the effect of royal jelly output. Then the productive efficiencies of royal jelly of honeybee bionic non-grafting larvae and traditional grafting larvae categories were compared. The result showed that the workers could build their combs on the new instruments. Additionally, it was found that the mean spawning rate in queen cell and the hatchability of spawn in cell when using bionic non-grafting larvae were higher than 88% and 90.32% ～ 98.11%, respectively. Moreover, The acceptance rate of queen cells was 82.28% ～92.86% and the output of royal jelly in each cell was 0.47 g ～ 0.64 g. Compared with the traditional grafting larvae, the productive efficiency of royal jelly of the experimental group increased by 38.9% ～ 83.3%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Genotype and environmental effect on clean aroma type and sensory taste quality of flue-cured tobacco
基因型及环境对烤烟清香型风格和感官质量的效应分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wu Xingfu, Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Agricultural Sciences, Yuxi (China)
Xiao Bingguang, Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Agricultural Sciences, Yuxi (China)
Wu Shengxin, Fujian Institute of Tobacco Agricultural Science, Fuzhou (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了解基因型及环境对烤烟清香型风格和感官质量的影响，采用AMMI模型对清香型烟叶产区5个试点6个基因型烟叶的清香型风格、香气特征、烟气特征、口感特征及感官质量评价得分进行了分析。结果表明：5个评价指标的基因型与环境互作效应分别占总平方和的45.8%、52.2%、59.0%、61.2%及56.6%，烤烟清香型风格和感官质量受基因型与环境互作效应的影响大于基因型和环境，清香型风格和烟气特征受环境效应的影响大于基因型，香气特征和感官质量受基因型效应的影响大于环境。AMMI模型可用于烤烟基因型与环境对烟叶风格和感官质量影响的分析，初步筛选出了较能彰显各产区试点清香型烟叶风格和感官质量的烤烟基因型。

AMMI model was used to analyze the effects of genotype and environment on clean aroma type and sensory taste quality of flue-cure tobacco. The scores of evaluation of clean aroma type, aroma characters, smoke characters and sensory taste quality from six genotypes leaves planted in five clean aroma areas sites were analyzed. The results showed that the interacting effect of genotype and environment were larger than that of genotype and environment, the percentages of these five evaluation indexes were 45.8%, 52.2%, 59.0%, 61.2% and 56.6% of the lolal sum of squares, environment effect was larger than that of genotype on clean aroma type and smoke characters, and genotype effect was larger than that of environment on aroma characters and sensory taste quality. AMMI model can be used to evaluate effects of genotype and environment on clean aroma type and sensory taste quality of flue-cure tobacco. The genotypes suitable for demonstrating clean aroma type and sensory taste quality of flue-cure tobacco in different clean aroma areas sites were selected primarily.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on accumulation rule of thiamphenicol in different tissues of common carp and crucian carp
甲砜霉素在鲤鲫鱼体内组织蓄积规律的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Di, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Harbin (China), Heilongjiang River Fisheries Research Institute
Yang Hongbo, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Harbin (China), Heilongjiang River Fisheries Research Institute
Lu Tongyan, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Harbin (China), Heilongjiang River Fisheries Research Institute

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本研究旨在分析甲砜霉素在鲤鱼和鲫鱼体内不同组织中的蓄积规律。按照30mg/kg的给药量对鲤鱼和鲫鱼连续口灌给药3d，停药24h后采样。外标法定量，采用高效液相色谱-串联质谱法（HPLC-MS/MS）检测鲤鲫鱼各组织中甲砜霉素的蓄积量。结果显示：甲砜霉素在0.1～200ng/mL范围内有良好的线性关系，相关系数为0.998 7，回收率82.37%～107.92%。甲砜霉素在鲤鲫鱼各种组织中呈现相同的蓄积趋势，其中以血浆和肾脏中最高，鳃及脾脏中最低，鳔、肝、肠、胆汁、性腺、肌肉和皮中均有药物蓄积，且在鲫鱼卵巢药物蓄积量略大于精巢。甲砜霉素应用于鲤鲫鱼病害防治时应注意其对肾脏及性腺的影响，避免造成机体或生理机能损伤。

The accumulation rule of thiamphenicol (TAP) in different tissues of common carp (Cyprinus carpio) and crucian carp (Carassius auratus) were studied. After oral administration of TAP with a dosage of 30 mg/kg body weight per day for 3 days, the samples were collected at 24 h after drug withdrawal. A quantitative analysis was performed with external standard method and TAP concentrations in tissues were analyzed by high performance liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (HPLC - MS/MS). The results indicated that the TAP had a good linear relationship (R2 = 0.998 7) in the range of 0.1 ng/mL to 200 ng/mL concentration and the recovery rate varied from 82.37% to 107.92%. TAP showed the same accumulation trend in various tissues of fish, among which, it accumulated the highest in blood plasma and kidney and the lowest in gill and spleen. TAP was also found to accumulate in swim bladder, liver, intestine, bile, gonad, muscle and skin. In addition, the accumulation content of TAP was a little higher in ovary than in testis. Therefore, more attention should be paid to the effects of TAP on kidney and gonad to avoid the damage to body or physiological function when TAP was applied to the prevention and control of bacterial diseases in common carp and crucian carp.

ags:resource.dc:title: Intensive evaluation of land use in Nanchang development zone, Jiangxi province
江西省南昌市开发区土地集约利用评价研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Huizhen, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Research Institute of Land Science
Guo xi, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Research Institute of Land Science
Huang Xihua, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Research Institute of Land Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以江西省南昌市9个开发区为研究对象，从土地利用状况、用地效益、管理绩效3个方面对各开发区土地利用集约情况进行分析，并构建评价指标体系、确定指标权重值，采用多指标综合评价法对其土地集约利用水平进行评价，得到南昌市开发区3个指标的集约度分值，分别是81.15、52.45和100.00，综合分值是74.87。研究结果表明：南昌市开发区土地利用属于基本集约利用类型，开发区土地建成率较高，工业用地固定投入产出强度较，管理绩效集约度突出。最后对开发区土地集约利用提出合理性的建议。

Taking nine development zones in Nanchang City Jiangxi Province, as the research object, from three aspects, namey land use status, land use benefit, performance management situation of land use in the development zones was analyzed, and an evaluation index system was built to determine the value of index weights, using multi-index comprehensive evaluation method to evaluate the level of intensive land use, the intensity scores of three indictors of the development zones were obtained, which were 81.15, 52.45 and 100.00 respectively, and the composite score was 74.87. The research results show that the land use in Nanchang development zones, belongs to the basic intensive use type, and has higher rates of land building, the fixed input-output intensity of the land for industry low; and the management performance is of outstanding intensity. Finally, some suggestions for intensive land use in the development zones are put forward.

ags:resource.dc:title: Three newly recorded invasive plants in Jiangxi province, China
江西省外来入侵植物新记录

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zeng Xianfeng, Hanshan Normal University, Chaozhou (China), Department of Biology
Qiu Heyuan, Hanshan Normal University, Chaozhou (China), Department of Biology
Fang Miaochun, Hanshan Normal University, Chaozhou (China), Department of Biology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2012年9-10月，在江西省赣州市实地考察外来人侵植物，发现了三裂叶薯（lpomoea triloba Linn.）、假臭草（Praxelis clematidea R.M. King ＆ H. Robinson）和断节莎（Cyperus odoratus L.），3种植物均为江西省外来入侵植物新记录。现对其产地、环境、形态特征等进行记述。

Two species of invasive plants are reported as new records to Jiangxi Province, China, which were collected from Xinfeng County in October, 2012, i. e. Ipomoea triloba Linn., PraxeIis clematidea R. M. King ＆ H. Robinson and Cyperus odoratus L.. Their collection sites, habitates, and morphology characteristics are recorded.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study of freezing properties of blueberry fruits and influencing factors
蓝莓果实的冻结特性及影响因素分析初报

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Dan, Shandong Institute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)
Sun Lei, Shandong Academy of Forestry Science, Jinan (China)
Sun Jiazheng, Shandong Institute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选择蓝莓品种“蓝金”为样本，利用先进的热镀锡膜铜-康铜热电偶测温技术进行冻结试验研究，总结了其冻结特性，为鲜食蓝莓的保鲜技术以及蓝莓的冷冻保存提供了理论依据。试验结果表明：蓝莓果实的冻结曲线有4种形式，典型的形式具有过冷点、冰点、终止冰点等关键特征点，而一部分果实出现了第二冰点，极个别无过冷点；3种不同的空气介质温度下的测得的冻结曲线表明果实冰点与介质温度无关，且空气介质温度越低，冻结速率越快；蓝莓果实经多次冻融，组织结构遭到破坏，更容易冻结，过冷点明显升高（P＜0.05），过冷现象也更显著（P＜0.05）；蓝莓果实的冰点在-3.6～-2.3℃温度范围，与可溶性固形物含量呈极显著负相关，与含水量呈极显著正相关，与硬度呈显著正相关，而与单果质量无相关性。

Taking hot tinning of copper-constantan thermocouples as the measurement method, the blue-berry cultivar “lanjin” was abundantly frozen and its freezing properties were concluded, which provid the theory basis for preservation technology and frozen storage of blueberry. The results illustrated that there were four shapes of the freezing curve of blueberry and supercooling point, freezing point and final freezing point were included in the typical shape, the second freezing point appeared in a part of the fruit and no supercooling point in a few. Through the freezing experiment at three different temperatures of the air medium, it was found that the lower the temperature of the air medium was, the faster the freezing and no relationship between freezing point and temperature of the air medium was found. The fruit were easier to freeze after repeated freezing and thawing, the temperature of supercooling point increased significantly and supercooling phenomenon was more obvious (p 0.05). The freezing point temperature of blueberry ranged from -3.6℃ to -2.3℃, and was significantly negatively correlated with the soluble solid content, significantly positively correlated with water content, positively correlated with firmness but no correlation with weight of single fruit.

ags:resource.dc:title: Measurement of the ear area of pig in vivo with the pixel method
利用像素法活体测量猪耳朵面积

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yang Huaigu, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), The Cultural Base of the National Key Laboratory of Animal Biotechnology
Zhang Xufei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), The Cultural Base of the National Key Laboratory of Animal Biotechnology
Hou Lijuan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), The Cultural Base of the National Key Laboratory of Animal Biotechnology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 探讨活体测量猪耳朵面积的测定方法。首先对27个绘制在方格纸上的不规则图形采用方格纸法和像素法进行面积测量，比较这2种方法在测量结果和测量时间上是否存在显著差异，与此同时也比较了5种不同的图像处理软件之间是否存在显著差异。然后对77头猪的右耳面积在屠宰前后分别用像素法和方格纸法进行活体和屠体测定，比较活体和屠体测量是否存在显著差异。试验结果显示，方格纸法和像素法之间没有显著差异，它们之间的相关系数大于0.995，但是方格纸法的测量时间明显高于像素法，前者平均用时约5min/头，后者平均用时均不足2min/头。这5种图像处理软件测量的耳面积之间也没有显著差异，且它们之间的相关系数都在0.991 2以上。虽然活体测量的面积显著高于屠宰后测量的面积，但是它们之间的相关系数高达0.898 7。综合分析试验结果：在屠体测量耳面积时，像素法可以替代方格纸法，以提高测量速度。鉴于活体测量与屠宰测量之间的高相关性，可以用活体测量替换屠体测量，这不但避免了屠宰，降低了测量的成本，而且可以动态地检测耳面积随日龄的变化。另外也可为其他不规则图形面积的活体测量提供参考。

The aim of this study is to find a way to scale the ear area of pigs in vivo, and to provide a reference method to measure other irregularshaped area in vivo. To compare the accuracy and time consumption of the graph paper method to the pixel method, a total of 27 irregular shapes were arbitrarily drawn on graph papers. Their areas were measured by the two methods, and the time consumption was recorded. In order to investigate the difference between in vivo and carcass measurements, the areas of the right ear of 77 pigs were scaled in vivo and in vitro with the pixel and the graph paper methods, respectively. The results showed that there was no significant difference in the ear areas measured wigh the graph paper and the pixel methods, and the correlation coefficients between them were greater than 0.995. However, the time consumption of the graph paper method was significantly larger than that of the pixel method. The former took about 5 minutes to scale an ear, and the latter took 2 minutes. The ear areas also had no significant differences among the five image processing software measurements, and the correlation coefficients among them were larger than 0.991 2. Although the ear areas measured in vivo were significantly huger than those measured in vitro, the correlation coefficient between them was as high as 0.898 7. So it can be concluded that the pixel method can replace the graph paper method to improve measurement speed when the ear area is scaled in vitro. Given the high correlation of ear areas between in vivo and in vitro, the in vivo measurement can displace the carcass measurement to not only avoid the slaughter and reduce the cost, but also dynamically supervise the ear area changes with growth.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on the preparation and antioxidant activity of antioxidant peptide from mung bean
绿豆抗氧化活性肽的制备及其抗氧化活性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Qin, Shanxi Normal University, Xi’an (China), Food Engineering and Nutrition Science College
Zhang Haisheng, Shanxi Normal University, Xi’an (China), Food Engineering and Nutrition Science College
Xu Shan, Shanxi Normal University, Xi’an (China), Food Engineering and Nutrition Science College

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究了绿豆抗氧化活性肽的酶解制备工艺，并以Vc和BHT作为对照，对所制备的绿豆抗氧化活性肽的体外抗氧化活性进行了研究。结果表明：中性蛋白酶为制备绿豆抗氧化活性肽的理想蛋白酶，其最佳酶解工艺参数为：底物浓度2%，酶解pH6.5，酶解温度50℃，加酶量5 000u/g，酶解时间120 min。按此工艺条件制备的绿豆抗氧化活性肽具有较强的体外抗氧化活性，其抗氧化能力低于Vc，而高于BHT。

The preparation of mung bean antioxidant peptide and its antioxidant capacity in vitro were studied and the results showed that neutral protease was the ideal protease for the preparation of mung bean antioxidant peptide. The best enzymatic hydrolysis technological parameters were as follows: substrate concentration 2%, hydrolysis pH 6.5, reaction temperature 50℃, enzyme concentration 5 000 u/g, reaction time 120 min. The mung bean antioxidant peptide prepared with these enzymatic hydrolysis technological parameters presented strong antioxidant activity and its antioxidant capacity was higher than that of BHT, but lower than that of Vc.

ags:resource.dc:title: The bioactivity of cyromazine against Bradysia sp. larvae damaging Phalaenopsis orchid
灭蝇胺对蝴蝶兰迟眼蕈蚊幼虫的生物活性

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cheng Dongmei, Zhongkai University of Agriculture and Engineering, Guangzhou (China), Department of Plant Protection
Zhang Zhixiang, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou (China), College of Resources and Environments
Xu Peichai, Zhongkai University of Agriculture and Engineering, Guangzhou (China), Department of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究了灭蝇胺等几种杀虫剂对蝴蝶兰迟眼蕈蚊幼虫的生物活性。结果表明：灭蝇胺对迟眼蕈蚊5日龄幼虫的活性随处理时间的延长而提高，100mg/L浓度处理后72h后校正死亡率为52.58%。对不同龄期的幼虫活性不同，低龄幼虫对灭蝇胺敏感，随着龄期增加，敏感性降低，100mg/L浓度处理对2日、4日和6日龄幼虫的校正死亡率分别为97.24%、81.88%和67.94%。对同一龄期幼虫的毒杀效果随质量浓度的增加而增加。灭蝇胺对迟眼蕈蚊幼虫的生长发育有明显抑制，处理后幼虫出现畸形，化蛹率和羽化率降低，幼虫历期延长。

The bioactivity of cyromazine against larvae of Bradysia sp. were studied. The result showed that the toxicity of cyromazine to the 5-day larvae of Bradysia sp. increased with the extension of treatment time, the corrected mortality rate was 52.58% when treated with the concentration of 100 mg/L after 72 h. The longevity of larvae was lower, the susceptibility of the larvae to cyromazine was higher. The corrected mortality rates of 2-day larvae, 4-day larvae and 6-day larvae were 97.24%, 81.88% and 67.94%, respectively. The toxicity activity to the larvae of the same instar increased with the treatment concentration. The larvae treated with cyromazine developed into malformed larvae, and the pupation rate and emergence rate were markedly lower, the larval duration of the survivals was prolonged.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of compound substrate of mushroom residue on the contents of effective components and growth situation of D. candidum officinal seeding
蘑菇渣复合基质对铁皮石斛生长和有效成分含量的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yang Lan, Nanjing Agriculture University, Nanjing (China), College of Horticulture
Shi Shuai, Jiangsu Yixing Aegean Taihu Ecological Agricultural Professional Cooperatives, Yixing (China)
Xiang Zengxu, Nanjing Agriculture University, Nanjing (China), College of Horticulture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以蘑菇渣基质为原料加入不同体积比的锯木屑、苔藓、松树皮形成蘑菇渣复合栽培基质并进行铁皮石斛组培苗移栽试验，通过观测植株成活率、株高、茎粗、根长、新根数以及石斛多糖、石斛碱含量的测定，筛选出适应铁皮石斛生长的栽培基质。结果表明，在相同的栽培管理条件下，移栽30d后，组培苗在处理GC、GD中成活率达97.3%、95.8%显著高于其他处理和对照，其中处理GC的株高、茎粗、根长和新根数也显著高于其他处理；移栽365d后，处理GC的成活率、株高、茎粗、根长和新根数依然最高，分别达到94.6%、7.87cm、0.307cm、5.57cm、7.67个与其他处理差异显著，同时石斛多糖和总生物碱含量在处理GC中也达到最大，分别为8.88%和0.30%并与其他处理差异显著和对照。可见，处理GC的配比有效地提高了铁皮石斛组培苗的生长和有效成分含量，为生产实践提供可靠理论依据。

With mushroom residue substrate as the raw material added with fine sawdust, moss, pine bark in different volume ratios the compund mushroom residue substrate was prepared for the tissue culture of Dendrobium, and the seedling transplant test was carried out. Through the observation and determination of plant survival rate, plant height, stem diameter, root length, number of new roots and the contents of Dendrobium polysaccharide and alkali, the suitable cultivation substrate for Dendrobium was screened. The results showed that, under the same cultivation management conditions, 30 days after transplanting, the tissue culture seedlings in the treatments of GC and GD, the survival rates were 97.3% and 95.8%, significantly higher than those in other treatments and the control, in the treatment GC, the plant height, stem diameter, root length and the number of new roots were also significantly higher than those in other treatments; 365 days after transplanting in the treatment GC, the survival rate, plant height, stem diameter, root length and the number of new roots were the highest, making 94.6%, 7.87 cm, 0.307 cm, 5.57 cm and 7.67 showing significant difference; meanwhile, the contents of Dendrobium polysaccharides and total alkaloid in the treatment of GC were the maximum, making 8.88% and 0.30% respectively, significantly larger than those in other treatments and the control. All this shows that the ratio of the treatment GC improved the growth and the contents of effective components of Dendrobium tissue culture seedlings. This study provides a reliable theoretical basis for production practice.

ags:resource.dc:title: Cloning and sequence analysis of southern rice black-streaked dwarf virus from Jiangxi province
南方水稻黑条矮缩病毒江西分离物CP基因克隆及序列分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sun Xiaotang, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Cui Ruqiang, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy
Ouyang Linjuan, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 根据GenBank已登陆的SRBSDV S10核苷酸序列设计引物，克隆SRBSDV江西分离物外壳蛋白（CP）基因，结合已公布的序列，通过生物信息学方法进行序列分析。结果表明，SRBSDV江西分离物CP基因全长1 674个核苷酸，推测编码557个氨基酸，与已报道的SRBSDV CP基因之间核苷酸同源性为97.5%～100%，氨基酸同源性为97.7%～100%。SRBSDV CP基因核苷酸序列高度保守，保守位点占全部位点的83.5%。没有发现重组事件。本研究首次报道根据系统发育进化树，SRBSDV可分为2大组群，不存在明显的地域和寄主分化。

According to the nucleotide sequences of SRBSDV S10 from GenBank, primers were designed. By reverse-transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) and sequencing techniques, the S10 gene of SRBSDV isolated from Jiangxi was cloned and sequenced, and the obtained sequence, together with partial corresponding sequences available from GenBank, were used for molecular variation analysis by using some bioinformatics softwares. The result indicated that the S10 gene of SRBSDV isolated from Jiangxi was consisted of 1785nts, including 1 674 nucleic acids of full length CP gene, encoding 557 amino acids. The CP gene nucleotide and amino acid sequences homology of SRBSDV Jiangxi isolate and other isolates in GenBank were between 97.5%-100% and 97.7%-100%, respectively. SRBSDV CP gene nucleotide sequences were highly conservative. No recombination event was detected. Phylogenetic analysis suggests that SRBSDV isolates could be divided into two clusters, but there was no significant correlation between clusters and geographic origin or host.

ags:resource.dc:title: The changing law and dynamic forecast of soil humidity in Nankang and Hukou counties, Jiangxi province
南方土壤墒情变化规律及动态预报研究——以江西省南康市、湖口县为例

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tang Chunyan, Nanjing University of Information Science and Technology, Nanjing (China), College of Applied Meteorology
Shen Shuanghe, Nanjing University of Information Science and Technology, Nanjing (China), College of Applied Meteorology
Du Xiaoling, Jiangxi Provincial Meteorological Bureau, Nanchang (China), Department of Emergency Response and Disaster Mitigation

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用南康、湖口近20年的土壤墒情观测资料及气象资料，分析了两地土壤墒情变化规律，建立了土壤墒情动态预报模型，为土壤墒情预测提供新方法，为田间水分管理提供科学依据。结果表明，南康、湖口两地土壤墒情具有明显的年变化规律，总体趋势为汛期、冬春季土壤墒情值高，伏、秋时节土壤墒情值低。逐步回归分析土壤墒情变化与气象因子之间的关系，建立了两地分时段的土壤墒情预报模型，并对模型效果进行检验，结果表明各模型均达到了较好的预报精度。

Based on the observation data of soil humidity and meteorological data of Nankang and Hukou Counties in recent 20 years, the changing law of soil humidity in these areas was analyzed and the forecasting models for soil humidity were established, which provides a new method for soil humidity forecast and provides a scientific basis for field water management. The result indicates that the soil humidity in Nankang and Hukou shows an obvious annual variation, which is high in spring, winter and the flood season while low in dog days and autumn. The forecasting models for soil humidity in different periods of time are established by stepwise regression analysis. The testing results show that all of the models achieve an acceptable predicting precision.

ags:resource.dc:title: A study on carbon emission effects of changes in land use in Poyang lake region
鄱阳湖区土地利用变化的碳排放效应研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Luo Zhijun, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Land Resources and Environment
Shi Xiangsong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Land Resources and Environment
Han Linjie, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Land Resources and Environment

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 土地利用是造成碳排放的重要原因。利用2000年、2005年和2010年的3期遥感影像，分析了2000-2010年鄱阳湖区土地利用变化特征，并运用碳排放估算模型，对鄱阳湖区不同土地利用方式的碳排放进行了计算和分析.结果表明：（1）2000-2010年鄱阳湖区碳排放量持续增加，从2000年的431.85×104 t增加到2010年的1 194.37×104 t，增加了1.77倍；（2）鄱阳湖区各县（市、区）的碳排放强度差异较明显；（3）调整土地利用方式、限制建设用地扩张、转变经济增长方式、优化能源结构是减少鄱阳湖区碳排放的主要措施。

Land use is one of the most important factors that cause carbon emission. This paper firstly analyses the characteristics of changes in land use in Poyang Lake Region from 2000 to 2010 by using the Landsat TM data in 2000, 2005 and 2010. Then it calculates and analyses the carbon emissions which is influenced by different land use types from 2000 to 2010 according to the assessment model of carbon emission. The results show: (1) the total of carbon emissions amounts increased rapidly from 4 318.50 thousand tons in 2000 to 11 943.70 thousand tons in 2010; (2) the amounts of carbon emission in different counties of Poyang Lake Region were different; (3) some suggestions for reducing carbon emission are put forward which include adjustment of land use structure, limit for the increase of construction land adjustment of economic growth and optimization of energy structure, etc..

ags:resource.dc:title: The separation and identification of triterpeniods from leaves of Cyclocarya paliurus
青钱柳叶三萜化合物分离与鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Tian, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Shangguan Xinchen, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Yin Zhongping, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Food Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用大孔树脂、硅胶、半制备高效液相等柱色谱技术以及重结晶等方法对青钱柳叶三萜化合物进行了分离纯化，获得了8个三萜单体，经高液相色谱（HPLC）、高分离度快速液相-飞行时间质谱（RRLC-TOF/MS）、核磁共振氢谱（1H NMR）和核磁共振碳谱（13C NMR）等检测分析，分别确定为β-香树脂醇（1）、熊果酸（2）、齐墩果酸（3）、白桦脂酸（4）、β-乳香酸（5）、科罗索酸（6）、马斯里酸（7）、阿江榄仁酸（8）。

Eight triterpenoids were separated from leaves of Cyclocarya paliurus by macroporous resin, silica gel, semipreparative high performance liquid chromatography and recrystallization, and were identified as β-amyrin (1), ursolic acid (2), oleanolic acid (3), betulinic acid (4), β-boswellic acid (5), corosolic acid (6), maslinic acid (7) and arjunolic acid (8) respectively by HPLC, RRLC-TOF/MS, 1H NMR and 13C NMR.

ags:resource.dc:title: Characterization of transcriptional activity and The expression analysis of two Fraxinus velutina Torr transcription factors
绒毛白蜡2个MYB转录因子的活性鉴定及其表达分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Tian, Shandong Normal University, Jinan (China), College of Life Science
Peng Zhenying, Shandong Academy of Agricultural Science, Jinan (China), Hi-Tech Research Center
Fan Zhongxue, Shandong Academy of Agricultural Science, Jinan (China), Hi-Tech Research Center

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 绒毛白蜡（Fraxinus velutina Torr.）FvMYB1和FvMYB2基因分别属于R1-MYB和R2R3-MYB转录因子家族成员。通过酵母（Saccharomyces cerevisiae）单杂交系统分别对其转录活性进行了鉴定，并分析了2个基因在不同组织中的表达模式。酵母滤纸显色反应结果表明两个转录因子均能激活下游报告基因（His和LacZ）的表达，具有转录激活功能；B-半乳糖苷酶活性检测法定量分析得出FvMYB1和FvMYB2的半乳糖苷酶活性分别为14.55U和20.80U。组织特异性分析显示，两者在各组织（根、子叶、茎、叶）中均有表达，但各自又表现出不同的组织表达差异，其中FvMYB1基因在茎中表达量最高，根中最低；而FvMYB2基因在各组织中的表达量无明显差异。

The Arizona ash (Fraxinus velutina Torr.) transcription factors FvMYB1 and FvMYB2 are two members of MYB family. The first one is a typical plant R1-MYB family gene while the later one belonged to R2R3-MYB family. In this study, their transcriptional activities were analyzed by using yeast (Saccharomyces cerevisiae) one-hybrid system. The results showed that both FvMYB1 and FvMYB2 could activate the expression of downstream report genes (His and LacZ). β-Galaetosidase activity assay of two proteins in yeast showed that the transcriptional activities of FvMYB1 and FvMYB2 were 14.55 U and 20.80 U, respectively. RT-PCR was carried out to invest the expression patterns of FvMYB1 and FvMYB2 in different organs of Arizona ash. The results showed that both FvMYB1 and FvMYB2 genes were widely distributed in all the tested organs (root, cotyledon, stem and leaf). However, the expression levels of them were different. For example, the highest amount expression of FvMYB1 was observed in stems and the lowest in roots while the gene expression level of FvMYB2 showed no dramatic differences in all the tested tissues.

ags:resource.dc:title: Optimization of ultrasonic-assisted extraction for total anthraquinones from Aloe leaves by response surface methodology
响应面分析法优化超声波提取芦荟总蒽醌工艺

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhou Molin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory on Natural Product and Functional Food of Jiangxi Province
Shangguan Xinchen, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory on Natural Product and Functional Food of Jiangxi Province
Zhan Yaqiong, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), Key Laboratory on Natural Product and Functional Food of Jiangxi Province

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了探索超声波提取芦荟蒽醌的最佳工艺，利用响应面分析法对芦荟蒽醌的提取工艺进行优化。在单因素试验基础上，选取超声时间、料液比、乙醇体积分数、超声温度为影响因子，以芦荟蒽醌的得率作为响应值，根据Box-Behnken试验设计原理采用4因素3水平的响应面分析法对超声波提取芦荟蒽醌的提取条件进一步优化。结果表明：芦荟蒽醌提取的最佳工艺条件为超声时间31min、料液比1:43（g/mL）、乙醇体积分数70%、超声温度83℃，在此条件下，测得芦荟蒽醌最高得率达到5.70%。芦荟蒽醌的得率比常规浸提法高，同时大大缩短提取时间。

Response surface methodology was used for optimizing ultrasonic-assisted extraction conditions in the extraction of total anthraquinones from aloe leaves. Based on One-Factor-at-a-Time (OFAT) experiments, four independent variables, namely ultrasonic treatment time, material-to-liquid ratio, ethanol concentration and extraction temperature, were selected as the casual factors during extraction. The experiments were arranged according to Box-Behnken central composite design. Response surface analysis was applied to determine the yield of total anthraquinones with the four extraction conditions which were composite design (CCD). The results showed that the optimum conditions for the extraction of total anthraquinones from aloe leaves were: ultrasonic treatment time of 31 min, the ratio of material to solvent 1:43 (g/mL), ethanol concentration 70% and extraction temperature 83℃. Under these conditions, the maximum extraction yield of total anthraquinones was up to 5.70%, which was higher than that of the conventional extraction, and the extracted time was significantly reduced.

ags:resource.dc:title: A mutation analysis of ascorbic acid content in the leaves and fruit of wild Actinidia eriantha Benth
野生毛花猕猴桃叶片与果实AsA含量变异分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tang Jiale, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agriculture
Huang Chunhui, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agriculture
Liu Kepeng, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agriculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以江西省武功山境内的野生毛花猕猴桃（Actinidia eriantha Benth）种质资源为试材，对随机采集的70份不同植株的野生毛花猕猴桃成熟叶片和幼嫩果实的AsA（抗坏血酸）含量进行了测定与分析，旨在发掘毛花猕猴桃优异种质，为野生毛花猕猴桃资源的合理开发利用及探讨AsA积累机制提供理论依据。结果表明，供试的野生毛花猕猴桃成熟叶片和幼嫩果实的AsA含量存在丰富的变异，成熟叶片AsA含量变异系数为41.30%，幼嫩果实AsA含量变异系数为21.88%。经变异分析和方差分析，筛选了8份高果实AsA含量（17.00mg/g以上）的野生毛花猕猴桃优异种质。

Seventy different wild genotypes of leaves and fruit of Actinidia eriantha Benth germplasm resources in Wugong Mountain of Jiangxi Province were collected and taken as the test materials, and their ascorbic acid (AsA) contents were determined and analyzed in order to find excellent kiwifruit germplasm, which may provide the theoretical basis for rational development and utilization of wild kiwifruit resources and probe into the accumulation mechanism of AsA content. The results indicated that the AsA contents of wild kiwifruit leaves and fruits varied greatly, the variation coefficient of AsA content of leaves was 41.30%, and the variation coefficient of AsA content of fruits was 21.88%. By mutation analysis and variance analysis, eight excellent wild kiwifruit germplasms with high AsA content were screened.

ags:resource.dc:title: Phylogenetic relationship of Hylobitelus xiaoi inferred from cytochrome C oxidase Ⅰ gene
以线粒体COⅠ基因探讨萧氏松茎象的分类地位

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Luan Fenggang, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agriculture
Ding Junjie, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Agriculture
He Longxi, Jiangxi forest pest control and quarantine bureau, Nanchang (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 用蛋白酶K消化法提取萧氏松茎象总DNA，并对细胞色素C氧化酶亚基Ⅰ（cytochrome c oxidase Ⅰgene，COⅠ）序列分析发现，COⅠ序列4种核苷酸量平均为A=30.2％，C=17.3％，G=15.4％，T=37.0％。将所获得的5个不同地区萧氏松茎象个体COⅠ序列排序后，比较形成了一个含1 209个位点的矩阵，其中1 174个不变位点，35个变异位点，所占比例为2.89％，序列的A＋T含量较高。遗传距离、核酸和氨基酸变异及系统发育树分析表明：萧氏松茎象与树皮象属亲缘关系最近，且分子水平上萧氏松茎象与树皮象属之间较之树皮象属内种间无明显差异，对目前的分类地位提出质疑。

The total genomic DNA of Hylobitelus xiaoi Zhang was extracted by means of digestion with proteinase K digesting, sequence CO Ⅰ. The result showed, the average content of A was 30.2%, that of C was 17.3%, that of G was 15.4%, that of T was 37.0% in sequences of CO Ⅰ. After alignment the size of sequences from five individuals of different sampling areas was 1 209 bp, including 35 mutations (the mutation rate was 2.89%), which showed the higher contents of A ＋ T. The analysis of genetic distance, variation ratio of nucleotide and amino acid, and the phylogenetic tree showed that Hylobitelus xiaoi is closely related to the species of Hylobius. It is proved that there is no obviously difference between Hylobitelus xiaoi and Hylobius sp. At molecular level, its present taxonomic status of Hylobitelus xiaoi is doubtful.

ags:resource.dc:title: Tissue culture and rapid propagation of excellent ornamental and medicinal ground cover plants — Bletilla striata
优良观赏药用地被植物——白芨组织培养及快速繁殖研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zou Na, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art
Li Yi, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art
Lian Fangqing, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Landscape and Art

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 分别以蒴果（种子）、花茎和地下茎为外植体对白芨进行组织培养和快速繁殖。结果表明：种子播种于培养基MS＋KT1.0mg/L＋NAA0.5mg/L进行白芨原球茎的诱导和芽的分化效果最好，随后转接到培养基MS＋6-BA0.45mg/L＋NAA0.4mg/L进行壮苗生根培养，30d后将生根无菌苗移栽到蛭石中，成活率可达到96%。本文采用无菌播种和组织培养方法获得无菌苗，并进行壮苗生根培养与移栽，不仅繁殖成本低、培养周期短，且操作简单易行便于推广，可为其优良品种的开发利用和快速繁殖提供技术支持。

Capsule (seed), floral axises and underground corms of Bletilla striata were used as the explants for the tissue culture and rapid propagation. It was showed that: the seeds germinated on MS ＋ KT 1.0 mg/L ＋ NAA 0.5 mg/L was the best for protocorm induction and bud differentiation, and those transferred to the vermiculite for lustihood and rooting culture on MS ＋ 6-BA 0.45 mg/L ＋ NAA 0.4 mg/L for 30 d had a survival rate of 96%. The sterile seedlings of Bletilla striata were obtained by asepsis sowing and tissue culture, and then subjected to lustihood and rooting culture and transplanting, which is not only of low reproduction cost, short culture period, but also simple operation and easy promotion. Therefore, it can provide technical support for the development, utilization and rapid propagation of fine varieties of Bletilla striata.

ags:resource.dc:title: Advances in research on early life resources of fish
鱼类早期资源研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Ke, Nanjing Agriculture University, Wuxi (China), Wuxi Fishery College
Liu Kai, Ministry of Agriculture, Wuxi (China), Scientific Observing and Experimental Station of Fishery Resources and Environment in the Lower Reaches of Yangtze River
Xu Dongpo, Ministry of Agriculture, Wuxi (China), Scientific Observing and Experimental Station of Fishery Resources and Environment in the Lower Reaches of Yangtze River

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 鱼类早期生活史主要指从胚胎到稚鱼期的早期阶段，其资源量可反映鱼类繁殖规模及种群数量变动趋势，近年来在国际上受到广泛重视并迅速发展。系统回顾了多年来国内外对鱼类早期资源的研究概况，重点综述了鱼类早期发育阶段的形态特征、分子生物学、生理生化、种群数量变动机制及时空分布特征等方面的研究进展，并对相关的研究进行了评述和展望。

The early life history of fishes refers to the stage from the embryo to the juvenile, the resources could reflect the scale of breeding and the trend of changes in population, and it has been widely valued and developed rapidly in recent years. This paper reviews the study of early fish resources at home and abroad over the years, mainly summarizes the research progress of the morphological characteristics, molecular biology, physiology and biochemistry of the early development of fishes, and the study of quantity change mechanism and the space-time distribution of early fish resources, and makes a comment of the relevant research and dicusses the future research of fishes of early life history stage.

ags:resource.dc:title: The treatment process for relevant research advance on mature landfill leachate
中老龄垃圾渗滤液处理技术及相关研究进展

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Nie Fahui, East China Jiao Tong University, Nanchang (China), School of Civil Engineering and Architecture
Li Wenting, East China Jiao Tong University, Nanchang (China), School of Civil Engineering and Architecture
Liu Zhanmeng, East China Jiao Tong University, Nanchang (China), School of Civil Engineering and Architecture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 垃圾在长期填埋所产生的“中老龄”垃圾渗滤液是目前公认的难降解废水,针对这类废水可生化性差、低C/N、氨氮含量高等特点，主要从物化法、生化法和短程生物脱氮3个方面介绍国内外该类渗滤液的处理技术，并分析各种处理技术的特点，最后指出未来该类渗滤液处理的主要研究方向。

The stabilized landfill leachate, which is produced from the long-term landfill process, is widely recognized as the most refractory wastewater. In view of its poor biochemistry, low C/N, high ammonia nitrogen content, etc, from the physical-chemical method, biological method and short biological denitrification. This paper mainly introduces the treating technology for waste leachate at home and abroad, and analyzes the characteristics of various processing methods, and finally, points out the main research direction of the leachate treatment in the future.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of Nitric Oxide on the preservation of postharvest plums
NO对采后李果实保鲜效果的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhu Liqin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Li Bin, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Zhang Wei, Jiangxi Agricultural University, Nanchang (China), College of Food Science and Engineering
