Seed vigor could be as an important index for estimating seed quality.

ags:resource.dc:title: Apple fruit quality and soil nutrition research in Shanxi province
山西省苹果果品质量与土壤营养调查研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Haihong, Shanxi Academy of Agricultural Science, Taigu (China), Research Institute of Pomology
Zhang Pengfei, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu (China), College of Horticultural Science
Gong Guihua, Shanxi Academy of Agricultural Science, Taigu (China), Research Institute of Pomology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过对山西省5个不同地区的苹果主产区果园土壤和果实品质取样调查研究，比较和分析了该产区15个15～20年生富士果园的果实矿质营养状况。结合土壤营养状况，综合评价山西省果实品质与土壤营养状况的相关性，同时比较了这5个地区果品的品质质量，并评价了不同年龄阶层的人群对果实的外观、口感和风味等果品综合消费指标。结果表明，这些地区均需要通过栽培措施，降低土壤的pH值以增加矿物质的有效吸收。土壤中矿质元素与果实中的矿质养分都是正相关，相关性大小依次为有效钾＞有效磷＞有效锌＞有效铁＞有效硼＞全氮＞有效钙，并且5个地区果实品质以翼城地区的最好，其花青苷含量和综合评分均最高。

Apple orchards of five different districts in Shanxi province used sampling investigation and study in this research. This research consists of comparison and analysis of 15 to 20 years of fifteen Fuji apple orchards fruit mineral nutrition. The comprehensive evaluation of the correlation of the fruit quality and soil nutrition in this area was combined with the soil nutrition, and the differences of the five area’s fruit quality were compared meanwhile. At the same time people with different ages evaluated apples which came from these five districts and scored according to the indexes including appearance, taste and flavor. The nutrient conditions of soil and fruits in local areas were known and analyzed. The results showed that some cultivation measures should be adopted to reduce pH of soil, to increase the effective absorption of minerals. Minerals and other elements in soil nutrients were positively related with nutrients of fruits. And the order of relations was effective Potassium effective Phosphorus effective Zn effective Fe effective Boron Total N effective Calcium. Fruit quality of five districts was obtained, among fruit in Yicheng region has the best quality, the highest anthocyanin content and the best integrated evaluation among five districts.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on heat damage and vegetative recovery of chrysanthemum
菊花的高温伤害及生长恢复研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Sun Xianzhi, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Zheng Chengshu, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Guo Jun’e, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 将菊花幼苗进行不同程度的高温胁迫处理，动态测定叶片光合能力（Pm）并记录叶片受伤害程度；在胁迫处理后每隔一天取出5株进行恢复生长，记录株高与节数增加值，测定各恢复阶段的光合速率（Pn）与暗适应下的初始荧光效率（Fv）、最大光化效率（Fv／Fm）的动态变化。结果表明，高温造成上位新生叶无法展开，中、下位叶出现黄斑、叶片反卷、下垂、干枯等受害症状，叶片的最大光合能力（Pm）明显下降，CO2补偿点升高。高温胁迫解除后，遭受低强度胁迫的植株可较快恢复生长，恢复40d后的高生长及节数与对照无明显差异；高强度胁迫导致Fo持续升高，Pn与Fv／Fm则大幅度降低，菊花幼苗出现不可逆伤害，最终在恢复过程中死亡。

Chrysanthemum were treated under different high temperature conditions, the photosynthetic capacity (Pro) was dynamically measured, and at same time the heat damages of leaves were recorded; 5 plants were respectively moved to normal condition for the growth recovery every other day. In the restoration process, absolute high added value and increasing of leafsegmen number were recorded, combining with the dynamic variation of greatest net photosynthetic rate (Pm) and the initial fluorescence (Fo) and the intrinsic photochemical efficiency (Fv/Fm). The results showed that, high temperature caused many obvious injury symptoms: new leaf couldn’t t spread normally; Irregular yellow spots appeared on middle and underneath leaves; lower leaves prolapsed and dried. The heat stress induced obviously decrease of leaf maxis photosynthesis (Pm) and rise of CO2 compensatory point. After the termination of stress, the plants treated under low intensity stress can restored rapidly, displayed no obvious difference in high growth, leafsegmen number and Pn, Fo, Fv/Fm, contrasted with c 40 days later; oppositely, high intensity stress leaded to continuous rising of Fo and substantial declining and Fv/Fm, the plants died eventually in the restoration process because of the irreversible damage.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research on stem sap flow character of “Fuji” apple trees and the response to main meteological factors
气象因子对红富士苹果树干茎流特性的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Feng Zhiwen, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Jiang Yuanmao, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Tian Yuzheng, Jining Administration of Highway, Jining (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用热扩散茎流测定系统（TDP）连续监测苹果树在生长季的茎流速率，同步观测太阳辐射、空气温度、空气相对湿度和风速等气象因子，选择晴天、阴天两种典型天气分析鲁西南地区苹果树干茎流速率的日变化及其与气象因子的关系。结果表明：苹果树干茎流速率在晴天条件下呈现单峰曲线，阴天条件下呈现多峰曲线。不同天气条件下，苹果树干茎流速率日变化波动曲线及其主要影响因子各异，但太阳辐射始终是茎流速率变化的主导因子。晴天茎流速率的主要影响因子依次为太阳辐射、空气相对湿度和空气温度；阴天依次为太阳辐射和空气温度。蒸腾量日际变化或季节变化特征为4月份逐渐升高、5—6月份达到高峰值、7月份后逐渐降低、10月份达到第二次高峰、11月初迅速降低。主要生长期蒸腾量为708.93mm，其中，主要需水期（5～7月份、10月份）的蒸腾量为423.41mm，占主要生长季的59.72％。

Stem sap flow dynamics of Fuji’ apple trees during the growing season with a year in the southwestern of Shandong province were studied by thermal diffusion probe (TDP), and total solar radiation, air temperature, air relative humidity and wind speed were measured by automatic weather recording system synchronously. According to the manual records of weather conditions, two most representative weather conditions (sunny and cloudy days) were gathered up to analyze the relationships of sap flow rate with meteorological factors. The results showed that the change of sap flow rate in sunny days was in a form of single-peak curve and in cloudy days was in multi-peak curve. The diurnal variations of sap flow rate and its dominant affecting factors differed with weather conditions, and solar radiation was always the dominant factor affecting stem sap flow rate. The main factors of stem sap flow rate in sunny days were solar radiation, air relative humidity and air temperature, and in cloudy days they were solar radiation and air temperature. The daily variations of transpiration is characterized with that transpiration rose gradually in April, and reach a peak during May and June, fall down readily in July, reach a second peak in October and descend rapidly in November. The transpiration was 708.93 mm in the main growing season and the main water requirement period (May, June, July and October) was 423.41 mm among them, accounting for 59.72%.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effects of the different container sizes and its transition on growth of malus hupehensis rehd seedlings
容器大小及转换对平邑甜茶幼苗生长影响的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: An Ningning, Shandong Agriculture University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticlture Science and Engineering
Fan Weiguo, Shandong Agriculture University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticlture Science and Engineering
Tan Qiuping, Shandong Agriculture University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticlture Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探讨容器大小及不同大小容器间转换对平邑甜茶实生苗木的影响，试验设置了相同土壤质地的不同容积的育苗容器处理。结果显示，不同容积容器对平邑甜茶苗木地上部生长量、根型参数、土壤微生物数量和土壤酶活力产生显著影响。生长前期，T2（中号容器）处理的平邑甜茶苗木地上部生长量、根型参数指标、细菌数量和硝酸还原酶活性均明显高于T1（大号容器）处理和乃（小号容器）处理，真菌数量相反。生长中后期T1处理的苗木地上部生长量、根型各项参数指标和细菌数量均最大，而真菌数量和硝酸还原酶活性呈降低趋势。容器转换结果表明，移栽后栽培基质中细菌数量显著增多，而真菌数量明显减少。T4处理（中号容器中生长的幼苗移栽到大号容器）中期苗木和根系生长量高于T2处理，低于T1处理；生长后期，T4各项参数达到最大。T5处理（小号容器中生长幼苗移栽到中号容器）中期苗木加粗较多，后期加高生长较快。本试验表明，中号容器适合苗木前期生长，移栽至大号容器后苗木生长加快。

To study effects of the different containers sizes and its transition on growth of Malus hupehensis Rehd seedlings, containers with different capacity and the same soil medium were used in the experiment. Results suggested that: different containers had significant effects on growth indexes for seedling, morphological parameters of root, quantity of microorganism and activity of nitrate reductase in soil. At early stage of growing seed- lings, Seedings in T2 (moderate container) treatment possessed the highest amount of growth, morphological parameters of root, quantity of bacteria and activity of nitrate reductase, the quantity of fungus had the opposite trend; at the middle and later stage of growing seedlings, while seedlings in T1 (large container) treatment shown the highest amount of growth of aboveground part and morphological parameters of root of seedlings, quantity of bacteria in soil, both quantity of fungi and activity of nitrate reductase were apparently decreased. The transitional experiment concluded that: the quantity of bacteria apparendy increased while the fungus decreased in the soil medium after transition. At the middle stage, the amount of growth of indexes for seeding and morphological parameters of root in T4 (seedings transported from the moderate container to the larger container) treatment is larger than T2 treatment while smaller than T1 treatment. At the later stage, T4 treatment possessed the highest amount of growth. Seedings of T5 (seedings transported from the small container to the moderate container) treatment had apparently faste stem diameter growth at the middle stage and stem height growth at the later stage. Hence, growing seedling with moderate container at early stage and then transferring them to larger ones can improve quality of seedlings of Malus hupehensis Rehd.

ags:resource.dc:title: Changes of photosynthetic, MDA content and the activity of SOD、POD during development of fragaria vesca cv. Selva leaves
四季草莓“赛娃”叶片发育过程中光合、MDA含量及SOD、POD活性的变化研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lou Hua, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Feng Lijuan, Shandong Institute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)
Li Min, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以四季草莓“赛娃”和一季草莓“丰香”为试材，研究赛娃叶片发育过程中Pn、MDA含量及保护酶SOD、POD活性的变化。结果表明：两品种草莓的叶绿素含量与Pn随叶龄均呈现先升后降的变化趋势，25d达到峰值，之后降低，赛娃的降幅小于丰香，而且叶绿素a含量及Pn在同叶龄时期高于丰香，推测其长势较丰香更强；叶龄小于53d时，两者的MDA含量较稳定，53d后迅速升高，此时SOD活性降低，POD活性一直升高，推测53d后叶片开始进入衰老期，此时是摘叶管理的最佳时期；赛娃的叶绿素a＋b含量及Pn在53d后降幅明显小于丰香，推断赛娃的抗衰老能力比丰香强，进一步体现了四季草莓“赛娃”栽植的优越性。

The strawberry cuhivars Fragaria vesca cv. Selva and Toyonoka were studied the Pn, MDA content and the activity of SOD, POD during the development of strawberry leaves. The results showed that chlorophyll content and Pn of two strawberry cultivars presented first up after down trend, which increased with leaf expanding and reached a peak on the 25th day at first, then declined gradually, reduction of Selva was lower than Toyonoka, besides the content of chlorophyll a and Pn was both higher than Toyonoka in the same period, so we reasoned that Selva grows better than Toyonoka; Before 53 d leaves’ age, MDA content of two strawberry cultivars was stable, rapidly elevated after 53d leaves’ age, at present the activity of SOD declared gradually, the activity of POD continued to increase, we supposed that strawberry leaves began to enter the aging phase at 53 d, it is the best period for picking the leaves. Reduction of Selva Content of chlorophyll a ＋ b and Pn were lower than Toyonoka, we supposed anti-aging ability of Selva was stronger than Toyonoka, which is further reflected the superiority of ever bearers strawberry (Selva) planting.

ags:resource.dc:title: Mutation types of chrysanthemum induced with EMS and molecular identification of the important mutation characteristics
EMS诱发菊花突变类型及重要性状的分子鉴定

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cai Haiyan, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Wen Lizhu, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Cheng Zhengshu, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用化学诱变剂甲基磺酸乙酯（ethylmethanesulfonate，EMS）处理菊花品种‘神马’茎尖以获得各种突变类型。对菊花的生物学性状及观赏性状进行调查，结果表明，突变群体的表型变异率达到6.31%，获得了菊花株高、叶片、开花期、花序以及花瓣等观赏性状的突变体。表型变异类型多样，特别是发现了自然突变或人工诱变中少见的开花期提早突变体和花器官的突变类型，如花苞片消失或易位、舌状花和筒状花增加或缺失等。本试验所用EMS构建的菊花突变群体变异类型丰富，且ISSR标记鉴定结果显示标记条带确实出现了差异，这表明突变植株的基因发生了变化。这为菊花新品种培育和功能基因组学的研究奠定了基础。

Abstract: Ethyl methane sulfonate (EMS) was used as the chemical mutagen for treating shoot tips of chrysanthemum ‘Jinba’ to induce some useful mutation types. Moreover biological characters and ornamental traits were investigated. The result showed that the rate of phenotype mutation was 6.31%. Many phenotype mutants were obtained, such as the plant height, leaf, florescence, inflorescence and lingulate flower mutants. The mutation phenotypes were multiple. Especially, the early flowering mutants and the variation of floral organ types, which were infrequently found in natural mutation or artificial mutation, were found, such as the disappearance of involucre or shifting, and the increase or disappearance of lingulate flowers and tubular flowers. The results of ISSR mark showed that the mark strips appeared differently. These mutant characteristics laid a foundation for the construction of chrysanthemum mutant library, and they would be efficiently used in new chrysanthemum breeding and functional genomics research in the future.

ags:resource.dc:title: Contrastive analysis on soil moisture data between FDR and drying methods
FDR与烘干法测定土壤水分对比分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Xueyi, Tai’an Meteorology Burea, Tai’an (China)
Cui Zhaoyun, Tai’an Meteorology Burea, Tai’an (China)
Huang Hua, Tai’an Meteorology Burea, Tai’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用2005年9月8日到2006年8月30日共40次对比观测资料，分析FDR测定土壤水分与烘干法的差异，结果表明，FDR法具有稳定的优点，但测定较小土壤湿度时，其灵敏度降低。FDR稳定、灵敏、准确和实时监测的特点，明显优于烘干法，能够满足抗旱服务需求，有大力推广价值。

The observation data of FDR auto - monitoring method and Soil Drying method, from September 8, 2005 to August 30, 2006, is contrastively analyzed. The results show that the method by FDR have a steady quality. But, when the soil moisture is lesser, the sensitivity of FDR method drops.

ags:resource.dc:title: Settlement calculation of multi-layes and composite foundation
多层复合地基沉降计算

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Zhouliang, Management Office of Dazhan Reservoir of Zhangqiu City, Zhangqiu (China)
Liu Fuchen, Shandong Water polytechnic, Rizhao (China)
Liu Xiangzhu, Shandong Water polytechnic, Rizhao (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 多层复合地基沉降量计算，对复合地基压缩模量的处理是关键问题。分析了先水平后垂直、先垂直后水平、《建筑地基处理设计规范》等方法的计算原理、计算方法的优缺点。理论和算例分析表明，先水平后垂直、先垂直后水平两种方法计算地基沉降量是等效的。先垂直后水平将地基简化为单一均质体，计算简单方便，建议采用第二种方法计算地基沉降量。

The settlement calculation of multi-layers and composite foundation is a key problem for dealing-properly with compression modulus of composite foundation. The merit and demerit of calculation methods are analyzed in this paper, which the methods includes vertical calculation after horizontal calculation, horizontal-calculation after vertical calculation and design specifications of construction foundation treatment. The theoretical and examples show that the computed total settlement by vertical calculation after horizontal calculation is equivalent to that of horizontal calculation after vertical calculation. The method of horizontal calculation after vertical calculation simplifies the foundation as single homogeneous body and calculation easily. The paper advises that computing the computed total settlement takes the method of horizontal calculation after vertical calculation.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research on residues of organochlorine pesticides in arable land of Liaocheng and agricultural functions
聊城市耕地土壤有机氯农药残留与农业功能定位研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Yan, Liaocheng University, Liaocheng (China), School of Environment and Planning
Xiao Yan, Liaocheng University, Liaocheng (China), School of Environment and Planning
Zhang Baohua, Liaocheng University, Liaocheng (China), School of Environment and Planning

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为掌握聊城市耕地土壤有机氯农药残留状况，确定耕地的农业功能及其对粮食质量的影响，将聊城市耕地分为136个采样点，调查有机氯农药六六六（HCHs）与滴滴涕（DDTs）的残留量。采用国家《农产品安全质量无公害蔬菜产地环境要求》和《绿色食品产地环境技术条件》作为评价标准，采用单因子指数和综合指数为评价方法进行污染评价。研究表明，聊城市土壤未受HCHs污染，但个别样点DDTs严重超标，且残留量在区域间存在着明显差异。以GIS为操作平台显示聊城市有机氯农药空间分布状况，并对区域耕地进行了功能定位。定位结果显示，聊城市东部和南部土壤质量最优，适宜种植绿色食品；中部和西部适宜种植无公害蔬菜；观察种植区主要位于聊城市西北部；污染区主要位于临清市。

In order to analyze the residues of organochlorine pesticides (OCPs) of arable land in Liaocheng, determine the agricultural function and it’s effect on food quality, 136 surface soil samples were collected and the residues of OCPs including HCHs and DDTs were monitored. “Safety qualification for agricultural product-environmental requirements for origin of non-environmental pollution vegetable” and “Environmental technical terms for green food production area” were chosen to evaluate the soil quality. Single index and integrated index were used during the evaluation. The study showed that all land has’nt been polluted by HCHs, but the residues of DDTs in a few samples has exceeded the criteria seriously, and the evident difference of residues exists in different regions. Geography information system was used to show the spatial distribution of HCHs and DDTs, and to determine the agricultural functional localization. Results showed that the soil in the east and south of Liaocheng is the best to produce green food; non-environmental pollution vegetable can be produced in the middle and west; the observed growing region lies in the northwest; and pollution area mainly lies in Linqing City.

ags:resource.dc:title: Gene analysis of sazmonfiiaenteritidis on three type secrete system from calves
牛源性肠炎沙门氏菌的三型分泌系统基因分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Fu Honglei, Qingdao Feed and Veterinary Drug Testing Station, Qingdao (China)
Li Yan, Qingdao Feed and Veterinary Drug Testing Station, Qingdao (China)
Du Dongdong, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 肠炎沙门氏菌是一类引起人与动物腹泻的病原菌，其致病性与三型分泌系统密切有关。本次试验研究临床上腹泻牛体内分离的一株肠炎沙门氏菌致病性与三型分泌系统的关系，试验选取SipA、SipD的基因序列进行测序分析。本次试验分别运用特异性引物扩增SipA、SipD的基因，连接到T载体上并测定目的片段序列。测出的序列在GeneBank上进行比对，以确定分离菌与其他菌株亲缘关系。试验结果显示该株肠炎沙门氏菌的SipA基因、SipD基因与肠炎沙门氏菌P125109同源性达100%。

Salmonella enteritidis was a kind of pathogenic bacteria causing human and animal diarrhea. The pathogenicity of it was closely related to type three secretion system. The study was aimed at the relationship between salmonella enteritidis separating from clinical diarrhea cow and the type three type secretion system. SipA and SipD gene were sequenced and analysed. We used specific primer to amplify SipA and SipD gene, connected T vector and determined the target fragment sequences. The measured sequences were compared in GeneBank to identify the relationship between the isolated bacteria and others. The test results showed that the the sequences of the strains of salmonella enteritidisSipA and SipD gene corresponded with salmonella enteritidis p125109 up to 100%. The study showed that the higher homology between SipAand SipD gene of type three secretiong system, the more similar of pathogenicity.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study of the avian diversity in the southern campus of Shandong Agricultural University
山东农业大学南校区校园鸟类多样性初步研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ren Yueheng, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Life Sciences
Gao Shuang, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Life Sciences
Kang Mingjiang, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Animal Sciences and Technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 2010年9月至2011年8月，应用路线调查法，结合鸟鸣声识别法，对山东农业大学南校区及周边实验田的鸟类进行了种类调查，共记录68种，隶属于11目31科。其中校区内繁殖鸟共有38种，占总数的55.9%。鸟类群落的优势种为麻雀（Passermontanus）。在校区四种生境中，鸟类多样性在林灌生境的最高，在建筑区的最低。新增5个泰安地区鸟种记录。

From September 2010 to August 2011, with the methods of line survey and birdsong identification, a survey of bird species was conducted in the Southern Campus and experimental fields around Shandong Agricultural University. Totally there were 68 bird species recorded, which belonged to 11 orders, 31 families. 38 species bred in the campus, accounting for 55.9% of the total. Sparrow (Passer montanus) was the dominant species of avian community. Among the four kinds of habitats, the highest avain diversity was in shrub and the lowest was in building area. Five new bird species had recorded in Tai’an.

ags:resource.dc:title: Assessment of climate suitability for introduction narcissus pseudonarcissus in Taian, Shandong
山东泰安地区引种荷兰水仙气候适宜性评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Qi Xuelong, Shandong Institute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)
Yang Juanxia, Shandong Institute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)
Wang Jiangyong, Shandong Institute of Pomology, Tai’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用年鉴资料获取泰安地区2001—2010年的气象资料，通过荷兰水仙生态习性的研究筛选评价指标，运用模糊综合评判法对泰安地区引种荷兰水仙的气候适宜性进行综合评价。结果表明：泰安地区属于引种荷兰水仙的适宜区，但夏季需要采取措施避免高温天气对荷兰水仙正常生长发育的影响。

The climate resources of 2001 - 2010 years in Taian area were acquired by researching the Almanac data. In order to choose the evaluation index, the Ecological Feature of Narcissus pseudonarcissus was researched. Climate suitability for introduction Narcissus pseudonarcissus in Taian area were evaluated by means of the fuzzy comprehensive evaluation. The result showed: that Narcissus pseudonarcissus is suitable to introduce in Taian area. But it is necessary of take measures in the summer in order to avoid the effects of high temperatures on the growth of Narcissus pseudonarcissus.

ags:resource.dc:title: The investigation and analysis of soil heavy metal pollution around one of the battery manufacturer in Tai’an
泰安市某蓄电池生产企业周围土壤重金属污染现状调查与分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Aixia, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China)
Jiang Yongdong, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China)
Wang Yujun, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 随着经济的迅猛发展和人们对电动车的需求，铅蓄电池生产企业越来越多。铅蓄电池的生产可能造成周围土壤的重金属污染。土壤受重金属污染后，不仅会退化土壤肥力，使农作物产量下降，而且可能通过食物链的传递危害人类健康。因此，土壤重金属污染问题受到越来越多的重视。泰安市世华电缆电池有限公司以生产铅酸蓄电池及零部件为主，为了解世华电缆电池有限公司周围土壤重金属污染情况，以该公司周围一定距离土壤样品为研究对象，在野外采样和实验室分析的基础上，评价企业周围土壤受Cu、Zn、Pb三种重金属的污染程度。结果表明，该公司周围环境中部分土壤样品中Cu、Zn、Pb含量与土壤环境背景值相比有显著提高（P0.05），但周边土壤中三种主要重金属的污染均未超过国家土壤环境质量二级标准，污染等级为清洁，公司对周围土壤重金属污染影响较小。

With the rapid development of economy and the peoples demand of the electric car, Lead-acid battery manufacturer will be more and more. Lead battery production may cause the soil heavy metal pollution. Soil by heavy metal pollution, will not only cause the degradation of soil fertility, make the crop yields down, but also do harm to human health through the food chain transfer. Therefore, soil heavy metal pollution has been paid more and more attention. Tai’an shihua cable battery limited company mainly produce lead-acid batteries and spare parts. In order to understand of heavy metal pollution around Taian shihua cable battery limited company, the soil samples were collected around the company at uariable distances, on the base of field sampling and laboratory room analysis, evaluation of the soil Cu, Zn, Pb pollution was made. The results show that some soil sampies of the company Cu, Zn, Pb concentrations exceed background values of soil environment of Shandong Province, but the three main heavy metals Cu, Zn, Pb contamination around the soil did not exceed the national environmental quality standards, pollution levels for clean, the company have little influence on the surrounding soil heavy metal pollution.

ags:resource.dc:title: Occurrence and damage investigation of grapholita molesta busck in Tai’an peach orchard
泰安桃园梨小食心虫发生与危害规律

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Guo Tingting, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Plant Protection
Zhang Shunyi, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Plant Protection
Ling Fei, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Plant Protection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文调查了山东泰安地区单植和混植桃园中梨小食心虫成虫发生动态及幼虫危害规律。结果表明：单植桃园中，梨小食心虫一年发生5代，具有世代重叠现象；老龄桃园与幼龄桃园折梢率分别为17.87％与14.80％，但差异不显著；老龄桃园中5、6和7月份折梢率分别为7.60％、10．60％和35.40％，幼龄桃园中3个月份折捎率分别为2.20％、9.80％和32.40％，均存在显著性差异；东、西、南、北4个方位折梢率无显著性差异，分别为老龄桃园17.67％、18.33％、15.67％和20.33％，幼龄桃园12.67％、16.67％、14.33％和18.33％。混植桃园中，梨小食心虫一年发生5代；3个月份折梢率差异显著，分别为5.80％、22.20％和32.00％；不同方位折梢率无显著性差异，4个方位分别为16.00％、22.00％、17.67％和26.33％；6、7月份虫果率分别为33.80％和38.20％，差异不显著；东、西、南、北4个方位虫果率分别为31.00％、43.00％、35.00％和39.00％，差异显著。

This paper investigated the population dynamics and damage of Grapholita molesta Busck in Tai’an monoculture and polyculture peach orchard. The results showed that in monocuhure peach orchard, G. molesta had five generations in one year with generation overlapping. The percentages of shoot tip damage in old and young peach orchard were lT. 84% and 14.80%, respectively, but there was no significant difference between them. The percentages of shoot tip damage in May, June and July were 7.60%, 10.60% and 35.40% in old peach orchard, while the percentages were 2.20%, 9.80% and 32.40% in young peach orchard, respectively. There were no significant differences in tip damage spatial distribution on the trees in both peach orchards. In polyculture peach orchard, G. molesta also had five generations in one year. As in monoculture peach orchard, there were significant differences in the percentages of shoot tip damage in the three months, and no significant differences of tip damage spatial distribution. There was no significant difference in the percentages of fruit damage between June (33.80%) and July (38.20%), but there were significant differences in the fruit damage spatial distribution in eastward (31.00%), westward (43.00%), southward (35.00%) and northward (39.00%) on the peach trees.

ags:resource.dc:title: The diversity of tomatoes’ lycopene content between Yantai and Xinjiang
烟台、新疆地区的番茄中番茄红素含量的差异

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Kan Yi, China Agriculture University (Yantai), Yantai (China), Facility Agriculture of Science and Engineering
Luo Xing, China Agriculture University (Yantai), Yantai (China), Facility Agriculture of Science and Engineering
LiHua, China Agriculture University (Yantai), Yantai (China), Facility Agriculture of Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了研究地域环境对番茄中番茄红素含量的影响，以烟台、新疆地区的番茄为研究材料，采用分光光度计法测定番茄含量。试验表明烟台和新疆地区番茄中番茄红素含量有较大差异，通过查阅文献和资料，从品种及栽培条件、温度、光照、水分三个方面分析产生差异的原因。

The factors influencing Lycopene content of Yantai and Xinjiang by spectrophotometry were investigated here. The study showed that the Lycopene content of tomatoes are quite different between Yantai and Xinjiang. Through consulting thesis and information, the differences may be made by species, cultivating, temperature, light, moisture and so on.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on the technology about antibacterial probiotics replace feed antibiotic
抑菌微生态制剂替代饲用抗生素技术研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ding Wenxiu, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Resources and Environment
Li Zhen, Shandong BaoLaiLiLai Biological Engineering Limited Liability Company, Taian (China)
Li Jingzhong, Environmental Protection Agency of Taishan District, Taian (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本课题筛选抑菌活性高的乳酸菌菌株和芽孢杆菌菌株，研究其代谢产物抑菌效果和抑菌谱，对抑菌谱不同的芽孢杆菌和乳酸菌复配，试验在动物上的效果。通过实验筛选抑菌性芽孢杆菌B7348和乳酸菌LP—11，将二者合理搭配可替代饲用抗生素在饲料中的使用。在提高机体抵抗力，减少发病率方面，已达到和超过饲用抗生素的效果。

This topic aims to sift lactic acid bacteria strains and bacillus strains with high activities of bacteria resistance. The effects of their metabolic product on bacteria resistance and antibacterial spectrum were studied, the bacillus and lactic acid bacteria was matched which will have different antibacterial spectrums. Their effects on animals were detected. The bacillus B7348 and lactic acid bacteria LP11 with high activities of bacteria resistance were selected through the test, the matched bacillus B7348 and lactic acid bacteria LP11 can replace the use of antibiotics in animal feed. Its effect was better than feed antibiotics in terms of improving the body resistance and reducing incidence of diseases.

ags:resource.dc:title: The investigation and analysis of ecological environment for the new countryside in the urban fringe of Zhengzhou city
郑州市城市边缘区新农村生态环境调查分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhao Yamin, Huanghe Science and Technology College, Zhengzhou (China), College of Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文从新农村居民的角度出发，以郑州市5个辖区的15个城市边缘区新农村为调查对象，实地考察这些新农村生态环境状况和居民对新农村生态环境建设的看法，深入分析其环境方面存在的问题，为制定合理的新农村环境建设对策提供依据，为全国其他大城市郊区农村环境建设提供借鉴。

Froming the angle of the new rural residents in zhengzhou city, the 15 cities around the zhengzhou of the Henan Capital the new rural survey was conducted. The new rural ecological environment situation and residents to the new rural construction of ecological environment view has known through local investigation. Analysis of the problems of the environment and reasonable new rural environment construction were proposed for the local government to provide basis for other large cities suburbs and to provide a reference for the construction of rural environment.

ags:resource.dc:title: Temperature automatic control system of intelligent executive desk
智能化大班台的温度自动控制系统

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Lu Zeguang, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), Forestry College
Wang Meng, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), Water Conservancy and Civil Engineering College
Jia Wanda, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), Forestry College

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了自动调节室内温度，形成舒适健康的办公环境，提高人员的工作效率和心理满意度，文章研究了智能化大班台的温度自动控制系统，探讨了信息接收及处理装置、信号发射装置和执行装置，设计了控制软件，借助继电器和空调可实现对室内温度的自动调节。

The research and development of temperature automatic control system of intelligent executive desks aimed at helping people to control the indoor air conditioning device, which conditioned indoor environment temperature automatically and promoted working efficiency and psychological satisfaction. Information accepting and management devices, signal shooting devices and executive devices were studied, the control software was designed. Then the automatic control of the indoor environment temperature could be achieved by the electric relay and air conditioning device.

ags:resource.dc:title: The study on determination and antioxidation of polysaccharides from Salvia miltiorrhiza f. alba
白花丹参多糖含量测定及其抗氧化性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Zhenliang, Taishan Medical University, Taian (China), Department of Chemical Engineering
Zhang ChangJun, Taishan Medical University, Taian (China), Department of Chemical Engineering
LiuKe, Taishan Medical University, Taian (China), Collge of Pharmacy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文首次研究白花丹参多糖的抗氧化性。水浴回流法提取白花丹参多糖，并采用对亚油酸过氧化的抑制作用和还原力测定其抗氧化能力。白花丹参多糖的总糖含量为34.2%。在实验设置的浓度范围内，白花丹参多糖的抗氧化能力随着浓度的增加而增加，1mg/mL的白花丹参多糖对亚油酸过氧化抑制率为23.05%。白花丹参多糖表现出较高的抗氧化性。

This paper first studied the antioxidant activity of polysaccharides from Salvia miltiorrhiza f. alba. The polysaccharides from Salvia miltiorrhiza f. alba were extracted by the water bath reflux method. The antioxidant activities in vitro of the polysaceharides were investigated by inhibition of linoleic acid peroxidation and determination of reducing power. The results showed that the content of total polysaccharides was 34.2%. In the setting concentration range, the antioxidant activities of the polysaccharides from Salvia miltiorrhiza f. alba increased with the elevation of concentration. The inhibition rate of linoleic acid peroxidation of 1mg/mL polysaeeharides was 23.05%. The results showed that the polysaccharides from Salvia miltiorrhiza f. alba had high antioxidant activity.

ags:resource.dc:title: Identification card system design in urban historical area – taking Mount Tai’an historical and cultural axis as an example
城市历史地段标识牌系统设计研究——以泰山历史文化轴线标识牌系统为例

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Qiang Wei, Forestry School of Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China)
Zhang Mingjun, Real Estate Developweut Cot., Lid of Taian Qingshan, Tai’an (China)
Yu Dongming, Forestry School of Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 随着城市改造步伐的加快，历史地段景观成为我们保护的重点，而标识设计又是强化地块性格特征的重要手段。结合泰山的文化景观轴线的特色，从泰山的历史文化因素及城市自然因素等对造型基础元素进行归纳与提炼，最后提出符合泰山历史文化轴线特色的标识牌设计的设计要点。

With the quickening pace of urban renewal, historic site landscape become a key point of our protection, and the identification card design is the important means which can strength the block character traits. When designing the historic urban logo, we not only enhance the urban cultural landscape, but also reveal the city characteristics. Based on the analysis on the similar cases at home and abroad, and combined with the Mount Tai’an cultural landscape axis characteristics to refine and summarize the basic elements of shape from the Mount Tai’an historical and cultural factors and the natural factors of the city. At last, this paper put forward the main points of design of the logo design axis which conforms to the Mount Tai’an culture characteristics.

ags:resource.dc:title: Bioassay and mechanism of allelopathy activity of ancient trees on raphanus sativus and brassica rapa
古树对萝卜、白菜化感作用的生物测定和作用机制研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xiaoying, Taishan Institute of Forestry science, Tai’an (China)
Feng Dianqi, Taishan Institute of Forestry science, Tai’an (China)
Zhang Yuanhu, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), Life science College

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以泰山古树（油松Pinus tabulaeformis和侧柏Platycladus orientalis）的土壤（根际土和非根际土）、剥落树皮和落叶为供体，萝卜（Raphanus sativus）和白菜（Brassica rapa）为受体，运用室内培养皿生物测定方法研究了古树的化感作用。结果表明，2种古树的根际土和落叶、古侧柏树皮水提取液对萝卜、白菜种子萌发、根系生长均表现为抑制作用，且随着提取液浓度的增加，其抑制作用增强，但2种古树本底土水提取液对白菜根系生长、古油松树皮水提取液对萝卜和白菜根系生长在低浓度时有促进效应，随着提取液浓度的升高，促进作用减弱，抑制作用增强，高浓度时为抑制作用。2种古树土壤、落叶水提取液浓度增加，2种受体幼苗丙二醛（MDA）含量呈上升趋势。在相同浓度条件下，古油松土壤水提取液对白菜幼苗根系生长的抑制指数高于萝卜，古侧柏土壤水提取液对萝卜的抑制指数高于白菜，即同一种化感物质对不同受体产生化感作用强度不同。

It was studied that the allelopathic effect of water extract of soil (rhizosphere soil and non rhizosphere soil), peeling bark and leaves of ancient trees of Tai Mountain (Pinus tabulaeformis and Platycladus orientalis) on Raphanus sativus and Brassica rapa by adopting indoor Petri dish bioassay methods. The results showed that rhizosphere soil, fallen leaves and peeling bark of the two kind ancient trees inhibited seed germination and root growth of Raphanus sativus and Brassiea rapa, and with the extracting solution concentration increased, the inhibition increased. The non rhizosphere soil water extracting solution of the two kind ancient trees stimulated root growth of Brassica rapa and peeling bark water extract of Pinus tabulaeformis stimulated the root growth of Raphanus sativus and Brassica rapa at low concentration, with the extracting solution concentration increase, stimulative effect weakened and inhibitive effect enhanced, finally, at high concentration it is inhibitive effect. With fallen leaves and soil water extracting solution concentration of the two kind Ancient trees increasing, malondialdehyde (MDA) content of the seedling of the two receptors increased. At the same concentration, the allelopathic inhibition response index of root growth of the seedling of Brassica rapa to water extract of soil of the Pinus tabulaeform/s was higher than that of Raphanus sativus, and the allelopathic inhibition response index of root growth of seedling of Raphanus sativus to water extract of soil of the Platycladus or/entalis was higher than that of Brassica rapa. The allelopathic response intensity of different receptor to the same allelochemical was different.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of Au nanoparticles on the specific amplification of long DNA fragments in polymerase chain reaction
金纳米粒子对聚合酶链式反应体系中长链DNA特异性扩增的效应

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Meitong, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Chemistry and Material Science
Zhu Shuhua, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Chemistry and Material Science
Zhou Jie, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Chemistry and Material Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以乙烯受体基因ETR1（2500bp）和山梨醇脱氢酶基因（SDH）（1100bp）为材料，研究了不同浓度金纳米粒子对聚合酶链式反应（PCR）体系中大于1000bp的长链DNA特异性扩增的效应。结果表明，金纳米粒子显著增强了ETR1和SDH在PCR时的特异性扩增，有效降低了非特异性扩增。在ETR1和SDH的PCR中，金纳米粒子适宜浓度为0.4nmol/L。在50℃-62℃的退火温度范围内，金纳米粒子均能够显著增强ETR1和SDH的特异性扩增。因此，金纳米粒子不仅提高了1000bp以上的长链DNA在PCR扩增的特异性，而且拓宽了PCR的退火温度范围。

Effects of different concentrations of Au nanoparticles on the specific amplification of long DNA fragments (more than 1000 bp) in polymerase chain reaction (PCR) were studied, using ethylene receptor ETR1 gene (2500 bp) and sorbitol dehydrogenase (SDH) gene (1100 bp) as materials. The results suggested that Au nanoparticles could significantly enhance the specific amplification of ETRI and SDH, and effectively reduce the nonspecific amplification in PCR. The proper concentration of Au nanoparticles was 0.4 nmol/L for ETR1 and SDH in PCR. When the annealing temperature was varied from 50 to 62℃, the specific amplifications of ETR1 and SDH in PCR could be increased as usual by Au nanoparticles. Therefore, Au nanoparticles could not only improve the specific amplification of long DNA with more than 1000 bp, but also broaden the range of annealing temperature in PCR.

ags:resource.dc:title: Large-scale development of SSR markers in the genome of cacao
可可全基因组SSR标记的开发及分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cao Hengchun, College of Plant Protection, Tai’an (China), Department of Tobacco
Wang Yi, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Agriculture
Huang Lisha, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Agriculture

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: SSR标记是一种广泛应用的分子标记技术，在可可基因组的研究中发挥了重要的作用。本研究运用生物信息学的方法，对可可全基因组进行了扫描，共得到10，4653个SSR区段。对这些sSR区段进行分析，发现含有碱基数目不同的重复单元之间具有较大的差异：含有七核苷酸的重复单元最多，为70，414个，占所有重复单元总数的67.3％；其次为二核苷酸重复单元，为23，272个，占总数的22.2％。在各类SSR单元中，不同核苷酸重复单元出现的频率有明显的差异，其中富含A／T重复单元的SSR单元数目最多，占总数的67％；而C／C重复单元的SSR单元数目较少，约占总数的0.02％。利用SSR单元的位点信息，设计出了65，861对引物，并在可可基因组中进行了电子PER扩增验证，结果显示100％的引物均能扩增出产物条带。在可可基因组中大规模开发的SSR标记，将为可可的进化、分类和遗传多样性研究提供参考。

SSR markers are widely used as the molecular markers technology. They play an important role in the study of Cacao genome. By large-scale developing in the whole genome of Cacao, a total of 104 653 SSR’s fragments were obtained. After being analyzed with the methods of bioinformatics, there was diversity among the different motifs of SSR: the most was septemnueleotide repeat unit, and accounting for up to 67.3%, and the second was dinueleotide repeat unit, accounting for 22.2%. Besides that, the number of (A/T)n repeats (67%) were more than the (C/G)n types (0.02%). With those SSR information got in Cacao, 65,861 pairs of SSR markers were finally designed out, which were also tested in the genome by e-PCR. And the results showed that 100% of those primers could obtain the target products. With so large of SSR markers got in the Cacao genome, it can be well promote the development of evolution, classification and diversity study.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on the best extraction method of peppers’ crude fat
辣椒粗脂肪提取最佳条件优化研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Peng Guihua, Guizhou Pepper Research lnstitute, Zunyi (China)
Han Shiyu, Guizhou Pepper Research lnstitute, Zunyi (China)
Yang Wanrong, Guizhou Pepper Research lnstitute, Zunyi (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为探明辣椒粗脂肪的最佳测定方法，通过L9（3*4）正交设计表，选择样品粒径、浸提温度、浸提时间和物料比作为考察因素，用脂肪提取仪SZF-06A研究了辣椒粗脂肪含量。结果表明：辣椒样品粒径对测定结果影响最大，之后依次是提取温度、物料比和、提取时间。根据以上研究结果确定，辣椒粗脂肪含量测定的最佳提取方案为辣椒粉末过100目分样筛，提取温度为50℃，提取时间为60min，物料比为1:100，提取率。

In order to explore the best determination methods of peppers’ crude fat, we took diameter of sample, extraction time and material ratio as the investigation factors, used L9 (3*4) orthogonal design and fat analyzer SZF-06A to determined peppers’ fat content. The result showed that, the order of the influence size on the determination result was that diameter of sample extraction temperature material ratio extraction time. On the basis of this result, we picked up the best scheme for peppers’ crude fat extraction was that pepper powder was passed the 100 - eqes screen, extraction temperature was 50℃, extraction time was 60min and the material ratio was 1:100.

ags:resource.dc:title: Correlation between FMC and WI of the dominant species in Lianyungang Huaguomountain
连云港花果山优势树种叶片含水率与水分指数相关性研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Gao Xiangwei, HuaiHai Institute of Technology, Lianyungang (China), School of Geodesy ＆ Geomaties Engineering
Fei Xianyun, HuaiHai Institute of Technology, Lianyungang (China), School of Geodesy ＆ Geomaties Engineering
Han Lingling, HuaiHai Institute of Technology, Lianyungang (China), School of Geodesy ＆ Geomaties Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 通过研究叶片含水率（FMC）与水分指数（WI）的相关性可以实现叶片含水率的快速测量，为模拟可燃物含水率随季节、天气变化而变化的规律准备基础，使林火预测预报更加准确。本文以连云港花果山赤松和麻栎两种优势树种叶片为样本，在室内测量其含水率和光谱曲线，利用统计方法分析含水率和水分指数的相关性。结果表明，光谱测量误差会影响叶片光谱反射率，使整个光谱曲线在一定范围内起伏不定，表现出一定的随机性，但当叶片含水率减少时，光谱曲线水分吸收小波谷的变化趋势是一致的，两种树种叶片的FMC和WI之间表现出较强的相关性。在森林火险预报研究中，完全可以利用地面高光谱遥感方法测量硼，用WI指示两种树种叶片含水率。

By studying the correlation between fuel moisture content (FMC) and water index (WI), the FMC could be measured rapidly. That was the basic work for simulation the FMC variation characteristics caused by season and weather, making forest fire forecast more accurate. In this study, leaves of Pinusdensiflora and Saw-tooth oak, two dominant species in Lianyungang Huaguo Mountain, were selected as Samples. The FMC and WI of sample leaves were obtained by indoor measurement, and then their correlation was analyzed by statistic method. The result showed that: spectrum measurement error could affect leaf reflectivity and make spectral curve fluctuating with certain scope showing certain random, but the variation trend of moisture absorption wave was consistent with FMC decreasing and the correlation was extremely significant between FMC and WI of two species leaves. For the study of forestry fire forecast, leaf FMC of the two species could be indicated by WI that could be measured by high spectral RS.

ags:resource.dc:title: Application of water quality identification index to environmental quality assessment of Nansi Lake
水质标识法在南四湖水质评价中的应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ma Guohong, Freshwater Fishery Research Institute of Shandong Province, Jinan (China)
Guo Fangfang, Freshwater Fishery Research Institute of Shandong Province, Jinan (China)
Xu Tao, Extension Station of Fisheries Technology in Shandong Province, Jinan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 根据2005-2011年南四湖5、8月份的实测结果，应用水质标识指数法对南四湖水环境状况分别进行单因子评价和综合评价。结果表明：2005～2011年期间，南四湖综合水质标识指数平均值分别为4.431，3.980，3.630，3.470，4.081，3.570，4.081，水质处于Ⅲ-Ⅳ类水，总体有所改善，但距离稳定达到IH类水质标准仍有差距；主要污染因子总氮（TN）、总磷（TP）、化学需氧量（CODMn），相应的单因子水质标识指数平均范围为3.58-6.88、2.23-8.42、3.47-4.73，叶绿素（Chla）标识指数平均范围为3.24-5.03，溶解氧（DO）和氨氮（NH3-N）标识指数平均范围为1.00-2.95、1.00-3.69，基本能达到指标要求。7年期间，各站点综合水质标识指数呈现5月份低、8月份高的规律性变化趋势。本文通过水质标识法对南四湖水质环境进行综合评价，为改善及修复南四湖水质提供支持。

This study was carried out to evaluate the water quality of Nansi Lake with the method of single factor and comprehensive water quality identification index, based on the data collected from six sampling sites from May 2005 to August 2011. The results indicated that the average comprehensive water quality identification index of Nansi Lake in seven years was 4.431, 3. 980, 3.630, 3.470, 4.081, 3.570, 4.081, respectively; the comprehensive water quality grade of Nansi Lake was between Ⅲ- Ⅳ, which has been improved, but not stable to water quality Ⅲ standard. The lake was mainly polluted by total nitrogen (TN), total phosphorus (TP), chemical oxygen demand (CODMn), and the corresponding single factor water quality identification index average range were 3.58 - 6.88, 2.23 - 8.42 and 3.47 - 4.73. The water quality identification index average range of the Chla was 3.24 - 5.03. The range of dissolved oxygen (DO) and ammonia-nitrogen (NH3-N) were 1.00 - 2.95 and 1.00 - 3.69, which could meet the standard of functional objectives of water. During the seven years, the comprehensive water quality identification index showed seasonal fluctuations, which was low in May, but high in August. The present study carried, out evaluating on Nansi Lake by water quality identification index, which provided support for the improvement and rehabilitation of Nansi Lake water quality.

ags:resource.dc:title: Wheel slip measurement in 4wd tractor based on LabVIEW
四轮驱动拖拉机滑转率的测量与特性分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhou Hui, Nanjing Institute of Industry Technology, Nanjing (China), Department of Energy And Electrical Engineering
Lu Zhixiong, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Engineering
Bai Xuefeng, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing (China), College of Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 设计了一套基于LabVIEW的四轮驱动拖拉机滑转率测量系统，介绍了系统的工作原理，包括系统的组成、传感器的工作原理、硬件电路设计与软件设计等。通过田间的试验验证了此系统的精确性，同时在不同耕深、不同作业地块下进行了拖拉机滑转率的测量实验。结果表明，拖拉机的滑转率随着耕深的变大逐渐变大，其存在一定的线性关系，速度的变化基本上不影响滑转率的变化。

A slip measurement system was developed for agricultural four wheel drive (4WD) tractors based on LabVIEW Software. The operating principle of this system, principle and installation method of encoder and radar-ground speed sensor were introduced. Hardware and software of the slip measurement system were designed. Slip measurement experiments were carried outment system and the slip characteristics were analyzed on driving and plowing. The accuracy of slip measure- Results show that error of this system is around 1.5% - 2.7% that the error can meet the requirements of the slip measurement system; there is a linear relation between slip and tillage depth for the slip become bigger with the increase of depth.

ags:resource.dc:title: The monitoring and evalution on in ground water Taishan district, Taian city
泰安市泰山区地下水质量现状评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Mingming, Shangdong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Resources and Environment
Li Guangde, Shangdong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Resources and Environment
Li Jingzhong, Taishan District Environmental protection Monitoring station, Taian (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以泰安市泰山区地下水13个监测点为调查对象，对地下水的温度、pH、氯化物、总硬度、氟化物、硫酸盐、高锰酸盐指数、硝酸盐、亚硝酸盐、氨氮十项指标进行了监测，并根据《地下水质量标准》（GB/T14848-93），运用单项组分评价方法对其进行评价。分析可知，总体来看，除氨氮含量超过Ⅲ类标准外，其余监测项目均在Ⅲ类标准以内，说明泰安市区地下水水质良好。

The goal of the paper is to evaluate the groundwater quality of Taishan district, Tai’an city. Using the thirteen monitoring points of Tai’an city to monitor its groundwater quality as the subject for the investigation. It takes the single-factor evaluation method to analyze the monitoring results of 10 of the water quality. These indicators include the temperature, pH, chloride, total hardness, fluoride, sulfate, potassium permanganate index, ammonia nitrogen, nitrate nitrogen and nitrite nitrogen. According to the quality standard for ground water and the single-factor evaluation method. It find out that all monitored items are within the 111 standards of except the content of ammonia nitrogen. It is thus concluded that the groundwater of Tai’an city is in a good quality.

ags:resource.dc:title: Automatic control system of baling and ensiling process on maize combine
玉米收获机秸秆青贮打捆过程自动控制系统

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Bao Wei, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Mechanical and Electronic Engineering
Chen Xi, ai’an Taishan Fushen Gear Box Co., Ltd, Tai’an (China)
Li Ruxin, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Mechanical and Electronic Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 为了简便驾驶员操作、降低劳动强度、提高机组作业效率，在自走式秸秆青贮打捆玉米收获机上设计了打捆过程自动控制系统，该系统主要由通用输入接口模块、处理器模块、输出接口模块等部分组成。通过对信号轮是否转动和触点开关开闭的检测，来为处理器模块提供检测信号，然后通过通用输出接口模块驱动执行元件，实现喂料、送绳的启停和仓门的开闭控制。

In order to enhance operation efficiency and reduce the operating burden of driver, an automatic control system on baling and ensiling apparatus was designed. This system mainly consists of general input interface module, the CPU module and the general output interface modules. Based on signal of wheel rotation and switch opening or closing, and the processor module driver actuators in order to realize module provides signal, and then through the general output interface the control of feeding, sending the rope and opening or closing the door.

ags:resource.dc:title: Effect of plant growth regulators on seed germination of impatiens balsamen
植物生长调节剂对茶花凤仙种子发芽的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Fuping, Hanshan Normal University, Chaozhou (China), Department of Biology
Lin Xiaoting, Hanshan Normal University, Chaozhou (China), Department of Biology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 分别采用不同浓度的吲哚乙酸（IAA）、吲哚丁酸（IBA）、赤霉素（CA3）、萘乙酸（NAA）、6-苄氨基嘌呤（5-BA）处理茶花风仙种子。结果表明：不同浓度的IAA、IBA、GA3、NAA和6-BA均可缩短茶花凤仙种子发芽时间，提高种子发芽率和活力指数以及简化活力指数等。与CK对比，IAA促进茶花风仙种子发芽与幼苗生长的最佳浓度为25mg/L，而GA3、NAA、IBA和6-BA等植物生长调节剂的理想浓度则分别为250mg/L、20mg/L、25mg/L和15mg/L。其中，25mg/L的IAA对茶花风仙种子发芽和幼苗生长的作用效果最好。

This article analyzed the plant growth regulators such as IAA, IBA, GA3, NAA and 6-BA on the seed germination and seeding growth of Impatiens balsamen. The results showed that different concentration of IAA, IBA, NAA, GA3 and 6-BA can shorten the time of impatiens seed germination, improve the seed germination rate, vital index and simplified vigor index. Compared with CK, the treatment with 25 mg/L IAA could obviously enhance the seeds germination and seeding growth. However, 250 mg/L GA3, 20 mg/L NAA, 25 mg/L IBA and 15 mg/L 6-BA were ideal concentration for the seeds to grow. Among them, IAA of 25 mg/L could promote seeds germination and seeding growth of impatiens balsamen best.

ags:resource.dc:title: Different color films affect the growth and development of eggplant
不同颜色棚膜对茄子生长发育的影响

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Yuan Cheng, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering
Jia Junfen, Yingjisha Agricultural Technology Extension Center of Xinjiang, Yingjisha (China)
Gao Rongguang, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Horticulture Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 利用不同颜色（无色、紫色、蓝色和红色）薄膜覆盖拱棚，分析探讨了不同光环境对‘吉龙长茄’生长发育的影响。结果表明，光强一致或不一致条件下，茄子叶片中叶绿素a和b含量均以蓝色膜下最高，且显著高于无色膜处理；叶绿素a／b比值则以无色膜下最大。茄子叶片净光合速率、干物质积累量及根系活力在未调节光强时均以无色膜下最高；调整光强后则为红色膜下最高。两茬试验中，茄子株高均以紫色膜下最高；而茎粗在未调节光强时以无色膜下最高，调节光强后则以红色膜下最高。综上所述，在光强一致的条件下，红色膜处理更有利于茄子的生长发育。

Using different color films (colorless, red, purple, blue), the effects of different light conditions on the growth and development of Jilong changqie: were studied The results showed that whether the light intensity was congistent or not, the contents of chlorophyll a and chloroph were significantly higher than under the colorless film treatment. yll b were the highest under the blue film and However, the ratio of chlorophyll a and b was the highest under the colorless film treatment. The net photosynthetic rate, dry matter accumulation and the root activity of eggplant were the highest under the colorless film when without adjusting the light intensity and highest under red film after adjusting the light intensity. During the period of two crops, the plant height of eggplant was the highest under the purple film, but the stem diameter was highest under the colorless film when without adjusting of light intensity and highest under the red film after the light intensity being adjusted. The resuits above suggested that the red film was conducive to the growth and development of eggplant after adjusting the light intensity.

ags:resource.dc:title: The study of action and inhibition mechanism of extracts from ailanthus on amaranthusretroflexus growth
臭椿提取物对杂草反枝苋抑制生长和作用机理研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Shujuan, College of biological and brewing engineering of Taishan University, Taian (China)
Liu Zhongde, College of biological and brewing engineering of Taishan University, Taian (China)
Wu Rentao, College of chemistry and chemical engineering of Taishan University, Taian(China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文采用不同浓度臭椿提取物处理杂草反枝苋种子，测定反枝苋的发芽率、鲜重、叶绿素含量、过氧化物酶活性及脯氨酸含量。结果表明：臭椿提取物能够抑制反枝苋种子的发芽率，影响幼苗的生长，降低幼苗鲜重，减少叶绿素含量，提高过氧化物酶活性及脯氨酸的含量，并且随着提取物浓度的提高，效果明显增加。

Amaranthusretroflexus seeds were treated with different concentrations of extracts from ailanthus, the germination rate, fresh weight, chlorophyll contents, peroxidase activity and proline contents were detected. The results showed that the extracts of ailanthus could inhibit the germination rate, influence the growth of seedlings, reduce the seedling fresh weight, decrease the chlorophyll contents and increase peroxidase activity and proline contents. Furthermore, the effects were raised with the extracts concentration increasing.

ags:resource.dc:title: Comparison of the hygromycin and bialaphos as selective agents in barley transformation
大麦转化中潮霉素和草丁膦的筛选效果研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Han Xiuli, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), Shandong Key Laboratory of Crop Biology
Wang Wenliang, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), Shandong Key Laboratory of Crop Biology
Tian Tian, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), Shandong Key Laboratory of Crop Biology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本研究以大麦品种“Golden Promise”幼胚为受体材料，建立了农杆菌介导的大麦遗传转化方法。实验利用携带潮霉素磷酸转移酶基因却讲（潮霉素抗性）和草丁膦乙酰转移酶基因Bar（草丁膦抗性）的载体PC551，研究了潮霉素及草丁膦对转基因幼胚的愈伤组织诱导、植株再生、生根等过程的影响，结果表明潮霉素的筛选效果优于草丁膦。通过除草剂Rely280涂抹、PCR检测以及黄色荧光观察等多种方法验证转基因后代，结果表明以潮霉素为筛选剂得到再生苗的阳性率显著高于以草丁膦为筛选剂的阳性率。因此在大麦遗传转化体系中，潮霉素更适合作为筛选剂。

Selective agents play important roles in generating transgenic plants. In this study, a binary construct PC551 was prepared containing two selective matrices of the hygromycin phosphotransferase gene (HptII, Hygromycin resistance) and the phosphinothricin acetyhransferase gene (Bar, Bialaphos resistance). PC551 was used to study the efficiency of hygromycin and bialaphos in screening of transgenic plants in cultivated barley “Golden Promise”. It was shown that hygromycin performed as a superior selective agent during the course of callus induction, shoot regeneration, and root regeneration. Herbicide painting, PCR analysis, and fluorescence-detection were further used to confirm transgenic to plants. It was demonstrated that hygromycin was associated with a higher transformation efficiency than bialaphos. Therefore, hygromycin is a preferable selective agent in genetic transformation of barley.

ags:resource.dc:title: Characteristic analysis on the ancienr Ginko trees in Hui county and Kang county of Gansu province
甘肃省徽县和康县银杏古树的调查分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ren Juanxia, College of Forestry of Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China)
Xing Shiyan, College of Forestry of Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China)
Liu Xiaojing, College of Forestry of Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 对甘肃省徽县和康县银杏古树进行了调查，两县各有银杏古树66株，总计132株，其中一级古树51株；二级古树12株；三级古树45株；另有20株古树树龄目前尚不明确。徽县银杏古树集中分布于嘉陵镇，其田家河上、下坝村分布最多，占到全县银杏古树的71.4%；康县在王坝乡、岸门口镇、阳坝镇和白杨乡等4个重点乡镇有银杏古树的分布，占到该县整个银杏古树资源的80.30%。两县银杏古树垂直分布在海拔1250m以下，一般生长在庙宇、古道附近及村庄房前屋后或路边的山坡、河谷地上。综合分析各项生长指标，徽县和康县平均树高分别为19.8m、27.1m；平均树龄分别为1176年、500年；平均胸径分别为1.16m、1.22m；平均冠幅分别为163.84m2、334.89m2；树龄、树高、胸径和冠幅的最大值依次为3000年、54.0m、4.82m（基）和35.6m×36.5m。

Ancient Ginkgo trees were invesgated in Hui County and Kang County. The result showed that there were totally 132 ancient Ginkgo trees and each had 66 trees in the two counties, of which 51 trees were at first class level, 12 at second level, 45 at third class level, and the other 20 not clear. In Hui County, Ginkgo trees were concentrated in the Jialing town, of which, Tianheshangba Village and Tianhexiaba Village distributed the most, accounting for 71.4% of the whole ancient Ginkgo trees’in Hui County. In Kang County, there were four key towns, that is, Wangba, Anmenkou, Yangba and Baiyang Town etc, distributed the ancient Ginkgo trees, accounting for 80.30% of the whole Ginkgo trees resources in Kang County. The vertical distribution of the trees in two counties was both blow an altitude of 1 250 m, and most of the trees generally grew in temples, near the ancient road and on the roadside slopes or the river valley of the village, which was in front or behind of the house. With comprehensive analysis of various growth index in Hui County and Kang County, the average tree height was 19.8 m, 27.1 m; the average age 1 176 a, 500 a; the average DBH (diameter at breast height) 1.16 m, 1.22 m; the average crown breadth 163.84 m2, 334.89 m2; the maximum of tree age, tree height, DBH and crown diameter successively 3 000 a, 54.0 m, 4.82 m (in base) and 35.6 m 36.5 m.

ags:resource.dc:title: The theoretical analysis about the problem of water transport across the plant cell membrance
关于跨越植物细胞膜的水分运输问题的理论分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Liu Yujing, Ludong University College of Life Science, yantai (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 植物细胞和环境之间的水分交换是一个复杂的过程，这不仅涉及到细胞膜两侧的水势差，而且由于细胞膜通常都不是理想的半透膜导致两种后果，一是水分的越膜运输还伴随着离子转移，二是渗透势对于水分的驱动力和同等大小的压力势对越膜水流的作用是不等效的，这就使得有关的分析计算变得很复杂。但是，在研究细胞膜上水通道对于细胞膜的水的透性作用时，就必须进行这种分析计算。目前国内相关的研究较少，更缺乏相关的理论分析方面的介绍，本文特就此问题作一概述。

The water exchange between plant cells and the environment is a complex process, which not only involves the water potential difference on both sides of the cell membrane, and because the cell membrane is usually not ideal semi -permeable membrane two consequences, one is the water transport is accompanied by the membrane ion transfer. It is osmotic potential for the size of the water drive and equal pressure potential Vietnam film flow is not equivalent, which makes the relevant analysis and calculation becomes very complex. However, in the cell membrane water channel for the membrane water permeability function, the analysis and calculation is a must. At present domestic related research is less, more the lack of relevant theoretical analysis of introduction, this paper gives a review on the issue venter.

ags:resource.dc:title: Impact study of cd on physiological and biochemical characteristics of wheat seedling at the action of Si
硅作用下汞对小麦幼苗生理生化指标的影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Dongxiang, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Resources and Environment
Li Guangde, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Resources and Environment
Zhang Hua, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), College of Resources and Environment

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 采用水培试验，研究在不同加硅量作用下，汞对小麦幼苗叶绿素含量、抗氧化酶系统活性（SOD、POD、CAT）、脯氨酸含量、可溶性蛋白含量以及MDA含量的影响。结果表明：在加硅量（30，60，90，120mg/L）作用下，叶绿素a、脯氨酸、可溶性蛋白的含量和SOD酶活性与对照相比均有显著提升，MDA含量则显著降低，说明硅缓解了汞毒害对小麦幼苗的影响；在加硅量150mg/L作用下，小麦幼苗抗氧化酶系统（SOD、CAT、POD）的活性以及脯氨酸、可溶性蛋白质的含量与对照相比均无显著性差异，但是叶绿素8含量的升高和MDA含量的降低依然缓解了汞毒害对小麦幼苗的影响；在加硅量180mg/L作用下，虽然小麦幼苗叶绿素8含量有所升高，MDA含量有所降低，但是SOD酶活性、脯氨酸和可溶性蛋白含量与对照相比均显著降低。

The water culture experiment was conducted to investigate the effects of Hg on chlorophyll content, antioxidant enzyme system activity (SOD, POD, CAT), proline content, soluble protein content and MDA content of wheat seedling with different concentrations of Si. The results showed: at the action of Si (30, 60, 90, 120 mg/L), chlorophyll-a content, proline content, soluble protein content, SOD activity of wheat seedling were increased and MDA content was droped, alleviating the toxicity of Hg on wheat seedlings; at the action of Si 150 mg/L, antioxidant enzymes system (SOD, CAT, POD) activity, proline content, soluble protein content of wheat seedlings compared with the control group showed no significant difference, but chlorophyll-a content was increased and MDA content was droped, alleviating the toxicity of Hg on wheat seedlings; at the action of Si l80 mg/L, chlorophyll-a content increased and MDA content droped, but SOD activity, proline content, soluble protein content of wheat seedling were droped.

ags:resource.dc:title: Intensive land use evaluation for rural residential area in Jinan city
济南市农村居民点土地集约利用评价

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Xiaoming, Shandong Normal University, Jinan (China)
Yang Hongchao, Shandong Normal University, Jinan (China)
Sun Kai, Bureau of Land Resources of Jinan, Jinan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 农村居民点土地集约利用是当前新农村建设中的重要问题。本文以济南市为例，选取农村居民点布局紧凑度、农村居民点投人强度、土地利用强度、土地利用产出等因素，构建农村居民点土地集约利用评价指标体系，采用多因素综合评价法对农村居民点土地利用集约度进行了评价，为了增强某些重要评价因素的显著性，采用障碍诊断方法分析制约农村居民点土地集约利用的限制因素。结果表明，济南市农村居民点土地利用可划分为3个集约等级，其中城乡结合部经济相对发达地区的农村居民点土地集约利用水平高于其他地区；影响济南市农村居民点土地集约利用的主要障碍因素为农民年人均纯收入、人均农村居民点用地面积、公共设施建设状况、农村居民点用地综合容积率和农村道路密度。研究结果可为济南市农村建设规划和农村居民点整理提供参考。

Intensive rural residential land use is an important issue of new countryside construction. Taking Jinan city as an example, an evaluation index system is established by selecting factors such as compact degree of rural settlements, intensity of investment in rural residential, land use intensity and land-use output to evaluate the rural residential land intensive degree with the multi-factor comprehensive evaluation method. Furthermore, in order to enhance the significance of some important evaluation factors, the obstacles diagnostic method is used to analyze the factors which restrict intensive rural residential land use. The research results show that the rural residential land in Jinan city is divided into 3 rank regions. The rural residential land intensive degree in developed urban-rural fringe area is higher than that in other areas. The main obstacle factors restricting intensive rural residential land use are Per capita net income of farmers, Per capita rural residential land area, condition of pub-lie facilities, rural residential land comprehensive volume fraction and rural road density. This research results can provide reference for countryside construction planning and rural residential land consolidation in Jinan city.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of yeast on phenolic compounds of dry
酵母对桑椹酒中酚类物质的影响研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Shi Hongmei, handong Grapevine and Wine Making Institute, Jinan (China)
Sun Yuxia, handong Grapevine and Wine Making Institute, Jinan (China)
Jiang Xilong, handong Grapevine and Wine Making Institute, Jinan (China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 选用7种商品酵母发酵桑椹酒，研究各菌株对桑椹酒中酚类物质和颜色的影响。结果表明各酒样中总酚、总花色苷、矢车菊素-3-葡萄糖苷和其他3种单体酚的含量存在显著性差异；色度和色调也有差异，其中RC212、DV10和D254发酵酒的色度较高。

Seven kinds of yeasts were used in dry mulberry wine fermentation and effects of different yeasts strains on phenolic compounds and colors of mulberry wine were studied. The results showed that there was significant difference between total phenols, total anthocyanin, cyanidin-3-0-glucoside chloride and other three single phenols. And there was also difference between chromaticity and tonality. The chromaticity of mulberry wines inoculated RC212, DV10 and D254 were higher.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on soil micro-ecological model of succession cropping obstacle in ganodermalucidum
灵芝连作障碍的土壤微生态研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ma Hongmei, Qiongzhoucollege, Sanya (China), College of bioscience and technology
Chen Yonggan, Qiongzhoucollege, Sanya (China), College of bioscience and technology
Xu Xiaoxiong, Qiongzhoucollege, Sanya (China), College of bioscience and technology

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 探讨了灵芝连作障碍的土壤微生物作用机制，并从恢复土壤微生态结构认识出发，提出通过生物防治、仿野生栽培及轮作三个方面解决灵芝的连作障碍。

The soil microbial mechanism of continuous cropping obstacles in ganodermalucidum was analyzed. Based on the theory of restoring soil micro-ecology, the three control methods, namely, biological control, imitative wild cultivation and rotation, were put forward to figuring out succession cropping obstacle.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on the evaluation and change of soil quality in hilly land consolidation region
丘陵土地整理区土壤质量评价及其变化研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Wang Ailing, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Resources and Environment
Liu Fengrong, Shandong Land Surveying ＆ Plamning Institute, Jinan (China)
Wang Qingfang, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Resources and Environment

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文以莱芜市里辛土地整理项目为例，采用野外采样、室内分析、GIS技术和综合评价法，研究了丘陵土地整理区土壤质量评价方法及其变化。研究结果表明，土地整理后研究区土壤质量级别空间分布、面积和总体质量水平均发生变化。整理前，土壤质量共分为四级，各级面积比重差异不大，分别为19.07%、25.52%、26.81%和28.6%，空间分布较零散。整理后，一级和三级面积增加，二级和四级面积减少，一、二、三、四级各级面积比重差异显著，分别为26.56%、23.61%、38.19%和11.64%，空间分布相对集中。整理后土壤质量总体提高4.68%。评价方法对土地整理土壤质量评价有借鉴意义，评价结果可为里辛土地整理项目绩效评价提供依据。

Taking Lixin Land Consolidation Project of Laiwu City as an example, combining field survey, indoor analysis, GIS technology with comprehensive evaluation method, evaluation method and change of soil quality in hilly land consolidation region were studied. The results indicated grade spacial distribution, area and total quality level of soil quality changed before and after land consolidation. Before land consolidation, soil quality was devided into 4 grades and spacial distribution was much scattered. The area propotion of grade 1,2, 3, and 4 was 19.07%, 25.52%, 26.81% and 28.6% respectively and the propotion difference was little before land consolidation. After land consolidation, area of grade 1 and 3 increased and grade 2 and 4 decreased. The area propotion of grade 1,2, 3 and 4 was 26.56%, 23.61%, 38.19% and 11.64% respectively and the propotion difference was obvious. Grade spacial distribution was concentrated relatively and total soil quality level increased 4.68% after land consolidation. The evaluation method has instructive significance for soil quality evaluation of land consolidation, and the results may provide scientific basis for performance evaluation of Lixin Land Consolidation Project.

ags:resource.dc:title: Using SSR markers to construct a fingprint map of major tobacco cultivars
烟草主栽品种的SSR指纹图谱的构建及其应用

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Huang Lisha, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Agronomy
Cao Hengchun, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Plant Protection
Wang Yi, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an (China), College of Agronomy

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 普通烟草（Nicotiar tatabacum L）主栽品种的遗传背景狭窄，形态学上相似程度高，迫切需要从分子水平上鉴定。本研究利用已知烟草序列，设计成烟草SSR标记库，从62对候选引物中筛选出21对多态性高、稳定性好的引物作为核心引物，构建9份烟草主栽品种DNA指纹图谱；共扩增出125个基因位点；每对引物扩增到等位基因位点2～12个，平均6个。遗传聚类结果显示，各个品种之间遗传相似系数变化范围为0.507-0.916，平均值为0.726，同一来源育成的品种聚在一类，说明它们的遗传关系较近。引物鉴别能力PIC值的变化范围0.37-0.86，平均值为0.67，其中9对引物在5个品种中具有特征带型。最少采用4对引物进行组合鉴定即可将9个烟草品种完全区分开，这些标记在烟草品种纯度鉴定中，具有很好的应用前景。

It’s an effective way to determine them by molecular markers because the genetic background and morphology of major tobacco cultivars were similar. In this study, a DNA fingerprinting of 9 major tobacco cultivars was constructed based on simple sequence repeats (SSR). 21 SSR primer pairs with high polymorphisms and good repeatability were screened out from 62 candidates as core primers to construct the fingerprinting database. A total of 125 alleles were detected by 21 SSR markers in 9 accessions with an average of 6 alleles per locus, The number of alleles ranged from 2 to 12. The PIC value ranged from 0.37 to 0.86 with an average of 0.67. There were 9 primer pairs amplified specific amplifications in 5 accessions. In addition, using 4 primer pairs we developed could completely identify the 9 major cultivars. Therefore, it’s a promising prospect of application in purity identification in major tobacco cultivars by fingerprinting.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of codon use features of plant disease resistance gene
植物抗病基因密码子使用特性分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Han Shuxiao, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China)
Sun Fulai, Seed Management station of Binzhou City, Binzhou (China)
Liu Quanlan, Qingdao University of Science and Technology, Qingdao (China), College of Chemical Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 植物抗病基因（R基因）相对植物整个基因组进化较快，且作用机制复杂，抗病基因一直是遗传及病理学研究的热点问题。本研究运用CodonW等软件对多种植物的42个不同抗病基因进行密码子偏好性及聚类分析，初步探究了植物抗病基因密码子使用模式。结果表明水稻Xal3、Xa21以及Xa27基因和玉米Hml基因明显区别于大部分R基因，除了这4个基因外之外，大部分R基因偏好于使用以A或T结尾的密码子，碱基组成AT含量大于GC。TTG、CTT、TAT等28个密码子为R基因的偏爱密码子，其中24个以A或T结尾。聚类结果在一定程度上反映了不同抗病功能基因的相似性及相同抗病基因的差异性。本研究为新的R基因的预测及R基因相关基因工程操作提供了一定参考。

Compared to the whole genome, plant disease resistance genes (R genes) are highly diverse and evolved rapidly, and their mechanism of action is complex. The study of Resistance genes has been a hot spot area in Genetics and pathology. In this study, CodonW was used to analyze codon usages of 42 R genes from different plants. The results showed that the codons ending with A/T, especially T, were frequently used and GC content was lower than AT content in most of R genes. Relative synonymous codon usage (RSCU) analyses showed that 28codons were preferable in the codons of coding DNA sequences (CDS) of R genes. Both cluster trees based on the relative RSCU and CDS of R gene could not reveal the evolutional relations of plant species. However, they could indicate the similarity of genes with different functions and the differences between genes having same disease to some extent. Xa13,Xa21, Xa27 and Hml were significantly from most of R gene. For example, they use the codons ending with G/T more frequently than that ending with A/T. This study provided certain reference for the prediction of new R genes and the operation of gene engineering R genes.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research on ecological planning method of north China coastal wetland - Taking Jincang National Wetland Park master plan in Laizhou Bay of Shandong province as an example
中国北方滨海湿地生态规划方法探讨——以山东莱州湾金仓国家湿地公园总体规划为例

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhang Xinwen, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), Forestry College
Zang Dekui, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), Forestry College
Zheng Xi, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian (China), Forestry College

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在生态设计意识不断增强的今天，如何通过规划设计尽可能的减少对自然环境的负面影响，如何增强自然环境的自我修复能力，成为当今设计师所关注的问题。通过对莱州湾金仓滨海湿地的现状进行SWOT分析，确定了山东莱州湾金仓国家湿地公园的生态规划目标及相应的技术措施。介绍了在功能分区、保护欲恢复规划、水系规划、生态旅游项目规划、交通组织等方面的具体规划方法，以修复本地区的湿地生态环境，实现北方滨海湿地生态的可持续发展。

As the awareness of eco-design growing up, designers pay much attention on the concerns about reducing the negative impact on the natural environment through design and enhancing the capability of self-repairing. Through the SWOT analysis of the status of Laizhou Bay Jincang coastal wetland, determining the eco-logical planning objectives and corresponding technical measures for the Jincang National Wetland Park in Laizhou Bay of Shandong province. In this paper, many planning methods were introduced, such as functional partitioning, protection for recovery planning, system planning, eco-tourism project planning and transportation planning organization. It can be realized the sustained development of northern coastal wetland to repair wetland ecological environment.
